Stir until sugar dissolves. Reduce heat to medium and simmer until peels lose their bright color. Remove apple peels with tongs or a slotted spoon. Continue simmering until mixture has reduced by half. Test consistency by dipping a spoon into the mixture and then rubbing your finger across it. You will be able to tell when it has thickened. Cooking time will vary. You may can this in sterile jars or let it cool and keep in the refrigerator. ; name: chow yuk ; ingredients: turkey breast, celery, onion, mushroom, water chestnut, brown sugar, soy sauce, salt ; preparation:Saute the turkey strips in a little oil until browned. Add the celery, onion, mushrooms and water chestnuts. Stir-fry until the onion becomes translucent. Add the brown sugar, salt and soy sauce, cook for an additional 10 minutes until ready. Serve with plain white rice. ; name: frozen peanut butter cream cups ; ingredients: whipping cream, marshmallow cream, cream cheese, peanut butter, chocolate ; preparation:Beat whipping cream until stiff. In a large bowl, with the same beaters, beat the marshmallow cream, cream cheese and peanut butter until smooth. Fold in gently the whipped cream into the peanut butter mixture. Line muffin cups with muffin cup papers. Separate the mixture evenly into the muffin cups. Cover and freeze for 3 or more hours, or until firm. Sprinkle with grated chocolate if desired. ; name: sourdough sandwiches ; ingredients: chive & onion cream cheese, lemon juice, dijon-style mustard, garlic pepper seasoning, sourdough bread, smoked turkey breast, provolone cheese, roasted sweet peppers, spinach leaves ; preparation:

name: pecan crunch fudge ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, evaporated milk, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, pecans, almond brickle chips, vanilla, pecan halves ; preparation:Combine brown sugar, butter and evaporated milk in a 3 quart saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until mixture reaches soft ball stage. Remove from heat. Stir in butterscotch morsels and marshmallow creme. Beat vigorously with a wooden spoon until mixture is smoooth and just begins to cool. Stir in chopped pecans, brickle chips and vanilla. Spread mixture evenly into 2 buttered 8-inch square pans. Cool completely, and cut into squares. Gently press pecan half on each square if desired. Store in airtight container. ; name: baked pear custard for toddlers ; ingredients: olive oil, pear, milk, nutmeg, vanilla essence ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Lightly oil a medium sized ramekin. Spoon pre-cooked pear into ramekin. Beat egg and milk together lightly. Pour the mixture over the pear. Sprinkle a little nutmeg on top. Place ramekin inside a larger ovenproof dish. Fill dish with water till halfway up the ramekin. Bake in oven for 40mins or until custard is set. ; name: sizzling sherry shrimp with garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, paprika, medium shrimp, dry sherry, salt & freshly ground black pepper, parsley ; preparation:Heat olive oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, and paprika in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot and the garlic has turned golden brown, increase heat to high and add the shrimp. Cook until the shrimp turn pink and opaque, about 3 minutes. Deglaze the pan with sherry or lemon juice and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve garnished with chopped parsley. ; name: warm spinach and rice chicken salad ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing, chicken rice pilaf mix, fresh spinach, tomatoes, pitted ripe olives ; preparation:Brush chicken with 2 teaspoons of the salad dressing. Grill or broil chicken, turning once, for 20 to 25 minutes or until juices run clear. Meanwhile, prepare rice pilaf mix according to package directions. Combine hot cooked rice with remaining salad dressing, spinach, tomatoes and olives. Stir until spinach is slightly wilted. Spoon rice mixture onto serving plates. Top with sliced chicken breast. ; name: jumbo shrimp with chive butter ; ingredients: dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, butter, fresh jalapeno, chives, jumbo shrimp, flour ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Place mustard in a bowl, whisk in lemon juice, then melted butter. Add chopped chives and jalapeno. Season with pepper. Arrange shrimp cut side up, on broiler pan. Brush with some butter mixture. Broil until cooked through 4 minutes. Serve, garnishing with whole chives if using and pass remaining butter for dipping. ; name: streusel crumb topped apple pie ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie shell, granny smith apples, sugar, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, flour, light brown sugar, butter ; preparation:

name: perfect no cook strawberry ice cream ; ingredients: strawberry, sugar, fresh lemon juice, salt, heavy cream ; preparation:Coarsely mash strawberries with sugar, lemon juice, and salt using a potato masher in a large bowl. Let stand, stirring and mashing occasionally, 10 minutes. Transfer half of strawberry mixture to a blender and pure with cream until smooth. Return strawberry cream to bowl with remaining strawberries and chill, stirring occasionally, until very cold, 3 to 6 hours. Freeze mixture in ice cream maker. Transfer to an airtight container and put in freezer to firm up. ; name: microwave risotto ; ingredients: onions, extra virgin olive oil, arborio rice, chicken stock, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh herbs ; preparation:In a microwave safe bowl, combine the chopped onion and shortening. Microwave on high for 4 minutes, stirring once after 2 minutes. Add the rice and stir to coat the grains with the oil. Microwave on high for 4 more minutes. Add the chicken broth and return bowl to microwave. Cook the rice on high for 18 minutes, stirring once half way through. Stir again before the last 2 minutes and check to see that the liquid is almost all absorbed. Take the bowl from the microwave and let the rice absorb the last of the liquid, stirring 2 or 3 times. Add the cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste. Before serving, you may add whatever mined herbs you like, swirl in a pat or butter, or some milk or cream if you like a creamier risotto. ; name: gloucester cheese and ale ; ingredients: double gloucester cheese, english mustard, brown ale, whole wheat bread ; preparation:Arrange the cheese slices in the bottom of a large ovenproof dish, and spread the mustard over the top of them. Pour in enough brown ale to just cover the cheese. Cover with foil, then bake at 375 fahrenheit for about 10 minutes, until the cheese has softened. Meanwhile, toast the bread. Pour the warm ale and cheese over the toast and serve immediately. ; name: orange delight salad ; ingredients: fat-free sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, sugar-free orange gelatin, crushed pineapple, mandarin oranges ; preparation:Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Mix in pineapple and oranges. Chill. ; name: jalapeno pepper mac n cheese ; ingredients: salt and pepper, cavatappi pasta, extra virgin olive oil, jalapenos, serrano chilies, garlic cloves, whole milk, cream cheese, dried onion flakes, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of water to a boil, salt it, add the pasta and cook until al dente. Drain and return to the pot. In a skillet, heat a drizzle of evoo over medium heat. Add the jalapenos, serranos and garlic and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add to the pasta. Preheat the broiler. In a saucepan, combine the milk, cream cheese and onion over medium-low heat. Cook, stirring, until smooth, 5 minutes. Stir into the pasta. Stir in the jack cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer the pasta to a baking dish and broil until browned, about 3 minutes. ; name: light oriental style vegetables ; ingredients: slivered almonds, frozen mixed vegetables, celery, sliced mushrooms, reduced sodium soy sauce, water ; preparation:

name: ham egg cheese cups ; ingredients: eggs, ham, frozen spinach, cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. Press a slice of ham into each muffin cup. Evenly distribute spinach between muffins cups. Evenly distribute cheese between muffin cups. Crack 1 egg to each muffin cup. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25 min or until done. ; name: pizza witches ii ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, ripe olives, tomato soup, garlic salt, oregano, sweet basil, salt & pepper, pizza cheese, hoagie roll ; preparation:Brown hamburger and onion, drain well. Add other ingredients except cheese. Cut buns in half and butter them. Put ground beef mixture on each and then cheese on each. Bake on cookie sheet for awhile and then broil under broiler until cheese bubbles. These can be frozen and taken out when needed to bake and broil. ; name: linguini and clams ; ingredients: baby clams, half-and-half, white wine, garlic, butter, fresh basil, linguine, parmesan cheese, parsley ; preparation:Heat a saute pan on medium high heat. Add in garlic, butter, wine, and half and half. Cook for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Add in the fresh basil and the clams. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Portion a half cup of linguini on each plate, top each plate with equal portions of the clam sauce. Garnish with parmesean cheese and chopped fresh parsley and enjoy. ; name: italian chicken and fettuccine ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, shake-n-bake, fettuccine, parmesan cheese, olive oil, butter, salt and pepper, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Coat chicken with shake and bake according to shake and bake directions. About 10 minutes before chicken is done, place a slice of mozzerella cheese on top. Bake until melted, about 10 more minutes. 15 minutes before chicken is done, cook fettucini according to package directions. Drain fettucini. Add olive oil and butter. Mix well. Add remaining parmesan. Mix and serve hot with chicken add additional parmesean cheese. ; name: grilled grouper with oriental sauce ; ingredients: orange juice, vegetable oil, light soy sauce, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, pepper, grouper ; preparation:Combine sauce ingredients. Marinate fish in sauce at least 30 minutes. Place the fish on light oiled grill, over hot heat. Brush frequently with sauce. Do not overcook. Fish is done when it flakes easy with a fork. ; name: delicious barley casserole ; ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, fresh mushrooms, pearl barley, chicken broth, fresh ground black pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: zesty baked pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, italian tomato soup, water, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:Arrange pork chops in a single layer in a 3 quart oblong baking dish. Bake at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 20 minutes or until chops begin to brown. Spoon off excess fat. Meanwhile, in a small bowl combine soup, water, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, and hot pepper sauce. Spoon soup mixture over chops. Bake 15 minutes or until done and no pink remains. Stir sauce before serving. ; name: warm prosciutto brandy and brie dip ; ingredients: sour cream, cream cheese, brie cheese, parmesan cheese, brandy, prosciutto, green onion, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a medium bowl, combine the sour cream, cream cheese, brie, and parmesan cheese. Beat with electric mixer at medium speed until smooth. Add brandy, prosciutto, green onion, and red pepper flakes, beating to combine. Spoon into an 8-inch square baking dish for 15 to 20 minutes, until bubbly. Garnish with chopped green onions if desired, and serve warm with your favorite crackers or melba toast rounds. ; name: baked sour cream noodles low fat ; ingredients: yolk-free egg noodles, fat free sour cream, fat-free cottage cheese, skim milk, garlic cloves, low-sodium worcestershire sauce, white pepper, parmesan cheese, poppy seed ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees farenheit, 175 celsius, or gas mark 4. Lightly spray a 2 quart casserole dish with cooking spray. Prepare the egg noodles per package directions omitting the oil and salt, drain well. While noodles are cooking, in a large bowl stir together the sour cream, cottage cheese, milk, garlic, worcestershire, and pepper. Stir in the cooked noodles, and spoon into the casserole dish. Bake uncovered, for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with the parmesan and poppy seeds and bake for 5 minutes more. ; name: easy christmas candies ; ingredients: baking cocoa, sweetened condensed milk, butter, nuts ; preparation:In a small heavy saucepan, combine cocoa, sweetened condensed milk and butter to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low. Continue to cook and stir until thickened. Transfer to a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. Roll into 1-inch balls. Then roll in nuts or sprinkles to coat. Store candies in refrigerator. ; name: light pancakes ; ingredients: low-fat biscuit mix, skim milk, splenda sugar substitute, lemon juice, baking powder ; preparation:Stir all ingredients together until well blended. Let stand 10 minutes. Using ladle, spoon on to hot griddle until edges are dry and middle is bubbly. Turn. Cook until golden. ; name: mountain dew apple dumplings ; ingredients: crescent rolls, tart apples, sugar, butter, cinnamon, mountain dew soda ; preparation:

name: savory consomme rice ; ingredients: onion, butter, fresh mushrooms, long grain rice, beef consomme, water, salt, pepper, dried parsley, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Saute onion and mushroons in butter. Add rice, consomme, water, salt, pepper, parsley, and garlic powder. Pour into greased two quart pyrex dish. Cover and bake one hour at 350 degrees. ; name: vegan sweetened condensed milk ; ingredients: soymilk, margarine, sugar, salt ; preparation:Place the soy milk into a heavy-based saucepan. Heat to boiling. Heat the margarine in a separate pan. Add the sugar and mix with a wooden spoon. Pour in the hot milk mixture when the sugar has dissolved. Add a pinch of salt. Mix well. Continue to boil gently, stirring frequently, for another 5 minutes, or until it thickens a little. Remove from heat and leave to cool. The vegan condensed milk is now ready for use as wished. ; name: cornbread heaven vegan gluten free ; ingredients: cornmeal, almonds, sugar, double-acting baking powder, cornstarch, water ; preparation:Finely chop the almonds, the add them to a blender. Blend until a fine meal consistency. Add the water and blend until smooth. Do not strain. In a glass baking bowl or cassarole dish, combine all dry ingredients. Blend well. Add the heavy almond milk mixture from the blender to the bowl of dry ingredients. Blend well. Bake at 400 deg f, 12-15 minutes, until golden on top. ; name: lollipop cookies ; ingredients: golden vanilla cake mix, vegetable oil, eggs, wooden sticks, white frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Stir together cake mix, oil and eggs, using spoon. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls about 3 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheet. Insert wooden stick in edge of dough until. Bake 8 to 11 minutes or until puffed and almost no indentation remains when touched. Cool 1 minute before removing from cookie sheet. Cool completely, about 30 minutes. Frost and decorate as desired. Store loosely covered. ; name: rice slice with turkey and asparagus ; ingredients: rice-a-roni, asparagus, cooked turkey, eggs, herbs, garlic cloves ; preparation:If you make risotto the night before, keep some aside before you add the final ingredients and fold some cheese inches. You will need to warm it through before proceeding with this recipe. If using rice-a-roni or similar, just prepare as directed. Stir in asparagus, turkey, eggs, herbs and garlic. Spoon into a greased and lined 9x11-inch pan and bake at 180c for 15-20 minutes. Cut into squares and serve warm, at room temperature or even cold. Serves 6 as a light lunch with a green salad, or at a party as finger food. ; name: kahlua pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie crust, evaporated milk, light brown sugar, kahlua, light corn syrup, pumpkin pie spice, salt, canned pumpkin, eggs ; preparation:

name: french chicken with sherry nutmeg sauce ; ingredients: skinless chicken thighs, onion, chicken broth, dry sherry, nutmeg, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, parsley, skim milk, flour ; preparation:Put the chicken in a non-stick frying pan. Cook slowly over moderate heat with no fat added until well browned. Drain off melted fat. Add the onion, broth and sherry. Sprinkle with seasonings. Cover and simmer over very low heat until nearly tender, 40 to 50 minutes. Uncover. Continue to simmer uncovered until the liquid is reduced by half. Whisk milk and flour together and stir into the pan. Cook and stir until sauce is bubbling and thick. ; name: hot n spicy cheeseburgers ; ingredients: ground beef, banana pepper, ground cumin, barbecue sauce, cheddar cheese, hamburger buns ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the beef, peppers& cumin. Shape the beef into 1-inch thick patties. On the grill rack, place the patties over medium hot coals. Grill, uncovered until done. Flip burgers and brush often with the bbq sauce. The last minute of grilling place a cheese slice on each burger. Heat until melted. Serve on the toasted buns. These can also be broiled in the oven. ; name: double peanut cereal nuggets ; ingredients: puffed wheat cereal, oatmeal, chex cereal, roasted peanuts, raisins, honey, peanut butter, vanilla ; preparation:Toss together cereals, raisins or dates, oats and peanuts. Cook honey over medium heat until foamy. Remove from heat and stir in peanut butter and vanilla. When smooth, pour over cereal mixture. Toss until evenly coated. Spread on cookie sheet to cool. Store in airtight container. ; name: strawberry banana papaya smoothie ; ingredients: strawberries, banana, papaya nectar, sugar, ice cubes ; preparation:Wash then hull strawberries. Slice in half. Peel banana and slice into thirds. Place in a blender or food processor. Pour in juice and optional ice cubes. Whirl until pured and frothy. Pour into tall glasses and serve. ; name: perfect roast chicken ; ingredients: lemon, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, whole chickens, coarse salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: italian fish ; ingredients: flounder fillets, dried oregano, salt, pepper, spaghetti sauce, fresh parsley, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: one pot tomato basil pasta ; ingredients: pasta, diced tomatoes with juice, sweet onion, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, dried oregano leaves, basil sprigs, vegetable broth, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta, tomatoes, onion, garlic, basil, in a large stock pot. Pour in vegetable broth. Sprinkle on top the pepper flakes and oregano. Drizzle top with oil. Cover pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a low simmer and keep covered and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes or so. Cook until almost all liquid has evaporated i left about an inch of liquid in the bottom of the pot but you can reduce as desired. Season to taste with salt and pepper, stirring pasta several times to distribute the liquid in the bottom of the pot. Serve garnished with parmesan cheese. ; name: curried shrimp with cilantro ; ingredients: olive oil, shallots, garlic cloves, curry powder, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, shrimp, fresh lime juice, low-fat sour cream, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper ; preparation:Over medium heat, heat oil in skillet. Add shallots and garlic. Cook and stir about 2 minutes until tender. Add curry powder. Cook and stir about 1 minute until the mixture becomes fragrant. Add the broth and bring to simmer. Add the lime juice and shrimp. Simmer until the shrimp are cooked through, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately. ; name: so easy homemade truffles ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, cream cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla, ground nuts ; preparation:Melt chocolate in microwave on med. Power. Stir occasionally. Set aside. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually add sugar, beating until well blended. Add melted chocolate and vanilla, mix well. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Roll into 1 inch balls. Roll in nuts or coconut. Store in refrigerator. ; name: scrambled egg and bacon sandwich ; ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, egg, water, salt and pepper, bacon ; preparation:Slice the 2 slices bacon in half and cook to a crisp. Drain on paper towel, and pour drippings out of pan. Whip egg with water, add salt and pepper and scramble eggs in same pan in which the bacon was cooked. Remove egg to cool. After bread has toasted, spread with mayo and layer on eggs and bacon. Slice and serve with favorite breakfast beverage. ; name: pineapple chutney ; ingredients: wine vinegar, sugar, fresh pineapple, jalapeno chile, fresh gingerroot, ground cumin, ground cardamom, ground cinnamon, white pepper ; preparation:Combine vinegar and sugar in large saucepan. Simmer and stir until sugar dissolves. Add pineapple and simmer until soft. Strain pineapple and set aside, return juices to pan. Add chile, ginger and spices to pan. Simmer and reduce au nape. Mix spiced syrup with pineapple. Refrigerate immediately. ; name: creamy cauliflower leek soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, leek, chicken stock, nutmeg, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:

name: farmer s chops ; ingredients: potatoes, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, pork chops, onion, sour cream, dry mustard, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Slice potatoes lengthwise into 3 slices each. Place in a 2-quart greased casserole dish. Saut garlic in olive oil, then add pork chops and brown lightly on both sides. Place browned pork chops and garlic on top of potatoes. Place thin sliced onions over pork chops. Mix sour cream, dry mustard and salt. Pour mixture over onions. Bake uncovered for 90 minutes, or until pork chops are well done. ; name: citrus french toast ; ingredients: self-rising flour, sugar, salt, cinnamon, lemons, zest of, milk, vanilla extract, egg, butter, bread ; preparation:In a bowl mix together the flour, sugar, salt, cinnamon and zest. Add the milk and mix until you have a smooth and lump free batter. Add the egg and vanilla, mix, now add the melted butter and mix again. Heat a non-stick frying. Dip and coat the bread in the batter, fry until light golden. ; name: chicken drambuie ; ingredients: chicken breasts, salt and pepper, butter, green onion, garlic clove, parsley, fresh tarragon, drambuie, dried thyme ; preparation:Brown the chicken breasts, seasoned with salt and pepper, in butter in a skillet. Remove to a plate with a slotted spoon. Saut the onion, garlic and parsley in the same pan. Add the tarragon and 2 tbs drambuie to the pan and simmer 2 minutes more. Lay each chicken breast on a square of foil. Coat each breast with the drambuie sauce and sprinkle with thyme. Seal and bake 1 hr at 300. Remove and open each foil pack. Pour the rest of drambuie over chicken, reseal the foil and leave to cook another 5 minutes. ; name: crock pot garlic pork with sweet potatoes ; ingredients: canola oil, boneless pork loin roast, salt, fresh ground black pepper, onion, garlic cloves, poultry seasoning, white wine, sweet potatoes, chicken broth ; preparation:If there is a lot of visible fat on the pork roast, trim it away. In a large, heavy skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Sprinkle salt and pepper on pork roast, then brown roast in hot oil on all sides, for about 10 minutes total time. Remove browned roast to a plate and temporarily set aside. In fat in skillet, saute sliced onion and minced garlic, seasoned with the poultry seasoning, just until onion starts to soften. Place in bottom of slow cooker. Turn heat to high and add white wine to skillet. Scrape up all the bits sticking to skillet, then pour this mixture over the onions in the crock pot. Cover onions with cubed raw sweet potato. Place browned pork roast on top of sweet potato cubes, then pour chicken stock over roast. Cover and cook on low power for for 7 to 8 hours, or until sweet potatoes are tender and pork is cooked. ; name: red onion confit ; ingredients: red onion, olive oil, red wine vinegar, marsala wine ; preparation:Slice the onion very thin and evenly. A mandolin is perfect for this. Sweat the onions in olive oil on low till very soft. Add the red wine vinegar and marsala. Simmer till all the liquid has reduced. ; name: crockpot chicken noodles ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, butter, egg noodles ; preparation:

name: roasted brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, olive oil, kosher salt, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: sopranos escarole beans soup ; ingredients: escarole, garlic cloves, olive oil, tomatoes, crushed red pepper flakes, chicken broth, cannellini beans, elbow macaroni, salt & freshly ground black pepper, pecorino romano cheese ; preparation:Trim off the base of the escarole and discard any bruised leaves. Wash the leaves in several changes of cold water, paying special attention to the central ribs where soil tends to collect. Stack the leaves and cut crosswise into 1-inch strips. In a large pot, cook the garlic in the olive oil over medium-low heat until golden. Add the escarole, tomatoes, and red pepper flakes. Cover and cook for 20 minutes, or until the escarole is tender. Add the broth and beans. Cook for 20 minutes. Stir in the elbows and season to taste with salt and pepper. Cook 10 minutes more, or until the pasta is tender. Just before serving, sprinkle with the cheese. ; name: cran raspberry jello salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, frozen raspberries, whole berry cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple in juice ; preparation:Be sure that raspberries and pineapple are well drained. If too much liquid is left in them, the jello will not set up. Mix the jello according to package directions, using the juices from the drained fruits as part of the cold liquid. Stir in the remaining ingredients, breaking up the cranberry sauce well. Put into a 9x13 pan and chill until set. ; name: chicken broccoli and cheese crescent wreath ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, fresh broccoli florets, canned chicken, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Unroll the crescent dough and place in a circle on round stone, with the wide ends in the middle and the pointed ends to the outside. You should have an circle in the middle of the stone. You will need to overlap the wide ends a bit to make a circle. Mix the remaining ingredients in a bowl, using more mayo if mixture appears to be dry. Place the mixture in a circle on the crescent rolls on the wide ends. Fold the pointed ends over the mixture to the middle of the stone. Tuck the ends under. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown. Slice and serve. ; name: cranberry cole slaw ; ingredients: miracle whip, red wine vinegar, honey, craisins, packaged coleslaw mix ; preparation:In a bowl with a lid, and large enough for the finished product, mix well the first 4 ingredients. Add the slaw. Put the lid on and shake, shake, shake. Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving. The cook time is fridge time. ; name: cheddar baked bagels and eggs ; ingredients: bagels, butter, eggs, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: sindhi hara murgh chicken in green curry homemade sindhi style ; ingredients: chicken, cooking oil, coriander powder, turmeric powder, salt, tomatoes, coriander leaves, ginger, garlic cloves, green chilies ; preparation:Heat the oil in a pan. Fry the paste for 5 minutes, stirring continuously. Add the powdered spices, salt and tomatoes. Fry till the oil bubbles to the top. Add the chicken and cook on low heat till the chicken is tender, usually takes about 20-30 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: italian breaded cauliflower ; ingredients: cauliflower, oil, green onions, garlic cloves, dried basil, salt and pepper, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Steam cauliflower in microwave or on stovetop until just barely crisp-tender. Set aside. In large skillet, saute green onions and garlic in oil for 2 minutes. Add cauliflower, basil and salt and pepper to pan and mix well. Cover and cook on medium-low heat for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is at desired doneness. Mix together bread crumbs and parmesan cheese. Add to pan and stir to mix. Serve immediately. ; name: caesar blt wraps ; ingredients: romaine lettuce leaves, tomatoes, bacon, caesar salad dressing, parmesan cheese, flour tortillas ; preparation:Combine lettuce, tomato, bacon and salad dressing in large bowl. Add cheese. Toss. Spoon mixture evenly onto tortillas. Roll up tortillas burrito-style. Wrap sandwiches in plastic wrap and refrigerate until serving time. ; name: cold dill pea salad ; ingredients: frozen tiny peas, sour cream, dried dill weed, dried chives, curry powder, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper, crisp salad green ; preparation:Cook the peas according to directions on package. Drain thoroughly. In a bowl, mix together sour cream, dill, chives, curry powder, lemon juice and salt and pepper to taste. Carefully combine with peas. Chill and serve on a bed of crisp salad greens. Garnish with more dill or chives, if desired. Makes 8 servings. ; name: my lightly spiced black beans ; ingredients: vegetable broth, red onion, canned black beans, unsweetened cocoa, turmeric, paprika, cinnamon, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:Heat vegetable broth in large pan on medium-high until it starts bubbling. Add the spices and leave for 2 minutes. Add the chopped onion and leave for 7 minutes. Turn heat down to low and add the beans. Stir gently until everything is heated through. Sprinkle cocoa on top and leave for five minutes, then stir it inches. ; name: baked apple oatmeal ; ingredients: apples, old fashioned oats, raisins, ground cinnamon, salt, soymilk, real maple syrup, walnuts ; preparation:

name: currant and tea crumpets ; ingredients: currants, strong black tea, self raising flour, sugar, egg, butter ; preparation:Add tea and currants into a small bowl. Allow to steep until tea is cold and currents plump. Sift flour into a clean bowl add sugar and combine well. Make a well in the center, add tea mixture and egg. Mix with a wooden spoon till all the ingredients are incorporated and the batter is lump free. Grease a frying pan with a little butter at a time. Drop a tablespoon of batter at a time, try to fit a few at a time in the frying pan. Cook over medium heat for 2-3 minutes or until bubbles appear on the surface. Turn and cook the other side. Repeat with remaining batter. Serve with whipped cream. ; name: mom s easy creamed chipped beef on toast ; ingredients: flour, buddig beef, salt, pepper, toast, milk ; preparation:Slice beef into thin strips. In a large bowl whisk together milk and flour salt and pepper. Melt butter in large pot over medium heat. Add milk and flour mixture constantly whisking until it reaches a thick consistency. Add beef and stir with a wooden spoon until heated through. Serve immediately over toast. ; name: pork chops with apples and swiss ; ingredients: pork chops, cloves, dry white wine, celery leaves, bay leaves, celery ribs, butter, apples, brown sugar, swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375f and butter a baking pan. Press a clove into each chop, then add the chops to the pan, followed by the wine, celery leaves, and bay leaves. Bake the chops for 30 minutes. Meanwhile, heat the butter in a frying pan and saute the diced celery for 5 minutes, tehn add the apples and brown sugar. Turn the heat to low and cook for 10 minutes, or until just tender. After 30 minutes, remove the pork chops, discard the bay and celery leaves and sprinkle cheese on each chop. Baste with juices and broil a few minutes to brown. Add a few pan juices to the apple-celery mixture, and serve as a side with the pork chops. ; name: mom s pork chops just 4 ingredients ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, onions, brown sugar, ketchup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Place all four pork chops on pan. Add 1 tbsp of ketchup on the center of each of the pork chops. Next, add 1 tbsp of brown sugar on top of the ketchup on each pork chop. Last, put a slice of onion on top of the brown sugar and ketchup. Place in preheated oven. Bake for 45 minutes or so, depending on thickness of your chops. Done when meat is no longer pink. ; name: three cheese spinach lasagna ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, pasta sauce, baby spinach leaves, lasagna sheets ; preparation:Pre hear oven to 180c. Grease lasagne pan. Spread some of tomato sauce on bottom of dish. Lay lasagne sheets on top of sauce. Spread half riccotta cheese on top. Spread a third of the mozzarella and a third of the cheddar cheese. Lay half of the spinach on top of cheeses. Spread some more of the tomato sauce on top and repeat. Finish with lasagne sheets and top with remaining mozzarella and cheddar cheese. Bake in oven for 40 minutes. ; name: farmgirl s funky chicken ; ingredients: chicken, relish, salt, oil, ground black pepper, lemon ; preparation:

name: kalbi short ribs ; ingredients: soy sauce, water, honey, ginger, sesame seed oil, garlic cloves, green onion, apple cider, beef short ribs, sesame seeds ; preparation:Combine all sauce ingredients. Dip each piece of meat in the sauce. And layer in a flat dish or pan. Pour more marinade on top. Marinate. 4-12 hours. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Remove short ribs from marinade pat dry and discard marinade. Grill short ribs until slightly charred and tender and cooked to desired degree of doneness. Garnish with the sesame seeds and additional scallions if desired. ; name: asian chili pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, sweet chili sauce, soy sauce, fresh orange juice, green onion, fresh ginger, sesame seeds, honey, vegetable oil ; preparation:Mix all the ingredients except the oil in a large plastic zip lock bag, mix well so the meat is coated. Place in the fridge for at least 2 hours or overnight. Remove pork from marinade -save marinade. Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the pork is nicely browned on both sides. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. ; name: sauteed ripe plantains ; ingredients: plantains, butter, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, brown sugar, hot sauce ; preparation:Peel ripe plantains and ensure the pulp is firm and smells sweet. Heat butter or margarine. Saute in at medium heat until browned about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with brown sugar, if desired. Serve immediately as a side dish or dessert. ; name: low fat apple spice cake ; ingredients: apple pie filling, spice cake mix, egg, egg whites ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray bundt pan with non stick cooking spray. Combine all ingredients in bowl using hand mixer, until well blended. The apples should be pretty well pulverized. Pour into bundt pan. Bake for approximately 40 minutes. ; name: saucy vegetables ; ingredients: potatoes, carrots, cream of mushroom soup, cheese, milk, corn, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat stove to high heat. Half fill medium saucepan with water and heat to boiling. Add potatoes and carrot and cook until just tender. Drain and set aside. While potatoes are cooking, turn on another burner to medium-low heat. Combine soup, cheese and milk in a small saucepan. Cook and stir until sauce is hot. Add potatoes, carrots and corn to sauce. Cook and stir until all vegetables are hot. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: tomato and basil pasta sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, dried chili pepper flakes, balsamic vinegar, sugar, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:

name: cheese ravioli with grape tomatoes ; ingredients: cheese ravioli, olive oil, spinach, grape tomatoes, onion powder, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Add ravioli to a pot of boiling water. Cook 3-5 minutes or until ravioli floats to the surface. Remove from heat, drain and set aside. Heat oil in a oversized skillet on medium heat, add spinach, tomatoes, onion powder, salt and pepper, and saute for about 7 minutes or until spinach and tomatoes wilt. Add ravioli to skillet and cook for 3 more minutes. Serve hot and sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: super simple chicken soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, carrot, celery, shallot, garlic, chunk chicken, hot water, chicken base, cold water, cornstarch ; preparation:Place first 5 ingredients in a soup pot and saute for 5 minutes. Add chicken, stir. Combine hot water and base then add to your pot. Cook for 15 minutes or until carrots are done enough for you. Combine cold water and corn starch then add to your pot while stirring. Your soup will thicken and be ready to serve. You can add more cornstarch mixture if you would like it thicker. I like mine somewhere between a soup and a stew consistency. ; name: perfect roast chicken ; ingredients: lemon, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, whole chickens, coarse salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: perked up pasta ; ingredients: penne pasta, garlic, olive oil, roasted red peppers, baby spinach, fat free feta cheese ; preparation:Cook 8 oz penne pasta until al dente. In a pan over medium heat, soften 2 tsp minced garlic in 2 tbsp olive oil. Add 4 oz sliced roasted red peppers and 6 oz baby spinach. Cook until spinach wilts. Add pasta to skillet, sprinkle with 4 oz fat-free feta, and toss. ; name: green bean and basil salad ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, vinegar, fresh basil leaf, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, scallions ; preparation:Steam the green beans for about 10 minutes, until tender. You can also cook them in the microwave for about 4 minutes. Set aside in a bowl. Whisk together the oil, vinegar and seasonings. Pour this over the green beans. Add the scallions and toss gently. Cover and place in the fridge until cold. The flavor really intensifies if you let the salad chill for 24 hours. ; name: brown rice pilaf ; ingredients: brown rice, onion, garlic cloves, carrot, frozen peas, frozen corn, salt and pepper, basil, oregano, olive oil ; preparation:

name: crispy crumbed pork chops ; ingredients: butter, soda crackers, fresh ground pepper, sage, sea salt, thyme, pork chops ; preparation:Rub melted butter, crumbs and seasonings together. Rinse chops with cold water and pat dry with paper towels. Coat chops thoroughly with the crumb mixture. Press crumbs on chops firmly with hands. Place chops, in a single layer, on a rack in a shallow baking pan with sides. Do not cover. Bake at 325 degrees fahrenheit for one hour, without turning, until done. ; name: chai cream smoothie ; ingredients: vanilla ice cream, chocolate syrup, milk, chai tea mix, club soda ; preparation:Place ice cream in tall glass. Drizzle with syrup. Set aside. Add milk to flavored drink mix in measuring cup, stirring until dissolved. Pour over ice cream. Gradually add club soda, stirring untl ice cream is melted and mixture is well blended. Serve immediately. ; name: brazilian pie ; ingredients: vanilla pudding mix, instant coffee, powdered cocoa mix, milk, whipping cream, pie shell, sliced almonds ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine pudding, coffee, cocoa, and milk. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until mixture comes to a full boil. Remove from heat and continue to stir frequently until cool. Place plastic wrap directly onto pudding and chill in refrigerator for 1 hours. Beat slightly. Fold in whipping cream which has been beaten until stiff. Pour into pie shell. Garnish with sliced almonds. Refrigerate until ready to use. ; name: cod portuguese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, chopped tomatoes, paprika, orange, juice of, cod fish fillets, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy fry pan and saute the onion, garlic and pepper for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, paprika and orange juice. Season, stir well and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Lay the fish fillets on top, cutting them to fit the pan if necessary. Season lightly, cover and simmer gently for 12-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked but still firm. Transfer to serving dishes and sprinkle with parsley. Serve. ; name: tomato basil tortellini soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, cheese tortellini, fresh basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Over medium heat cook garlic in oil until fragrant. Stir in broth and tomatoes. Bring to a boil. Add tortellini, reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in basil, salt and pepper. Simmer for 3 minutes longer. ; name: easy cheesy pasta ; ingredients: pasta shells, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, light sour cream, whipping cream, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: steak supper special ; ingredients: flour, salt, cube steaks, oil, french bread, chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, prepared mustard ; preparation:Mix flour and salt. Coat steaks. In skillet, heat oil and cook steaks until browned on both sides. Place each steak onto a piece of bread and keep warm. Into drippings in pan, stir in chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and mustard. Stir to mix well and heat to boiling. Spoon sauce over steaks. ; name: tropical grilled tuna ; ingredients: fresh pineapple, onion, jalapeno peppers, fresh cilantro, lime juice, tuna steaks, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Grill pineapple slices, uncovered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side. Chill for 30 minutes. Dice the pineapple. Place in a bowl. Stir in the onion, jalapenos, cilantro and lime juice. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until chilled. Brush tuna steaks with oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5 minutes. ; name: thai peanut dressing from cpk s thai crunch salad ; ingredients: creamy peanut butter, rice vinegar, honey, water, soy sauce, sugar, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, canola oil ; preparation:Whisk together peanut butter, vinegar, honey, water and soy sauce. Stir in sugar, salt, cayenne and red pepper flakes. Add oil and continue whisking until smooth. Use immediately or refrigerate for up to five days. Bring to room temperature and whisk before using. ; name: all in one tuna casserole ; ingredients: onion soup mix, milk, frozen peas and carrot, egg noodles, tuna, cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In large bowl, blend onion soup mix with cream of mushroom soup and milk. Stir in peas & carrots, cooked noodles, cheese and tuna. Turn into greased 2-quart baking dish. Bake 30 minutes or until bubbling. ; name: chicken rice bake ; ingredients: long grain rice, condensed cream of celery soup, water, chicken pieces, scallion, longhorn cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle rice over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Combine soup and water. Pour carefully over the rice. Lay the chicken pieces over the rice without overlapping. Sprinkle the sliced scallions and grated cheese over the top. Cover dish with foil. Bake in preheated oven 45 minutes. Uncover and bake 15 minutes longer. ; name: kid s macaroni cheese casserole ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs, tuna fish, potato chips ; preparation:

name: mediterranean pasta ; ingredients: linguine, bacon, boneless chicken breast, salt, diced tomatoes with juice, dried rosemary, feta cheese, pitted black olives, artichoke hearts ; preparation:Bring large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add linguine and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Season chicken with salt. Stir chicken with bacon in a large skillet or saucepan. Add tomatoe and rosemary, simmer 20 minutes. Stir in feta cheese, olives and artichoke hearts and cook until heated through. Toss with fresh cooked pasta and serve warm. Garnish with extra feta if desired. ; name: sweet sour brussels sprouts ; ingredients: frozen brussels sprouts, olive oil, cider vinegar, sugar, coarse salt, pepper, garlic clove, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Place brussels sprouts in shallow baking dish. In a small bowl, combine oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper, and garlic. Pour evenly over sprouts then sprinkle with the cheese. Bake at 350 for about 20 minutes, or until brussels sprouts are tender. ; name: eggplant tomato deluxe ; ingredients: eggplant, tomatoes, fat-free parmesan cheese, seasoning, olive oil, onion, fresh mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick oil spray. Arrange eggplant rounds on the cookie sheet and sprinkle parmesan over the eggplant. Can peel the eggplant also, if preferred that way. Layer one slice of tomato on top of each eggplant round. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. If using olive oil, brush the eggplant with olive oil then add seasonings, then parmesan and tomato. Can also add slices of onion or fresh mushroom to make this a deluxe meal of yummy veggies. Feel free to add additional variations of cheeses. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes. ; name: far breton aux pommes apple pie ; ingredients: apples, butter, all-purpose flour, sugar, eggs, milk, salt ; preparation:Peel and slice the apples. Put the apple - slices in a casserole dish, add the butter and 70gr sugar and bake for 15 minutes at 350f. Meanwhile, beat the eggs, with the rest of the sugar. Add the milk and the flour to make a soft dough. Allow the apples to cool. When apples are cooled, put the batter on top of the apples and bake for 60 minutes at 350f. ; name: great turkey brine for a moist juicy bird ; ingredients: canning salt, white wine, dried sage, dried thyme, dried tarragon, dried rosemary, water ; preparation:Mix the salt, water and spices along with the wine in a large clean container such as a food grade five gallon bucket. Stir well until the salt dissolves. Take your thawed turkey, clean it under running water and remove the neck and giblets for another use. Add the turkey to the brine, putting it in so the breast side is down in the brine, be sure to fill all the cavities in the bird with the brine. Cover and refrigerate until time to cook, then drain and cook according to your package directions. ; name: eggless salad vegan or vegetarian ; ingredients: extra firm tofu, vegan mayonnaise, celery, onions, dijon mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: parker s deviled eggs ; ingredients: light mayonnaise, dill, mustard, cider vinegar, hard-boiled eggs, paprika, onion powder ; preparation:Slice eggs in half and remove yolks. Mash yolks, dill and powdered spices together first for smoother filling. Then add wet ingredients - mayo, mustard, vinegar. Stir until smooth. Spoon into egg halves and chill. ; name: carrots in champagne and dill ; ingredients: butter, carrot, beef broth, champagne, fresh lemon juice, dried dill ; preparation:Melt the butter in a heavy saucepan. Saut the carrots for a few minutes over medium heat until they begin to brown. Add the beef broth and champagne and cover. Cook until barely tender but still a bit firm. Remove cover and place on high heat until the liquid is almost cooked away. Add the lemon juice and dill and serve. ; name: hochrippe und sauerkraut spareribs and sauerkraut ; ingredients: sauerkraut, spareribs, paprika, beef bouillon cubes, caraway seed, pepper, bacon ; preparation:Rinse and drain the sauerkraut. Place sauerkraut in large 4-quart casserole. Add 2 qts. Hot water. Add uncooked spareribs, paprika, bouillon cubes, caraway seeds, and pepper. Cook covered, over low heat, 3-4 hours. Fry floured bacon slices. Break bacon into sauerkraut. Remove bones from the sauce before serving. Serve with dark bread and steins of beer. ; name: cactus mexican style ; ingredients: cactus pieces, tomatoes, white onion, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, monterey jack cheese, salt, corn oil ; preparation:Steam the cactus until softened. Drain the cactus. Fry all the ingredients except for the monterrey cheese. Combine fried ingredients with the cactus and allow to simmer for 15 minutes. Top with cheese before serving. ; name: grilled eggplant with ricotta and tomato ; ingredients: eggplant, olive oil, cherry tomatoes, garlic cloves, capers, ricotta cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Heat the grill to high. Brush the eggplant slices with some of the oil. Grill the eggplant slices on both sides until brown, then place them in the bottom of a lightly greased, small shallow baking pan that will fit under the grill, and set aside. Over a medium heat, add the rest of the oil to a small saut pan, add the cherry tomatoes and garlic and saut for a couple of minutes, stirring occasionally, until the tomatoes begin to soften. While still stirring, add the capers and leave the pan over the heat for an additional minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Cover the eggplant slices with the tomato, garlic and capers, season to taste and spoon the ricotta over the tomatoes. Place the baking pan under the grill until the ricotta starts to bubble. Scatter the basil leaves over the top and serve. ; name: garlic lover s shrimps ; ingredients: olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, raw shrimp, salt, dry sherry, fresh parsley, old bay seasoning ; preparation:

name: napa salad ; ingredients: coleslaw mix, green onions, beef-flavor ramen noodles, butter, slivered almonds, sunflower seeds, salad oil, soy sauce, sugar, white vinegar ; preparation:Put slaw in a large bowl. Add diced onions. Break up ramen noodles and add them to bowl set the bowl aside. Melt butter in a skillet and brown almonds and sunflower seeds. Cool the almonds and sunflower seeds, then add them to the bowl. Place all of the dressing ingredients in a separate bowl. Whisk together and pour over slaw mixture. Serve immediately. ; name: orzo with parsley and lemon ; ingredients: orzo pasta, coarse salt, olive oil, lemons, zest of, black pepper, parsley ; preparation:Cook orzo in salted water 12 min, to al dente. Drain well, but do not rinse. Transfer to a serving bowl. Drizzle with oil, and season with salt and pepper. Toss with zest and parsley, and serve. ; name: mexi beef bites ; ingredients: ground beef, cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, green chilies, green taco sauce, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Cook ground beef until done. Drain off fat. Stir in cheeses, chilies, taco sauce and eggs. Spray an 8x8 baking dish with cooking spray. Transfer meat mixture to the prepared baking dish. Bake for about 40 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean. Let cool for 15 minutes. Cut into squares. ; name: easy oven fried chicken breasts ; ingredients: butter flavor crisco, flour, paprika, salt, pepper, chicken breasts ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Melt crisco in a 13 x 9 baking pan. Combine flour, paprika, salt and pepper in a bag. Shake chicken pieces, one at a time, in bag to coat with flour mixture. Place chicken skin side down in baking pan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes. Turn chicken. Bake 30 minutes longer. ; name: spinach pumpernickel dip ; ingredients: low-fat sour cream, low-fat mayonnaise, herb salad dressing mix, frozen spinach, pumpernickel rounds, water chestnuts, green onion ; preparation:Combine the sour cream, mayonnaise and salad dressing and mix well. Squeeze the spinach to remove water. Add to the mixture and mix well. Add optional ingredient. Hollow out the bread and fill with the sour cream mixture. Cube the bread that was removed from the loaves. Arrange assorted cut up veggies and bread cubes around loaves. ; name: irish bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: dry white bread, sweet butter, nutmeg, golden raisin, eggs, heavy cream, milk, vanilla, superfine sugar, white sugar ; preparation:

name: cheddar and scallion bread ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, butter, scallions, garlic cloves, kosher salt, black pepper, bread ; preparation:Place an oven rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the cheese mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately. ; name: alaska burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, worcestershire sauce, cumin, cracked black pepper, smoked cheddar cheese ; preparation:Mix beef, onion, worcestershire, cumin and pepper in a bowl. Divide into 4 portions. Place a slice of cheese in the middle of each portion and form into patties. Heat a frying pan to medium. Cook the burgers 5-6 minutes on each side. Served topped with tomato slices and lettuce. ; name: the creamiest pepper parmesan dressing ; ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, garlic, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, buttermilk, red wine vinegar, fresh parsley, feta cheese ; preparation:In small bowl, combine sour cream, mayonnaise and parmesan cheese and set aside. Mash garlic and salt together until it forms a paste. Add to sour cream mixture along with black pepper. Whisk in remaining ingredients. Store covered, in refrigerator. ; name: chocolate cinnamon muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, baking powder, ground cinnamon, salt, light brown sugar, semisweet mini chocolate chips, eggs, low-fat milk, sunflower oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, cinnamon and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and chocolate chips. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely. ; name: pantry southwest chicken ; ingredients: tomatoes and green chilies, tomato sauce, black beans, onion, corn, chicken breasts, garlic cloves, cumin, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:In olive oil, cook the chicken until almost done. Remove from pan. In same pan, add onion and garlic. Cook until onion is translucent. Add diced tomatoes with chilis, can of tomato sauce, can of black beans, corn, and cumin. Return chicken to pan and cook until the chicken is done. Serve with hot cooked rice. ; name: sweet potato puffs ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, milk, salt, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice, blanched slivered almond ; preparation:

name: pancake souffle ; ingredients: butter, eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Place butter in bottom of 9x13 baking dish and melt in oven, while preheating. Place eggs in blender and beat on high. Add flour, milk and vanilla. Mix together for 30 seconds. Pour mixture into dish with melted butter. Bake for 20 minutes. ; name: cheese ball 1 ; ingredients: cream cheese, cheese whiz, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, yellow cheese, nuts ; preparation:Mix cream cheese and cheese whiz together and blend well. Then add worchestershire sauce, garlic powder, and grated cheese. Blend in well. Form ball and then roll into chopped nuts. Then chill your ball till you want it served. ; name: chicken fettuccine in browned butter sauce ; ingredients: fettuccine, butter, garlic, dried parsley, dry white wine, lemon juice, salt, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breasts, slivered almonds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Bake almond slivers on an ungreased cookie sheet for 5-7 minutes or until browned. Meanwhile, in a saucepan, boil water and cook fettuccine according to package directions. Drain and keep warm in a covered 2 quart casserole dish. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium to high heat, stirring constantly. Butter will begin to be frothy like and bubble, then brown. Add the chicken, garlic and toasted almonds. Cook about 5 minutes or until chicken is done. Stir in the parsley, wine, lemon juice and salt. Add chicken and sauce to noodles, toss to coat. Sprinkle with fresh grated parmesan and serve. ; name: mountain breeze tomato soup ; ingredients: tomatoes, celery, onions, brown sugar, coarse salt, butter, flour, white pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Cook tomatoes, celery and onions for 2 or 3 hours until soft enough to be pressed through a cone sieve. Add sugar, salt and butter. Using a couple cups of soup mixture, stir into flour to make paste. Add paste and seaoning back to mixture. Bring to a boil, stirring often. Ladle into sterile quart jars. Cap and seal. Water bath for 20 minutes. ; name: vegan fruit and yogurt muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, vanilla-flavored soy yogurt, ground flax seeds, water, vanilla extract, vegan margarine, blueberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners. Mix in a large bowl, the flax seed and warm water. Let the flax seed set. In a separate bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking soda and baking powder. Return to the bowl with the flaxseed in it. Combine yogurt, vanilla, margarine and blueberries with the flaxseed. Stir the two mixtures together just until combined. Batter will be very thick. Scoop into prepared muffin cups. Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes. ; name: braised leeks ; ingredients: leeks, garlic, carrots, olive oil ; preparation:

name: quick easy tuscan bean soup ; ingredients: baby carrots, onion, olive oil, cannellini beans, reduced-sodium chicken broth, dried italian seasoning, baby spinach, cracked black pepper ; preparation:In a dutch oven, cook and stir carrots and onion in 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium-high heat 3 minutes. Add beans, broth and seasoning. Bring to boiling. Slightly mash beans. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered, 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, in large skillet, heat remaining oil over medium-high heat. Add spinach and toss 1-2 minutes, just until wilted. Remove from heat. Ladle soup, top with the spinach and sprinkle with the pepper. ; name: hot spiced cheer ; ingredients: cloves, cinnamon sticks, crystallized ginger, apple cider, pineapple juice, orange juice, fresh lemon juice, sugar, salt, white rum ; preparation:Place cloves, cinnamon, and crystallized ginger on a double layer of cheesecloth. Gather edges and tie together to make a pouch. Combine cheescloth pouch, cider, pineapple juice, orange juice, lemon juice, sugar and salt in large stockpot and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes. Discard cheesecloth pouch. Serve with rum, if desired. ; name: zucchini in a pot ; ingredients: zucchini, salt, olive oil, onion, button mushrooms, crushed tomatoes, garlic powder, cumin ; preparation:I dont like watery zucchine so grate the zucchini and place in a colander. Sprinkle with the salt, mix it around. Place colander over a bowl and let sit at least 15 minutes. In a medium sauce pan over medium heat, cook oil, onions and mushrooms about 10 minutes until onions are translucent and mushrooms have cooked down. Stir in tomatoes, garlic and cumin. Cover, cook 5 minutes. While cooking, grab the zucchini by small handfuls and squeeze it to remove excess moisture. Add this to the pot, sprinkling and breaking it up as you do so. Stir this together and cook 5 more minutes. Serve hot. ; name: fruit n honey jam ; ingredients: strawberries, peach, blueberries, cherries, dry pectin, honey, lemon juice ; preparation:Combine strawberries, peaches, blueberries, cherries and pectin in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a full rolling boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Cook for one minute. Add the honey and lemon juice. Return to a rolling boil and cook for 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and skin off the foam. Ladle into sterilized jars, seal and process in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes. ; name: sticky spiced mushroom skewers ; ingredients: dark soy sauce, cooking wine, clear honey, vegetable oil, fresh ginger, garlic clove, chinese five spice powder, shiitake mushrooms ; preparation:Mix the first seven ingredients together in a large bowl. Add the mushrooms and stir well until they are coated in the marinade. Cover and leave to marinate in a cool place for at least 1 hour. Drain the marinade into a small pan and simmer for 1-2 mins until syrupy. Thread the mushrooms on to skewers then cook over hot barbecue coals or griddle or under a hot broiler for about 10 mins, turning frequently and brushing with more of the marinade. Serve hot. ; name: pineapple raisin broccoli salad ; ingredients: bacon, broccoli florets, cheddar cheese, pineapple tidbits, raisins, red onions, mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar ; preparation:

name: raspberry scottish shortbread vegan ; ingredients: whole wheat pastry flour, salt, quick-cooking oatmeal, cold-pressed oil, maple syrup, vanilla, raspberry jam ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Sift the flour and salt. Add the oil to the dry ingredients and mix well. Add the maple syrup and vanilla and mix thoroughly. Lightly oil a 9x9 pan. Cover bottom with half the batter, pressing it firmly into place with fingers. Spread the jam evenly over the batter to cover loosely cover with remaining batterpress gently and bake for 35 minutes. Let cool 15 minutes. ; name: quick shrimp scampi bake ; ingredients: butter, white wine, fresh lemon juice, garlic, fresh parsley, salt, medium raw shrimp ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the butter, white wine, lemon juice, garlic, and parsley. When the butter melts completely, remove from heat. Arrange shrimp in a shallow baking dish. Pour the butter mixture over the shrimp. Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes or until the shrimp are pink and opaque. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: snappy rolls ; ingredients: refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, italian salad dressing, parmesan cheese, poppy seed, sesame seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f and grease a muffin tin pan. Separate biscuits and dip each into italian salad dressing to coat lightly. Fold biscuits in half. Take two of the folded biscuits and place them together, seam side down into one muffin tin. Repeat with remaining biscuits. Mix together remaining ingredients and sprinkle over the rolls in the pan. Bake until golden- approx 10-12 minutes. ; name: gingersnaps soft chewy ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, molasses, egg, flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, clove, ground ginger ; preparation:Cream shortening and sugar. Add molasses and egg. Stir in sifted, flour, salt and baking soda. Then cinnamon, cloves, and ginger. Dough will be soft and sticky. Roll, into walnut-sized balls and roll in granulated sugar. Place on greased cookie sheet and bake at 350f for 7 to 8 minutes. Cookie will flatten out while baking. ; name: brazen brie soup ; ingredients: cream cheese with garlic and herbs, brie cheese, vegetable stock, single cream, cornflour, dry white wine, fresh parsley, french baguettes, cranberry sauce ; preparation:Put all soup ingredients in a blender and whizz. Strain. Soup can now be stored for upto 1 day. When ready to serve toast bread and top with cranberry sauce. Heat soup in a heavy based saucepan, stirring well. Gradually bring to boil and simmer for one minute. Serve sprinkled with parsley and with a cranberry boat floating in the soup. ; name: mexican coffee balls ; ingredients: chocolate wafers, blanched almond, unsweetened cocoa powder, white sugar, instant coffee, coffee liqueur, light corn syrup, cinnamon sugar ; preparation:

name: orange dream ; ingredients: orange juice, milk, sugar, pure vanilla extract, ice cube, orange slice ; preparation:In blender container combine orange juice, milk, sugar and vanilla. Cover. Blend until mixed. With the blender running, add ice cubes, 1 at a time, through lid opening. Blend until smooth. Pour into tall glasses. Garnish on the rim with orange slices, if desired. ; name: pink chum pagne ; ingredients: water, caster sugar, pineapple juice, orange juice, cranberry juice, lemonade ; preparation:Mix the water with the sugar in a jug. Stir until sugar is almost disolved. Add the orange and pineapple juice. Stir for 5 seconds. Add cranberry juice. Fill to brim with lemonade. ; name: horseradish encrusted salmon ; ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, breadcrumbs, gingerroot, horseradish ; preparation:Oil baking pan with 1 tsp. Of oil. Place salmon in the dish. In processor, blend the remaining ingredients. Place this mixture on each fillet. Bake in 350f oven for about 12 minutes. ; name: chicken in coriander cilantro sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, skinless chicken thighs, onions, dry white wine, fresh cilantro, garlic cloves, salt, black pepper, lemons ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large non stick fry pan. When it is hot, add the thighs in one layer and saute them over medium to high heat for 4 minutes on each side or until nicely browned. Remove the chicken to a platter. Add the onions to the dripping in the pan. Saut for 1 minute. Stir in the garlic, wine and coriander stems only and saut for 1 minute longer. Return the chicken to the pan, add lemon salt and pepper. Bring the surrounding liquid to the boil. Cover the pan, reduce the heat and boil gently for 15 minutes. Stir in the coriander leaves and serve 2 thighs per person. Serve with rice or cous cous. ; name: brunch panini ; ingredients: provolone cheese, country bread, prosciutto, raspberry jam, eggs, butter ; preparation:Preheat a panini press. Divide half the cheese among 4 slices of the bread, then top with the prosciutto. Spread 1 tablespoon jam on each and top with the remaining cheese. Set the remaining bread slices in place. In a shallow bowl, beat the eggs with the butter. Working in batches, dip both slices of each sandwich in the egg mixture and place in the panini press. Grill until the bread is crisp and golden, about 3 minutes. ; name: pull apart monkey bread ; ingredients: refrigerated biscuits, butter, sugar, cinnamon, nuts ; preparation:

name: giant instant pot pancakes ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, kosher salt, milk, eggs, vanilla extract ; preparation:Heavily coat the inside of the instant pot with non stick cooking spray. In a large bowl whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Next whisk in milk, eggs and vanilla extract until the batter is smooth. Pour the batter into the prepared instant pot. Seal the lid on top and cook on manual for 40 minutes using the low setting. The pancake is cooked when a toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean. Use a rubber spatula to gently loosen the pancake from the sides of the pot and invert on a plate. Serve with your favorite pancake toppings. ; name: chicken wild rice chowder ; ingredients: fresh carrots, onion, celery, butter, all-purpose flour, chicken broth, cooked chicken breasts, long grain and wild rice blend, half-and-half cream, pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the carrots, onion and celery in butter til tender. Stir in flour til blended. Gradually add broth. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or til thickened. Stir in chicken, rice, cream and pepper. Heat through. ; name: yogurt bran muffins from fiber one ; ingredients: all-bran cereal, egg whites, vegetable oil, nonfat yogurt, all-purpose flour, splenda granular, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Grease bottoms of 12 muffin molds, or use baking cups. Crush cereal. Stir together egg whites, oil, and yogurt. Stir in cereal and dry ingredients, just until moistened. Fold in optional additions. Spoon batter evenly into tins. Bake 18-20 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: zesty red potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, butter, crushed red pepper flakes, salt ; preparation:Arrange potatoes and onion in an ungreased 9 inch square baking dish. Combine butter, pepper flakes and salt. Drizzle over potatoes and onion. Cover and bake 400 degrees for 25 minutes. Uncover and bake 15-20 minutes longer or until potatoes are tender. ; name: yummy chili casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, celery, chili, diced tomatoes with juice, taco sauce, corn, egg noodles, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: browned kohlrabi karalabe fozelek ; ingredients: kohlrabi, butter, salt, sugar, parsley, flour, chicken broth ; preparation:

name: saffron basmati rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cinnamon stick, green cardamom pods, whole cloves, basmati rice, water, sugar, salt, saffron, pistachio nut ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium saucepan, over medium high heat. Add the cinnamon stick, cardamom and cloves. Saute until the spices are aromatic, about 1 minute, then scoop out with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the rice to the pan and cook, stirring until the rice is evenly coated in oil, and beginning to toast, 1 to 2 minutes. Add the water, sugar, salt and saffron to the pan and bring to a boil over medium high heat, then reduce heat to medium low, partially cover the pan and simmer for 10 minutes. Fully cover the pan and simmer for about 10 minutes longer, until water is completely absorbed. Take pan off heat and let stand 5 minutes without removing lid. Fluff with a fork and stir in the pistachios just before serving. ; name: parmesan grilled sweet onions ; ingredients: sweet onions, butter, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place each onion half, cut side up on a square of heavy-duty aluminum foil. Dot each with butter. Sprinkle with cheese, salt and pepper. Wrap onions tightly in foil. Grill 20 to 30 minutes or until tender. ; name: so i cheated refrigerator dills ; ingredients: dill pickle, onion, cayenne, garlic cloves, vinegar, canning salt, water, dill ; preparation:Remove pickles from jar and discard juice. Put some dill in bottom of empty pickly jar. Slice pickles into circles and add to jar along with onion and garlic cloves. Top jar with remaining dill. Boil vinegar salt and water and pour over pickles in jar. Replace jar top and let cool. Store in refrigerator. ; name: jana s church enchiladas ; ingredients: flour tortillas, ground beef, onion, taco seasoning, cream of chicken soup, milk, green chilies, velveeta cheese, green onion dip ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Brown ground beef and onion. After meat is finished, add taco seasoning. In a saucepan, combine soup, milk, green chilies, velveeta and onion dip. Heat on low till creamy. Fill tortillas with spoonful of meat, roll and put seamside down. Pour creamy mixture over tortillas in a 9x13 pan. Cook at 350 for 20-30 minutes. ; name: spicy sweet glaze chicken ; ingredients: garlic, apricot preserves, soy sauce, ketchup, tabasco sauce, chicken pieces ; preparation:Mix together garlic, apricot preserves, soy sauce, ketchup and tobasco sauce. Put chicken pieces of choice in a gallon ziplock bag. Add the sauce mixture. Place in a freezer. To cook the chicken, thaw completely in the refrigerator. Dump into a 9x13 pan. Bake at 350 degrees fahrenheit until done, 50 to 60 minutes. ; name: scottish whipped shortbread ; ingredients: salted butter, icing sugar, cornstarch, flour, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: indian style mung beans ; ingredients: mung beans, vegetable oil, turmeric, cumin, black mustard seeds, ground coriander, onion, tomatoes, mushrooms ; preparation:Wash and soak the mung beans overnight. Rinse and drain and then place in a pot with enough water to cover them. Bring to boil and then simmer for 45 minutes. Heat the oil in a pan and add the tumeric, cumin and coriander and fry until they turn brown. Add the mustard. Add onion, mushrooms and tomato and cook for 5 minues. Add the mixture to the mung beans and cook for 15-20 minutes. ; name: xue s chicken with celery and leek ; ingredients: chicken breast, celery, leek, soy sauce, salt ; preparation:Dice the chicken and celery. The celery should be sliced lengthways and then chopped along the lengths. This will stop parts of it burning when you stir-fry it. Finely chop the leek. Place the celery in boiling water for a minute. This will reduce the taste slightly. Stir-fry the leek. Then add the chicken and celery. Cook until the chicken is cooked all the way through. Add soy sauce and salt to taste. Serve with rice. ; name: wonderful parmesan zucchini strips ; ingredients: seasoned bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, zucchini, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. In a bowl, combine bread crumbs and cheese topping. Dip zucchini strips into egg, then into crumb mixture. Place on baking sheet coated with nonstick cooking spray. Bake at 450 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown and tender. ; name: midwestern german meatloaf ; ingredients: lean ground beef, ground pork, sauerkraut, rye breadcrumbs, eggs, onion, milk, grainy mustard, caraway seed, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all of the ingredients. Form meat mixture into a loaf and place into a casserole dish. Bake for 50-60 minutes. Nice with scalloped potatoes and steamed green beans. ; name: nacho cheese dip with beer ; ingredients: beer, ground cumin, dried oregano, garlic powder, refried beans, salsa, velveeta cheese, fresh cilantro, tortilla chips ; preparation:Combine beer, cumin, dried oregano and garlic powder in heavy medium sauce-pan. Bring to simmer. Add beans and salsa. Stir until heated through. Add velveeta cheese. Stir until cheese melts, about 3 minutes. Stir in cilantro. Transfer to bowl. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: apple cider glazed carrots ; ingredients: butter, carrot, apple cider, brown sugar, tarragon, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: mohave mesquite bread ; ingredients: mesquite meal, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, oil, water ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients. Add oil and water and mix until dough forms a ball and cleans the sides of the bowl. Lightly grease a cookie sheet or flat pan. Form the dough into a half-sphere loaf on the pan. Bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees. ; name: sand tarts ; ingredients: butter, sugar, pecans, all-purpose flour, powdered sugar ; preparation:Cream butter until soft. Add sugar, pecans, and flour, mixing well. Shape into balls and bake at 300 degrees on ungreased cookie sheet for 45 minutes. While hot, roll balls in powdered sugar. Roll in sugar again after all have been rolled once. ; name: roasted garlic dipping sauce ; ingredients: garlic, mayonnaise, sour cream, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut off top of garlic bulb to expose most of the garlic cloves. Put the bulb in an oven-safe small dish or on top of a sheet of foil. Drizzle olive oil on the tops of the garlic cloves, add more if needed to drench the tops and sides of the whole bulb. Sprinkle some salt on the top of the bulb on the oil. Wrap or seal up the garlic bulb with foil. Roast in oven at 400f for 30-40 minutes, until tops and sides are browned and roasted. Take out of the oven and cool for 10 minutes. When cooled enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic cloves from the root or the bottom of the bulb, into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise and sour cream, using a fork, stir until blended. Add pepper to taste, and salt if needed. ; name: chicken curry bake ; ingredients: honey, lemon juice, curry powder, prepared mustard, onion, slivered almonds, chicken breasts, hot pepper ; preparation:Arrange chicken in a shallow pan. Mix the other ingredients and pour over chicken. Cover pan with foil. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes. Add a little water if needed to bottom of the pan to prevent burning. Uncover and sprinkle almonds over chicken and baste with sauce. Bake uncovered for about 10 more minutes. Careful not to burn. ; name: pina colada cups ; ingredients: oreo cookie crumbs, cream cheese spread, sugar, crushed pineapple, angel flake coconut, cool whip topping ; preparation:Divide crumbs evenly among 12 paper-lined medium muffin cups. Beat cream cheese spread and sugar in large bowl with wire whisk until light and fluffy. Add pineapple and coconut. Mix well. Stir in whipped topping. Spoon into prepared muffin cups. Sprinkle with additional toasted coconut, if desired. Freeze at least 4 hours or until firm. Remove from freezer about 10 minutes before serving to soften slightly. ; name: broccoli and green bean polka ; ingredients: head of broccoli, french beans, olive oil, unsalted cashews, almonds, sea salt ; preparation:

name: zucchini and grape tomatoes in pesto with feta ; ingredients: pesto sauce, feta cheese, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, juice of, salt & freshly ground black pepper, zucchini, grape tomatoes ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine pesto, oil and lemon juice. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Arrange zucchini slices, overlapping slightly, on a platter. Top with grape tomatoes and feta and drizzle pesto mixture on top. Cover and let stand at least 1 hour for flavors to blend. Meanwhile, sit on the porch with a fly swatter and put some grey goose in your lemonade. ; name: fruited spinach salad with honey mustard dressing ; ingredients: vinegar, honey, oil, poppy seed, dry mustard, fresh spinach, papayas, grapes ; preparation:In a screw top jar combine vinegar, oil, honey, poppy seed, and dry mustard cover.
