In a medium saucepan, steam the green beans for approximately 5 minutes, or until crisp-tender. Drain and toss the beans with the toasted walnuts, lime juice and olive oil in a serving bowl. Garnish with cilantro leaves if desired. ; name: swiss steak for the crock pot ; ingredients: round steaks, flour, salt, pepper, onion, carrot, celery, tomato sauce ; preparation:Cut round steak into serving pieces. Season flour with salt and pepper. Dredge meat in seasoned flour. Put onions in bottom of crock pot. Add meat. Top with carrots and celery and cover with tomato sauce. Cover. Cook on low for 8-10 hours or on high for 3-5 hours. ; name: pollo en mojo well sort of ; ingredients: fryer chickens, garlic, sea salt, dried cayenne peppers, cumin seed, paprika, olive oil, red wine vinegar, oil ; preparation:Using a mortar and pestle, mash garlic and salt until creamy. Add cayenne peppers and cumin seeds and continue to mash. Add paprika and mix. Add oil and mix, then add vinegar and mix again. Marinate chicken for 2-3 hours in the refrigerator. Heat a small amount of oil over medium high heat. Fry chicken pieces until cooked through-- for bone-in, about 20 minutes or so, for boneless skinless breasts, about 15 minutes. May also be done on the grill. ; name: sunday morning hash browns potatoes homemade ; ingredients: russet potatoes, onions, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:

name: the texan s silver lining salad ; ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, iceberg lettuce, green onion, avocados, sesame seeds, fish sauce, fresh cracked pepper ; preparation:Whisk together the olive oil, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar. In a large wooden salad bowl, combine the lettuce, green onions, avocados, and crushed toasted sesame seeds. Toss with enough dressing to coat. Add the nuoc mam sauce and toss again lightly. Season with cracked pepper taste and serve. ; name: french beef slice ; ingredients: french bread, ground beef, onion, tomato soup, cheddar cheese soup ; preparation:Cut bread in half lengthwise. Scoop out inside and break into bite size pieces. Combine ground beef& onion in a large skillet. Cook until browned, drain off grease. Stir in soup& bread pieces. Spoon meat mixture into bottom half of bread shell. Cover with top half of bread shell. Wrap loaf in foil. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Cut into slices& serve. ; name: wheat beer bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, beer ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: bacon topped squash casserole ; ingredients: squash, onion, egg, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, bacon ; preparation:Boil or steam squash and onion until tender. Mash, then add salt and pepper. Add butter, egg, 1 cup bread crumbs and cheese. Mix and place into a greased 1 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with remaining bread crumbs and bacon. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: riverside resort s tomato bisque ; ingredients: plum tomatoes, celery, diced onions, carrots, heavy cream, fresh basil, salt, white pepper, tomato paste ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Drain liquid from tomatoes and reserve. Place plum tomatoes on a sheet pan sprayed lightly with pam, and roast in the oven for 20-30 minutes. Meanwhile, over medium-low heat, saute onions, celery and carrots in a stockpot until translucent, approximately 10 minutes, or just until veggies are tender-crisp. Remove roasted tomatoes and allow to cool for a few minutes. Add them to the stockpot along with the reserved tomato juice and tomato paste and stir until combined. Cook for 30-40 minutes. Start gently warming the heavy cream. Meanwhile, puree stockpot mixture, and then add the warmed cream. Finish with salt and pepper to taste. Add fresh chopped basil at the end. ; name: gram s baked macaroni ; ingredients: diced tomatoes, elbow macaroni, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:

name: meatloaf simple and delicious ; ingredients: ground beef, onion roasted garlic soup mix, ketchup, eggs, oatmeal, brown sugar, mustard ; preparation:Mix the ground beef, soup mix, ketchup, eggs and oatmeal together. Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray. Press the meatloaf into the pan. Mix the ketchup, brown sugar and mustard together and spread over the meatloaf. Bake at 350 for about 50 minutes. ; name: pink potatoes ; ingredients: carrots, potatoes, onion, milk, butter, flour, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the potatoes with salt until done. Drain into a colander. Cook the carrots separately with some sugar and salt until tender. Drain into the colander. In one of the pots add the butter and melt and saute the onion till tender. Add the flour and cook one minute. At this point stir in the milk. Add the potatoes and the carrots and mash together until smooth. Add the salt and pepper and some garlic or onion powder if desired. ; name: onion bibb salad ; ingredients: bibb lettuce, watercress, onion, english cucumber, salad oil, tarragon vinegar, worcestershire sauce, salt, sugar, coarse black pepper ; preparation:Place chilled, dried greens, onion, and cucumber in a salad bowl. Zigzag a stream of salad oil over, then a mixture of the vinegar and worcestershire. Sprinkle with salt and sugar. Grind pepper over generously. Toss gently and serve. ; name: lancaster farmhouse baked oatmeal ; ingredients: old fashioned oats, unsalted butter, milk, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, salt, dried apple, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Butter a medium baking dish. Add the oats and butter to a heatproof mixing bowl. Pour 1 cup boiling water over them and let stand 5 minutes. Stir in the milk, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. When well mixed, stir in the apples. Spoon mixture into the prepared dish. Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and continue to cook for 5-10 minutes, until thick and bubbly. Spoon into bowls and serve hot with cream drizzled around the cereal and a dusting of cinnamon. ; name: pizza buns ; ingredients: mushroom, pizza sauce, onion, green pepper, mozzarella cheese, tomatoes, pepperoni, hot dog buns ; preparation:Put pizza sauce in bowl. Drain juice from mushrooms and add. Chop onion& green pepper into small pieces and add to mixture also. Grate mozzarella cheese, leave some for top of buns. Mix ingredients, until fairly thick consistency. Slice tomatoes, and meat if desired. Put pizza bun mixture from bowl on buns or bread, top with tomatoes, meat, and mozzarella cheese. Place buns on cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes or so until cooked, then broil for a few minutes until cheese is brown. ; name: asian style vegetable stir fry ; ingredients: honey, stir-fry sauce, red pepper flakes, peanuts, broccoli florets, mushrooms, onion, carrot ; preparation:

name: wild mushroom and bean salad ; ingredients: chanterelle mushrooms, green beans, bacon, white wine vinegar, mustard, parsley ; preparation:Boil the beans until tender and drain when done. Cut the bacon into small cubes and fry in a shallow pan until golden. Add the vinegar and let it bubble for a few seconds. Season with salt, pepper, the mustard and parsley. Mix the beans and mushrooms together and serve. ; name: easiest baked pork chops with sauce ; ingredients: pork chops, tomato soup, peas, onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Place chops in a 9x13 pan. Pour undiluted tomato soup over chops. Pour peas with liquid over soup. Place onions over all. Salt and pepper to taste. Do not stir. Cover with foil tightly and bake 1 hour 15 minutes or until meat falls off the bone. Serve over mashed potatoes. ; name: lentil chili soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, fresh garlic, onions, frozen carrots, dry lentils, low-sodium v8 juice, water, chili powder, ground cumin, dried oregano ; preparation:Pour the vegetable oil into a large cooking pot or dutch oven. Over medium-high heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden, about 2-3 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and stir. Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to a simmer. Cook uncovered until the lentils are tender, about 45 minutes. Serve. ; name: kittencal s caesar vinaigrette ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, anchovy fillets, dijon mustard, fresh garlic, worcestershire sauce, olive oil, black pepper, salt, parmesan cheese, sugar ; preparation:Using a small processor blend lemon juice, anchovies, dijon mustard, garlic and worcestershire sauce until well blended. While the machine is still running slowly drizzle in oil. Add in parmesan cheese blend to combine. Season with black pepper and salt. Add in the sugar only if needed and blend again. Transfer to a glass jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover and refrigerate 6 hours or overnight before using. Shake well before using. ; name: hot pizza sub sandwich ; ingredients: italian bread, pizza sauce, italian seasoning, green pepper, deli ham, salami, pepperoni, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, american cheese ; preparation:Slice bread in half horizontally. Spread bottom half with pizza sauce, sprinkle with seasoning. Top with green pepper, ham, salami, pepperoni. And cheeses, replace bread top. Place on baking sheet. Bake 425 degrees for 12-15 minutes or until cheese is melted. If cooking on open grill-wrap in foil. If cooking on gas grill covered doesnt need foil. ; name: citrus roasted fish with capers ; ingredients: fish, olive oil, lemon, juice of, sea salt, pepper, lemon, orange, capers ; preparation:

name: khuta a soup from the punjab region of india ; ingredients: buttermilk, sour cream, salt, masala, cayenne pepper, cucumber, carrot ; preparation:In a large bowl, add buttermilk and sour cream, blend with a whisk or electric mixer till smooth. Stir in salt, masala and cayenne pepper. If desired, fold in grated cucumber or carrot. Cover and chill at least two hours, overnight is best. Serve cold. ; name: sausage breakfast muffins oamc ; ingredients: chorizo sausage, bisquick, cornmeal, eggs, milk, cheese ; preparation:Line muffin tins with paper liners, and set aside. Fry, crumble and drain sausage. Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix together bisquick, cornmeal, eggs, and milk. Add drained sausage, and cheese, and stir well. Ladle the filling into the prepared muffin tins, filling almost to top. Bake for 11-15 minutes. Allow to cool completely. Store in freezer in a large airtight container. Or place each in a sandwich bag, and then place a dozen in a large ziploc bag. Microwave on high for approx 90 seconds. ; name: 100 whole wheat rolls ; ingredients: yeast, water, honey, olive oil, eggs, salt, whole wheat flour ; preparation:Dissolve yeast in water and honey for about 5 minutes. Combine honey, olive oil, eggs, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Slowly add flour and knead until it loosens from sides of the bowl. Place in large oiled bowl, cover and let rise until about double. About one hour, be sure it is in a warm place. Punch down and remove dough. Shape dough into rolls about 2 inch in diameter. Place on an oiled or non stick baking sheet, cover and let rise for 30 minutes. Pre-heat oven to 375 degrees. Bake at about 375 degrees for about 20 minutes or until browned. ; name: crab casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, heavy cream, salt, pepper, sherry wine, lump crabmeat, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a double boiler, make cream sauce by melting the butter. Add the flour and stir. Add the cream and stir constantly until sauce is thick. Add salt, pepper and sherry to the double boiler. Take the double boiler off the heat and fold in the crab gently. Pour into buttered 1 quart casserole. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake, uncovered, for about 30 minutes, or until cheese melts, at 400 degrees f. ; name: sandra lee s rose sangria ; ingredients: rose wine, sprite, light rum, brandy, ice cube, apple, red grapes, lemon slice, lime slice ; preparation:Combine wine, sprite, rum, and brandy in a clear glass pitcher filled halfway with ice cubes. Stir with a long wooden spoon. Add a few slices of apple, halved grapes, and lemon and lime slices to pitcher. Stir once more. Pour sangra into tulip glasses. ; name: kid friendly tuna casserole ; ingredients: pasta, velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, canned tuna ; preparation:

name: fruited pot roast ; ingredients: dried prune, dried apricot, ground ginger, light beer, chuck roast, oil, onion, brown sugar, cinnamon, honey ; preparation:In the crock pot, soak the dried fruits and ginger in the beer for 1 to 2 hours. Stir in brown sugar, cinnamon, and honey. Brown meat in oil over medium high heat. Place the meat on top of the fruit in the crock pot. Cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours, or on high for 5 to 6 hours. ; name: mom s hamburger soup ; ingredients: hamburger, salt, pepper, onion flakes, italian-style tomatoes, tomato juice, italian seasoning, frozen mixed vegetables, white rice, hot water ; preparation:Use 8 quart stock pot. Combine first 4 ingredients and cook together until hamburger is loose and no longer pink. Do not overcook. Drain off grease and return meat mixture to the stock pot. Add the diced tomatoes, tomato juice and steak seasoning to the meat mixture. Simmer on low heat for 30 minutes. Stir after 15 minutes. Add the frozen mixed vegetables. Simmer on low heat for 60 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes. Add the rice and 2 c water. Continue to simmer for about 60 minutes stirring frequently. Add additional water if soup is too thick. ; name: tomato cucumber and green pepper chopped salad ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, garlic clove, olive oil, romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green bell pepper, green onions, mint leaves ; preparation:Mix lemon juice and garlic in large bowl. Whisk in oil. Add remaining ingredients. Toss. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: green chili enchiladas ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, flour tortillas, salt & pepper, velveeta cheese, rotel tomatoes & chilies ; preparation:Brown beef, onions, salt and pepper in skillet, drain and add chopped green chilies and mushroom soup, mix well. Lightly warm the tortillas in the microwave to make them easy to roll. Place a couple of heaping tablespoons of meat mixture in each tortilla and roll up. Place in a 9 x 13-inch pan sprayed with non-stick spray. If you have any meat mixture left, you can add it into the next step. Melt velveeta and ro-tel in the microwave or on the stove top, add any remaining meat mixture and pour over tortillas. Put into a 350f oven for about 20 minutes or until cheese is bubbly. ; name: chocochip coconut macadamia nut cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, chocolate cookie crumbs, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, flaked coconut, macadamia nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f in a small saucepan melt butter. Stir in your crumbs, and combine thoroughly. Press mixture into a 13x9 pan. Pour the condensed milk evenly over the crumbs, and then scatter the chocolate chips evenly. Next, sprinkle the coconut and nuts evenly. Now, press down firmly over the entire mixture. Put into your preheated oven and bake for approximately 25-30 minutes until light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on top of a wire rack. ; name: angel hair with garlic spinach and white beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach leaves, cannellini beans, vegetable broth, angel hair pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: caesar salad sandwiches with chicken ; ingredients: hard rolls, romaine lettuce, fat-free caesar salad dressing, parmesan cheese, chicken breasts, olive oil ; preparation:Set the oven on broil. Cut each roll in half and scoop out the dough to form a pocket in one side of the bread. Combine the lettuce, dressing and cheese in a bowl. Place the chicken strips on a broiler pan and brush with the olive oil. Broil the strips of chicken for a total of about 7 minutes, turning once. Add the chicken to the salad and pile the mixture into the bread pocket. Top with the other half of bread and serve. ; name: broccoli pasta with salmon ; ingredients: broccoli, salt, pasta, smoked salmon, eggs, milk, black pepper ; preparation:Wash and clean the broccoli, cut it into small flowers and cook it in boiling saltwater for 4 minutes. Set aside. Take it out and cook the pasta in the same water until al dente. Set aside. Cut the salmon into thin slices and then into bites. Whisk the eggs and add milk, a pinch of salt and the freshly grinded black pepper. Put the pasta in a nice salad bowl, pour the eggs over it, add the broccoli and at last the salmon and blend. Serve or store in fridge for up to 24 hours. ; name: pork chops in peach and ginger sauce ; ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, peach jam, fresh ginger, red wine vinegar, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Grease a shallow baking dish large enough to hold the chops. Season the chops with salt and pepper. In a bowl stir together the jam, ginger, wine vinegar, and worcestershire sauce. Pour this mixture over the chops and let them marinate for 1 hour. During this time, turn them once and spoon the sauce over the top. Cover the baking dish and bake the chops, in marinade for 25 minutes. ; name: cherry cheesecake low fat ; ingredients: eggs, low-fat cream cheese, low fat cottage cheese, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar substitute, lemon juice, pure vanilla extract, reduced fat graham cracker crust, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix first 7 ingredients by hand or in blender. Pour into pie crust, bake 30 minutes until set. Remove and refrigerate overnight. Spread cherry pie filling on top, serve. ; name: pumpkin cream pie ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, butter, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, canned pumpkin, 9-inch graham cracker crust, sugar, heavy cream ; preparation:Beat first 5 ingredients together until fluffy, 1-2 minutes. Blend in pumpkin. Spoon into crust. Chill throughly. Top with whipped cream. ; name: asparagus mushroom bacon quiche ; ingredients: pie crust, cheddar cheese, cooked bacon, mushroom, onion, asparagus spears, milk, eggs, italian seasoning, garlic ; preparation:

name: fruit chewy cookies with no added sugar ; ingredients: bananas, egg whites, dates, raisins, rolled oats, cocoa powder ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Defrost the bananas so they are soft and mash them in a bowl, leaving some little chunks. Into the bowl add the egg whites and mix well. Then add the dates and the raisins and mix well or until the fruit is coated with the egg mixture. Add the oatmeal and the cocoa powder if you are using it. Let the bowl sit for 10 minutes or until the oatmeal absorbs all the liquid. Spray baking pans with cooking spray. Using 2 teaspoons, spoon the mixture onto the baking pan. With the back of one of the spoons, smush the mixture down so it is somewhat flat. Bake the cookies for 20-25 minutes or until the edges are getting golden brown. Remove the cookies to a cooling rack. ; name: cucumber basil martini ; ingredients: sugar, hot water, fresh ginger, cucumber, basil leaves, gin, fresh lime juice, ice ; preparation:In a small bowl, dissolve the sugar in the hot water. Press the grated ginger through a fine strainer set over the bowl, releasing the juice. In a cocktail shaker, muddle the diced cucumber with the 2 torn basil leaves. Add the ginger syrup, gin, lime juice and a handful of ice. Shake well, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish the martini with a cucumber slice and the remaining whole basil leaf and serve. ; name: white chocolate potato chip cookies ; ingredients: shortening, granulated sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, white chocolate chips, flour, baking soda, potato chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cream shortening and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Beat well. Sift flour and baking soda and stir into creamed mixture. Add crushed potato chips and white chocolate chips. Stir to integrate fully. Drop by heaping spoonfuls onto greased cookie shhet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: cordon bleu stromboli ; ingredients: frozen bread dough, butter, deli ham, swiss cheese, roasted deli chicken ; preparation:On a lightly floured surface, roll dough into a 10-in x 8-in rectangle. Spread with butter. Top with ham, cheese and chicken. Roll up jelly-roll style. Starting with a long side. Pinch seam to seal and tuck ends under. Place seam side down on a greased baking sheet. Cover and let rise for 20 minute. Bake at 375 for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: baby food chicken ; ingredients: butter, unbleached flour, milk, chicken, potato, white cheddar cheese, vegetables, salt ; preparation:Grill or bake chicken, remove bones and shred. Bake or boil potato and chop into small cubes or mash. Melt butter in a saucepan. Add milk, flour, and cheese and make a sauce. Add chicken and potato to it. Add remaining ingredients. ; name: baked bbq turkey drumsticks ; ingredients: turkey legs, sea salt, black pepper, unsulphured molasses, red wine vinegar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, red onion, coconut oil ; preparation:

name: refried bean supreme ; ingredients: refried beans, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, green onion ; preparation:Mix beans and half of the cheese in a microwaveable safe dish. Cover. Microwave on high for 3min. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Microwave until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with green onions and tomato. ; name: pork chops low cal carb ; ingredients: pork loin chops, dijon mustard, corn flakes, salt, pepper, basil, tarragon, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to broil. Coat pork chops with the mustard. In a shallow bowl, combine crushed corn flakes and the seasonings. Dredge pork chops in the crushed corn flakes mixture. Place pork chops on a wire rack and set rack on top of a sheet pan. Place under the broiler and cook on both sides until golden brown, about 5 minutes on each side. ; name: simply elegant steak and rice ; ingredients: boneless beef round steak, vegetable oil, onions, sliced mushrooms, cream of mushroom soup, garlic salt, cooked rice ; preparation:Cut steak into thin strips. In a large skillet, brown meat in oil, using high heat. Add onions. Saute until tender crisp. Blend soup, liquid from mushrooms and garlic salt. Pour over steak. Add mushrooms. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for one hour or until steak is tender. Serve over bed of fluffy rice. ; name: fresh orange slices with honey and cinnamon ; ingredients: oranges, honey, cinnamon stick, orange flower water, sliced almonds, greek yogurt ; preparation:Using small sharp knife, cut off peel and white pith from oranges. Thinly slice oranges into rounds. Arrange orange slices in shallow bowl. Combine honey, cinnamon stick, and orange flower water in heavy small saucepan. Stir over low heat until mixture comes to simmer, about 2 minutes. Pour hot syrup over oranges. Cool. Sprinkle almonds over oranges. Serve cold or at room temperature, with a dollop of yoghurt or sour cream on the side, if desired. A flavoring extract available at liquor stores and in the liquor or specialty foods section of some supermarkets. ; name: mushroom potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, salt, cream of mushroom soup, milk, onion, paprika ; preparation:Cover potatoes with water, add salt and cook until tender. Mix soup, milk and onion. Add potatoes and toss to mix well. Pour into greased 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: strawberry and greens salad ; ingredients: mixed salad green, radishes, strawberry, spring onions, red pepper, coriander, vinaigrette ; preparation:

name: quick easy tuna rice ; ingredients: starkist sweet and spicy tuna, cooked white rice, spinach, slivered almonds ; preparation:Cook rice and veggies. Top rice with layer of spinach or broccoli. Top that with tuna directly from the pouch. Add some almond slivers. Voila. ; name: bacon cucumber and cream cheese sammies ; ingredients: pumpernickel bread, cream cheese, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, cucumber, bacon ; preparation:Cook bacon in a 400 degree oven until crisp, being careful not to burn it, about 10-14 minutes. If you prefer, you could fry it in a pan or on the griddle. Drain well and let cool. In a bowl, mix the cream cheese and seasoning packet together. Thinly slice the cucumber and set it aside. Spread 2 slices of pumpernickle with a thin layer of the cream cheese mixture. On one slice, layer the cucumber and bacon, and top with the other slice of bread. Cut the sandwich into triangles and serve. ; name: virginia barbecue ; ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, onion, ketchup, sugar, dry mustard, chili powder, worcestershire sauce, cider vinegar, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Cut roast into chunks. Place in 3-quart or larger slow cooker. Mix onion, ketchup, sugar, mustard, chili powder, worcestershire sauce, vinegar, pepper. Pour on roast. Cook on low for 8 hours. Remove pork from cooker. Shred. Mix with sauce in cooker. ; name: magical pie ; ingredients: butter, plain flour, milk, caster sugar, vanilla essence, desiccated coconut, eggs ; preparation:Place all the ingredients in a bowl. Beat until mixed well. Pour into a greased flan dish. Bake for about one hour at 175 degrees celsius. When baked it will surprisingly have a base, a custard centre, and a coconut topping. ; name: funfetti bars ; ingredients: pillsbury funfetti cake mix, margarine, eggs, chocolate frosting ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f grease 15x10-inch baking pan. In large bowl, combine cake mix, margarine and eggs. Stir by hand until thoroughly moistened. Stir in candy bits from cake mix. Spread in pan. Bake for 13 to 17 minutes or until light golden brown and toothpick comes out clean. Cool completely. Frost bars and sprinkle with candy bits from frosting. Cut into bars. ; name: weight watchers raspberry zinger cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, diet sprite, egg whites, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cool whip, flaked coconut ; preparation:

name: turkish lamb chops ; ingredients: onion, salt, olive oil, fresh thyme leave, lamb loin chops, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon wedge ; preparation:Sprinkle the onion with the salt. Squeeze the juice out of the onion and discard it. Add the oil and thyme to the onion. Apply the mixture to both sides of the chops and marinate for 1 hour. Grill chops or broil close to heat source. Season with salt and lots of pepper. Garnish with lemon wedges. ; name: homemade spicy tortilla chips ; ingredients: salt, chili powder, fresh lime juice, flour tortillas, nonstick cooking spray ; preparation:Combine salt, chili powder and lime juice in a cup. Mix well. Brush lightly over each tortilla. Cut each tortilla into 8 wedges. Spread tortilla wedges in a single layer on a baking sheet sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Toast in a preheated 400 oven for 7-9 minutes or until chips are lightly browned and crisp. Remove from oven. Cool. Chips will firm up as they cool. ; name: linguine with fresh tomatoes olives and feta cheese ; ingredients: linguine, tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, black olives, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, combine tomato, basil, olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper in mixing bowl. Drain pasta and place in large serving bowl. Top with tomato mixture, sprinkle with feta cheese and olives. Serve. ; name: after the gold rush ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, chopped tomato, green pepper, green onion, brown sugar, jalapeno pepper, tarragon vinegar, salt, fresh dill ; preparation:Combine the first 7 ingredients in a heavy, non-aluminum saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 20-25 minutes or until liquid has evaporated, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat. Stir in salt, if desired. Let cool for 5 minutes. Stir in the dill. Spoon into a serving bowl. Serve at room temperature and refrigerate unused portion. ; name: maple roasted parsnips ; ingredients: parsnips, olive oil, salt and black pepper, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 c. Line a baking dish with non stick baking paper. Place parsnips, salt, pepper and oil in baking dish. Toss to combine. Roast for 30 minutes, pour over syrup. Roast for another 15 - 20 minutes till cooked through and golden. ; name: oven ranch chicken ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, ranch dressing mix, low-fat sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:

name: sorority chocolate fudge ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, evaporated milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate chips, marshmallow creme, nuts, vanilla ; preparation:Cream margarine and sugar with wooden spoon in 6 quart saucepan. Mixing thoroughly, stir in milk over medium heat. Evenly work from bottom of pan. Cook to full rolling boil. If using candy thermometer, cook to 230 degrees. If not, cook 7 minutes from start of full rolling boil, still stirring constantly. Remove from heat and add marshmallow creme, chocolate chips and vanilla. Beat until very think and creamy. Pour into an 11x16 tray which has been lightly and evenly buttered. ; name: grilled shrimp pineapple ; ingredients: shrimp, pineapple, olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Prepare a fire in a charcoal grill. Thread 2 shrimp and 1 cube pineapple onto each of 5 skewers. Brush with oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Grill, turning over a medium fire until shrimp are pink, about 5 minutes. ; name: potato and zucchini soup ; ingredients: onion, zucchini, potatoes, chicken stock cubes, cream, butter, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Chop vegies as roughly as you like. Saute with a tablespoon of butter. Add enough water to cover, add stock cubes. Cook until tender. Blend and mash the vegies. Add the cream to taste. Serve with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: grilled chicken and cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: cooked chicken, raisins, almonds, celery, mayonnaise, monterey jack cheese, whole wheat bread, butter ; preparation:For the chicken mixture, stir the first five ingredients together. Using half the bread place 1 slice of cheese on each slice of bread. Spread the chicken mixture on evenly and top with cheese. Spread butter on one side of each of the sandwiches, cook with butter side down on medium heat for about three minutes or until light and brown. Spread the other side with remaining butter and cook for three minutes. ; name: hash brown bake ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, butter, cooked ham, shredded cheddar cheese, red peppers, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: seasoned scrambled eggs ; ingredients: egg whites, eggs, ranch salad dressing, spicy brown mustard, fresh parsley, garlic powder, canola oil, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: roasted turkey panini ; ingredients: focaccia bread, turkey breast, dried cranberries, sharp cheddar cheese, red onion, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Saute the dried cranberries and red onion in olive oil for two minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add one tablespoon of water to keep ingredients moist. Set cranberry compote aside. Slice the rosemary & onion focaccias in half, then slice horizontally to create the top and bottom sandwich portions. Cover the bottom half of the focaccia with cranberry compote and top with 4 ounces of roasted turkey breast and one slice of sharp cheddar cheese. Place top of focaccia over sandwich. Grill over medium-high heat on both sides. ; name: moist vegan cornbread ; ingredients: maple syrup, canola oil, plain soymilk, whole wheat flour, cornmeal, baking powder, kosher salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Stir first three ingredients together. In another bowl whisk together the flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt. Regular salt will work as well. Mix wet and dry ingredients together and pour into a greased 9x9 square pan. Bake for 35 minutes at 350, until tester comes out clean. ; name: country bread abm ; ingredients: water, olive oil, honey, salt, sugar, white bread flour, whole wheat flour, yeast ; preparation:Add water, oil, honey, sugar and salt in container. Add flour. Make a ridge and add yeast. Bake for basic bread. It is really good and so easy to make. To make it even better, remove from bread machine after the dough cycle. Shape in one large on 2 smaller loaves. Let rise in a warm place for 1 hour. Bake in a 375 preheated oven 30 minutes. ; name: amazing and fast pressure cooker short ribs ; ingredients: beef short ribs, light olive oil, beef broth, red wine, sweet onion, garlic cloves, honey, brown sugar, coarse salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in heavy pan then brown short ribs in the oil. Put short ribs in pressure cooker. Put in pressure cooker red wine, beef broth, onion,. Garlic, honey, brown sugar, salt and pepper. Bring to high pressure. Cook at high pressure for one hour. Turn off and let steam come down naturally -- do not open cooker until steam is completely released. Serve. ; name: carob cocoa hot ; ingredients: carob powder, cornstarch, unsweetened soymilk, vanilla extract, sugar ; preparation:In a small saucepan, whisk together dry ingredients. Gradually add soy milk to keep mixture smooth. Heat, stirring often, until hot. Stir in vanilla. Add a natural sweetener to taste, if desired. ; name: the cake of wisdom ; ingredients: carrots, ginger, lemon peel, eggs, honey, cinnamon, dry breadcrumbs, ground hazelnuts, cream cheese ; preparation:

name: strawberry cheesecake shake ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, cream cheese, skim milk, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream ; preparation:In a blender container, combine all ingredients except ice cream. Blend well. Add ice cream. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately. ; name: captain d s batter dipped fish ; ingredients: pollock fillets, flour, dry yeast, egg, beer, hot water, salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper ; preparation:In a bowl mix the yeast and beer. In another bowl beat together the egg, hot water and salt. Add the egg mixture to the beer. Slowly beat in the flour until batter is consistency of light pancake batter. Roll or dust fish with flour. Drop fish into batter and cover thoroughly. Fry in hot oil. Drain on baking rack or broiling pan. ; name: honey cream filled crescents ; ingredients: cream cheese, honey, almonds, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f mix cream cheese and 2 tablespoons of the honey. Stir in almonds. Unroll crescent roll dough. Separate into 8 triangles. Spread 1 rounded tablespoons cream cheese mixture onto each triangle. Roll up each loosely, starting at shortest side of triangle, rolling to opposite point. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet. Curve each into crescent shape. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bale 12 to 14 minute or until golden brown. Serve rolls warm, drizzled with remaining honey. ; name: goulash heart healthy version ; ingredients: ground turkey, whole wheat elbow macaroni, onion, light cheese whiz, garlic powder, diced tomatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook macaroni until al dente, drain and reserve. Brown ground turkey. Add onion and garlic powder, cook until onion is translucent. Add tin of tomatoes, with their juices. Return cooked macaroni to pot, heat through. Add cheez whiz, stir until melted. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. ; name: lemon soy pork tenderloin ; ingredients: soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, lemon juice, ground black pepper, vegetable oil, pork tenderloin ; preparation:In a zip-top plastic bag, combine soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, garlic, lemon juice, pepper and oil. Add pork, and turn to coat evenly. Squeeze out as much air as possible, seal, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade. ; name: spring green guacamole ; ingredients: peas, avocado, nonfat sour cream, green onion, cilantro, lime juice, green chili, garlic clove, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: leek cream soup ; ingredients: leeks, cauliflower, onion, vegetable bouillon granules, cream, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Cut the leek in small pieces. Cut the center out of the cauliflower and separate the flowerets. Cook the leek, onion and cauliflower in the vegetable bouillon until soft. With the mixer, mix the soup until smooth. Heat again, stirring the cream in. Serve with the parsley sprinkled on top. ; name: chicken pistachio sandwich ; ingredients: cooked chicken breast, celery rib, pistachios, coriander, mayonnaise, bread, butter, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Cut chicken into small pieces. Combine celery, pistachios, coriander and lime mayo in a small bowl. Add the chicken and stir through until well coated with the mayo. If using, lightly butter the bread. Spread chicken mixture onto 2 slices of bread, season with salt & pepper, then top with remaining bread slices. ; name: breaded chicken fingers ; ingredients: chicken breasts, egg, buttermilk, garlic powder, all-purpose flour, seasoned bread crumbs, salt, baking powder, oil ; preparation:Place chicken strips into a large, resealable plastic bag. In a small bowl, mix the egg, buttermilk and garlic powder. Pour mixture into bag with chicken. Seal and refrigerate 2 to 4 hours. In another large, resealable plastic bag, mix together the flour, bread crumbs, salt and baking powder. Remove chicken from refrigerator, drain, discarding buttermilk mixture. Place chicken in flour mixture bag. Seal and shake to coat. Heat oil in a large, heavy skillet to 375 degrees. Carefully place coated chicken in hot oil. Fry until golden brown and juices run clear. Drain on paper towels. ; name: peach dump cake for 2 ; ingredients: peaches, ground cinnamon, brown sugar, crumb cake mix, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Empty the canned peaches into a 1 quart baking dish that has been sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix in the cinnamon and brown sugar. Sprinkle with the crumb cake mix and cut butter into 4 equal portions and place on top. Cover and bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes. Remove cover and continue to cook for an additional 10 minutes or until top is brown. Can be served immediately or is also good room temperature. ; name: perfect roast chicken ; ingredients: lemon, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, whole chickens, coarse salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: orange ginger chicken and rice recipe ; ingredients: orange juice, onion, cooked brown rice, fresh ginger, dried parsley, dried thyme, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: strawberry shortcake ; ingredients: angel food cake, cream cheese, sugar, cool whip, vanilla extract, strawberry ; preparation:Cut up strawberries and cover with sugar. Let sit in the refrigerator for several hours. Blend cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla. Add cool whip to the mixture. Spread on top of cake. Top cake with strawberries. Be careful to not put too much of the juice on the cake, or else it will be too moist. Refrigerate for an hour. ; name: creamy shrimp salad on romaine ; ingredients: shrimp, celery, egg whites, walnuts, onions, fat-free thousand island salad dressing, romaine lettuce ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the shrimp, celery, egg whites, walnuts and onions. Add the dressing and stir until the shrimp-mixture is coated. Cover and chill in the refrigerator about 30 minutes to blend the flavors. To serve, divide the lettuce among four plates. Then top with shrimp mixture. ; name: potatoes with bay leaves ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, black pepper, bay leaves, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Make a deep slit lengthwise in each potato, almost to the point of cutting it in half. Sprinkle salt and pepper inside the potatos and tuck in the bay leaves, 2 per potato. Put the potatoes in a baking dish and drizzle with olive oil, smearing some on the insides as well as making sure the outsides are well coated. Push the potato halves back together. Sprinkle their outsides with salt and pepper. Bake for about 1 hour. The potatoes are done when you can easily poke a thin-bladed knife right through them. Serve immediately. ; name: artichoke bruschetta ; ingredients: marinated artichoke hearts, tomatoes, romano cheese, red onion, garlic cloves, mayonnaise, french baguette ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place the bread slices on a baking sheet and toast lightly under the broiler. In a medium bowl, mix marinated artichoke hearts, romano or parmesan cheese, red onion, crushed garlic, diced tomato and mayonnaise. Top the lightly toasted french baguette slices with equal amounts of the artichoke heart mixture being careful to spread the mixture over the entire surface. The edges of the bread will tend to burn if not covered by the artichoke mixture. Arrange slices in a single layer on the baking sheet. Broil in the preheated oven 2 minutes, or until toppings are bubbly and lightly browned. ; name: cornmeal cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, pure vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour ; preparation:Mix softened butter and sugar until creamy. Add the egg and vanilla and beat well. In a separate mixing bowl, mix together the cornmeal, baking powder, salt and flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: pork chops in honey mustard sauce ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt and pepper, olive oil, dry white wine, honey, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: coffee ganache ; ingredients: instant espresso, boiling water, heavy cream, light corn syrup, dark chocolate ; preparation:Stir together the instant espresso and boiling water until smooth. Set aside. Combine the cream and the corn syrup in a heavy saucepan and bring to a boil over medium heat. Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the espresso. Pour the mixture over the chocolate and let sit, covered, for 2 to 3 minutes. Stir until the chocolate is completely melted and the sauce is very smooth. Keep warm until ready to use, or let cool to room temperature and store in a container with a tight-fitting lid in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks. Reheat chilled sauce over very low heat on the stovetop or in the microwave until warm enough to pour easily. ; name: lazy banana muffins in the oven in just over 5 minutes ; ingredients: egg, bananas, golden syrup, sour cream, canola oil, vanilla, self raising flour, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 180 c of 350f. Grease & line muffin tins with liners. In a blender place - egg, bananas, golden syrup, lite sour cream, canola oil & vanilla. Blend until smooth. In a large bowl combine remaining dry ingredients & make a well in the centre. Pour banana blend into the well and mix until just combined. Spoon equal amounts into the 12 holes. Bake for 20 minutes. Allow to cool in tin for 5 minutes before turning out on a rack to cool. Yummy warm with a coffee. ; name: white chocolate party mix ; ingredients: small pretzels, cheerios toasted oat cereal, corn chex, salted peanuts, vanilla chips, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine first 5 ingredients. Set aside. In a microwave-safe bowl, heat chips and oil on medium-high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Microwave on high for 10 seconds. Stir until smooth. Pour over cereal mixture and mix well. Spread onto wax paper-lined baking sheets. Cool. Break apart. Store in an airtight container. ; name: steak with a chive whiskey cream sauce ; ingredients: butter, steak fillets, chives, flour, beef stock, whiskey, lemon juice, dijon mustard, cream ; preparation:Melt butter in pan over a medium flame and seal meat on both sides. Continue cooking for a further 2 minutes transfer steaks to bbq & cook to desired degree. Add chives to pan and cook over a low heat for 1 minute. Sprinkle in flour and stir to combine. Add remaining ingredients and simmer gently until just thickened. Serve steaks with whiskey sauce. ; name: savory organic golden beets with greens ; ingredients: garlic clove, water, beet, salt, limes ; preparation:Clean and dice beets. Clean green tops of beets. Crush and chop the garlic clove. Add the beets, garlic, salt into a hot fry pan. There is no need for oil because you are trying to braise the beets to keep the flavor. Turn the heat down to medium, once the beets start to brown add the water until the beets are soft and can push a fork into them - about 20 minutes. The water will evaporate down, chop and add the greens and squeeze the lemon or lime into the dish cover and cook on medium heat until wilted. Serve right away and enjoy. ; name: honey mustard tilapia ; ingredients: butter, dijon-style mustard, honey, seasoned dry bread crumb, pecans, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: zucchini rice pilaf ; ingredients: dried basil, butter, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, long grain rice, carrot, zucchini ; preparation:In a skillet, saute basil and butter for one minute. Then add chicken stock and bring to a boil. Stir in the rice and carrot. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Add zucchini slices and simmer another 10 minutes or until zucchini is tender. ; name: crock pot swiss cheese chicken ; ingredients: turkey bacon, potatoes, boneless chicken breasts, garlic clove, onion, carrot, cream of chicken soup, swiss cheese ; preparation:In skillet cook bacon until crispy, remove and crumble. Set aside. Add potatoes to crockpot. Add chicken to crockpot. Add garlic, onion, carrot and soup to crockpot. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours. Remove individual pieces of chicken to plates along with vegetables and place one slice of cheese on each piece of chicken. Sprinkle bacon on top of cheese. Enjoy. ; name: cheese and thyme wrapped mushrooms ; ingredients: goat cheese, mushrooms, thyme, puff pastry, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oven 200 c, place a baking sheet in to heat. Slice goats cheese into 4 equal pieces, leaving the rind on. Turn the mushrooms cut side up. Sit a piece of cheese in the middle of each mushroom. Top with some thyme leave and season to taste. Cut pastry into 4 strips lengthways. Wrap each mushroom in a strip of pastry so that the ends of the pastry are under the mushroom. Make slashes on top of the pastry with the. Brush exposed sides of mushroom with oil. Place them on hot baking sheet, cook 15 - 20 minutes til pastry is golden and cheese oozing and mushroom is tender. ; name: ghoulish punch ; ingredients: boiling water, lime gelatin, orange juice, seltzer water, ice cube, orange sherbet, orange, lime ; preparation:Stir boiling water into dry gelatin in large bowl at least 2 minutes until completely dissolved. Stir in juice. Cool to room temperature. Pour into punch bowl just before serving. Add seltzer and ice. Stir. Add scoops of sherbet and fruit slices. ; name: mixed grilled vegetables ; ingredients: olive oil, red onions, yellow squash, red bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat grill to high. Lightly oil grates. Insert two 8-inch-long metal or presoaked wooden skewers through onion slices horizontally. Place prepared skewers and remaining vegetables on one or two rimmed baking sheets. Drizzle with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Working in batches if necessary, remove from baking sheets. Arrange on grill. Cook, turning occasionally, until lightly browned and tender, 4 to 8 minutes for squash and 8 to 12 minutes for onions and peppers. Remove skewers, and serve. ; name: ginger orange tilapia ; ingredients: orange juice, orange peel, garlic, ginger, vegetable oil, tilapia fillets, flour, salt and pepper, green onion ; preparation:

name: jamaican pumpkin soup ; ingredients: onion, pumpkin, chicken stock, scotch bonnet pepper, scallions, garlic cloves, bay leaf, fresh thyme, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Saut onions in butter in a large pot until transparent. Add pumpkin and fill with stock. Add the remaining ingredients and bring to boil. Simmer for about half an hour or to desired consistency. Remove scotch bonnet pepper and serve hot. ; name: raisin bread not bread machine ; ingredients: flour, fast rising yeast, cinnamon, sugar, brown sugar, salt, butter, raisins, water ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes. ; name: broccoli potato casserole ; ingredients: frozen broccoli, condensed mushroom soup, mashed potatoes, cheese, salt and pepper, paprika, garlic powder, butter ; preparation:Cook potatoes until tender and mash them. Cook broccoli until tender. Dot casserole dish with butter or mushroom. Add broccoli. Top the broccoli with the mushroom soup and grated cheese. Add the mashed potatoes on top. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder. Bake in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. ; name: black white and red all over vegetarian tacos ; ingredients: black beans, white corn, rotel, tortilla, sour cream ; preparation:Drain and rinse black beans. Drain corn and tomatoes. Mix beans, corn and tomatoes in pan and heat until heated throughout. Serve on tortillas with any additional toppings desired. Mixture can also be heated in microwave. ; name: italian lemon trout ; ingredients: trout fillets, olive oil, lemon, zest of, basil, minced garlic clove, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 500. In a bowl mix olive oil, minced garlic, basil and parmesan cheese and set aside. Cover a cookie sheet with tinfoil. Spray covered cookie sheet with non stick stray so fish will not stick. Place trout fillets on covered cookie sheet about 1 inch apart. Spoon mixture you reserved in bowl over fish. About 1 tablespoon full spreading evenly over fish. Place a couple of lemon slice over top of mixture on fish. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes. No need to add salt as parmesan will add salt to recipe. Wonderful served with a side salad or pasta. ; name: modern morocco coffee cinnamon ice cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, instant espresso powder, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, plain fat-free yogurt, ground cinnamon, figs ; preparation:

name: garlic shrimp with basil tomatoes ; ingredients: grape tomatoes, fresh basil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, raw shrimp, garlic ; preparation:If using larger than cherry or grape tomatoes, cut them in segments about the same size as your shrimp. In a medium bowl, combine tomatoes & basil. Season with salt & pepper. Set aside. Rinse, drain & pat shrimp dry. Season with salt & pepper. Heat a large saute pan or skillet over medium heat. When hot, add shrimp and saute for about 1 minute. Add garlic, and continue to saute shrimp until pink and cooked through. Add shrimp and garlic to bowl of tomatoes & basil, and toss well. May be served hot. ; name: one dish chicken biscuit bake ; ingredients: cooked chicken, cream of mushroom soup, water, sliced mushrooms, pepper, refrigerated biscuits ; preparation:Preheat over to 325. Place cooked chicken in 9x13 baking pan. Combine the soup and water. Mix well and pour over chicken. Place uncooked biscuits over chicken mixture. Sprinkle with pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until biscuits are lightly brown. ; name: fast and easy bean and corn salad ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, corn, black beans, tomatoes, green onions, cheddar cheese, ranch dressing, salsa ; preparation:In a large serving bowl put the lettuce, canned corn, canned beans, tomato, green onion and cheese. Lightly toss. Right before serving mix together the ranch dressing and salsa and pour over the salad. Mix well. Serve at once. You may top the salad with roasted chicken pieces that you have diced, but that is optional. ; name: mulberry strawberry freezer jam ; ingredients: mulberries, strawberry, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert ; preparation:Cook any combination of berrys and sugar together for 10-15 minutes with a little water. Add strawberry jell-o gelatin. Label containers or bags with item & date. Pour into containers or freezer bags and freeze. Or use jelly jars and process for canning. ; name: hootenanny pancakes ; ingredients: butter, eggs, milk, salt, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degree f. Put entire stick butter into a 9 x 13 inch pan. Put pan with butter into the oven until butter is melted. Beat the eggs, milk, and salt until frothy. Add flour. Beat until mixed. Pour over melted butter. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Serve with syrup or jelly. ; name: la casita s guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, onion, salt, water ; preparation:

name: potato salad with cumin tourchi batata tunisia ; ingredients: potato, olive oil, harissa, salt, cumin, lemon, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Cook potatoes in boiling water for 15 minutes or until tender but not too soft or mushy. Cool and peel, cut into cubes. Heat oil in a small skillet and add harissa, salt, cumin and lemon juice. Bring to a boil and boil for a few seconds. Pour over potatoes and toss. Refrigerate for 1 hour or overnight. Add the chopped cilantro or parsley just before serving. Stir it in or sprinkle on top as you wish. ; name: oriental asparagus and mushrooms ; ingredients: green asparagus, sesame seed oil, garlic cloves, fresh mushrooms, white wine, soy sauce, unsalted cashews ; preparation:Wash and trim the asparagus. Cut the asparagus into pieces about 1 inch long, reserving. Heat the oil in a skillet or wok until hot. Add the garlic, the asparagus and mushrooms. Stir fry for about 2 minutes. Now add the wine, soy sauce, the asparagus. Mix well and stir fry for 2 more minutes. Serve warm. ; name: sara belle s veg all casserole ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, water chestnuts, onion, mayonnaise, sharp cheddar cheese, butter, butter flavored crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl. When well combined, transfer to a casserole dish. Combine butter and crackers. Place cracker mixture on top of vegetable casserole. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until bubbly around edges. ; name: linguine with green onions ; ingredients: linguine, green onion, butter, dark sesame oil, low sodium soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic powder ; preparation:Cook linguine just until done. Trim green onions and cut lengthwise into long thin threads, including green tops. While noodles are cooking, heat butter and sesame oil in a large skillet. Stir in green onions. Cook for 1 minute or until onions are wilted. Add soy sauce, ginger and garlic powder. Add drained pasta, toss well and serve. ; name: banana and peanut butter toast ; ingredients: bread, banana, creamy peanut butter, egg, milk, butter, salt, pancake syrup ; preparation:Spread bread slices with peanut butter. Arrange half of sliced banana on one slice of bread. Cover with another slice of bread. Heat a nonstick frying pan and grease with butter. Coat sandwich with egg and milk mixture and grill for 2 minutes on each side. Served garnished with remaining sliced banana and hot syrup. ; name: raspberry whip ; ingredients: sugar-free raspberry gelatin, boiling water, cold water, sugar-free cool whip ; preparation:

name: bangin bourbon balls ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, pecan halves, salt, dipping chocolate, bourbon ; preparation:Cream the butter and sugar to form a fondant. Add the dash of salt and whiskey to taste mix well. Roll a tablespoon of fondant around 1 pecan half. Place on waxed paper and refrigerate 8 hours or until firm. Melt chocolate and cool until easily handled. Dip the balls, letting the excess drip off. Place back on the waxed paper. Chill 1 hour or until chocolate is set. Store in an airtight container either in a very cool place or the refrigerator. ; name: red pepper cheddar dip ; ingredients: sharp white cheddar cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, roasted red pepper, tabasco sauce, bacon, scallion, salt and pepper ; preparation:Blend all ingredients, excepts the bacon and scallions in a food processor until fairly smooth. Saute the bacon until crispy and drain. Reserve some of the bacon to use as a garnish, the stir the rest into the the cheese mixture. Chill for at least 1 hour. Just before serving, garnish with remaining bacon and scallions. Serve with favorite bread sticks, veggies, toasted baguettes, etc. ; name: tko sangria punch non alcoholic ; ingredients: crystal light raspberry powdered drink mix, cranberry juice cocktail, orange juice, fresh lime juice, club soda, oranges, limes ; preparation:Empty drink mix into large pitcher. Add cranberry juice cocktail, orange juice and lime juice. Stir until drink mix is completely dissolved. Stir in club soda and fruit. Serve over ice cubes in tall glasses. ; name: maw maw s country style steak ; ingredients: steak, onions, ground pepper, cream of mushroom soup, reduced-sodium brown gravy mix ; preparation:Cut any large pieces of steak into roughly 4-inch-wide pieces after tenderizing vigorously. Place a single layer of steak in the bottom of a slow cooker. Peel and slice the onion into -inch-wide rings. Place half the rings over the steak. Sprinkle with half the pepper. Layer the rest of the steak over the rings and top with the remaining onion and pepper. In a small bowl, combine the soup, gravy mix and 1 cup lukewarm water. Mix well. Pour the mixture over the steak, and cover the slow cooker. Cook on high heat for 6 hours or low heat for 10 hours. Remove steak to a large platter, and spoon the gravy on top. Serve immediately. ; name: pasta with leek bacon ; ingredients: butter, bacon, leeks, cream, pasta, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut bacon into 1cm cubes. Trim the leeks and cut in half length ways, rinsing any dirt out from beneath the layers. Cut the halves into thin strips length ways. Melt butter in frying pan and saute the bacon and leeks for about 5 - 6 minutes. Add cream, mix well and simmer for 2 - 3 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to packet instructions, then drain. Add the bacon and leek mixture to the hot pasta and season well. Mix together and serve immediately. Top with parmesan. ; name: skillet franks n noodles ; ingredients: frankfurter, onion, dried basil, butter, cream of celery soup, milk, canned tomato, wide egg noodles, dried parsley ; preparation:

name: healthy soft chicken tacos ; ingredients: chili powder, salt, ground cumin, fresh ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast, cooking spray, white corn tortillas, green cabbage, monterey jack cheese, low-fat sour cream ; preparation:Prepare grill. Combine first 4 ingredients in a small bowl. Rub spice mixture over chicken. Place chicken on grill rack coated with cooking spray. Grill 10 minutes on each side or until done. Let stand 5 minutes. Chop. Heat tortillas according to package directions. Divide chicken evenly among tortillas. Top each tortilla with 2 tablespoons cabbage and 1 teaspoon cheese. Serve with sour cream, if desired. ; name: capers in balsamic vinegar ; ingredients: olive oil, red onion, garlic cloves, soft brown sugar, capers, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat the oil in a pan and add the onion and fry over low heat until translucent, about 15 minutes. Add the garlic and fry for 1 minute. Increase the heat and cook the onion and garlic for 5 minutes or until it starts to brown. Add the sugar and cook for 15 minutes until onion is caramelised. Add the capers and vinegar and bring to the boil then reduce and simmer until the liquid is sort of syrupy. Rinse a glass jar with boiling water and dry in a warm oven. Spoon in the capers and liquid and seal. Store for up to 3 months and refrigerate after opening. ; name: stevia chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: flour, salt, baking soda, fat free greek yogurt, stevia powder, pumpkin puree, vanilla, eggs, unsweetened baking chocolate, chocolate chips ; preparation:In a bowl mix together flour, salt, and baking soda. Set aside. In the bowl of a mixer cream yogurt, pumpkin or banana, vanilla and stevia powder until creamy, scraping the sides down at least one time. Add in eggs one at a time. Slowly add the flour mixture. Chop the unsweetened chocolate into very small peices. Add in all the chocolate and mix. Drop by tb size onto a cookie sheet. Then with lightly wet fingers pat down the top of the cookie until flat. Bake at 350 for 15-18 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: artichoke flatbread grilled ; ingredients: whole wheat flat bread, olive oil, fresh spinach, goat cheese, marinated artichoke hearts, tomatoes, pizza seasoning, salt, pepper ; preparation:Lightly brush both sides of 4 whole wheat flatbreads with olive oil. Grill directly over medium heat for 2 minutes to toast. Remove from grill. Divide fresh spinach, garlic and herb goat cheese, marinated artichoke hearts and tomato among flatbreads. Grill about 2 minutes more or until bottoms are browned and toppings are heated through. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and pizza seasoning. ; name: porcupine meatballs w rice a roni ; ingredients: ground beef, rice-a-roni, egg, brown gravy mix ; preparation:Mix ground beef with egg and rice-a-roni, reserving seasoning packet. Shape into balls. Brown in frying pan, on all sides. Drain grease. Sprinkle seasoning packet on top. Mix brown gravy mix and pour on top. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Serve over mashed potatoes. ; name: blt pinwheels ; ingredients: mayonnaise, cream cheese, chunky salsa, dry mustard, bacon, flour tortillas, tomatoes, romaine lettuce ; preparation:

name: rita s chex peanut butter candy ; ingredients: corn chex, butter, peanut butter chips, peanut butter, powdered sugar ; preparation:In a large pot melt butter, peanut butter chips and peanut butter. Heat just until melted together and smooth. Remove from heat and stir in chex cereal. Place powdered sugar in a gallon sized ziplock bag. Add peanut butter covered chex to the powdered sugar and shake until well coated. ; name: raspberry lime pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lime juice, cool whip, red food coloring, fresh raspberry, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:In a bowl, combine milk and lime juice. Mix well. Mixture should thicken. Add cool whip and food coloring if desired. Fold in raspberries. Spoon mixture into pie crust. Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving. ; name: cowboy casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, baked beans, barbecue sauce, bisquick baking mix, milk, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef and drain, preheat oven to 425f. Stir baked beans and barbecue sauce into beans heat to boiling while stirring, pour into sprayed 2 quart casserole dish. Stir bisquick mix, milk, and butter until dough forms. Drop by spoonfuls onto beef mixture. Bake uncovered 20 minutes until topping is golden brown. Sprinkle with cheese and cook about 3 minutes more or until cheese is melted. ; name: lolly s french toast casserole ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, karo syrup, eggs, milk, challah ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt together, butter, brown sugar, karo syrup. Pour mixture into a 9-by-12 inch pyrex dish that has been greased with butter. Lay french bread slices 1 inch thick in dish. Mix eggs and milk. Pour mixture over the bread. Top with cinnamon. Soak overnight. In morning bake at 340 degrees for 45 min to 1 hour. ; name: wendy s no bake peanut butter bars weight watchers ; ingredients: reduced-fat creamy peanut butter, brown sugar, honey, light butter, vanilla extract, crispy rice cereal, bran buds ; preparation:Spray a 9 x 13 inch baking pan with non-stick spray. Combine the peanut butter, brown sugar, honey and butter in a large saucepan. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally until smooth, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla. Add the cereals and stir well to coat. Spoon the cereal mixture into the baking pan. Cover with wax paper or plastic wrap and gently press to form an even layer. Let cool completely. Refrigerate, covered, until firm. Uncover and cut into 24 bars. ; name: white bean sausage rigatoni ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, white kidney beans, italian-style stewed tomatoes, smoked turkey sausage, fresh basil, asiago cheese ; preparation:

name: easy honey drummies ; ingredients: chicken wings, honey, curry powder, ginger, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Place wings in a single layer on a baking sheet with rim. Bake in a 400 oven for 10 minutes. In a mixing bowl, add the remaining ingredients. Stir to combine. Spoon half of the honey mixture over the wings. Bake for 10 more minutes. Turn wings over and spoon the remaining honey mixture over the wings. Bake 10 more minutes. Let cool slightly before serving. ; name: simple meat loaf ; ingredients: ground beef, dry breadcrumbs, eggs, onion soup mix, garlic powder, ketchup, beef broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick spray. Set aside. Crumble beef into large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients and mix well with hands. Shape into two oblong loaves. Place on baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven until at least 160f inside. We like ours well done. After 80 minutes it was 180f and perfect. Let rest 5 minutes before serving. ; name: peanut butter breakfast banana split ; ingredients: banana, reduced-fat peanut butter, low-fat banana cream yogurt, grape-nuts cereal ; preparation:Place bana halves in small banana split dish or shallow bowl, with cut sides facing inward. Spread peanut butter evenly over open banana. Spoon yogurt in the middle. Top with cereal. Serve immediatley. ; name: orange glaze ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, orange juice, lemon juice, salt, butter ; preparation:Mix sugar& cornstarch in pan. Add juices, stirring well. Add salt& butter. Cook over low heat til thick& clear. Cool& frost. ; name: avocado with groundnut dressing ; ingredients: avocados, lemon juice, peanuts, paprika, cinnamon, cayenne, salt, chives ; preparation:Peel the avocados, remove the pit and cube the flesh. Place in a bowl with lemon juice. Grind the peanuts so you have small chunks. Sprinkle the nuts and spices over the avocado and toss gently. Garnish with chopped chives. ; name: lemon asparagus 3 weight watchers points ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, asparagus, shallot ; preparation:

name: salmon and bean lunch bowl ; ingredients: beans, low-fat vinaigrette dressing, fresh parsley, red salmon, cherry tomatoes, red onion, cucumbers, salad leaves ; preparation:Mix the beans with the vinaigrette, parsley and seasoning to taste. Place in the base of two a plastic containers with lids. Remove the skin and bones from the salmon and lightly flake the flesh. Spoon on top of the bean mixture. Top with the tomatoes, onion and cucumber. Finally heap the salad leaves on top. Seal the container with the lid and chill until required. Lightly toss together before eating. ; name: tahina parsley salad ; ingredients: tahini, garlic cloves, green chili, salt, lemon, juice of, flat leaf parsley, water ; preparation:Add tahina in a bowl. Add lemon juice to bowl and stir well. Add in the water mix till incoperated. Add salt, garlic and chili. Add parsley. Serve with fish, grilled meat, rice dishes and falafals. ; name: low fat lemon tea cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, milk, egg, oil, lemon juice, poppy seeds ; preparation:Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl. Make a well in the middle, set aside. Mix the rest of the ingredients together in another medium sized bowl. Pour it in the middle of the dry ingredients, and stir just until it is mixed together. If you overstir it, it will become a tough piece of crap. Preheat an oven to 350 degrees and wait 2 minutes. Grease a loaf pan. Bake for about 45 minutes, until the crust is brown and if you stick a toothpick inside it will come out clean. ; name: pasta spirals with shrimp peas and tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, shrimp, scallion, garlic clove, tomatoes, dried basil, spiral shaped pasta, peas, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a medium skillet. Add shrimp and saut over high heat, stirring, until pink and tender, about 3 minutes. Stir in scallion and garlic. Add tomato and sprinkle with oregano. Cover and set aside. Meanwhile, cook the pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente, about 10 minutes. Add of the pasta water to the shrimp mixture. Drain pasta. Toss pasta, shrimp mixture and peas. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: purist s guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, white onion, fresh cilantro, kosher salt ; preparation:Cut onion into small dice. In a mortar and pestle or molcajete, pound onion and salt to a rough paste. Add cilantro and pound until well incorporated. Peel and seed avocados, add to mortar, and mash until mixture is a lumpy puree. Place one avocado pit in the center of the mixture and serve from the mortar or molcajete with tortilla chips. Makes about 2 cups. ; name: garlic roast chicken with rosemary and lemon ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, mccormick grill seasoning, dry white wine ; preparation:

name: easy pork skillet ; ingredients: vegetable oil, pork tenderloin, pork-flavored ramen noodles, water, red bell pepper, broccoli floret, green onions, fresh parsley, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat a 12 inch skillet or wok over medium high heat. Add oil and rotate skillet or wok to coat sides. Add pork and cook approximately 5 minutes or until no longer pink. Break apart ramen noodles adding to cooked pork along with seasoning packets and remaining ingredients. Heat until mixture comes to a boil and boil for 3 to 4 minutes stirring occasionally, or until noodles or completely softened. Serve immediately. ; name: world s greatest cornbread ; ingredients: cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, creamed corn, canola oil, sour cream ; preparation:Heat oven 400. Combine dry ingredients. Combine wet ingredients. Combine. Pour into a sprayed 9x9. Bake 20-25 minutes. ; name: zucchini and caramelized onions ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, sugar, zucchini, tomatoes, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions, cook stirring for 5 minutes. Add sugar, cook about 7 minutes until carmelized. Add water if necessary to prevent sticking. Add zucchini, cook about 5 minutes until tender. Add tomato and pepper flakes. Cook until heated through and tomato begins to release juices, about 5 minutes add salt and pepper. ; name: glazed brownies ; ingredients: sugar, butter, water, semisweet chocolate morsels, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, eggs, pecans ; preparation:Cook first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan over high heat stirring constantly, until sugar melts. Add 2 cups chocolate morsels and vanilla, stirring until mixture is smooth. Let cook 15 minutes. Add flour, baking soda, and salt to cooled chocolate mixture, stirring until blended. Stir in eggs and pecans until blended. Spread batter into a greased 13x9 pan. Bake at 325 for 30 minutes. Sprinkle remaining 2 cups chocolate morsels evenly over warm brownies and let stand 5 minutes to soften. Spread over top. Cool on wire rack before cutting. ; name: instant pot asian pork chop ; ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, low sodium soy sauce, honey, garlic cloves, sesame oil, ginger, sriracha sauce, black pepper, hoisin sauce ; preparation:Heat instant pot on saute. Once hot, add the oil. Place the pork chops in the oil and brown both sides. Add the rest of the ingredients, close the lid, and pressure cook on manuel for 12 minutes. Let the instant pot do a natural pressure release. ; name: linda s string bean and brussels sprouts saute ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, green beans, butter, garlic clove, salt and pepper, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: chocolate dipped kettle chips rachael ray ; ingredients: dark chocolate, vegetable oil, potato chips, pistachios, salt, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Line 2 cookie sheets with wax paper. In a small bowl, break up chocolate, microwave chocolate and oil on high power, stirring every 30 seconds until smooth. Set a rack over the cookie sheets lined with wax paper. Working with one chip at a time, dip the chips into the hot chocolate and set on the rack. Sprinkle chopped pistachios over one-third of chips. Sprinkle coarse salt over one third. Sprinkle cayenne pepper over one third. Refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving. ; name: soya tomato cheese casserole ; ingredients: soybeans, cream-style corn, tomatoes, sugar, seasoning salt, soft breadcrumbs, cheese, paprika ; preparation:Lighty grease a shallow casserole dish. Arrange beans in alternate layers with corn. Mix tomatoes, sugar, and salt. And pour over bean mix. Top with buttered crumbs, mixed with cheese, and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered 180c for about 40-45 minutes. ; name: mcdonald s hot mustard sauce clone ; ingredients: prepared yellow mustard, dark corn syrup, dry mustard, white vinegar, mayonnaise, soy sauce, sugar, cayenne pepper ; preparation:In small microwave safe bowl, combine all ingredients with a fork. Mix well. Microwave on high about 30-35 seconds then mix again. Cover & refrigerate at least 6 hours to allow the flavors to meld. This makes approximately 4 packets worth of hot mustard. ; name: sugarless apple cookies ; ingredients: dates, apple, raisins, water, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda, eggs, artificial sweetener ; preparation:In a large saucepan, combine dates, apple, raisins and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Combine flour, cinnamon and baking soda. Stir into apple mixture and mix well. Combine eggs and sweetener. Add to batter and mix well. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto a nonstick baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes. ; name: peanut butter fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, peanut butter, vanilla extract, marshmallow creme ; preparation:Butter a 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix sugar, evaporated milk and butter in large saucepan. Stir constantly over medium heat and bring to a full boil. Stir 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter, vanilla and marshallow. Spread in pan. Cool completely and cut into squares. ; name: spicy oven fried chicken breasts ; ingredients: dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, paprika, dried thyme, garlic salt, ground red pepper, low-fat buttermilk, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cooking spray, margarine ; preparation:

name: baked custard cups ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, nutmeg, vanilla, milk ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients, stir until blended. Slowly add scalded milk, stirring constantly. Pour into 4 custard cups. Set cups in 9x9 inch baking pan. Pour 1 inch hot water into pan. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes, or until knife comes out clean. Remove from pan, cool. Chill. ; name: steak supper special ; ingredients: flour, salt, cube steaks, oil, french bread, chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, prepared mustard ; preparation:Mix flour and salt. Coat steaks. In skillet, heat oil and cook steaks until browned on both sides. Place each steak onto a piece of bread and keep warm. Into drippings in pan, stir in chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and mustard. Stir to mix well and heat to boiling. Spoon sauce over steaks. ; name: coconut and raspberry slice ; ingredients: biscuits, butter, raspberry jam, caster sugar, vanilla essence, egg, desiccated coconut, self-raising flour ; preparation:Grease a 30 x 20 x 3 cm baking tin, and line with baking paper. Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. For the base, place biscuits into a food processor and process to fine crumbs. Add the melted butter to the crumbs and process until combined. Press the mixture firmly into the base of the tin using the back of a spoon. Spread the base with the raspberry jam. For the topping, cream the butter, sugar and vanilla essence until fluffy. Add the egg and fold in the coconut and flour. Sprinkle over the jam but careful not to press the topping onto the base. Bake for about 20 minutes. Allow to cool at room temperature then chill overnight. ; name: summer delight curry chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken, scallion, currants, slivered almonds, mayonnaise, curry powder, major grey chutney, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine mayo, curry powder, and chutney. Stir until smooth. Mix dressing with chicken, scallions, currents and almonds. Season to taste. Chill for 1 hour. Serve cold over a bed of lettuce. ; name: snow peas with cashews ; ingredients: canola oil, dried orange peel, snow peas, salt & freshly ground black pepper, cashew nuts ; preparation:In nonstick skillet, heat oil. Add orange peel and cook over low heat for 2 minutes. Add snow peas and salt and pepper, to taste. Turn heat to medium. Stirring constantly, cook 3 to 4 minutes or until snow peas are bright green and crunchy. Sprinkle with cashews and serve. ; name: shrimp with artichokes ; ingredients: shallots, mushroom, butter, dry white wine, artichoke hearts, chives, chopped pimiento, shrimp, lemon, parsley ; preparation:

name: french mojito ; ingredients: vodka, fresh mint leaves, lime juice, sugar syrup, chambord raspberry liquor, raspberries, mint sprig ; preparation:Muddle mint with vodka in base of shaker. Add lime juice and sugar. Shake with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. Top with soda and stir. Serve in a collins glass, garnished with raspberry and mint sprigs. ; name: pasta with turkey sausage tomatoes mozzarella ; ingredients: hot sausage, olive oil, garlic, onion, tomatoes with juice, dried red pepper flakes, pasta, smoked mozzarella cheese, parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat.
