Add the stuffing mix and stir well. Bake, only if desired, in a pan covered loosely with aluminum foil. ; name: amazing rib eye steaks with marsala sauce ; ingredients: rib eye steaks, salt and pepper, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, sliced mushrooms, flour, marsala wine, beef broth, dried rosemary ; preparation:Heat olive oil in skillet over high heat. Salt and pepper steaks to taste. Place steaks in hot skillet and immediately turn down heat to medium high. Cook steaks for 4 minutes on each side or to your taste. Remove steaks to a platter and cover with foil to keep warm. Remove skillet from heat and add butter and garlic. Return to heat and add mushrooms and saute until done. Add flour and cook for about a minute, decrease heat to medium low, then add wine and broth. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly until thick. Remove pan from heat and add rosemary. ; name: southwestern monte cristos ; ingredients: white bread, hot pepper jelly, honey-baked ham, monterey jack pepper cheese, smoked turkey, eggs, milk, hot sauce, unsalted butter ; preparation:

name: crock pot dilly beef sandwiches ; ingredients: boneless beef chuck roast, dill pickles, chili sauce, garlic cloves, hamburger bun ; preparation:Cut roast in half and place in a 3 quart or larger crock pot. Add pickles with juice, chili sauce and garlic. Cover and cook on low 7 to 9 hours or until beef is tender. Discard pickles. Remove roast. When cool enough to handle, shred the meat. Return meat to sauce and heat through. Using slotted spoon, fill buns with desired amount. ; name: easy thai green curry ; ingredients: meat, coconut milk, oil, garlic cloves, fresh gingerroot, green chili, green curry paste, lime, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute the meat with garlic and ginger root in oil for a couple minutes. Add the curry paste, coconut milk, lime rind and juice. Simmer until meat is desired tenderness, or until tofu is heated through. Stir in the cilantro just before serving. Serve with rice. ; name: strawberry yogurt pancakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, eggs, butter, low-fat strawberry yogurt, buttermilk, vanilla ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and sugar. Add in the eggs, buttermilk, melted butter, yogurt and vanilla and mix until smooth. Spray griddle with pam or use a slab of butter for each pancake and heat over medium heat. Pour approximately cup of batter onto a preheated griddle. Cook for 8-10 minutes or the top is nice and bubbly. Turn and brown the other side. Serve with warm maple syrup. ; name: roasted pear salad ; ingredients: pears, fig jam, goat cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, dijon mustard, watercress, red onion, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoons jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing. ; name: citrus rubbed skirt steak ; ingredients: lemon rind, orange rind, kosher salt, ground red pepper, garlic clove, skirt steak, cooking spray ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in a bowl, stirring well. Lightly coat steak with cooking spray. Rub rind mixture evenly over steak. Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add steak to pan. Cook 5 minutes on each side or until desired degree of doneness. Let stand for 5 minutes. Cut steak diagonally across grain into thin slices. ; name: apple annie s tea room s chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, red bell peppers, dried dill weed, dry ranch dressing mix, mayonnaise ; preparation:

name: basil green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, spring onion, margarine, dried basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper ; preparation:Trim and snap green beans into thirds. Mince the onion. Put water on to boil to steam beans. As soon as water boils, steam beans for 12 to 17 minutes or until tender. Melt margarine for beans and saut onions until tender. Add steamed beans, basil, garlic powder and pepper. Toss beans with basil sauce to coat evenly and serve. ; name: flying biscuit s creamy dreamy white cheddar grits ; ingredients: water, half-and-half, kosher salt, white pepper, quick-cooking grits, white cheddar cheese, unsalted butter ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine water, half-and-half, salt and white pepper and bring to a boil. Slowly pour grits into boiling water while whisking the entire time. Reduce to low heat and continue to whisk often, until thick and completely smooth, about 10 minutes. Add cheese and stir gently until cheese melts. Whisk again to combine. Turn heat off and allow grits to rest 5 minutes. Add butter and stir until completely smooth, silky and shiny. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: food processor loaf bread ; ingredients: water, active dry yeast, sugar, all-purpose flour, salt ; preparation:Combine water, sugar and yeast in a small bowl and set aside. Using steel blade, place flour and salt in bowl of food processor. Pour in yeast mixture through chute. Process till dough forms ball. Break dough apart and reprocess 2 or 3 times. Place dough in buttered bowl. Turn dough in bowl to butter all sides. Cover and let rise about 1 hour, till doubled in size. Punch down, shape into loaf and place in greased loaf pan. Let rise till doubled. Bake in preheated oven 25 to 30 minutes or till golden brown. ; name: red star basic chicken taco filling ; ingredients: oil, cooked chicken, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes with juice, green chilies, cumin seed, salt, black pepper, water ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Sautee chicken, onion and garlic until onion softens and chicken begins to brown crisp on edges, about 8-12 minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Reduce heat to medium. Stir in tomatoes, chiles and cumin. If needed add enough water just to make the mixture a little soupy. Continue to cook, stirring occassionally, until liquid is reduced. Mixture should be moist, not wet or dry. Use immediately or freeze for later. ; name: sausage stuffed mushroom caps ; ingredients: mushrooms, spicy bulk sausage, garlic clove, scallion, egg, white breadcrumb, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: chili jam ; ingredients: garlic, onions, birds eye chiles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, white sugar, peanut oil ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add garlic and onion and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge. ; name: chocolate nut kentucky pie ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, flour, salt, bourbon, pecans, chocolate chips, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter and sugar. Add beaten eggs, flour, salt, and kentucky bourbon. Add chocolate chips and nuts. Stir well. Pour into partially baked pie shell and bake for 30 minutes, or until center is set. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream. ; name: rocky road tasty team treats ; ingredients: pretzel sticks, butter, sweetened condensed milk, miniature kisses, miniature marshmallows, pecans ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f gease bottom and sides of 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Combine pretzels and melted butter in small bowl. Press evenly onto bottom of prepared pan. Spread sweetened condensed milk evenly over pretzel layer. Layer evenly with mini kisses, marshmallows and pecans, in order. Press down firmly on pecans. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. Cut into bars. ; name: spicy mint tea ; ingredients: orange pekoe tea bag, mint sprigs, cayenne pepper, boiling water, white sugar, lemon juice, cinnamon stick, lemons ; preparation:Steep 1 tea bag, 6 mint stems and cayenne pepper in 2 cups of boiling water. Strain the mixture, keeping only the liquid. Add the sugar, lemon juice and cinnamon stick to the mint mixture and refrigerate. When ready to serve, remove the cinnamon stick and dilute the mint mixture with equal parts of water. Serve in a tall glass with ice, add a fresh mint sprig and a lemon slice for garnishing. ; name: southern comfort yams or sweet potatoes easy and yummy ; ingredients: yams, salted butter, light brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, southern comfort ; preparation:Boil yams in water, on stove, until soft. After yams are cool to touch, peel them, cut into thick chunks and put aside in 8 x 8 glass dish. Put rest of ingredients in deep non-stick saucepan. Cook over medium-high until the alcohol has boiled off -stir constantly-this should take about 3-4 minutes. Pour mixture over set aside yams. Bake at 350 f until dish is bubbly. Let sit a few minutes before serving. ; name: peanut butter sundaes ; ingredients: sugar, water, creamy peanut butter, vanilla ice cream, salted peanuts ; preparation:

name: breakfast crescent pizza ; ingredients: crescent rolls, sausage, bacon, hash brown, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: linguine with sun dried tomato pesto ; ingredients: pine nuts, parmesan cheese, sun-dried tomato, garlic clove, olive oil, linguine, ground black pepper, basil leaves ; preparation:Put the pine nuts in a small non-stick frying pan and toss over a low heat for 1-2 minutes or until the nuts are lightly toasted and golden. Add the parmesan, sun-dried tomatoes and garlic, with pepper to taste. Process until finely chopped. With the machine running, gradually add the oil through the feeder tube until it has all been incorporated evenly and the ingredients have formed a smooth paste. Cook pasta according to packet directions, drain well, reserving a little of the cooking water. Serve immediately garnished with the basil leaves and parmesan shavings. ; name: frozen peppermint pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, creme de menthe, red food coloring, whipped topping ; preparation:Beat cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually beat in milk. Stir in creme de menthe. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into crust. Freeze for 4 hours. ; name: chutney chicken salad great for tea sandwiches ; ingredients: chicken, celery, red onions, walnuts, plain yogurt, lemon juice, mango chutney, salt, pepper, butter ; preparation:Combine everything in a small bowl and mix well. A very thin bread is great, otherwise choose what you like. For tea sandwiches, stack bread and cut off crusts. Save crusts for another recipe. If you want spread a thin layer of butter on the bread. Spread chicken salad on the bread and top with another slice. Cut into squares, rectangles or triangles. If triangles, place on plate points up. If you have made this ahead of time cover with wax paper and then a damp tea towel to keep them moist. ; name: orange salad with olives mint ; ingredients: red onion, navel oranges, olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice, of fresh mint, kosher salt, black olives ; preparation:Soak onions in ice water for 30 minutes, drain. Meanwhile, peel oranges as directed above, making sure as much of the white pith as possible is removed. Slice, crosswise as thinly as possible and save any juice that accumulates from the slicing. Lay the oranges in a spiral on a platter. Combine the oil, lemon and orange juice with salt, mint and any of the accumulated orange juice. Toss the onion slices over the oranges. Spread the dressing over both evenly. Then sprinkle with olives. ; name: holiday sweet potato coconut casserole ; ingredients: mashed sweet potatoes, sugar, evaporated milk, eggs, vanilla, butter, coconut, nuts, brown sugar, flour ; preparation:

name: pickled beetroot ; ingredients: beetroots, vinegar, water, sugar, peppercorn, clove, bay leaf, mustard seeds, cinnamon stick, salt ; preparation:Wash the beetroot well, and cook in boiling salted water until tender. Strain and cool beetroot and remove skins. Slice beetroot into julienne strips and set aside. Place all pickling ingredients into a pan and bring to boil when boiling bring back mixture to a simmer for about 5 minutes and then strain mixture. Spoon beetroot into hot sterilized jars, and top with the vinegar mixture. Seal jars, and store in a cool place. ; name: beer batter chicken fingers ; ingredients: flour, beer, water, egg yolk, egg white, chicken breasts, salt, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, peanut oil ; preparation:Mix together flour and salt. Add the beer. Using a whisk, mix well and then add water and mix until smooth. Add the egg yolk and mix well. Add the beaten egg white and mix well. Place into refrigerator for at least 2 hours. Mix the worcestershire sauce and hot sauce together and add chicken strips. Allow chicken to marinate for at least 10 minutes. Roll chicken in your batter. Deep fry until golden brown, then drain on a paper towel. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce. ; name: smoky chipotle salsa with tomatillos ; ingredients: garlic cloves, tomatillo, chipotle chiles in adobo, water, seasoning, sea salt ; preparation:Preheat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add tomatillos cut side down. Brown on both sides, turning over halfway through, about 7 minutes total. Transfer tomatillos to a blender or food processor. Add garlic, chiles, water, salsa seasoning and salt. Process to a coarse puree. Let cool before serving. ; name: christmas with the kranks caramel cream pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, sweetened condensed milk, marshmallow cream, whipped topping ; preparation:Place the cans of sweetened condensed milk in a large pot. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer for 3 hours, making sure the water stays above the cans. Let cool 1 hour. Carefully open the cans and scoop contents into large bowl. Fold in the marshmallow cream. Pour into pie shell. Chill in refrigerator for several hours or overnight. Serve topped with whipped topping. When cooked that long, the sweetened condensed milk turns into caramel. ; name: dijon roasted new potatoes from ww ; ingredients: cooking spray, olive oil, dijon mustard, paprika, dried thyme, table salt, pepper, new potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Coat a 9x13 inch baking dish with cooking spray. In a large bowl, whisk together oil, mustard, paprika, thyme, salt and pepper. Add potatoes and stir to coat. Transfer potatoes to prepared baking dish and roast 15 minutes. Stir and roast until tender on inside, about 15-20 minutes more. ; name: couscous dried fruit and honey pudding ; ingredients: couscous, mixed fruit, nuts, milk, honey, vanilla extract, sugar, ground cinnamon, heavy cream ; preparation:

name: alton brown s tapioca pudding ; ingredients: pearl tapioca, cold water, whole milk, heavy cream, egg yolk, sugar, lemon, zest of, salt ; preparation:Place tapioca in a medium mixing bowl along with the water, cover, and let stand overnight. Drain water from tapioca. Place the tapioca into a slow cooker along with the milk, heavy cream, and salt. Cook on high for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. In a small bowl, whisk together the egg yolk and sugar. Temper small amounts of the tapioca into the egg mixture until you have added at least 1 cup. Add this back into the remaining tapioca in the slow cooker. Add the lemon zest and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 15 minutes, stirring at least once. Transfer the pudding to a bowl and cover the surface with plastic wrap. Allow to cool at room temperature for 1 hour and then place in the refrigerator until thoroughly chilled. ; name: johnny b goode casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, black olives, whole kernel corn, tomato soup, cheddar cheese, noodles, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Cook ground meat with onions in a large roaster and drain excess grease when meat is browned. Add the cooked noodles. Mix in the olives and corn. Add the tomato soup and water if desired. Add grated cheese. Place in large casserole dish and top with more cheese. Bake at 350 degrees about 30 minutes or until the cheese on top is brown and bubbly. ; name: spicy tuna gourmet ribbon sandwiches ; ingredients: tuna, cream cheese, green capsicum, red capsicum, margarine, white sandwich loaf, whole wheat sandwich loaf ; preparation:Spread a slice of white bread with margarine, top with spicy tuna. Spread a slice of wholemeal bread with margarine and cover. Top this layer with cream cheese mixed with finely chopped capsicums and top again with a slice of white bread. Cut off the crusts as accurately as possible, and then cut long ways into three and then in half. Makes almost both loaves of sandwich bread. You can also mix and match using wholegrain loaf. Garnish sandwiches on a tray with parsley and serve. ; name: fried perch ; ingredients: perch fillet, flour, cornmeal, light beer, salt, pepper, old bay seasoning, oil ; preparation:Heat skillet fryer with hot oil. Mix flour, cornmeal, beer, salt pepper and seasonings until a batter consistency. Coat filets with batter. Deep fry til golden brown. Approx 3 minutes per side. ; name: date nut balls ; ingredients: egg, margarine, sugar, pitted dates, pecans, rice krispies, vanilla ; preparation:In electric skillet set at 300 degrees, cook butter, sugar, dates and egg until gooey and thickened. About 7-10 min. Add pecans and vanilla. Then add rice krispies. Mix well. Cool until slightly warm. Form into balls & roll in powdered sugar. Makes 50-60 small balls. ; name: pastina with milk and eggs ; ingredients: milk, italian pastina, eggs, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: maple glazed delicata squash ; ingredients: maple syrup, fresh sage leaf, delicata squash, olive oil, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees. Cut off squash ends, halve lengthwise, seeded and sliced into 1 inch half moons. In a small saucepan, combine maple syrup and sage, bring to simmer, reduce heat to low, cover and cook 15 minutes, set aside, covered. In a bowl, toss squash slices with olive oil and salt. Transfer to a a foil lined baking sheet in a single layer, bake at 400 for 20 minutes. Pour maple syrup mixture evenly on top of squash, bake 20 minutes more until squash is browned and tender. ; name: tuna spread with capers ; ingredients: cream cheese, canned tuna, onions, capers, worcestershire sauce, mayonnaise, nuts, miniature party rye rounds, seedless cucumber, dill weed ; preparation:Mix the first 6 ingregients and form into a long tube shape. Refrigerate at least overnight. Top with chopped nuts if desired. Slice and spread on the breads and top with a slice of cucumber. Sprinkle with dillweed to garnish. ; name: chinese five spice short ribs crock pot ; ingredients: onion, short rib of beef, garlic salt, black pepper, vegetable oil, beef broth, stewed tomatoes, onion soup mix, chinese five spice powder ; preparation:Slice the onion and put it into a slow cooker. Season the short ribs with garlic salt and pepper. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Working in batches, brown all sides of the short ribs. When browned, place in slow cooker on top of sliced onions. In a mixing bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour over the top of short ribs. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 9 hours. ; name: orange banana smoothie pops ; ingredients: vanilla yogurt, orange juice concentrate, bananas, lime juice, sticks ; preparation:Puree all ingredients together in blender. Pour into 6- 3oz molds or paper cups. Freeze for one hour, place sticks in the middle. Freeze for another 3 hours, until solid. To release pops, dip molds into hot water until pops loosen and slide out. If using paper cups, peel away paper. ; name: eier in gruner sosse eggs in green sauce ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon, eggs, salt, pepper, sugar, fresh herbs ; preparation:Blend mayonnaise, sour cream and lemon juice. Finely chop 1 hard-cooked egg and stir into mayonnaise mixture. Season with salt, pepper, and sugar. Thoroughly rinse herbs, pat dry, and chop. Blend with the sauce. Slice rest of the hard-cooked eggs in half and arrange in the sauce and serve. ; name: sweet ginger steak sweet potatoes ; ingredients: topside steak, fresh ginger, extra virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, sweet potatoes, oil, sweet chili sauce, lemon, juice of ; preparation:

name: bacon chicken alfredo fettuccine ; ingredients: fettuccine pasta, bacon, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, black pepper, alfredo sauce, frozen chopped spinach, italian seasoning, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook fettuccine according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Remove from pan using a slotted spoon. Set in on paper towels to soak up the grease and drain the skillet reserving 3 tablespoons of drippings. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Cook chicken in the bacon drippings over medium high heat until juices run clear. Drain fettuccine, stir into skillet with the chicken. Add the alfredo sauce, spinach, italian seasoning, and bacon. Cook and stir occasionally until heated through. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: pickled tongue ; ingredients: beef tongue, vinegar, water, sugar, onions, pickling spices, mustard seeds, bay leaf, garlic cloves ; preparation:Boil tongue in salt water for 3 hours. Peel skin from the tongue. Mix remaining ingredients in a large, nonreactive pot and bring to a boil. Add meat and boil for 10 minutes. Cool and store in refridgerator for one week. Slice tongue thinly to serve. ; name: maple pumpkin pots de creme ; ingredients: heavy cream, whole milk, maple syrup, canned solid-pack pumpkin, egg yolks, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Whisk together cream, milk, syrup, and pumpkin in a heavy saucepan and bring just to a simmer over moderate heat. Whisk together yolks, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt in a bowl. Add hot pumpkin mixture to yolks in a slow stream, whisking constantly. Pour custard through a fine-mesh sieve into a large measuring cup, then divide among custard cups. Bake custards in a hot water bath pan covered tightly with foil, in middle of oven until a knife inserted in center of a custard comes out clean, 35 to 40 minutes. Transfer custards to a rack to cool completely. Chill, covered, until cold, at least 2 hours. ; name: broiled shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, garlic, parsley, crushed red pepper flakes, oregano, salt and pepper, fresh breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Put shrimp in lg. Bowl. Add all other ingredients. Toss well to coat shrimp. Place on shallow baking sheet. Broil 7 in from heat for about 6-7 min, turning once. Serve with sauce from pan. Add a little butter if you like. ; name: kashk o badenjam or kashk e baadenjaam ; ingredients: eggplants, kashk, tomato paste, onions, dried mint, cooking oil, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Peel eggplants and slice length-wise to a thickness of 1 cm. Add salt and pepper and fry eggplant on both sides on medium heat until golden. Add half a cup of hot water to tomato paste and mix well. Add to eggplants and cook over medium heat for about 4-5 minutes. Peel onions and slice thinly. Fry in oil until golden. Also fry dried mint in oil for a few minutes. Alternatively, fresh mint can be used. If so, wash and finely chop mint, then fry in oil. Pour kashk evenly over eggplants, follow with onions and mint. Mash ingredients together with a fork, then serve. ; name: tailgate sandwiches ; ingredients: rolls, black forest ham, gruyere, chive & onion cream cheese, butter, parmesan cheese, worcestershire sauce, dried onion flakes ; preparation:

name: runnin rebels ranch guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, red onion, fresh cilantro leaves, red bell pepper, anaheim chili, fresh lime juice, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a medium bowl, using a fork or potato masher, mash the avocados until chunky. Add the onion, cilantro, bell pepper, and chile. In a small bowl, combine the lime juice and package of hidden valley original ranch salad dressing & seasoning mix. Add to the avocado mixture along with the pepper and stir gently to combine. Transfer the dip to a serving bowl and place a piece of plastic wrap directly on the surface of the guacamole, pressing to eliminate any air pockets. Serve at room temperature. This dip is best when made within 8 hours of serving, but it can be prepared up to 1 day in advance. Cover and refrigerate. Remove from the refrigerator 30 minutes before serving, but keep covered until ready to serve. ; name: quick n easy curried shrimp ; ingredients: butter, curry powder, onion, celery, garlic, fresh shrimp, all-purpose flour, sour cream, whipping cream ; preparation:In a large non-stick fry pan, melt butter, stir in curry powder and cook and stir for 5 minutes to develop flavor of the curry powder. Add the onion, celery and garlic. Cook and stir until onion is softened. Add shrimp and cook for 3 to 4 minutes until shrimp have turned pink and are almost cooked. Stir in the flour until it has been absorbed. Add sour cream and whipping cream, stirring all the time until mixture comes to a boil and thickens. Seve immediately over rice. ; name: chicken creole with chili cream sauce ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast halves, creole seasoning, olive oil, cream of chicken soup, water, green chilies, lime juice, sour cream ; preparation:Season chicken with creole seasoning heat oil in skillet. Add chicken and brown on both sides. Add soup, water, chiles and lime juice. Heat to a boil. Cook over low heat 5 minutes or until done. Stir in sour cream and heat thru. ; name: braised salmon with leeks dill ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, garlic cloves, tomatoes, kosher salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, dry white wine, salmon fillets, fresh dill ; preparation:Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add leek. Saut 3 minutes. Add garlic. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add tomato, salt, and pepper. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add wine and salmon. Sprinkle with dill, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. ; name: brownies weight watchers 2 points ; ingredients: low-fat brownie mix, all-bran cereal, water, baking powder ; preparation:Put the all bran into a large bowl and add the water. Soak for 5 minutes. Add the brownie mix along with the baking powder to the all bran and mix well by hand. Pour into a greased 9x13 pan and bake according to directions on box. When cool, cut into 20 squares. One square will equal 2 points. ; name: buttermilk biscuit bubble pizza ; ingredients: refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, green pepper, onion, black olives, sliced mushrooms, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: yakitori japanese grilled chicken skewers ; ingredients: chicken breast, green onions, soy sauce, chicken stock, sake, sugar, mirin ; preparation:Bring yakitori sauce to a boil for 5 min then set aside. Thread the chicken alternately with the green onions onto the skewers. Grill chicken in a preheated griller, turning every now and then and basting at the same time to keep it moist. Drippings can be returned to baste the chicken until it is cooked. Baste the yakitori again and serve with left over sauce. ; name: georgian sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, molasses, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Peel potatoes and boil until soft. Mash and add remaining ingredients. Beat well and place in a buttered casserole. Dot top with butter slices. Bake 35 minutes at 350f degrees. ; name: super easy chicken broccoli pie ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, frozen chopped broccoli, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, bisquick, milk, dried onion flakes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a greased pie plate, mix chicken, broccoli, 2 cups of cheddar, and onion flakes. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, bisquick, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour egg mixture over chicken mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top and bake a few more minutes until it melts. Let cool slightly before cutting. ; name: maureen s festive cheese ball ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, cream cheese, mayonnaise, worcestershire sauce, onion salt, garlic salt, celery salt, green olives, dried beef, fresh parsley ; preparation:Combine, cheeses, mayonnaise, worcestershire sauce, and salts. Blend until smooth. If too stiff add a bit more mayonaise. Add olives and shape into ball. Combine dried beef and fresh parsley and roll ball in the mixture. Cover with plastic wrap and chill. For a difference you can roll in crushed walnuts or pecans. Serve with crackers. ; name: mashed potato spinach casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt, pepper, butter, milk, frozen spinach, cheddar cheese, dill seed, chives ; preparation:Peel, cook and mash potatoes. Add sour cream, salt, pepper. Mix in enough milk to bring it to your favorite mashed potato consistency. Add spinach. Place in casserole dish and top with grated cheddar cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 20-30 minutes. We like to serve this with corn, which usually ends up mixed in with all the rest. ; name: unstuffed green bell peppers ; ingredients: ground round, green peppers, onions, garlic salt, tomato sauce, cooked rice, water ; preparation:

name: non alcoholic hard sauce ; ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, salt, vanilla extract, heavy cream ; preparation:Sift powdered sugar and set aside. Beat butter until soft. Gradually beat in the sugar until well blended. Beat in salt and vanilla. Beat in heavy cream. When sauce is very smooth chill thoroughly. Serve. ; name: ever ready muffins ; ingredients: raisin bran cereal, flour, sugar, salt, baking soda, eggs, buttermilk, oil, raisins, walnuts ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients. Combine other ingredients and add to dry ingredients. Mix with spoon just to moisten. Fold mixture. Put in refrigerator overnight. Spoon into greased muffin pans, being careful to take batter from sides and not mix batter anymore. Bake on bottom rack at 400 degrees for 5 minutes. Then bake on top rack 15 minutes. ; name: easy pork skillet ; ingredients: vegetable oil, pork tenderloin, pork-flavored ramen noodles, water, red bell pepper, broccoli floret, green onions, fresh parsley, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat a 12 inch skillet or wok over medium high heat. Add oil and rotate skillet or wok to coat sides. Add pork and cook approximately 5 minutes or until no longer pink. Break apart ramen noodles adding to cooked pork along with seasoning packets and remaining ingredients. Heat until mixture comes to a boil and boil for 3 to 4 minutes stirring occasionally, or until noodles or completely softened. Serve immediately. ; name: pasta with cherry tomatoes and goat cheese ; ingredients: gemelli pasta, cherry tomatoes, goat cheese, brine-cured black olives, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:Cook pasta in 6-quart pot of boiling water until tender. While pasta is cooking, toss tomatoes with salt and let juices exude. Toss hot pasta with goat cheese in large bowl until cheese is melted and coats pasta. Add tomatoes with juices, olives, basil, salt and pepper to taste. Toss and combine. ; name: avocado grilling butter ; ingredients: butter, lime juice, garlic cloves, flat leaf parsley, habanero sauce, worcestershire sauce, salt, jalapeno pepper, avocado ; preparation:Cut softened butter into small squares. Peel and seed avocado and cut into small pieces. Mash butter and avocado and add to a mixing bowl. Seed jalapeno pepper and dice. Add jalapeno and other ingredients and mix in the mixing bowl. Spoon mixture onto plastic wrap. Shape into a log shape. Put the log in the refrigerator to become firm. To use the butter, melt in the last minute of grilling over steak, poulty or fish. Add a slice on top of resting meat. Let melt. Or spread atop french bread as previously mentioned. ; name: mocha bundt cake ; ingredients: cocoa, yellow cake mix, instant chocolate pudding mix, eggs, vegetable oil, strong black coffee, coffee liqueur, powdered sugar ; preparation:

name: crunchy glazed pecans ; ingredients: butter, light corn syrup, water, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 250f. Combine butter, corn syrup, water, and salt in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Add pecans and stir to completely coat nuts. Spread nuts evenly on lined baking sheet. Bake for 1 hour, stirring every 10 minutes. Cool and serve. ; name: lime cilantro grilled steak ; ingredients: boneless beef chuck steaks, fresh lime juice, water, fresh cilantro leaves, jalapeno pepper, garlic clove, ground cumin, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine lime juice, cilantro, water, jalapeo pepper, garlic and cumin and pour into a large zip-top plastic bag. Add steaks, seal and shake bag to coat meat. Let marinate in refrigerator 1-2 hours, shaking bag every now and then. Toss marinade when ready to grill steaks. Grill steaks over medium heated until cooked to your liking, turning once. Once cooked, season to taste with salt and pepper. Carve steaks into thin slices and serve. ; name: christmas with the kranks caramel cream pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, sweetened condensed milk, marshmallow cream, whipped topping ; preparation:Place the cans of sweetened condensed milk in a large pot. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer for 3 hours, making sure the water stays above the cans. Let cool 1 hour. Carefully open the cans and scoop contents into large bowl. Fold in the marshmallow cream. Pour into pie shell. Chill in refrigerator for several hours or overnight. Serve topped with whipped topping. When cooked that long, the sweetened condensed milk turns into caramel. ; name: crock pot taco soup ; ingredients: cooked ground beef, v8 vegetable juice, onion powder, whole kernel corn, kidney beans, tomato sauce, taco seasoning mix, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook ground beef until no longer pink. Place all ingredients except cheese in crock pot and stir. Cook on low 4 hours or until heated through. If eating immediately, pour in bowls and top with cheddar cheese. If freezing, let cool and place in freezer container. When ready to eat, pull and let thaw in fridge. Microwave on high 2 minutes or until heated through. Top with cheddar cheese. Also you can make this on the stove top. Combine all ingredients except cheese and let simmer for an hour. Top with cheddar cheese and serve. ; name: low fat southwestern layered salad ; ingredients: ranch salad dressing, salsa, romaine lettuce, carrots, black beans, whole kernel corn, red onion, chopped tomato, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, baked corn tortilla chips ; preparation:Combine ranch dressing and salsa. Set aside. In large bowl, layer the romaine. Mix carrots, black beans, corn, red onion, tomato and cheese. Top with crushed tortilla chips before serving. ; name: beans n ham hocks ; ingredients: pink beans, onion, garlic cloves, ham hock, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: golden carrot potato soup ; ingredients: russet potatoes, carrots, onion, water, chicken bouillon cube, salt, black pepper, milk, sour cream, chives ; preparation:Place potatoes, onion, carrots, water, bullion, salt, and pepper in medium sized pot and boil until potatoes are done, about 15 minutes, depending on the size of your potato pieces, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Carefully mash contents of pot until only some potatoes remain in tact. Add milk and sour cream, reserving 4 teaspoons of sour cream for garnish, if desired. Return to low heat and stir until soup is warm and sour cream is broken up. Do not boil. Serve immediately, with dollops of reserved sour cream and chives. ; name: coffee brined chicken breasts ; ingredients: kosher salt, brown sugar, water, lemons, black peppercorns, mustard seeds, coriander seed, strong coffee, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter ; preparation:Combine the brine ingredients, except coffee in a saucepan, heat until sugar and salt dissolve pour into a large bowl, stir in coffee, refrigerate until cool. Add chicken and use a small plate to keep it submerged 2-3 hours. Heat grill to high. Remove chicken from brine, blot with paper towels, and brush with oil or butter on both sides grill 4-8 minutes, moving halfway to create grill marks. Turn over and grill 4-6 minutes more until done. ; name: rustic honey baked nectarines ; ingredients: nectarines, parchment paper, brown sugar, vanilla extract, honey, greek yogurt ; preparation:Set oven temp to 350 degrees. Remove stones and place cut nectarines on the parchment paper in an oven proof dish or pan facing up. Drizzle honey, vanilla and sprinkle brown sugar over the top. Bake for 15 minutess, scoop up the juices from the bottom of the pan and coat nectarines and bake for an additional 15 minutes or until golden and sticky. Serve with yoghurt, drizzled with honey. ; name: vegetarian green chili ; ingredients: butter, garlic, onion flakes, flour, diced tomatoes, green chili pepper, salt, cilantro, water ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add flour and stir to make a roux. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot. ; name: chicken spaghetti bake ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, spaghetti, fat-free american cheese, fat-free ricotta cheese, fat free chicken broth, low-fat cream of mushroom soup, tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook spaghetti and chicken separately - set aside. Mix broth, mushroom soup and tomatoes. Grease casserole dish with cooking spray. Layer ingredients - spaghetti, kraft singles, chichen, ricotta, tomatoe mixture. Make two layers. Bake 35 minutes. ; name: tomatillo guacamole spicy dip ; ingredients: avocados, tomatillos, red onion, roma tomatoes, lime juice, red pepper flakes, hot pepper sauce, salt and black pepper ; preparation:

name: marinated tomato slices marinierte tomaten ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, ground cumin, salt, fresh ground black pepper, sugar, turmeric, tomatoes, green onion, parsley ; preparation:Combine oil, lemon juice, cumin, salt, pepper, sugar and turmeric in screw-top jar. Shake well to blend. Place sliced tomatoes on serving plate. Sprinkle with onion and parsley. Pour dressing over. Let stand at room temperature 1 hour, then chill well. Makes 6 servings. ; name: chava s thin and crispy potato kugel ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, eggs, matzo meal, baking powder, salt and pepper, oil ; preparation:Grate potatoes in the food processor. If you can grate with a large hole, use the largest. Grate onion. Place in large bowl. Add eggs, beat them first. Add rest of ingredients including oil. Mix well. Place in a greased, large pan in a thin layer. Bake at 375 till brown and crispy. For extra crunchy kugel, add about 2 extra tablespoons of oil to the pan and place the pan in the oven to heat the oil, then put in the kugel. ; name: bow tie bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, sliced mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper, bow tie pasta, condensed tomato soup, mozzarella cheese, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:In a skillet, cook beef, onion, mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper over medium heat until the meat is no longer pink. Drain. In a greased 3-quart baking dish, layer half of the pasta, half of the meat mixture, all of the tomato soup and 1 cup of cheese. Top with the remaining pasta and meat mixture. Spread evenly with mushroom soup. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30-45 minutes or until heated thoroughly. ; name: strawberry no bake cheesecake bars ; ingredients: cinnamon graham cracker crumbs, butter, sugar, powdered sugar, cream cheese, strawberry jam, strawberries, cool whip ; preparation:Mix the graham cracker crumbs, melted butter or margarine and sugar together. Press firmly into a 13x9 inch pan and refridg while making the filling. Beat the cream cheese till smooth. Slowly add the powdered sugar. Add the jam and mix well. Stir in the strawberries and then fold in the cool whip. Spoon over the crust, cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours to set up enough to cut cleanly. ; name: pizza bagel omelets ; ingredients: eggs, parmesan cheese, italian spices, fresh garlic, pizza toppings, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, bagels ; preparation:Melt the butter in a large frying pan. Add the parmesan cheese, italian spices, and garlic and mix well. Add the beaten eggs to the pan and cook until almost set. Top with the pizza toppings and cook until the eggs are set and the toppings are heated through. Remove the omelet from the pan and cut in quarters. Fold each quarter into a triangle and place on top of a bagel half. Top with the tomatoes and mozzarella. Broil until the cheese melts and the toppings are hot. ; name: monkey bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, bananas, butter, eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: italian chicken and fettuccine ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, shake-n-bake, fettuccine, parmesan cheese, olive oil, butter, salt and pepper, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Coat chicken with shake and bake according to shake and bake directions. About 10 minutes before chicken is done, place a slice of mozzerella cheese on top. Bake until melted, about 10 more minutes. 15 minutes before chicken is done, cook fettucini according to package directions. Drain fettucini. Add olive oil and butter. Mix well. Add remaining parmesan. Mix and serve hot with chicken add additional parmesean cheese. ; name: susan s amazing potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, hardboiled egg, onion, mayonnaise, dried parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes in the skin for 35-40 minutes. Cool potatoes for 1 to 1. 5 hours. Make hardboiled eggs and allow to cool. Peel skin from potatoes and cut potatoes into cubes. Cut eggs into cubes. Combine all ingredients gently and allow to chill for 3 hours. ; name: asparagus with curry butter ; ingredients: butter, curry powder, lemon juice, salt, extra virgin olive oil, shallot, asparagus ; preparation:Combine butter, curry powder, lemon juice and salt in a small bowl, creating a curry butter. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add shallot and cook, stirring, until softened, about 2 minutes. Add asparagus and cook, stirring, until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir the curry butter into the asparagus. Toss to coat and serve. ; name: french dip roast beef sandwiches ; ingredients: bottom round steaks, onion soup mix, beef broth, beer, onion, rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place roast in a large roasting pan. Combine soup mix, broth and beer in a bowl and stir until soup mix is dissolved. Pour over roast and place onions around it. Bake for 2 to 3 hours, basting frequently, or until beef is tender and looks stringy when pulled with a fork. If roast starts getting too crispy, cover pan with foil or lid. Slice meat thinly and serve on rolls. Serve juices in individual cups or bowls to dip sandwiches into. ; name: raspberry cream dressing ; ingredients: frozen raspberries, olive oil, whipping cream, sherry wine vinegar, salt ; preparation:Place raspberries in a blender and process until smooth. Pour through a strainer into a bowl and press the mixture with the back of a spoon against the sides of the strainer to squeeze out liquid. Discard seeds. Combine the raspberry puree, olive oil, & remaining ingredients, whisking until smooth. Chill. ; name: cheesy crab squares ; ingredients: crescent rolls, miracle whip, lemon juice, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, imitation crabmeat, green onion, parsley ; preparation:

name: roasted apples with fig hazelnut stuffing ; ingredients: dried figs, hazelnuts, orange zest, allspice, granny smith apples, brown sugar, butter, fresh orange juice ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 180c. Combine the chopped figs, hazelnuts, orange zest and allspice. Using an apple corer, remove the apple cores. Place the apples in a baking dish and loosely press the fig mixture into the centre of the apples. Combine the sugar, butter and orange juice and drizzle it over the apples. Bake the apples for 25 minutes or until tender, then set aside for 10 minutes for the sauce to thicken slightly. Serve with the sauce spooned over the apples with cream or icecream. ; name: horseradish stuffed cherry tomatoes ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, cream cheese, prepared horseradish, bacon bits ; preparation:Cut tops off tomatoes and scoop out pulp. Invert tomato shells on paper towels to drain. Combine cream cheese, horseradish, and bacon bits. Beat at medium speed until light and fluffy. Spoon or pipe the mixture into tomato shells. ; name: oven baked beef or pork steak with tangy sauce ; ingredients: round steaks, salt and pepper, onions, fresh garlic, barbecue sauce, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees f. Grease a roasting pan or baking dish. Heat oil in a large skillet. Season the beef or pork steak with with salt and pepper, then brown on both sides. Place into the prepared pan and top with the onion slices. In a bowl mix the bbq sauce, soy sauce and garlic then pour over meat in the pan. Cover tightly with foil then make a couple of slits in the foil with a sharp knife to allow steam to escape. Cook until meat is fork-tender, about 1 hour. ; name: raspberry pear crisp ; ingredients: pears, fresh raspberries, sugar, quick-cooking oats, honey, margarine, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Place pears in an 8-inch square baking dish coated with non-stick cooking spray. Sprinkle pears with raspberries and sugar. In a bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Sprinkle over berries. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes or until pears are tender and mixture is bubbly. Serve warm. Excellent with vanilla ice cream, especially if you drizzle the juice over the ice cream. Diabetic exchange is 2 fruits. ; name: lemon chive rice ; ingredients: margarine, onion, rice, curry, turmeric, lemon zest, chicken broth, chives, pepper ; preparation:Melt margarine. Add onions and saute. Add rice and curry or tumeric and cook until grains of rice are all coated. Stir in half the lemon peel and all the broth. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20- 25 minutes. Stir in remaining lemon peel and chives just before you serve. ; name: crunchy baked flounder ; ingredients: panko breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, unsalted butter, flounder fillets, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: cheesy garlic cardiac arrest bread ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sharp cheddar cheese, green onion, garlic, french bread, parsley, paprika ; preparation:Mix mayo, cheese, onion and garlic. Spread on bread halves. Sprinkle both sides with paprika and parsley, and put back together to form loaf shape. Wrap in foil and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or freeze. Bake at 400 for 8 to 10 minutes if refrigerated, or 20 to 25 minutes if frozen. ; name: my real pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, ground cloves, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk ; preparation:Combine the eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and milk. Mix well and pour into prepared pie crusts. Bake in a 425f oven for 15 minutes. Reduce temperature to 350f and bake an additional 50-60 minutes or until the center of the pie is no longer wobbly or liquid. Cool and serve with whipped topping or vanilla ice cream. ; name: beef and vegetable barley soup ; ingredients: chuck steaks, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, oregano, beef bouillon cubes, water, bay leaf, carrots, barley ; preparation:Brown beef in oil in large pot. Stir in onion and garlic. Cook until onion is tender. Add water. Stir in oregano, bouillon and bay leaf. Bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer for an hour. Add barley and veggies. Turn heat to medium. Cook for 30 minutes. ; name: gyro sauce ; ingredients: cucumber, garlic salt, dill weed, prepared mustard, sour cream ; preparation:Fold together all ingredients in a bowl. Chill til ready to serve. I often make a faux gyro with pitas, tomatoes and sweet red onion. I buy thin sliced pastrami or spicy or peppered roast beef from the deli and microwave it for 20 or 30 seconds. Put it all together and-- yum. ; name: chvre with pistachios and honey ; ingredients: fresh goat cheese, half-and-half, orange blossom honey, roasted pistachios, crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a bowl, whisk goat cheese and half-and-half until smooth. Spoon into a small, shallow gratin dish, spreading level. Bake until cheese is hot in center and beginning to firm up at edges, about 15 minutes. Drizzle cheese with honey and sprinkle with pistachios. Serve with crackers. ; name: homemade butterscotch pudding ; ingredients: dark brown sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, salt, milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: a very special gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, bacon, leeks, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, skim milk, parmesan cheese, cheddar cheese, cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, baby spinach leaves ; preparation:Cook gnocchi according to package directions. Set aside. Saut bacon until crisp. Set aside. Saut leeks in bacon fat. In medium saucepan, melt butter. Over medium heat, whisk in flour. Whisk in milk, stirring constantly until boiling. Add cheeses & stir until melted. In large bowl, combine all components & stir well, adding spinach last. ; name: grilled cheese pickle and tomato sandwiches ; ingredients: white bread, butter, american cheese, kosher dill pickle, tomatoes ; preparation:Spread butter on one side each of 2 slices of bread. Place 1 piece of american cheese on a non-buttered side of bread. Place tomato slices on top of the cheese. Lay thin slices of dill pickle on top of tomato slices. Put other slice of bread, butter side up, on top. Fry in a pan until both sides are nicely browned. ; name: bourbon brown sugar sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, brown sugar, bourbon, butter, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Cube sweet potatoes and boil in water until soft. Add brown sugar, bourbon, butter and mash well. Add cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla. Mix all ingredients well. If you want to add more cinnamon and not so much bourbon, for example, feel free. ; name: asparagus bundles with prosciutto goat cheese ; ingredients: asparagus spear, prosciutto, olive oil, salt, black pepper, roasted red peppers, goat cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Line a 15-inch x 10-inch baking pan with foil. Wrap asparagus spears in bundles of 3 or 4 spears with strips of prosciutto around the middle. Place bundles in a single layer on baking pan tucking under ends of prosciutto. Drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Top with roasted red peppers. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until asparagus is crisp tender. Sprinkle with cheese and continue baking for 5 minutes or until cheese is soft. ; name: sauteed spinach with mushrooms ; ingredients: baby spinach, butter, mushroom, salt and pepper, fresh garlic cloves ; preparation:Bring water in a large pot to a boil. Add the spinach and cook for 1 minute or less. Drain in colander and let cool. Squeeze spinach to extract moisture and chop. Melt all but 1 tablespoons of butter in the pan on medium low heat, add the the sliced mushrooms and cook, stirring often. Add salt and pepper when mushrooms are almost cooked and add remaining butter and spinach. Cook thru stirring about 30 seconds. Sprinkle with chopped garlic, stir and cook for a few more minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: pasta with garlic and oil pasta aglio e olio ; ingredients: spaghetti, salt, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, hot red chili peppers, italian parsley ; preparation:

name: farro apple and pecan salad ; ingredients: cracked farro, olive oil, red onion, apple, fresh thyme, apple cider vinegar, pecans, salt, pepper ; preparation:Soak farro in cold water for 20 minutes. Drain well. Bring 2 quarts salted water to a boil in a medium pot. Add farro and simmer, uncovered, until tender, 30 to 35 minutes. Drain well then rinse under cold water for 30 seconds. Drain again, then transfer to a large bowl, cover and refrigerate. Heat 2 tablespoons of the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onions and cook until softened and translucent, about 5 minutes. Add apples, stir well and cook until slightly softened, 2 to 3 minutes more. Transfer apple mixture to bowl with farro. Add thyme, vinegar, remaining 2 tablespoons oil, pecans, salt and pepper and toss gently to combine. Serve immediately. ; name: sourdough bread french ; ingredients: warm water, sourdough starter, flour, sugar, salt, baking soda ; preparation:Mix water, the sourdough start and flour in a non-metallic bowl. Cover loosely. Let stand in warm place until mixture bubbles and has a definite sour aroma. Mix sugar, salt and baking soda into sourdough mixture. Stir in enough of the remaining flour to make dough easy to handle. Knead dough on well-floured surface. Form and let rise until double in size, covered. ; name: it s almost summer bbq chicken with salsa ; ingredients: chicken stock, cornflour, dijon mustard, chicken, onion, red capsicum, green capsicum, tomatoes ; preparation:In a saucepan mix chicken stock, cornflour and dijon mustard. Reduce over low heat. Cool the sauce and divide into two equal quantities. Reserve one for a dressing. With the other half of the sauce add chicken pieces and marinate overnight. Next day placed chicken on skewer sticks then discard left over marinate. Pre-heat barbecue and set aside chicken until you finished making the salsa. In a medium bowl add diced onions, diced capsicums and diced tomatoes, mix well with the reserved dressing. Bbq chicken until golden brown, then serve with salsa and enjoy. ; name: greek cocktail meatballs keftethes ; ingredients: ground beef, soft breadcrumbs, salt, cinnamon, garlic clove, onion, parsley, dried spearmint, egg ; preparation:Combine all ingredients -- you will have to mix this with your hands. Roll into balls. Refrigerate 1 hour, or overnight. Heat equal amounts of olive oil and butter. Flour and brown until dark golden brown. ; name: creole celery cabbage ; ingredients: chinese cabbage, butter, onion, green bell pepper, tomatoes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and lightly grease a casserole dish. Cover chinese cabbage with boiling water and cook for about ten minutes or until tender. Drain very well. Melt butter. Add onions and peppers and cook slowly for about five minutes. Add tomatoes and heat to the boiling point. Add cabbage, salt and pepper. Pour into a baking dish, cover and bake in oven for 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: orange rosemary glazed chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh rosemary, orange marmalade, sherry wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:

name: parmesan pull apart mini bundts ; ingredients: buttermilk biscuits, butter, italian seasoning, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray mini bundt pan with cooking spray. Combine butter, garlic, italian seasoning and cheeses in bowl. Cut each biscuit into quarters and dip in butter. Fill each bundt half full with biscuit pieces and bake 10-15 minutes in preheated oven, until just starting to brown. ; name: vegan cornbread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, maple syrup, soymilk, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin cups or a square pan. Put dry ingredients in one bowl, and mix them. Put oil and milk together, and add to dry. Stir til just moist. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: green bean cherry tomato and basil salad ; ingredients: green beans, shallot, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Bring large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the green beans and cook about 4 minutes. Drain and set aside on a towel to cool. In large bowl, stir together shallot, vinegar, salt and pepper. Set aside for 15 minutes, then whisk in oil. Add cherry tomatoes and toss. Add beans and basil and toss again. Adjust seasoning. ; name: clapshot an orcadian potato and yellow turnip swede rutabaga ; ingredients: potato, turnip, onion, chives, butter, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Peel the potatoes and turnip. Cut both into roughly the same size pieces. Put into a deep pan with the onion. Add boiling water to cover and simmer gently until the ingredients are just soft. Drain off the cooking liquid. Mash everything thoroughly, adding chives and enough milk and butter to make a light consistency. Season well with salt and pepper. Serve with a nice sharp cheese as a meal, or as a side dish with a stew or meat. ; name: nick s banana bread ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, brown sugar, salt, ginger, cinnamon, vegetable oil, water, vanilla, bananas ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients into a large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients. Mix together. Pour mix into bread pan. Bake at 350-400 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hour. ; name: irio kenya ; ingredients: white potatoes, watercress, peas, corn, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: buttery toffee cookies ; ingredients: sugar, butter, egg, vanilla, flour, baking powder, baking soda, english toffee bits ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. In large bowl, beat sugar, butter, egg and vanilla until creamy. Add flour, baking powder and soda. Beat on low until well mixed. Stir in toffee bits with a spoon. Shape into 1-inch balls. Roll in sugar. Put 2-inches apart on ungreased baking sheet. Flatten slightly with bottom af glass. Bake for 9 minutes or until edges are just lightly brown. While warm, sprinkle with more sugar. ; name: cajun spiced peanuts ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cajun seasoning, cayenne pepper, dry roasted salted peanuts ; preparation:Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in seasoning and cayenne. Add peanuts to skillet. Cook for 2 minutes stirring constantly. Serve warm or at room temperature. Store for up to 3 weeks in a tightly covered container. ; name: southern hospitality pie ; ingredients: pecans, coconut, butter, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, cool whip topping, graham cracker pie crust, caramel ice cream topping, ice cream topping ; preparation:Melt butter or margarine in skillet over low heat. Add pecans and coconut stirring constantly to brown. Cool. Mix cream cheese and sweetened condensed milk until smooth. Fold in non dairy whipped topping. Pour evenly into crust. Sprinkle with coconut and pecan mixture. Drizzle with the caramel and chocolate toppings. Cover and freeze until frozen hard. Remove from freezer 10 -15 min before serving. ; name: honey pork tenderloin kabobs ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, bourbon, honey, prepared mustard, dried tarragon, sweet potatoes, peaches, green bell peppers, skewers ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-hot. Mix bourbon, honey, mustard and tarragon in bowl. Stir well and set aside. Steam or boil sweet potatoes until crisp-tender. Thread 3 sweet potato cubes, 3 pork cubes, 2 peach quarters, and 4 pepper pieces alternately onto each of eight 10-inch skewers. Brush kabobs with honey mixture. Lightly oil grill. Grill kabobs, basting occasionally, 5 minutes on each side or until done. Serve kabobs on a bed of seasoned rice. ; name: simple beet pickles ; ingredients: beet, white vinegar, white sugar, salt, powdered allspice ; preparation:Cook beets, cool and peel. Prepare solution. Put beets in jars. Pour solution over beets. Seal jars. ; name: potato pepper jack soup sp5 ; ingredients: simply potatoes traditional mashed potatoes, monterey jack pepper cheese, fat-free chicken broth, garlic powder, baby spinach ; preparation:

name: sweet roasted carrots ; ingredients: honey, butter, bacon, baby carrots, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: rudy s creamed corn ; ingredients: frozen whole kernel corn, fat free cream cheese, heavy whipping cream, splenda sugar substitute, black pepper, unsalted butter ; preparation:Spread corn over bottom of a crockpot or slowcooker. Top with cream cheese, cubed into pieces. Mix remaining ingredients together and pour over corn. Cover and cook on high heat for 2-3 hours till creamy. Stir occasionally as it cooks. ; name: chicken wings with honey soy and sesame ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken wings, soy sauce, water, honey, sesame seeds ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375f heat the vegetable oil in a small ovenproof frying pan. Fry the chicken wings for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden. Remove the pan from the heat and add the soy sauce, water and honey. Transfer to the oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, turning the chicken wings once. Arrange the chicken wings on a warmed platter, scatter over the sesame seeds and serve. ; name: green bean cherry tomato and basil salad ; ingredients: green beans, shallot, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Bring large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the green beans and cook about 4 minutes. Drain and set aside on a towel to cool. In large bowl, stir together shallot, vinegar, salt and pepper. Set aside for 15 minutes, then whisk in oil. Add cherry tomatoes and toss. Add beans and basil and toss again. Adjust seasoning. ; name: iced orange coffee ; ingredients: oranges, juice of, oranges, water, sugar, coffee, whipping cream ; preparation:Place the orange peel, water and sugar in a saucepan. Boil for 5 minutes. Remove the peel and let the syrup cool. Mix the orange juice with the coffee and syrup. Add the whipping cream. Pour over crushed ice in tall glasses. ; name: grandmother s cornbread ; ingredients: jiffy cornbread mix, mayonnaise, eggs, oil, sugar ; preparation:

name: dump coke bbq chicken oamc ; ingredients: chicken pieces, barbecue sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, coke, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix barbecue sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, coke, salt and pepper in large freezer bag. Add chicken. Freeze. When ready to serve thaw in fridge. Cook in oven or grill. In oven, place in pan sprayed with pam. Cook at 350 for about 30 minutes. Baste with marinade during cooking. ; name: swiss stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, dried breadcrumbs, eggs, dried dill weed, lemon juice, margarine, swiss cheese, dried parsley flakes, lemon, rind of ; preparation:Wash and drain mushrooms. Chop stems. Sprinkle caps with salt. In a skillet over medium heat, cook stems. Add remaining ingredients and cook through. Spoon a little mixture into each cap. Place on cookie sheet. Bake in oven at 350 degrees for 5-8 minutes. ; name: 1 potato 2 potato ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, garlic cloves, salt and black pepper, frozen potato wedges, bacon, green onions, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Spray a quiche dish with nonstick cooking spray. Mix mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, and garlic in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to blend. Spread mashed potato mixture evenly into the quiche dish. Arrange the frozen potato wedges in a spoke wheel fashion on top of the mashed potatoes. For curly fries, make a random pattern, breaking in half any large fries. Sprinkle with bacon bits, green onion and parmesan cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve. ; name: the pizza makers sauce ; ingredients: garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, olive oil, crushed tomatoes, dried oregano, salt ; preparation:In a big skillet. Cook the garlic and red pepper flakes in the oil over medium heat until the garlic is golden, about 1 minute. Add in tomatoes, oregano, and salt to taste. Bring to a simmer. Cook, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 10-15 minutes. Let the sauce cool before spreading it on the pizza dough. Keeps well in refrigerator for up to 5 days. In the freezer for 1 month. ; name: yam or sweet potato puff ; ingredients: yams, butter, eggs, sugar, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and butter a casserole dish. Peel potatoes and boil until soft. Mash and add remaining ingredients. Beat well and pour into prepared casserole. Dot with additional butter and bake until brown, 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: herbed split pea soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, garlic, dried split peas, turkey ham, dried marjoram, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:

name: lemon garlic chicken over angel hair pasta ; ingredients: flour, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breast, butter, lemon, juice of, white wine, hot water, chicken bouillon cube, angel hair pasta ; preparation:Combine flour, parmesan, and garlic powder. Dredge chicken in mixture. Melt butter in large skillet. Add chicken and brown. Add liquid. Stir until thickened. Meanwhile cook pasta according to package directions. Drain pasta and place in large serving bowl. Pour chicken and sauce over pasta. Toss gently. Top with grated cheese. Garnish with fresh lemon slices and fresh parsley. ; name: angel lush cake ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, vanilla flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, cool whip topping, angel food cake, berries ; preparation:Mix pudding and pineapple in bowl. Gently stir in whipped topping. Cut cake horizontally into thirds. Spread one-third pudding mixture over bottom layer of cake. Top with second layer. Repeat layering, ending with pudding. Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until ready to serve. Garnish with your favorite seasonal berries. ; name: easy and fast fruit n cream waffles ; ingredients: waffles, cream cheese, canned peaches, brown sugar, whipped cream ; preparation:Toast waffles. Cover with a layer of cream cheese. Add a layer of fruit. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Cover completely with whipped cream. ; name: wonderful vegan brownies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, white sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, soymilk, vegetable oil, vanilla, walnuts ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. In a bowl combine flour, sugar, sifted cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. In a small bowl combine soy milk with oil and vanilla. Pour into the flour mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts. Transfer to the prepared baking dish. Bake for about 30-35 minutes or until the top is no longer shiny. Let cool about 20 minutes or more before slicing. ; name: spiced lemonade ; ingredients: cloves, cinnamon stick, cranberry juice, water, sugar, frozen concentrated lemonade ; preparation:Mix spices, cranberry juice, and water in saucepan. Bring to a rolling boil. Cover, remove from heat, and let stand about 3 minutes. Strain and discard spices. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Add lemonade. Mix well. Reheat, and serve hot. Garnish each serving with half an orange slice and a sprig of mint or a green cherry. ; name: poutine burger eh ; ingredients: ground beef, kosher salt, ground pepper, buns, butter, fresh mozzarella cheese, french fries, chicken gravy, caramelized onion ; preparation:

name: chinese brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, minced garlic cloves, ginger, onion, red pepper flakes, soy sauce ; preparation:Stir fry sprouts in hot oil with garlic, onion and ginger until nearly done. Mix slurry ingredients together and add to sprouts. Sprinkle with crushed red pepper. Stir-fry for 2 minutes more. Serve hot with char siu ribs and steamed rice. ; name: grilled short ribs ; ingredients: soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic cloves, sesame oil, beef short ribs, lettuce leaf, sticky rice, red miso ; preparation:Whisk together marinade ingredients in a 15 x 10 inch pan and add ribs to marindade, turning to coat and let marinade for 30 minutes to 2 hours at room temperature. Prepare grill to medium high heat. Brush grill with oil. Grill ribs until cooked through. Remove meat from bones. Wrap meat in lettuce leavs with a small amount of miso and sticky rice. ; name: sauerkraut and bean soup ; ingredients: dried kidney beans, oil, pork, salt and pepper, sage leaves, parsley, garlic cloves, chicken stock, sauerkraut, polenta flour ; preparation:Bring the kidney beans to a boil in a large pot with plenty of salted water. Remove from the heat, cover and set aside for 1 hour. In a dutch oven, heat oil over high heat, season the pork well with salt and pepper and sear on all sides, working in batches if necessary, and remove the meat when it is browned. Add the sage, parsley, and garlic and saute for 5 minutes before returning it to the casserole. Drain the beans and add them to the casserole with the stock and the sauerkraut and bring to a simmer. Cook the mixture slowly for 45 minutes, or until the pork is very tender and the beans are cooked through. Slowly sprinkle the polenta over the stew and stir constantly for 10 minutes, or until the polenta has expanded. Season with salt and pepper, to taste, and serve. ; name: salmon and bean lunch bowl ; ingredients: beans, low-fat vinaigrette dressing, fresh parsley, red salmon, cherry tomatoes, red onion, cucumbers, salad leaves ; preparation:Mix the beans with the vinaigrette, parsley and seasoning to taste. Place in the base of two a plastic containers with lids. Remove the skin and bones from the salmon and lightly flake the flesh. Spoon on top of the bean mixture. Top with the tomatoes, onion and cucumber. Finally heap the salad leaves on top. Seal the container with the lid and chill until required. Lightly toss together before eating. ; name: meatballs with tomato with juice gravy ; ingredients: ground beef, ground sausage, salt, pepper, chili powder, onion, saltine crackers, egg, cornstarch, tomato juice ; preparation:Mix the ground beef, sasuage, salt, pepper, chili powder, onion, crackers, 1 beaten egg and 1 cup tomato juice. Shape into balls about the size of walnuts and bake at 350 about 30 minutes, turn and bake about 20 more minutes. You can drain the drippings off or leave them, sometimes i leave them if there is not too much grease. Mix remaining juice, cornstarch, a little chile powder and some of the dripping from the pan, i warm the sauce up in the microwave just a little before putting in the hot pan. Put back in the oven till juice thickens or is good and bubbly. ; name: slow cooker peach butter ; ingredients: peaches, water, light brown sugar, fresh lemon juice, ground ginger, ground cloves ; preparation:

name: minute steaks with taco sauce ; ingredients: butter, vegetable oil, minute steaks, button mushrooms, taco sauce, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Heat the butter and oil in a frying pan. Season the steaks with salt and pepper and fry for 1 minute on each side on fairly high heat. Place the cooked steaks into a serving dish and place in the oven to keep warm. Add mushrooms to the pan. Cook on high heat and lightly brown. Remove from pan and place in oven to keep warm. Pour the taco sauce in the pan and simmer for about 1 minute. Place the mushrooms and steaks on a plate and pour the taco sauce over the steaks. Garnish with the parsley. Serve. ; name: frozen sweet corn ; ingredients: sweet corn, half-and-half, butter, margarine ; preparation:Cut corn off the cobs. Mix all ingregients together in a roasting pan. Bake, uncovered for 1 hour at 325. Stir every 15 minutes. Cool and freeze. Can use ziploc bags or freezer containers. ; name: spinach stuffed portobello mushrooms ; ingredients: portabella mushrooms, onion, eggs, reduced-fat sour cream, frozen chopped spinach, seasoned stuffing mix, feta cheese, garlic salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil. Coat the foil with nonstick cooking spray and set aside. Remove stems from mushrooms. Set caps aside and chop stems. Saute the stems and onion in a small amount of water until soft. In a small bowl, combine the eggs and sour cream. Stir in the spinach, stuffing, feta cheese, garlic salt and onion mixture. Spoon into mushroom caps. Place on prepared baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese, bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until mushrooms are tender and cheese is melted. ; name: avocado appetiser ; ingredients: avocado, hard-boiled eggs, onion, salt ; preparation:Hard boil eggs. Chop onion, fine. Combine eggs, onion, avocado, salt& mash- i let the kitchen machine do it. Put in refrigerator for at least a few hours that flavors can intensify. Garnish with paprika& serve on salad leaves. ; name: mini chip shortbread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, miniature chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large mixing bowl, beat butter and sugar together until creamy. Beat in egg and vanilla. Add flour gradually and beat well. Stir in 1 cup morsels. Press on bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 30-33 minutes or until the top is lightly browned. Immediately sprinkle with the remaining chocolate chips and let sit for 5 minutes or so until the chips become shiny. Then spread evenly over top. Cool completely in the pan and then cut into squares. ; name: southern pound cake ; ingredients: cake flour, sugar, crisco, eggs, milk, vanilla ; preparation:

name: ritzy cookies ; ingredients: smooth peanut butter, semisweet chocolate morsel, butterscotch chips, ritz cracker ; preparation:Spread peanut butter on crackers and top with another cracker. Prepare several. Slowly melt morsels on low heat. Dip cookies in melted morsels, place on wax paper. Cool. Place in container and refridge. ; name: no way casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, hamburger, vegetable soup, cream of mushroom soup, potato chips ; preparation:Place sliced potatoes in buttered casserole dish. Next, layer meat over potatoes. Put vegetable soup on next layer. Mushroom soup on next layer. Top with chips or bread cubes. Bake till potatoes are done, about 1 hour at 350. ; name: light pancakes ; ingredients: low-fat biscuit mix, skim milk, splenda sugar substitute, lemon juice, baking powder ; preparation:Stir all ingredients together until well blended. Let stand 10 minutes. Using ladle, spoon on to hot griddle until edges are dry and middle is bubbly. Turn. Cook until golden. ; name: egg fried rice ; ingredients: frozen peas, eggs, sesame oil, peanut oil, cooked rice, salt, pepper, spring onions, fresh bean sprouts ; preparation:Thaw frozen peas. Drain in colander. Combine eggs and sesame oil in a small bowl and set aside. Heat a wok over high heat until hot. Add the oil and when it is hot and slightly smoking, turn the heat to medium and add the eggs. Stir fry the eggs for 2 minutes, then add the cooked rice and stir fry for 3 minutes, mixing well. Then add the peas, salt and pepper. Stir fry 5 minutes over high heat. Add spring onions and bean sprouts and stir fry for 2 minutes. Turn onto a platter and serve at once. ; name: pumpkin bread with mini chocolate chips ; ingredients: flour, granulated sugar, baking soda, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, semisweet mini chocolate chips, eggs, canola oil, water, canned pumpkin ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine all dry ingredients, except chocolate chips, in a large mixing bowl and mix well. In a seperate bowl, slightly beat the eggs with a fork or wire whisk. Add thwe remaining wet ingredients to the eggs and stir well. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients. Stir just until evenly mixed. Fold in chocolate chips. Coat 2 bread pans evenly with cooking spray. Pout half of the mixture into each pan. Bake for 50-60 minutes. ; name: strawberry and kiwi spinach salad with grilled chicken breast ; ingredients: fresh spinach leaves, strawberries, kiwi, slivered almonds, feta cheese, red onion rings, chicken breasts, poppy seeds ; preparation:

name: simple tasty potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, sweet pickle, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, onion ; preparation:Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all. ; name: quick chicken with green beans ; ingredients: chicken breasts, condensed cream of mushroom soup, french style green beans, french-fried onions, milk, soy sauce, pepper, cooked white rice ; preparation:Spray a large skillet with cooking spray and place over medium-high heat on stove. Add chicken to skillet and cook until browned on all sides. Combine remaining ingredients except rice and add to skillet. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 5-10 minutes. If mixture is too thick after simmering, add milk to desired thickness. Serve over warm white rice. ; name: flourless peanut chocolate cookies martha stewart ; ingredients: sugar, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, creamy peanut butter, egg, semi-sweet chocolate chips, roasted peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a small bowl combine sugar, soda and salt. In a large bowl, stir together sugar-soda-salt-mix, egg and vanilla until well combined. I used a wire whisk for this step. Now add in the peanut butter, stir with a spoon til well combined and smooth. Fold in chocolate chips and roasted peanut pieces. With moistened hands, roll dough, about 1 heaping tablespoon at a time, into balls. Place 2 inches apart on two baking sheets. Bake for about 12-14 minutes. Cookies will still be slightly soft, but firm up while cooling.
