Allow to set on baking sheet for a couple of minutes and then transfer to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: warm potato salad low fat ; ingredients: small potato, dijon mustard, whole grain mustard, rice vinegar, red wine vinegar, shallots, extra virgin olive oil, fresh flat-leaf parsley, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Put the potatoes in a saucepan, add water to cover and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to medium and cook, uncovered, until the potatoes are tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain and let stand until just cool enough to handle. Cut each potato in half and place in a warmed serving dish. In a small bowl, whisk together the mustards, the vinegars and the shallot until well blended. While whisking, slowly drizzle in the olive oil to make a thick dressing. Stir in the parsley, salt and pepper. Pour the dressing over the warm potatoes, mix gently and serve immediately. ; name: warm greens saute ; ingredients: olive oil, mixed greens, honey, balsamic vinegar, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in 10 inch skillet. Add greens. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally for 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in honey, vinegar, and salt. ; name: chipotle crusted pork tenderloins can sub chops ; ingredients: onion powder, garlic powder, dried chipotle powder, salt, brown sugar, pork tenderloin ; preparation:

name: cactus fries nopalitos fritos ; ingredients: cactus pieces, cornstarch, achiote paste, all-purpose flour, baking powder, egg white, ice water, peanut oil ; preparation:Remove thorns and eyes from cactus, and trim off the edges of pads. Blanch cactus for 2 minutes in a covered pan with enough boiling salted water to cover. Drain. Cut cactus in 3- to 4-inch strips similar to french fries. Set aside. Combine cornstarch and achiote paste in a blender or food processor, and pulse until smooth. In a medium-size bowl, combine flour and baking powder, add cornstarch mixture, and blend well. In another bowl, beat egg white to stiff meringue. Fold into the flour mixture, alternating with enough ice water to make batter the consistency of unbeaten egg white. Chill. Dredge cactus strips in batter, and fry in deep hot oil until crisp and golden, approximately 3 minutes. Drain well and serve. ; name: karate baked caramel corn ; ingredients: popped corn, margarine, brown sugar, corn syrup, baking soda, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 250 degrees f. Put popped corn in a large lightly buttered roasting pan. Melt margarine in medium saucepan. Stir in brown sugar and corn syrup. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil without stirring 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in soda and vanilla. Pour over popped corn gradually, mixing well. Bake one hour, stirring every 15 minutes. Remove from oven and cool completely. Break apart if necessary and store in tightly covered tin box. ; name: baby greens with mustard vinaigrette ; ingredients: eggs, honey dijon mustard, white pepper, salt, red wine vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, butter lettuce ; preparation:Peel and chop eggs. Combine next 5 ingredients and process until smooth with a hand held blender. Place lettuce in a bowl, add dressing and eggs and toss gently. Serve on a plate or salad bowl. Garnish with chopped parsley. ; name: zucchini con grana padanao layered zucchini with grana padano ; ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, olive oil, zucchini, pancetta, white bread, rosemary, grana padano ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 170c. Add olive oil to pan and once it is heated, saut the onions and garlic until they have softened, then place them in a large ovenproof dish. Cut the top and bottom from each of the zucchini, slice them lengthways and place them, slightly overlapping the slices, on top of the onions and garlic. Layer the pancetta on top of the zucchini. Process the bread, rosemary and grana padano in a food processor. When combined, sprinkle the mixture over the zucchini and pancetta. Drizzle a little oil over the top layer of the dish and bake for about 25 minutes. Serve warm. ; name: zucchini bread plain ; ingredients: unbleached flour, splenda sugar substitute, baking powder, salt, egg white, eggs, canola oil, zucchini ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 2 loaf pans with non stick coating. In a large bowl, mix flour, splenda, baking powder, and salt. In a separate bowl mix together the eggs and egg whites, canola oil, and the grated zucchini. Stir the liquid mixture into the flour mixture. The dough will be somewhat thick. Stir until the flour mixture is just moistened. Spread evenly into the loaf pans. Bake 50 minutes. ; name: bratwurst skillet ; ingredients: bratwurst, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, onions, paprika, caraway seed ; preparation:

name: truly easy pizza dough ; ingredients: flour, quick-rising yeast, sugar, salt, milk, water, butter ; preparation:Mix flour, yeast, sugar and salt in a bowl. In another large bowl mix milk, water and butter, and microwave for 1 minute. Add to dry ingredients, adding more flour as needed to form elastic dough. Knead and let rise for about an hour. Knead and roll out onto baking stone or pizza pan. Cover with sauce, or italian salad dressing, and top with favourite toppings. Bake at 450 f until golden brown. ; name: chilled cranberry soup ; ingredients: water, granulated sugar, cinnamon sticks, ground cloves, fresh cranberries, fresh lemon juice, orange zest, sour cream ; preparation:In a r4-quart sucepan, mix water, sugar, cinnamon sticks & cloves. Bring to boil over high heat, then add cranberries & return to a boil. Reduce heat & cook until cranberries pop, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat & stir in lemon juice & orange zest. Cool to room temperature, then chill about 4 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, top each bowl of soup with a dollop of sour cream. Refrigerate any leftovers. ; name: peanut butter marshmallow fluff coconut cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, creamy peanut butter, all-purpose flour, baking soda, marshmallow cream, coconut flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, peanut butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour and baking soda. Stir in to the peanut butter mixture. Then fold in the marshmallow fluff in just until combined. When you drop the cookies by the rounded spoonfuls or use a cookie scooper into the ungreased cookie sheet first put a pinch of coconut flakes on bottom on cookie sheet then place dough on top of coconut then after all your cookies have been drop place a nice hefty pinch of coconut flakes on top of cookie dough then press with fork as you would with regular peanut butter cookies to impress a criss cross with fork. Bake for 15 minutes. ; name: philly tandy takes ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla, milk, flour, baking powder, peanut butter, sweet baking chocolate ; preparation:Combine the first six ingredients together and beat with mixer for 2 minutes. Spread in jelly roll pan and bake at 350 for 15-20 minutes. Spread peanut butter on hot cake and refrigerate for 2 hours. Your choice on how much peanut butter, i like a lot. Melt 8oz. Of sweet baking chocolate square in double boiler and spread over cake. Let cool before eating. Can put in refrigerator for chocolate to harden. ; name: thai noodles ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, soy sauce, peanut butter, sugar, vegetable oil, dark sesame oil, garlic, dry crushed red pepper, red chili oil, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Cook pasta according to the package directions. Drain well. Set aside, and keep warm. Combine soy sauce and the next seven ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well with a wire whisk. Pour over the pasta. Toss gently. Add toppings, if desired. ; name: chicken vegetables and pasta soup ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, olive oil, onion, carrots, cauliflower florets, low-sodium low-fat chicken broth, dried herbs, pasta, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: english muffin panini with goat cheese and tomato ; ingredients: english muffins, pesto sauce, goat cheese, tomatoes, radicchio ; preparation:Spread toasted side of each english muffin half with pesto. Spread cheese over 4 english muffin halves. Top with tomato slices, radicchio, and remaining english muffin halves. Spray panini with cooking spray. Coat skillet or grill pan with cooking spray and heat over medium heat. Place panini in pan. Weight with smaller-diameter saucepan weighted with 2 cans. Cook 2 minutes. Flip, replace weight, and cook 2 minutes more. ; name: chicken noodle casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken, medium noodles, onions, cream of mushroom soup, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbs ; preparation:Mix onions with noodles. Add chicken and seasonings. Add soup and mix well. Put mixture in greased 2 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle buttered bread crumbs or corn flake crumbs over top. Cover and bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Uncover 10 minutes before done and let brown. ; name: oven baked chicken with tasty rub ; ingredients: chicken breasts, salt, garlic, oregano, paprika, pepper, chili powder, onion powder, thyme, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Take all ingredients except for olive oil and chicken and combine in small bowl. Vary amount of chili powder depending on desired level of spice. Take chicken and lightly coat both sides with olive oil. Place chicken in oven-safe dish and rub both sides heavily with ingredients previously mixed. Pour a little bit more olive oil into the bottom of the dish, enough so that it is lightly covered. Cook for roughly 35-45 minutes. ; name: low fat pizza with turkey sausage and sweet peppers ; ingredients: pizza crust, prepared pizza sauce, sweet italian turkey sausage, yellow sweet pepper, fresh mushrooms, fat free mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Prepare your pizza crust in whatever way you prefer and prebake on a greased pan for 10 minutes. While crust is baking, saute the turkey sausage links in skillet until done. Cool briefly and dice into chunks. Spread pizza sauce over crust, top with sausage chunks, sliced pepper rings, mushrooms and mozzarella. Bake for an additional 10-12 minutes or until cheese is melted and lightly browned. ; name: libbie s apple crisp ; ingredients: brown sugar, water, cinnamon, apples, butter, flour, salt ; preparation:Mix brown sugar with water and cinnamon. Mix with apples. Put in a buttered casserole. Mix flour and salt with butter. Spread over apples. Bake at 375 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hour until apples are tender. ; name: green lentils with garlic onion madhur jaffrey ; ingredients: vegetable oil, whole cumin seed, garlic cloves, onion, green lentil, water, salt, cayenne ; preparation:

name: sweet peas and mushrooms ; ingredients: frozen peas, fresh mushrooms, onion, butter, sugar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook peas according to package directions. Drain. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saut mushrooms and onion in butter until onion is crisp-tender. Stir in sugar, salt, pepper and peas. Cover and cook until heated through. ; name: ethiopian doro wat chicken stew ; ingredients: roasting chickens, vegetable oil, butter, onions, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, berbere, chicken stock, lime juice, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:Heat oil in a pan and brown the chicken. When all pieces are light brown, remove chicken. In the same pan, without removing the oil, add butter, onion, ginger and garlic. Cook until golden brown. Add berbere and saute the mixture over low heat until it browns. Add chicken stock and lime juice, simmer 3-4 minutes. Return the chicken to the pan, cover, and simmer slowly for 30 minutes, turning the chicken from time to time. Transfer the stew to a platter, garnish with eggs, and serve with injera or pita bread. ; name: spicy oven fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, oil, flour, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Put oil in 9x13 pan, swirl around. Scrub potatoes. Cut each lengthwise into 8 wedges. Combine flour and seasonings in a bowl or baggie. Add potato wedges and shake or toss to coat. Arrange skin-side-down in oiled pan. Bake 35-40 minutes. ; name: broccoli supreme ; ingredients: broccoli spears, garlic cheese rolls, cream of mushroom soup, sliced mushrooms, seasoned dry bread crumb ; preparation:In a saucepan, boil broccoli for 3 minutes, and drain. Place broccoli in a 2-quart baking dish. In another saucepan, combine cheese roll, soup, and mushrooms. Heat on medium, stirring constantly until cheese melts. Spoon cheese-mushroom mixture over broccoli. Sprinkle breadcrumbs over top of casserole. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: kissey face cream cheese cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, egg, vanilla extract, hershey chocolate kisses ; preparation:Cream butter and cream cheese. Gradually add sugar, beating until light and fluffy. Add flour. Beat well. Stir in egg and vanilla. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Place 2 inches apart a lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 f for 8 minutes. Remove the cookies from the oven and place one unwrapped hershey kiss in the middle of each cookie. Return to oven and bake 5 minutes. Cool 2-3 minutes on cookie sheets before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: honeydew ham salad ; ingredients: macaroni, ham, celery, red onion, mayonnaise, lime juice, honey, fresh cilantro, honeydew melon ; preparation:

name: peach sauce for the microwave fat free ; ingredients: water, white sugar, molasses, lemon juice, vanilla, fresh peaches ; preparation:Peel, pit, and slice the peaches. In a microwave safe dish with a lid, mix all the ingredients but the peaches. Microwave on high for 6 minutes or until boiling. Add the peaches and let it sit. Serve cold. ; name: coconut balls coquitos ; ingredients: coconut in heavy syrup, brown sugar, vanilla extract, white sugar ; preparation:Drain syrup from coconut. Reserve syrup. Mix coconut, brown sugar, and vanilla in a medium size saucepan. Cook over medium heat for a few minutes then allow to cool. Make small balls on buttered cookie sheet and set aside. Mix coconut syrup and white sugar in small saucepan and cook over medium heat. Stir frequently until it becomes dark brown. Pour over balls and allow to cool. ; name: alton brown s bananas foster ; ingredients: unsalted butter, dark brown sugar, ground allspice, nutmeg, banana liqueur, bananas, dark rum ; preparation:Melt butter in a 10-inch heavy skillet over low heat. Add brown sugar, allspice and nutmeg and stir until sugar dissolves. Add banana liqueur and bring sauce to simmer. Add bananas and cook for 1 minute on each side, carefully spooning sauce over bananas as they are cooking. Remove bananas from pan to a serving dish. Bring sauce to a simmer and carefully add the rum. If the sauce is very hot, the alcohol will flame on its own. If not, using stick flame, carefully ignite and continue cooking until flame dies out, approximately 1 to 2 minutes. If sauce is too thin, cook for 1 to 2 minutes until it is syrupy in consistency. Immediately spoon the sauce over bananas and serve. Serve with waffles, crepes, or ice cream. ; name: fried chicken dumplings ; ingredients: ground chicken, ginger, garlic, sweet chili sauce, cornflour, water chestnuts, wonton wrappers, oil ; preparation:Place the minced chicken, ginger, garlic, water chestnut, corn flour and sweet chilli sauce in a bowl and stir till it is combined. Lay a wonton wrapper on a flat surface and brush a little water around the edge of the wrapper. Place 2 teaspoons of the chicken mixture in the middle of the wrapper. Bring the corners together and pinch the edges together to seal. Repeat with the remaining mixture and wonton wrappers. Heat a pan of hot oil, and deep fry them till they are golden brown. ; name: turkey chili con carne ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion soup mix, chili powder, red kidney beans, black beans, crushed tomatoes ; preparation:Place ground turkey in large skillet. Sprinkle with onion soup mix. Brown meat well. Add the beans, chili powder, and crushed tomatoes. Simmer covered 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: chicken rollatini with cheese ham spinach ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, deli ham, baby spinach leaves, goat cheese, dijon mustard, seasoned bread crumbs, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: honey mustard glazed parsnips ; ingredients: parsnip, olive oil, honey, coarse grain mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. Peel parsnips and halve lengthways. Place in a roasting dish with the olive oil and stir well to coat. Season and roast for 40-45 mins or until the parsnips are soft and golden. Mix honey with wholegrain mustard and pour over parsnips for the last 5 mins of cooking time. ; name: crabby appetizer ; ingredients: green onions, crabmeat, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, chili powder, pepper, muffins ; preparation:Mix everything except muffins. Spread about one generous tablespoon of mixture onto muffin halves. Broil for about 5 minutes until cheese gets bubbly. Cut each muffin into 4 pieces. Serve warm. ; name: moroccan vegetable topped hummus ; ingredients: chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic clove, salt, cumin, tomatoes, green onions, parsley ; preparation:Combine chick-peas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, cummin and salt in a food processor, and process until smooth. Combine tomato, green onions and parsley in a small bowl. Place chick-pea mixture in mediums serving bowl. Spoon tomato mixture evenly over top. Serve with wedges of pita bread or assorted crackers. ; name: mozzarella and spinach crostini ; ingredients: french bread, garlic salt, fresh spinach, cream cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cut the french bread in half lengthwise. Place cut side up on a baking sheet and toase in a 350 degree oven until lightly browned. Sprinkle with garlic salt. Put the spinach and a small amount of water in a saucepan and cook until tender. Drain and squeeze out all moisture. Combine the spinach and the cream cheese and mix well. Spread over the cut sides of the bread. Lay mozzarella slices over the spinach. Broil until cheese melts. Slice into 1- or 2-inch pieces to serve. ; name: incredibly good pot roast ; ingredients: chuck roast, olive oil, vidalia onions, salt and pepper, garlic, porter, beef broth ; preparation:Dry the roast on both sides and sprinkle with salt and fresh ground pepper. Heat oil in 5 qt dutch over. Brown chuck on both sides, remove from pan and set aside. Add sliced onions to the same pan and cook over medium heat until carmelized. This will take a little time, but be patient, it is worth it. Dont allow the onions to burn. I would guesstimate it will take approx 30 minutes. Now add the garlic and stir it around, cook for about a full minute. Place the roast on top of the onions, pour the beer and the broth over top and cover, allowing to cook on medium for the next 2 hours. Optional -- at the hour mark, you can add quartered potatoes and carrots if you want. We prefer to serve this over mashed potatoes though, the gravy is fab. ; name: tapas chicken with sherry pechuga de pollo con jerez ; ingredients: flour, chicken breast, olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh thyme, green olives, sherry wine ; preparation:

name: spiced skewered chicken chicken sosaties ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, vegetable oil, onions, madras curry powder, garlic cloves, coriander seed, light brown sugar, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Place chicken in a large deep nonreactive bowl. Heat oil in a nonreactive saucepan and fry the onions until they are lightly browned. Add the remaining ingredients and cook for 2 minutes over low heat, stirring constantly to make sure that the sugar has dissolved. Allow the marinade to cool and pour it over the chicken. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate it for 24 hours. When ready to grill the chicken pieces, remove them from the marinade, drain them, place them on skewers, and grill over hot coals or under the broiler for 10 minutes, turning once, or until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot with apricot chutney. ; name: quick mushroom barley pilaf ww ; ingredients: vegetable broth, quick-cooking barley, mushrooms, low sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Bring broth to a boil in a saucepan. Add barley. Simmer, covered, 12 minutes. Spray a skillet with nonstick spray and set over medium-high heat. Add 2 cups sliced mushrooms and cook until tender. Add the barley and soy sauce. ; name: onion and herring sandwich smorrebrod ; ingredients: butter, pumpernickel bread, herring fillets, sweet onion, tomatoes, watercress ; preparation:Spread 1 teaspoon butter on each slice of bread, being sure to cover each completely. Cut each buttered slice in half crosswise or into 2 pieces. Top each piece of bread with one-eighth of the herring, placing the fish smooth-side up. Top each with several onion rings and 1 tomato wedge. Garnish with watercress or parsley. ; name: light pie crust ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, reduced-calorie margarine, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Combine flour and sugar in a large bowl or food processor. Add margarine and process, or mix together with your fingers, until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add cold water, one tablespoon at a time, and process, or mix, until a manageable dough forms. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 12-inch circle. Press dough into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie pan or removable-bottom tart pan. Prick the bottom all over with a fork, cover dough with foil and fill with dried beans or rice. Bake 10 minutes. Remove beans and foil and bake until crust is golden brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove from oven and cool completely on a wire rack. Yields 8 slices per crust. ; name: antipasto napoli ; ingredients: chopped tomatoes, sliced mushrooms, pepperoni, zucchini, salad greens, parmesan cheese, italian dressing ; preparation:Combine tomatoes, mushrooms, pepperoni and zucchini. Add dressing and marinate for at least 2 hours. Drain, reserving marinade. Toss marinated items with greens. Serve with reserved marinade and parmesan cheese. ; name: gnocchi with cheese prosciutto and basil ; ingredients: gnocchi, garlic, fresh basil, fontina cheese, parmesan cheese, prosciutto, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: beef n gravy on potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, water, ground beef, garlic powder, onion powder, brown gravy mix, milk, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes and water in a microwave-safe dish. Cover and microwave on high for 8-10 minutes or until tender. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in garlic powder and onion powder. Prepare gravy according to package directions. Place the potatoes in a mixing bowl. Add milk, butter, salt and pepper. Beat on medium speed until smooth. Serve beef and gravy over mashed potatoes. ; name: cozze mussels ; ingredients: mussels, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, white wine, fish stock, anisette, olive oil ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat add olive oil and onions. Cook until tender. Stir in garlic and cook stirring until golden. Stir in mussels, wine and broth and let simmer for 2-5 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and anisette and let simmer for 5 minutes or so. Pour into bowls to serve. ; name: jg house vinaigrette ; ingredients: chicken bouillon cube, sugar, black pepper, garlic powder, cider vinegar, olive oil ; preparation:Place the bouillon cube in a bowl with 2 tbsp water. Microwave on high for 30 seconds to dissolve cube. Place sugar in a bowl and add pepper, garlic powder, and vinegar. Stir and let set 5 minutes. Whisk in the dissolved bouillon and gradually add oil in a slow steady stream while whisking vigorously. Whisk again before serving. ; name: chris broccoli cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen broccoli florets, mayonnaise, cream cheese, cheddar cheese soup, egg, cheez-it white cheddar crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Pre-cook broccoli for 5 minutes in boiling salted water. Drain well. Using electric mixer, cream together egg, cream cheese, and mayonnaise. When creamed together, add cheddar cheese soup and mix well. Place broccoli in casserole dish. Pour cheese mixture over top. Sprinkle crushed cheez-its over the top. Bake for 25 - 30 minutes, until heated through and topping is golden brown. ; name: spinach leek cream soup ; ingredients: leek, garlic cloves, olive oil, celery salt, chicken stock, potatoes, fresh spinach, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan, soften leek and garlic in oil. Add celery salt and pepper. Add chicken stock and potatoes. Bring to boil. Cover and let simmer about 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Add spinach and keep cooking 1 minute. In blender, reduce in a creamy puree and homogeneous. Adjust seasoning. You can serve with firm plain yogurt on top. Or if you have people over, you can use whipped cream instead of yogurt. ; name: apples and cinnamon pork chop bake ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, cinnamon, margarine, apples, brown sugar ; preparation:

name: fudge crackles ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, unsweetened chocolate squares, butter, vanilla, sugar, eggs, pecans ; preparation:Combine flour, baking powder and salt. Set aside. Melt 1 cup of semi-sweet chips, unsweetened chocolate and butter in microwave. Let cool slightly. Beat sugar and eggs until thick and creamy. Mix in melted chocolate and vanilla. Stir in flour until just mixed. Fold in remaining semi-sweet chips and pecans. Chill 30 mins. Drop by rounded tablespoon fulls on to ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 for 8 mins or until tops are cracked and shiny. Cool 3-5 mins and remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: spirited mincemeat pie ; ingredients: frozen pie crusts, raisins, brandy, mincemeat, apple, walnuts, brown sugar, lemon rind, lemon juice, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Combine raisins with brandy in large bowl and let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes. Combine raisin mixture with remaining ingredients and spoon into pie crust. Top with remaining pie crust and make several small slits on top of crust. Brush top with egg mixture. Bake for 35 to 45 minutes. ; name: wicklewood s posh pork n beans ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic clove, tomato puree, chopped tomatoes, vegetable stock, seasoning, lardons, white beans ; preparation:In a skillet, heat the oil and gently fry the onion and garlic for 5 mins until soft. Add the tom puree and cook for further 5 mins, stirring often. Add the chopped tomatoes and vegetable stock and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and cook out for 35-40 mins stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, in a saucepan fry the bacon lardons until crispy. Add the beans and sauce and stir together. Cover and gently simmer for 5-10 mins until thick and syrupy. ; name: cabrito goat and red gravy ; ingredients: goat meat, onion, cumin, red chili powder, flour, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown cabrito in a large pot, use a little oil if it sticks. Add salt and pepper and enough water to cover and cook until about half done. Add chili powder, onion and comino seed to the mixture. When completely done and tender, mix flour in a bit of water to make a paste. Stir into pot with cabrito mixture to make a gravy. ; name: old spaghetti factory creamy pesto dressing recipe ; ingredients: oil, mayonnaise, buttermilk, romano cheese, dried basil, salt, garlic, hot pepper sauce, paprika ; preparation:Whisk together oil and mayonnaise. Add buttermilk, cheese, basil, salt, garlic, and hot pepper sauce to taste. Mix thoroughly. Cover and let flavors meld overnight in refrigerator. This also will make an excellent chicken marinade. ; name: quick green rice ww ; ingredients: canola oil, fresh snow peas, garlic clove, cooked brown rice, fresh cilantro ; preparation:

name: vietnamese peanut sauce dipping sauce for fresh spring rolls ; ingredients: roasted peanuts, peanut oil, garlic cloves, chili paste, chicken broth, tomato paste, sugar, peanut butter, hoisin sauce ; preparation:Heat the oil and add the garlic, chili paste, and tomato paste. Fry until garlic is golden brown. Add the broth, sugar, peanut butter, and hoisin sauce, and whisk to dissolve the peanut butter. Bring to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Garnish with the ground peanuts. ; name: crunchy chicken bites ; ingredients: chicken breasts, corn flakes, paprika, salt, pepper, egg, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Line a 15x10 inch pan with foil, spray with nonstick cooking spray. Cube the chicken into nugget size pieces or a little bigger. On a plate, mix the cornflakes, paprika, salt and pepper. On another plate, beat the egg until thoroughly mixed. Dip the chicken pieces into the egg, then the cornflake mixture. Place the chicken onto the pan and drizzle with the butter. Bake twenty minutes or until brown on top, turning once. Please check to make sure they are done, as different breasts are of different thicknesses. ; name: buttermilk cheese bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, egg, sharp cheddar cheese, whole wheat flour, bread flour, dry buttermilk, salt, yeast, lemon pepper ; preparation:Place ingredients in bread machine pan in recommended order and set on dough cycle. Check consistency of dough and add additional water or flour, if necessary. At end of cycle, remove, shape, and let rise until approximately doubled. Bake in preheated 350 deg. Oven. For app. 30 to 40 minute. ; name: roasted rabbit with garlic and olives ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, fresh ground black pepper, rabbits, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, green olives, thyme leaves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a shallow bowl, stir flour, salt, and pepper together. Dredge rabbit pieces in flour mixture, completely coating meat on all sides. In a large cast-iron skillet, heat 3 tb olive oil over medium heat. Put rabbit in the skillet and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, until nicely browned. In a small bowl, toss the garlic with 1 tb olive oil to coat completely. Transfer rabbit to a baking dish and sprinkle with garlic, olives, and thyme. Bake, uncovered, for about an hour, or until the garlic cloves are golden brown and the rabbit is browned on the outside and opaque throughout. Drizzle the remaining 1 tb olive oil in an abstract pattern on a serving platter and arrange rabbit on top. Scoop the garlic cloves and olives from the baking dish and sprinkle over the rabbit. Serve immediately. ; name: badam burfi almond squares ; ingredients: almonds, sugar, whole milk, ghee ; preparation:Grease a shallow 6x6 inch pan with ghee. In a frying pan over a low flame, mix almonds, sugar and milk and keep stirring. After 5 minutes, add ghee. Continue stirring till the mixture thickens to the consistency of bread batter, and starts leaving the sides of the pan. Continue stirring for another couple of minutes. Remove from flame and pour it into the prepared greased pan. Smoothen surface of the mixture if necessary. 20 minutes later, after it partially cools down, cut into 1 inch squares using a knife or pastry cutter. Cool completely, and store squares in an airtight tin. ; name: mom s chocolate gravy ; ingredients: granulated sugar, butter, milk, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder ; preparation:

name: simplest ever cream tuna on toast ; ingredients: toast, tuna, milk, salt, pepper, cornstarch, cold water ; preparation:Heat oven to 200 degrees. Combine cornstarch with water in glass and stir. Make toast and butter. Place in oven to keep warm. Drain tuna and place in large skillet, with fork break apart. Pour milk over tuna, and add salt and pepper. Heat on medium high then add cornstarch mixture slowly, stirring constantly until thickened. Serve over toast. ; name: gluten free fairy cakes ; ingredients: margarine, caster sugar, eggs, vanilla essence, gluten-free flour, milk, baking powder ; preparation:Make sure you have 12 paper cases handy. Preheat oven to 200 degrees. Cream together margarine and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla, followed by the sifted baking powder, sifted flour and milk. Half fill paper cases standing on baking tray. Bake for 10-12 minutes. When cold, decorate the top with jam or icing or just icing sugar, if desired. ; name: baked chicken lemon and pea risotto ; ingredients: olive oil, chicken breast fillets, leeks, lemon zest, arborio rice, chicken stock, frozen peas, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, mint ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c 400f. Heat a fry pan over high heat add oil and chicken and cook for 3 mins each side or until well browned, set aside. Add leeks and zest to the pan and cook for 5 mins until leeks are golden. Place leek mix, rice and stock in a baking dish, cover tightly with lid or foil and bake for 20 mins. Add chicken and peas to the risotto and cover tightly and bake for further 20 mins. The risotto will be quite liquid at this stage. Stir the parmesan, lemon juice, mint and salt and pepper through the risotto. Stir for 2 mins to thicken then serve. ; name: cherry tomato pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, cherry tomatoes, sugar, salt and pepper, fresh basil leaf, thin spaghetti, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place oil in a skillet over low heat. Add the garlic and cook, stirring, until golden, about 6-7 minutes. Add the tomatoes, sugar, salt, and pepper. Raise heat to medium and cook, gently smashing some of the tomatoes with the back of the spoon, until the sauce is thickened, about 8 minutes. Stir in the basil. Add the pasta, combine well and serve immediately, topped with grated cheese. ; name: orzo risotto ; ingredients: butter, garlic, orzo pasta, lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, water, milk, frozen peas, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a 3-quart saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat and cook garlic until almost golden. Add the orzo and stir until coated with butter. Stir in onion soup mix that has been blended with water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered 8 minutes. Stir in milk and peas and simmer, stirring frequently, until heated through, about 1 minute. Stir in the cheese. Serve immediately. Makes about 4 cups. ; name: summertime soy granita ; ingredients: sugar, water, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, vanilla-flavored soymilk, slivered almonds, mint sprig ; preparation:

name: japenese style crispy pork ; ingredients: boneless pork chop, chinese rice wine, ginger, eggs, panko breadcrumbs, cornstarch, tonkatsu sauce ; preparation:Season the pork with salt. Mix the rice wine and 1 tsp ginger and spread on the pork. Set aside. Beat the eggs with cup water in a shallow bowl. Put the panko and cornstarch in 2 separate shallow bowls. Dredge each piece of pork in cornstarch, dip in egg, then coat with panko. Heat inch of oil in large skillet over high heat. Fry the pork in batches until golden, 3-4 minutes per side. Drain on paper towel lined plate. Mix the tonkatsu sauce and the remaining tsp ginger in a bowl. Serve with pork. ; name: rimrock rumaki appetizers ; ingredients: lean bacon, water chestnuts, chicken liver, soy sauce, garlic cloves, dried chili, fresh ginger, chinese mustard ; preparation:Cut bacon slices in half and lay out individually. In the center of each slice place a chestnut. On each chestnut, place a piece of liver. Fold up each end of bacon strip over chicken liver and chestnut, secure with toothpick. Combine remaining ingredients in large dinner plate or deep pie dish. Marinate for several hours in the fridge, turning frequently. Place bundles on broiler pan and broil 5-7 minutes, turning once. Serve with mustard. ; name: cherry crisp ; ingredients: cherry pie filling, white cake mix, pecans, margarine ; preparation:Spread pie filling in 9x13 cake pan. Sprinkle dry cake mix on top. Spread with fork to even it out. Sprinkle nuts on top of cake mix. Pour melted margarine over all. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: ukrainian dried fruit compote uzvar ; ingredients: dried prunes, raisins, dried apples, dried pear halves, honey, cinnamon stick, cloves, apple cider, lemon ; preparation:Combine fruit in a large pot and fill with enough cider to cover it by a third or more. Add cloves and lemon peel. Simmer until the larger pieces are cooked but not falling apart. Pour off liquid and cook until reduced by a third. To reduced liquid add honey, cinnamon, lemon juice, and fruit. Reheat, stirring. Taste, and add more lemon juice if needed. Serve warm in crystal or clear glass bowls. Keeps in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks. ; name: hot cheese and bacon dip ; ingredients: bacon, cream cheese, mild cheddar cheese, half-and-half, worcestershire sauce, dried onion flakes, dry mustard, salt, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Brown and drain bacon, and set aside. Mix remaining ingredients in a slow cooker. Cover, cook on low for 1 hour, stirring occasionally until cheese melts. Stir in bacon. Serve with fruit slices, or french bread slices. ; name: iron chef cornbread ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, baking powder, salt, baking soda, eggs, creamed corn, canola oil, plain fat-free yogurt ; preparation:

name: cajun blackened skillet chicken ; ingredients: dried oregano, paprika, ground ginger, black pepper, cayenne, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt ; preparation:Combine the oregano, spices, and oil in a bowl, then rub over the chicken breasts to coat. Heat a large nonstick saut pan over high heat for 2 minutes. Add the chicken, smooth side down. Pan fry for 2-3 minutes, until just beginning to blacken. Turn the chicken over, reduce heat, and cook for 3-6 minutes, until juices run clear. Sprinkle with a little salt and thyme just before serving. ; name: vegetarian mexican stuffed peppers ; ingredients: bell peppers, mexican rice, yellow onion, green bell pepper, tomato sauce, black beans, shredded cheddar cheese, hot water ; preparation:Heat oven to 400. Parboil halved bell peppers for 5 minutes. Saut onions and green peppers in skillet until heated thoroughly. Add cooked rice, drained black beans, and tomato sauce and cook for an additional 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in cup of cheese. Spoon mixture into pepper halves and then place in 9 x 13 glass baking dish. Pour hot water in the bottom of the dish and cover with aluminum foil. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake uncovered for an additional 10 minutes. ; name: herb and cheese oven fries ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, dried italian seasoning, salt and pepper, parmigiano-reggiano cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 500 deg. Place sliced potato wedges on a cookie sheet. Drizzle with oil to coat and season with herb seasoning. Roast potatoes and turn after after 15-20 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese liberally on potatoes and roast another 10 minutes. ; name: crock pot french onion soup ; ingredients: vidalia onions, unsalted butter, beef stock, dry white wine, medium-dry sherry, reduced-sodium worcestershire sauce, garlic, french bread, romano cheese ; preparation:Using a large frying pan, slowly saut the onions in butter until limp and glazed. Transfer to crock-pot. Add beef stock, white wine, sherry, worcestershire and garlic. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours. Place french bread on a baking sheet. Sprinkle generously with cheese. Place under preheated broiler until lightly toasted. To serve, ladle soup into bowl. Float a slice of toasted french bread on top of each bowl. ; name: cranberry feta pinwheels ; ingredients: dried sweetened cranberries, cream cheese spread, feta cheese, green onion, flour tortillas ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except tortillas, mix well. Divide and spread mixture evenly among tortillas. Roll up tightly, wrap in plastic and refrigerate at least one hour. To serve cut into 12 slices. A nice variation is to add thin slices of ham on top of the spread before rolling. ; name: banana bread ii ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, applesauce, granulated sugar, egg whites, bananas, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: bob s peppermint pie ; ingredients: plain gelatin, cold water, whipping cream, peppermint candies, chocolate cookie pie crust ; preparation:Soften gelatin in water. Set aside. Put half cup whipping cream in small saucepan with candy and cook over low heat until candy melts. Add gelatin. Mix well. Let cool and fold in whipped cream. Pour into crust. Chill. ; name: saucy salisbury steak ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, salt, pepper, condensed golden mushroom soup, water, worcestershire sauce, carrot, frozen green beans ; preparation:Mix beef, onion, salt and pepper well. Shape into oval patties. Brown patties, pour off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cove and cook on low for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: family time vegetable soup ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, potatoes, celery, frozen mixed vegetables, water, beef bouillon cubes, beef broth, diced tomatoes, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:In large saucepan, cook ground beef and onion on med high heat until done. Drain. Add all remaining ingredients. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Stir occasionally. ; name: lazy mini okonomiyaki ; ingredients: cabbage, flour, dashi, sake, light soy sauce, eggs, green onions, ham, oil, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a non-stick skillet, saute the cabbage mix. Allow to cool to room temperature before adding to the batter. Mix flour, dashi, sake, soy sauce, and eggs together in a large bowl until smooth, although a few small lumps are fine. To the batter, add the cooled cabbage mixture, ham and the green onions. Mix well. Using the same non-stick skillet that you used to cook the cabbage, heat over medium, a small amount of oil or spray with cooking spray. Drop the batter by tablespoonfuls into the pan. Cook until golden on each side. Serve hot, room temperature, or cold with kewpie mayonnaise and bull-dog tonkatsu sauce. ; name: swiss chard with lemon and feta ; ingredients: swiss chard, butter, lemon juice, feta cheese, ground black pepper ; preparation:Rinse chard and place in a large stock pot with water still clinging to leaves. Cover and cook on medium heat until tender, about 10 minutes. Drain well and return to pot. Reduce heat to low. Add remaining ingredients. Toss to combine. ; name: chocolate chews ; ingredients: baking chocolate, butter, eggs, sugar, vanilla, cake flour, nuts ; preparation:

name: lamb and sweet potato slow cooker casserole aust ww 4 pnts ; ingredients: olive oil, lean lamb, onions, garlic cloves, coriander powder, whole cardamom pods, sweet potato, hot water ; preparation:Place lamb, onions, garlic, coriander, cardamom, sweet potato and stock in a 5-litre capacity slow cooker. Season well with salt and pepper. Cover and cook on a low setting for 7 hours. Make sure to split cardamom pods down centre with a large sharp knife. This will help cardamom flavour to infuse in casserole. Unfortunately some of the black seeds may come out during the cooking process, so be careful not to eat them. They arent at all harmful to your health, just a little full-on in flavour. Serve with steamed green beans or broccoli. ; name: pear cranberry crumble crisp ; ingredients: pears, fresh cranberries, cornstarch, brown sugar, vanilla, whole wheat pastry flour, oats, salt, butter ; preparation:In a bowl, toss pears with cornstarch. Add in cranberries, vanilla and brown sugar and stir gently to coat pears. Pour into an 8x8 pan. Mix dry ingredients for topping. Stir in melted butter and vanilla. Crumble over fruit mixture. Cover with foil and bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes. Uncover and bake for 15-20 minutes more or until topping is lightly golden and pears are tender. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream or whipped cream, if desired. ; name: chicken fettuccine with spinach ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, frozen spinach, cooked fettuccine, butter, onion, basil, minced garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Melt butter in skillet over medium heat. Add onion, basil, garlic and pepper flakes. Cook until onion is tender about 7 minutes. Add chicken and saute, stirring often. Mix in uncooked spinach. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Heat until spinach is heated through. Place fettucini in bowl and toss with some of pan dripping. Add chicken and toss with parmesan cheese. ; name: cajun chicken with ginger lime mayonnaise ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cajun seasoning, mayonnaise, fresh ginger, lime, juice of, tabasco sauce, salt and pepper ; preparation:Slice chicken breasts in half. Place between plastic wrap and flatten slightly, making sure they are all of equal thickness. Mix the mayonnaise, ginger, lime juice, tabasco and salt & pepper together and rub half of it over the chicken breasts. Dust lightly with the cajun spice mix. Place on a heated barbecue grill and sear for at 4-5 minutes. Turn and sear the other side for at least 5 minutes. Chicken should be well heated through and cooked in middle when cut. Serve with a dollop of the ginger & lime mayonnaise on the side. ; name: crunchy snack in a cone ; ingredients: non-fat vanilla yogurt, vanilla instant pudding mix, raisins, apple, granola cereal, ice cream cones ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl, combine yogurt and pudding mix. Stir well. Stir in raisins, apple and granola cereal. Scoop cup into each ice cream cone. Serve immediately. ; name: simplified choucroute garni for crock pot pork chops sauerk ; ingredients: dried italian seasoning, salt, pepper, potatoes, boneless pork chops, tart apples, sauerkraut, kielbasa, sweet white wine, frozen peas ; preparation:

name: barbecued fish steaks ; ingredients: salmon fillets, onion, garlic, butter, lemon juice, soy sauce, salt, orange juice, ground pepper ; preparation:Saut onion and garlic in butter or margarine until tender. Add ingredients through ground peppercorn and simmer for about 7 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cool. Pour liquid into a zip-lock type storage bag. Add salmon. Marinate in refrigerator 45 minutes, turning after about 20 minute intervals. Remove fish from marinade. Place on well-greased, hinged wire grill. Cook 2 inches from coals for 3 minutes, basting frequently with sauce. Turn and cook for about 5 minutes longer, or until fish is done. ; name: grilled summer squash ; ingredients: summer squash, onion, fresh ground pepper, garlic powder, salt, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat grill. Arrange veggies on a piece of aluminum foil large enought to form a packet. Sprinkle pepper, garlic powder, & salt over veggies. Slice butter into desired pieces and place on top of veggies. Drizzle with olive oil. Seal packet leaving enough room for veggies to steam. Place on grill for approximately 20 minutes or until veggies are soft and flip packet as necessary for even cooking. ; name: grilled pear and blue cheese sandwich ; ingredients: blue cheese, havarti cheese, sourdough bread, unsalted butter, pears, salad greens ; preparation:Toss cheeses together in a small bowl. Set aside. Place bread slices on a work surface. Spread 1 teaspoon of the butter on each of 4 bread slices. Set aside. Arrange pear slices evenly on the unbuttered slices. Top with the cheese. Top with the greens, then the buttered slice of bread. Heat remaining 2 tablespoons of the butter in a skillet over medium heat, or prepare a panini pan. Add sandwiches to pan. Heat, turning once, pressing with a spatula to flatten, until cheese melts and bread browns, about 3 minutes per side. ; name: magic potato puffs ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, olive oil, cracker crumb, salt, pepper, egg yolks ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Put potatoes in large pot and add enough water to cover them. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat to medium and cook for 12-15 minutes or until fork tender. Drain off water, mash and allow to cool. Coat a baking sheet with pam. In a small saucepan, saut onion in the olive oil over medium heat until tender. Add the onion, cracker crumbs, salt and pepper to the potatoes and remash. With your hands, roll into balls and place onto baking sheet. Brush with the egg yolks. Bake 40-45 minutes or until crispy brown. Makes 24-72 small puffs. ; name: easy mix and match stir fry ; ingredients: italian dressing, soy sauce, garlic, boneless chicken breasts, olive oil, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, green onion ; preparation:In a small bowl combine italian dressing, soy sauce and minced garlic to make the sauce. In a plastic baggie add the meat of choice and 1 to 2 tbs. Of the sauce. Toss to coat and let stand 5 minutes. Heat oil in a large wok or skillet on medium -high heat. Add the meat mixture and stir fry 10 to 15 minutes or until no longer pink inside. Add the red and yellow bell pepper strips and green onions. Stir fry 4 minutes. Add remaining sauce to mixture and simmer 2 to 3 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: sweet cream cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, mini chocolate chip, vanilla, pecans, graham cracker sticks ; preparation:

name: speedy triple decker club ; ingredients: miracle whip, whole wheat bread, rotisserie-cooked chicken, bacon, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Spread 1 tablespoons of the dressing evenly onto 2 of the toast slices. Top with chicken. Cover each with second toast slice. Cover with bacon, tomatoes and lettuce. Top with remaining toast slices spread with remaining 1 tablespoons dressing. Cut each sandwich into four triangles. Secure each with wooden toothpick. ; name: super saucy pork chops and rice ; ingredients: pork chops, crushed tomatoes, brown sugar, vinegar, garlic powder, sweet onion, molasses, chili powder, cooked rice ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except pork chops and rice in a slow cooker. Stir until well blended. Add pork chops. Cook for 6 hours. Serve over rice, or add cooked rice to mixture during the last half hour of cooking. ; name: mexican mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, diced tomatoes, onion, hot chili sauce, green onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute tomatoes, onion, chile sauce, green onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir in potatoes and cook until heated through. Spoon potato mixture into a 2 quart casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Serve when the cheese has melted. ; name: persian chicken and rice ; ingredients: butter, chicken, onion, dried apricot, raisins, chicken broth, salt, pepper, ground cinnamon, long-grain rice ; preparation:In a soup pot, melt the butter and cook the chicken for about 15 minutes, until brown on both sides. Remove the chicken to a platter. Add the onion, apricots, and raisins and saute over medium heat for 2-3 minutes. Add the chicken broth, salt, pepper, and cinnamon and bring to a boil. Add the rice and mix well. Return the chicken to the pot. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook for about 25 minutes or until all the liquid is absorbed and the chicken is cooked through. ; name: cranberry walnut crescent rolls ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, sugar, dried sweetened cranberries, walnuts, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Unroll dough. Separate into 12 triangles. Sprinkle with sugar, craisins and walnuts. Press craisins and walnuts lightly into dough. Roll up loosely towards pointed end. Place rolls point-side down, onto ungreased cookie sheet. Curve into crescent shape. Bake at 375 for 11-13 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve warm. ; name: apple spiced sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple pie filling, golden raisin, butter, apple pie spice, pecans, sugar ; preparation:

name: zaney s sesame chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, red hot sauce, sesame oil, sugar, flour, salt, pepper, sesame seeds ; preparation:Marinate chicken breasts in sesame oil, redhot sauce and sugar. Let sit, covered, in the fridge 30 minutes. Add salt and pepper to flour in a shallow dish. Dredge chicken in flour. Spray baking dish with pam. Put the chicken in the baking dish and sprinkle with the sesame seeds if using. Bake at 350 for 30-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear. ; name: cherry cream cheese dessert ; ingredients: cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling, slivered almonds ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, and vanilla. Lightly swirl pie filling into cream cheese mixture. Spoon into serving dishes. Cover and chill. Garnish with almonds. Prep time includes refrigeration time. ; name: extreme cream liqueur ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, irish whiskey, chocolate syrup, vanilla extract, instant coffee crystals, whipping cream, cream of coconut ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in blender. Blend until coffee crystals dissolve, about one minute. Add whipping cream & cream of coconut to mixture and blend 10 seconds. Transfer to pitcher, cover & refrigerate until cold, about 2 hours. Serve over ice, add to coffee or serve over chocolate or coffee ice cream. Can be made up to 2 weeks ahead. Keep refrigerated. ; name: chocolate chip mini muffins ; ingredients: sugar, shortening, egg, milk, vanilla, flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, miniature semisweet chocolate chips ; preparation:In a large bowl, cream sugar and shortening until fluffy. Add egg, milk and vanilla. Mix well. Combine dry ingredients. Gradually add to creamed mixture. Mix well. Fold in chocolate chips. Spoon about 1 tablespoon batter into each greased mini muffin cup. Bake at 375 for 10-13 minutes or until muffins test done by inserting a toothpick in center of muffin. Cool in pan about 10 minutes before removing. ; name: tomato and macaroni dinner ; ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, ground beef, diced tomatoes, cooked macaroni, paprika, dried oregano, chili powder, garlic powder ; preparation:Cook macaroni according to package directions. Cook onion in vegetable oil. Add in ground beef and cook until meat is browned. Stir in tomatoes, macaroni, and spices. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer, stirring often for 10min. Uncover and boil if not thick enough. ; name: chilean cilantro salsa pebre ; ingredients: garlic clove, salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil, sherry wine vinegar, green onions, jalapenos, fresh cilantro leaves, water ; preparation:

name: chris awesomely easy ice cream dessert ; ingredients: vanilla ice cream, vanilla instant pudding mix, milk, crackers, margarine, sugar, whipped topping ; preparation:In large bowl, using electric mixer, combine softened ice cream, milk, and sprinkle in the dry instant pudding mix. Place mixture in refridgerator while preparing crust. Crush crackers into a 9x13 pan, add sugar, and pour melted margarine over all. Mix well and spread into crust at the bottom of the pan. Spread ice cream mixture over the crust and top with the whipped topping. Refridgerate at least 2 hours before serving. ; name: egg bhujia ; ingredients: oil, eggs, onion, green chili peppers, salt, skim milk ; preparation:Beat egg well. Add salt and milk. Heat oil. Add chopped onion and green chili. Fry to light golden brown. Add beaten egg. Cook for about a minute. Stir and mix egg mixture thoroughly and fry to light brown. Serve hot with paratha or rice and lentil. ; name: bacon mushroom chicken ; ingredients: butter, chicken breast halves, seasoning salt, garlic clove, bacon, mushroom, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm. Pour juices from baking dish into a small saucepan and whisk together with cream over low heat until thickened. Pour sauce over chicken and serve warm. ; name: dorito chicken ; ingredients: cooked chicken, sour cream, chili powder, salt, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, plain doritos ; preparation:Crush doritos, enough to just cover the bottom of a 2 quart casserole. Mix all other ingredients, except cheese, and place on top of doritos. Crush another layer of doritos on top. Sprinkle cheese over all. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes. ; name: raisin sauce ; ingredients: mustard powder, flour, butter, water, brown sugar, cider vinegar, raisins ; preparation:Whisk mustard and flour together. Melt butter. Whisk in dry ingredients. Cook 1-2 min, until the raw taste is cooked out of the flour. Add water, sugar and vinegar. Simmer 45 minutes. Add raisins and simmer 10 minutes more. ; name: indonesian corn patties ; ingredients: corn kernels, fish sauce, fresh cracked pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, shallots, egg, cornflour, oil ; preparation:

name: garlic soup soupe a l ail ; ingredients: water, garlic clove, potato, carrot, whipping cream ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in medium saucepan. Bring to boil. Cover, reduce heat to low and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 25 minutes. Puree in batches in blender. Season with salt and pepper. Rewarm over medium heat. Drizzle with cream, if desired. ; name: maple pumpkin pots de creme ; ingredients: heavy cream, whole milk, maple syrup, canned solid-pack pumpkin, egg yolks, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Whisk together cream, milk, syrup, and pumpkin in a heavy saucepan and bring just to a simmer over moderate heat. Whisk together yolks, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt in a bowl. Add hot pumpkin mixture to yolks in a slow stream, whisking constantly. Pour custard through a fine-mesh sieve into a large measuring cup, then divide among custard cups. Bake custards in a hot water bath pan covered tightly with foil, in middle of oven until a knife inserted in center of a custard comes out clean, 35 to 40 minutes. Transfer custards to a rack to cool completely. Chill, covered, until cold, at least 2 hours. ; name: ethiopian sauteed lamb or beef ; ingredients: lean lamb, garlic clove, olive oil, sweet onion, hot peppers, red bell pepper, salt, butter, mixed spice ; preparation:Cut meat into thin 2 inch long strips and mix with garlic. Heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute onion and hot peppers until onion is light golden. Add red pepper ans salt. Saute until red pepper is tender. Transfer onion mixture to bowl. In same pan, melt butter over high heat and saute meat mixture until seared all over. Stir in berbere spice mix to taste. Saute for 30 seconds. Serve with injera bread and tomato & cucumber salad. Keep extra berbere spice mix on table to sprinkle over meat as desired. ; name: chicken wings with honey soy and sesame ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken wings, soy sauce, water, honey, sesame seeds ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375f heat the vegetable oil in a small ovenproof frying pan. Fry the chicken wings for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden. Remove the pan from the heat and add the soy sauce, water and honey. Transfer to the oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, turning the chicken wings once. Arrange the chicken wings on a warmed platter, scatter over the sesame seeds and serve. ; name: artichoke black olive baked chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, marinated artichoke hearts, sliced ripe olives, chicken broth, fresh tarragon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Place chicken breasts in a 9x13 casserole dish and spread olives and artichoke hearts all over and around the chicken breasts. Pour the chicken broth over all. Sprinkle with tarragon. Bake for 1 hour. ; name: easy for sheezy goulash ; ingredients: ground turkey, olive oil, garlic, spaghetti sauce, sweet corn, onion, italian seasoning, elbow macaroni ; preparation:

name: classic two crust apple pie ; ingredients: tart apples, lemon juice, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. ; name: primavera fish fillets ; ingredients: celery ribs, carrot, onion, garlic clove, white wine, dried thyme, dill, old bay seasoning, cream of mushroom soup, cod ; preparation:In a large skillet, combine the first eight ingredients. Bring to a boil and then reduce heat and cover and simmer for 5-7 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Stir in soup until blended. Bring to a boil and then add fillets. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 5-7 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: japanese pickled daikon and carrot salad ; ingredients: carrot, daikon radish, salt, rice vinegar, japanese soy sauce, fresh ginger, sugar ; preparation:Peel and finely shred carrot and daikon. Put vegetables into large bowl. Sprinkle with salt and let stand for 30 minutes. Gently squeeze out as much water as possible from vegetables. In a bowl, combine vinegar, soy sauce, ginger and sugar, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add vegetables and refrigerate for 8 hours. Salad will keep for up to 1 week in sealed container in refrigerator. ; name: surprisingly superb weeknight taco salad ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, sour cream, salsa, salt, pepper, garlic, tortilla chips ; preparation:Brown ground turkey or beef and garlic in skillet over medium heat. Drain any grease away. Meanwhile shred the head of lettuce into small pieces and dice tomatoes to desired size. When meat and garlic mixture is done, add salt and pepper, stir. Break tortilla chips up into desired size and place in individual serving bowls. Add desired amount of meat to bowls, followed by desired amounts of lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream and salsa. Serve and enjoy. ; name: citrus french toast ; ingredients: self-rising flour, sugar, salt, cinnamon, lemons, zest of, milk, vanilla extract, egg, butter, bread ; preparation:In a bowl mix together the flour, sugar, salt, cinnamon and zest. Add the milk and mix until you have a smooth and lump free batter. Add the egg and vanilla, mix, now add the melted butter and mix again. Heat a non-stick frying. Dip and coat the bread in the batter, fry until light golden. ; name: cranberry tea hot punch ; ingredients: tea bags, boiling water, unsweetened cranberry juice, apple cider, brown sugar, cinnamon stick, ginger, cloves, cinnamon sticks, orange slices ; preparation:

name: the infamous lemon chicken recipe ; ingredients: unsifted flour, salt, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, realemon juice, sugar, sliced mushrooms, cooked rice ; preparation:In zip-lock bag combine pepper, salt, and flour. Add chicken and shake a few pieces at a time. In large skillet brown chicken in butter. Add lemon juice, sugar, and mushrooms, decrease heat. Cover and simmer 15 min, or until chicken is cooked. Serve over rice. ; name: best baked chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried parsley, salt, pepper, lemon juice, garlic powder, butter ; preparation:Preheat your oven to 350. In a large bowl mix the breadcrumbs, parmesan, parsley, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Dip the chicken breasts in the melted butter. Dip the chicken in the breaded mix. Brush lemon juice onto the tops of the chicken. Place chicken on a baking sheet and bake at 350 for one hour. ; name: portuguese custard cupcakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, eggs, butter, milk, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 300f grease cupcake tins with butter. Beat the eggs until lemon coloured. Add the sugar and butter and continue to beat until thick, then add the lemon rind. Pour warm milk into egg mixture while continuing to beat. Once blended, fold in the flour until well mixed. Fill the tins half way up and bake for approximately 1 hour, or until a tester inserted comes out clean. Cool in pans on a rack. Cupcakes will sink during the cooling process. ; name: sweet tangy chicken ; ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, condensed tomato soup, water, brown sugar, vinegar, cooked rice ; preparation:Heat butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add soup, water, sugar and vinegar. Heat to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat 5 minute or until done. Serve over rice. ; name: easy cheesy veggies ; ingredients: onion, summer squash, tomatoes, zucchini, red sweet bell pepper, oregano, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Combine vegetables in a baking dish. Sprinkle with oregano. Pour on tomato sauce. Bake uncovered in preheated 350 degree oven for 20 minutes. Top with mozzarella cheese and bake an additional 4 to 5 minutes, until cheese melts. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes with pineapple and pecans ; ingredients: vegetable oil, sweet potatoes, fresh pineapple, salt, pecans, pure maple syrup, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: the black eyed peas baked squash ; ingredients: yellow squash, eggs, whole wheat rolls, butter, sugar, salt, pepper, onion ; preparation:Cut squash and onion in pieces, boil together, then reduce heat until tender. Drain & mash squash some. Combine squash, onion, eggs, bread bits, butter, sugar, salt. Put into a 3 quart dish that has been oiled. Bake at 350 until lightly browned. Sometimes i toss in some velveeta - when the kids were small they liked it with the cheese. ; name: chutney rice ; ingredients: long grain rice, chicken broth, chutney, golden raisin, curry powder, slivered almonds ; preparation:Pour chicken broth into a saucepan and bring to a boil. Slowly add rice to broth. Reduce heat and simmer, covered 20 minutes. Remove from heat and add the chutney, raisins and curry powder and stir until well mixed. Let stand approximately 5 minutes for flavors to blend. Sprinkle with the toasted almonds before serving. ; name: baked custard cups ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, nutmeg, vanilla, milk ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients, stir until blended. Slowly add scalded milk, stirring constantly. Pour into 4 custard cups. Set cups in 9x9 inch baking pan. Pour 1 inch hot water into pan. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes, or until knife comes out clean. Remove from pan, cool. Chill. ; name: ww crispy barbecued sweet potatoes ; ingredients: ketchup, worcestershire sauce, red wine vinegar, yellow mustard, fresh ground pepper, sweet potato ; preparation:Spray the grill rack with nonstick spray. Prepare the grill for medium-hot fire. Combine the ketchup, worcestershire sauce, vinegar, mustard, and pepper in small bowl. Mix well. Brush the potato slices on both sides with the ketchup mixture. Grill the potatoes 5 inches from heat, turning frequently and brushing with the remaining ketchup mixture, until browned on the outside and tender when pierced with a barbecue fork, about 8 minutes. ; name: simple and standard pizza dough ; ingredients: active dry yeast, warm water, bread flour, water, salt, olive oil, honey ; preparation:Stir the yeast into the warm water to dissolve. Add the flour. Stir the remaining ingredients into the flour mixture. Knead with dough hook or by hand until smooth and elastic. Place dough in a lightly greased bowl and cover. Allow to rise in a warm place for 30 minutes. Punch down the dough and divide into portions. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough into very thin rounds and top as desired. Bake at 400f until crisp and golden brown, approx 8-12 minutes. Rolled dough may be stored in the freezer. I have kept rolled dough in the freezer for several months with the only effect being a less puffy baked crust. ; name: mark bittman s chicken and rice soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, long grain white rice, carrot, celery, chicken, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: big batch ranch dressing mix ; ingredients: dried parsley flakes, dill weed, onion powder, salt, garlic powder, ground pepper, dried onion flakes ; preparation:Mix together all ingredients. Store in a 1 cup canning jar or other airtight container. When ready to make dressing, combine 1 cup of mayonnaise, 1 cup buttermilk, and 1 tablespoon dry dressing mix. Whisk well. Store in refrigerator. ; name: cajun chicken with ginger lime mayonnaise ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cajun seasoning, mayonnaise, fresh ginger, lime, juice of, tabasco sauce, salt and pepper ; preparation:Slice chicken breasts in half. Place between plastic wrap and flatten slightly, making sure they are all of equal thickness. Mix the mayonnaise, ginger, lime juice, tabasco and salt & pepper together and rub half of it over the chicken breasts. Dust lightly with the cajun spice mix. Place on a heated barbecue grill and sear for at 4-5 minutes. Turn and sear the other side for at least 5 minutes. Chicken should be well heated through and cooked in middle when cut. Serve with a dollop of the ginger & lime mayonnaise on the side. ; name: garlic piperade soup ; ingredients: garlic cloves, onions, sweet pepper, olive oil, tomatoes, beef stock, bread, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Blanch the garlic in boiling water for thirty seconds. Run under cold water and drain. Peel and slice the cloves of garlic. Cook the onions and peppers in the oil for ten minutes until the onions are golden and the peppers are soft. Add the garlic and tomatoes. Cover the pan and cook over low heat for thirty minutes. Pour in the broth and bring to a boil. Tear the bread into large pieces and add to the boiling soup where it will disintegrate and thicken the broth. Adjust the amount of bread and broth to the desired thickness of the soup and salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot with grated cheese if you wish. ; name: honey mustard pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, honey, dijon mustard, olive oil, garlic, dried oregano leaves ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Line baking sheet with foil. Place pork in pan. In small bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Brush over pork tenderloin. Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until pork has slight blush of pink in center and meat thermometer inserted reads 160. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut diagonally into slices. ; name: warm tortellini salad ; ingredients: cheese tortellini, roasted red peppers, broccoli florets, vinaigrette, havarti cheese ; preparation:Cook tortellini in a large pot of boiling water according to package directions. Add the broccoli for the last 5 minutes of cooking. Combine cheese, peppers and dressing in a large bowl. Drain pasta and broccoli. Add to the other ingredients in the bowl and toss. ; name: ginger honey glazed barbecued pork chops ; ingredients: honey, low sodium soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic cloves, gingerroot, pork loin chops ; preparation:

name: nachos agrios sour cream nachos ; ingredients: refried beans, tortilla chips, swiss cheese, provolone cheese, jalapeno, sour cream, pimiento ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees f. Heat refried beans in a pan over medium heat until hot. Spread chips out evenly on large oval oven-proof dish. Spread beans on top of chips, sprinkle cheeses over beans, and scatter jalapenos over cheese. Bake until cheese is completely melted, about 5 minutes. Garnish with dollops of sour cream then scatter pimentos over nachos. Serve immediately. ; name: spaghettini verdi ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, italian parsley, spaghettini, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a saucepan. Saute crushed garlic until golden. Discard garlic. Stir in the parsley and simmer 4 minutes. Cook the pasta according to package directions. Drain well. Place in a large bowl. Add pepper, parmesan cheese, and salt, and toss well. Add the parsley sauce and toss again. Serve immediately. ; name: autumn pumpkin spice fudge ; ingredients: sugar, milk, light corn syrup, pumpkin, salt, pumpkin pie spice, vanilla extract, butter, nuts ; preparation:In 3 quart saucepan, combine sugar, milk, syrup, pumpkin, & salt. Bring to a boil over high heat, stirring constantly. Reduce the heat to medium, continue boiling, do not stir. When mixture heats to 232 deg. On candy thermometer remove from heat. Stir in pumpkin pie spice, vanilla, butter& the nuts. Let cool to lukewarm. Beat until very thick& until it loses some of its gloss. Quickly, pour mixture into greased 8-inch square pan. When fudge is firm, cut into pieces. ; name: kritharaki me rize greek orzo and rice pilaf ; ingredients: orzo, butter, rice, vegetable stock, cheese ; preparation:Saute orzo in butter in a medium saucepan, until lightly brown. Add rice, stir to coat with the butter. Add stock. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to simmer, cover and cook for 25 minutes. Serve on a platter with grated kefalotiri cheese if desired. ; name: filipino shrimps sauteed ; ingredients: shrimp, onions, garlic cloves, soy sauce, mountain dew soda, sugar, cornstarch, water, tomatoes, oil ; preparation:Put oil in skillet. Add crushed cloves garlic and finely diced onion. Peel and devein shrimp leaving tails on. Add to pan fry. Add tomato diced fine. Add sugar. Add mountain dew or sprite. Cook 5 minutes. Add cornstarch and water. Cook until thick. ; name: lime jello and pineapple salad ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, sour cream, pineapple ring, carrot, celery, pecans, boiling water ; preparation:

name: hoppin jalapenos ; ingredients: jalapeno peppers, neufchatel cheese, low-fat cheddar cheese, green onion ; preparation:Carefully cut each jalapeo lengthwise. Under running water, rinse out the seeds and remove the stems and veins. In a small mixing bowl, mix cheeses and onions. Use a small spoon to stuff each jalapeo half with the cheese mixture. Bake the peppers in a 350 degree oven for about 15 minutes, or until the cheese melts. ; name: green bean and parmesan soup ; ingredients: butter, green beans, garlic clove, vegetable stock, parmesan cheese, light cream, salt, black pepper, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium saucepan and add the green beans and garlic cooking for 2-3 minutes over medium heat, stirring frequently. Stir in the stock and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer, uncovered, for 10-15 minutes until beans are tender. Pour soup into a food processor and process until smooth. Return to pan and reheat slowly. Stir in parmesan cheese and cream and sprinkle with parsley. ; name: oma s chocolate pudding ; ingredients: milk, eggs, sugar, cocoa, custard powder ; preparation:Scald the milk. In a bowl, beat the eggs. Add the sugar, the cocoa and the custard powder. When milk is scalded, add one cup of it to the egg mixture slowly. Then add the egg mixture back into the scalded milk slowly. Cook until boiling. Stir constantly. ; name: easy italian chicken soup ; ingredients: chicken breasts, olive oil, chicken broth, water, penne pasta, great northern beans, diced tomatoes with garlic and olive oil, corn, italian seasoning ; preparation:Heat broth and water to boiling. Add pasta as soon as boiling begins. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in skillet and add chicken breasts, cook until browned. Add can of tomatoes to chicken and simmer for 5 minutes. Lower pasta and broth temp to medium. Add canned ingredients, italian seasoning and chicken to broth. Simmer on medium for about 15-20 minutes or until pasta is the way you like it. ; name: steak with a chive whiskey cream sauce ; ingredients: butter, steak fillets, chives, flour, beef stock, whiskey, lemon juice, dijon mustard, cream ; preparation:Melt butter in pan over a medium flame and seal meat on both sides. Continue cooking for a further 2 minutes transfer steaks to bbq & cook to desired degree. Add chives to pan and cook over a low heat for 1 minute. Sprinkle in flour and stir to combine. Add remaining ingredients and simmer gently until just thickened. Serve steaks with whiskey sauce. ; name: green chile scones ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, green chili pepper, garlic, whipping cream, cayenne ; preparation:

name: italian chicken with sauce ; ingredients: chicken pieces, condensed tomato soup, tomato paste, onion salt, garlic salt, oregano, mushroom pieces, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Remove skin from chicken& place in an 12 by 8 inch microwave safe dish with the meatiest portions towards the outside of the dish. In a mixing bowl, stir together soup, tomato paste, spices, & mushrooms. Spoon over chicken. Microwave on high for 20 to 22 minutes, rotating dish if necessary, halfway through. Sprinkle cheese over chicken& microwave on medium for 2 to 4 minutes, or till cheese melts. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: lubys patties ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, bacon, american cheese, beef broth ; preparation:Cook bacon either fry or microwave when cooked crumble into pieces. Make 4 hamburger patties season and cook untill thoroughly done. Place hamburgers in a baking dish top with cheese, bacon, and onions. Pour cup of beef broth over patties. Bake at 350 for 10 min or untill cheese is melted and juice is warm. Serve with mashed potatoes, rice, or noodles. ; name: peasant turnip slaw with sweet hot mustard dressing ; ingredients: cabbage, turnips, carrot, celery, sugar, white vinegar, canola oil, sweet-hot mustard, celery seed, salt and pepper ; preparation:Peel turnips and carrot. Shred or julienne cut all the vegetables. Toss veggies with sugar. Mix dressing ingredients, whipping with a fork or a whisk until the mustard is dissolved. Toss dressing with veggies. Chill at least one hour to blend flavors. ; name: vanilla pound cake ; ingredients: sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Combine sugar and melted butter in large bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy. Add eggs,, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add vanilla. Beat until well mixed. Stir together flour and baking powder in small bowl. Gradually add flour mixture alternately with milk to butter mixture, beating at low speed until well mixed. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan. ; name: basic aioli ; ingredients: garlic cloves, egg yolks, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix the garlic in a food procesor. Add the egg and process until well mixed. With the motor running, slowly pour in half of the olive oil. Stop the machines and add the lemon juice. Then, with the motor running, slowly pour in the rest of the olive oil and process until the mixture is thickened and the oil is emulsified. Add salt and pepper to taste.
