Heat a nonstick sillet over moderate heat until hot and cook sandwiches in batches, pressing lighly with a spatula, until undersides are golden, about 1 minute. Turn sandwiches over and cook, pressing lightly until undersides are golden and cheese is melted about 1 minute. ; name: lemon cheese spritz cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, egg, lemon rind, lemon juice, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Cream butter, cheese, and sugar until fluffy. Blend in remaining ingredients. Cover and chill. Press out cookies on un-greased baking sheet. Sprinkle with colored sugars. Bake at 375 f 7-8 minutes. ; name: homemade potato soup ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, flour, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Start by boiling potatoes until fork tender. When potatoes are done, strain out the water and add butter. When butter is melted, add flour. Stir gently to make a paste between butter and flour. The paste will coat the potatoes. Add milk. Gently stir. Allow the pot to boil. When it reaches boil, turn down to simmer. Simmer on low till soup thickens. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: hot chicken salad most requested ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, miracle whip, cheddar cheese, water chestnuts, onion flakes, celery, lemon juice, salt & pepper, potato chips ; preparation:Cut chicken breasts into 2-inch squares. Boil chicken chunks 5 minutes. Drain. Mix all ingredients. Spread into greased 13x9-inch pan. Top with crushed chips. Bake at 350f for 25 - 30 minutes until cheese melts & chips brown. ; name: easy lemon sponge cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, self-raising flour, lemon juice, lemon, rind of ; preparation:

name: taco stuffed bell peppers cups ; ingredients: green peppers, lean ground beef, onions, kidney beans, tomato sauce, taco seasoning, cheddar cheese, tomatoes ; preparation:Cut peppers in half lenghtwise and remove seeds. Cook in boiling water for 5 minutes. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium high heat until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Add beans, tomato sauce and taco seasoning, bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes. Place pepper halves in an ungreased 8 inch square pan. Fill with meat mixture. Bake, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until peppers are tender. Top with sour cream, tomato, and cheese. ; name: bleu cheese burgers ; ingredients: lean ground beef, blue cheese, egg, seasoned bread crumbs, black pepper, hamburger buns, tomatoes ; preparation:Mix all meat ingredients into a bowl until combined. Form 4 patties. Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Heat oil and butter in a large non-stick skillet over med-high heat. Add burgers and sear to brown. Place burgers onto cookie sheet and bake for 20 minutes until cooked throughout. Serve with bleu cheese sauce on warmed buns. ; name: arugula salad with shaved manchego ; ingredients: honey, white balsamic vinegar, olive oil, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper, slivered almonds, arugula, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, manchego cheese ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk honey and vinegar until combined. Whisk in oil. Season with salt and pepper. Add arugula, sun-dried tomatoes and almonds to the dressing. Lightly toss. Using a vegetable peeler, thinly shave the manchego. Add half to the bowl, and toss to combine. Divide among four serving or salad plates. Top with remaining manchego. Serve immediately. ; name: yummy round steak with rich gravy ; ingredients: round steaks, onion soup mix, water, condensed cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Cut steak into 5 or 6 serving pieces. Place in a slow cooker. Add dry onion soup mix, water and condensed mushroom soup. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours or on high about 4-5 hours. If making the pork chops, brown in oil and then put some of the sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 pan, then layer pork chops and add more sauce. Then bake for an hour and a half at 350. ; name: praline peach sundaes ; ingredients: brown sugar, heavy whipping cream, butter, ground cinnamon, fresh peaches, pecans, vanilla extract, ice cream ; preparation:In large saucepan, whisk the brown sugar, cream, butter and cinnamon until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook and stir for 6-7 minutes or until thickened. Remove from heat and stir in the peaches, pecans and vanilla. Cool for 10 minutes. Add ice cream of choice to sundae dishes and top with peach sauce. Garnish with additional peaches and whipped cream if desired. ; name: super suppers beef and noodles ; ingredients: thin egg noodles, ground beef, onion, green pepper, garlic, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: chicken with mustard cream ; ingredients: chicken breast, olive oil, salt and pepper, onion, mushrooms, red bell pepper, garlic cloves, dijon mustard, sour cream, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Saute chicken in oil until well browned on all sides. Add 1 teaspoon of alino--rz does not recognize this spice combination. Add salt and pepper to your taste. Also add the onions, mushrooms and bell pepper, saute 5 minutes. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Add garlic, mustard and sour cream. Heat through but do not boil. Serve over rice or noodles, sprinkled with cheese. ; name: pork n tater skillet ; ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless pork, onion, green pepper, seasoning salt, ground black pepper, water, milk, potatoes ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add oil, pork, onion, and green pepper. Sprinkle with seasoned salt and pepper. Cook until onions and peppers are slightly tender and pork is lightly browned. Add water and milk to skillet, then add potatoes and seasoning packet. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cover. Simmer for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender, stirring ocasionally. ; name: ranch mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, ranch dressing mix, sour cream, milk, margarine, bacon ; preparation:In 3-quart saucepan, cover potatoes with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes or until potatoes are very tender. Drain. Return potatoes to saucepan. Mash. Stir in remaining ingredients. ; name: abehjerne monkey brains ; ingredients: onions, ground beef, bacon, cocktail franks, low-fat whipping cream, diced tomatoes, salt and pepper, cooked rice ; preparation:Fry bacon in pan until crispy. Remove from pan and set aside, leaving bacon fat in the pan. Add onion to pan and saut until slightly transparent. Add ground beef and cocktail sausages. Brown meat and sausage for 3 minutes, breaking meat up into smaller pieces. Stir in cream and tomatoes. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes. Break up the bacon into bite size pieces or smaller. Add to mixture. Serve over cooked rice or hot pasta. ; name: tortilla beef ; ingredients: garlic, round steaks, salt, pepper, limes, onion, carrot, marjoram, beef broth, tomatoes ; preparation:Spread minced garlic on round steak and sprinkle with salt, pepper and lime juice. Place in the slow cooker and add remaining ingredients. Set cooker on low and cook for 8 hours. Meat should be fork tender and shred easily. Fill tortillas with favorite fillings and meat. ; name: noodles herbs ; ingredients: egg noodles, thyme leaves, basil leaves, parsley, chives, butter ; preparation:

name: easy chicken luau ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, coconut milk, frozen spinach ; preparation:Saute the chicken in the oil until just cooked through. Add the cream of chicken soup and the coconut milk. Heat until simmering. Add the spinach. Serve over steamed white rice. ; name: velvet strawberries ; ingredients: strawberries, heavy whipping cream, sweet chocolate, powdered sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Hull berries and slice in half. Arrange in bowl. Whip heavy cream and powdered sugar until barely thick. Fold in grated sweet chocolate and vanilla. Serve as sauce over berries. ; name: creamy coleslaw with bell peppers red onion ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, carrots, bell peppers, red onion, celery seeds, mayonnaise, rice wine vinegar, salt and black pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, toss together all vegetables and celery seed. In a small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, vinegar, salt and pepper. Toss together the vegetables and dressing until thoroughly combined. Taste and correct seasoning. Refrigerate 30 minutes to let flavors blend. Serve. ; name: tuna corn and broccoli chowder ; ingredients: tuna in water, creamed corn, onion, broccoli, olive oil, flour, milk, salt and pepper, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in pan over medium heat. Add flour and whisk until well blended. Add milk, stir until incorporated, and bring to boil over moderate heat. Add onion and broccoli, simmer on low heat for 10 minutes. Add tuna, corn, salt, and pepper. Simmer until thickens and broccoli is tender - approximately 10 minutes. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper before serving. Serve with baguette or garlic bread, if desired. ; name: fatback gravy ; ingredients: salt pork, flour, milk, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Fry the salt pork. Drain on paper towels. Reserve for eating with breakfast. Pour all but 3 tablespoons of the grease out of skillet. Add flour to make a roux. When browned to a caramel color, add the can milk and water and stir well over low heat until thick. ; name: cinnamon crackers ; ingredients: flax seed meal, almond flour, splenda granular, cinnamon, water ; preparation:

name: broiled salmon with chili glaze ; ingredients: garlic cloves, onion, ancho chilies, light brown sugar, cider vinegar, salmon fillets, cilantro ; preparation:Blacken the whole garlic and onion slices on all sides in a large, dry non-stick frying pan. Remove, cool briefly, then peel the garlic cloves. Soak the ancho chili in boiling water for 15 mins, drain then place in a blender with the sugar, vinegar, garlic, onion and some salt and pepper. Whizz to a smooth sauce. Heat the broiler. Brush each salmon fillet liberally with the sauce and save any remaining. Broil for 8 minutes. Sprinkle with chopped cilantro and serve with the remaining sauce. ; name: patent leather icing glossy chocolate ; ingredients: chocolate, egg, evaporated milk, water, sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Melt the chocolate in the top of a double boiler. Combine the egg, milk, water and sugar and stir into the chocolate. Cook the icing over hot water for 20 minutes, stirring often. Remove it from the steam. Beat it with a rotary beater for 1 minute or until well blended. Stir in the vanilla. Cool the icing before spreading it. Tightly covered and stored in the refrigerator it will keep for several days. ; name: mexican casserole weight watchers ; ingredients: extra lean ground beef, onion, diced tomatoes, frozen corn, black beans, chile, fat free sour cream, low-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown hamburger and onions in large skillet, until thoroughly cooked. Add tomatoes, corn, back beans and crushed chilies, mix well. Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Mix in sour cream, simmer another 10 minutes. Top with cheese when serving. ; name: spicy buffalo glazed meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, soft breadcrumbs, egg, onions, garlic, salt and pepper, hot pepper sauce, butter, honey, blue cheese dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine ground beef, bread crumbs, egg, onion, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl, mixing lightly but thoroughly. Shape mixture into 32 1-inch meatballs. Place on rack in broiler pan and bake 18 to 20 minuntes. Do not overbake for they will become dry. Meanwhile, combine hot pepper sauce, butter and honey in a small saucepan. Simmer, low, for about 5 minutes until sauce has thickened and has reduced by about half. Place meatballs into a bowl and pour sauce mixture over, stirring to coat well. Serve meatballs with blue cheese dressing. ; name: slow cooker german style pork roast ; ingredients: white potatoes, garlic, salt and pepper, boneless pork loin roast, sauerkraut, caraway seeds ; preparation:Place the potatoes, garlic, salt and pepper in a slow cooker. Stir to coat. Season the pork roast with salt and pepper. Lay atop the potatoes. Pour the sauerkraut over the roast, sprinkle with caraway seeds. Cook in slow cooker on low 8-10 hours. ; name: sweet bbq chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thigh, honey, garlic cloves, ginger, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: hot olive cheese puffs ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, paprika, pimento stuffed olives ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. To make dough, blend the cheese with the butter. Stir in the flour, salt, and paprika. Mix well. Wrap 1 teaspoon of dough around each olive overlapping completely. Bake until light brown, 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: lickety split beef stroganoff ; ingredients: chuck eye steak, yellow onion, canola oil, mushroom, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Trim steak of excess fat. Slice into thin strips. Slice onion into thin rings. Brown steak strips and onion in oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Add mushrooms and mushroom soup. Stir, lower heat to medium and cover. Simmer for ten minutes. Add sour cream, stir. Serve over rice, small egg noodles or toast. ; name: george washington pie dessert ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, walnuts, cool whip, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Mix the melted butter with the graham crackers and press into a 8x8 dish. Bake for 8 minutes in a 350 degree oven. Cool. Cream the cream cheese and powdered sugar and spread over the cooled crust, sprinkle with chopped nuts and spread the cool whip over this and chill for about an hour. Spread the cherry pie filling over the cool whip. Keep refrigerated. Will keep several days in the refrigerator. ; name: the easiest apple dumplings ; ingredients: granny smith apples, crescent roll, butter, sugar, apple juice concentrate, apple pie spice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Put butter, sugar, apple pie spice, and apple juice concentrate into glass pyrex baking dish. Microwave until all is melted. Mix well. Unroll each roll and place a slice of apple in each roll, starting with the largest end. Place rolls in the baking dish. Spoon juice over top of dumplings. Bake 20-25 minutes, until apples are tender. Spoon sauce over dumplings occasionally as they bake. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream or cool whip. ; name: rhubarb cream dessert ; ingredients: rhubarb, water, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, sugar, frozen strawberries, vanilla ice cream, whipped cream ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, combine rhubarb and water. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer over medium heat until rhubarb is tender, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in gelatin and sugar until dissolved. Add frozen strawberries and ice cream. Alow to thaw, stirring occasionally. Pour into indivitual servind dishes. Refrigerate several hours or until firm. Serve with a garnish of whipped cream on top. ; name: chic broc chee rice ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, onion, butter, instant rice, cream of chicken soup, milk, garlic salt, pepper, provolone cheese ; preparation:

name: deviled eggs done bobby s way ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, miracle whip, prepared yellow mustard, sweet pickle relish, salt & pepper, paprika ; preparation:Peel shells off cooled hard-boiled eggs and slice into halves lengthwise. Remove yolks from whites and set aside in a small round bowl and mash with a fork into fine pieces. Add 2 tablespoons miracle whip, 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard, 2 tablespoons sweet pickle relish, salt and pepper to taste. Stir mixture until creamy. Spoon mixture into a zip-locked sandwich bag, snip off one corner of bag. Squeeze mixture out of corner of bag into each white egg half. Sprinkle tops of filled deviled eggs with paprika. Chill in refrigerator 1-2 hours or until cold before serving. ; name: big john s cajun fried oysters ; ingredients: oyster, butter, eggs, milk, habanero sauce, cornmeal, cajun seasoning, cayenne pepper, baking powder, hot pepper oil ; preparation:Drain oysters, reserving the liquid. Mix oyster liquid, eggs, hot sauce and milk. Mix cornmeal, cajun seasoning, cayenne and baking powder. Saute oysters in butter until edges curl. Remove from heat and let cool. Dip oysters first in liquid, then dredge in cornmeal mixture. Fry oysters in hot pepper oil for three minutes over medium heat, turning once, they are done when golden brown. Remove, drain on paper towels. Serve immediately. ; name: guacamole grilled chicken club ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and black pepper, ciabatta rolls, mayonnaise, lettuce leaves, bacon, guacamole, mexican cheese, adobo seasoning ; preparation:Preheat grill. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Grill over medium for 5 to 8 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Spread chipotle mayonnaise on bottom half of each roll and top with lettuce, chicken breast, bacon, guacamole and crumbled cheese. Close each sandwich with top half of roll and serve. ; name: kickn quesadillas ; ingredients: cheese, vegetables, hot sauce, chicken, garlic, jalapeno, tortillas ; preparation:Take your tortillas and drop in all of your ingredients on top of it. Cheese will normally go first. If you would like to add your hot sauce, drop a tsp. Of it on top of every thing. Put into a hot pan and let cook until cheese starts to melt. Next add your second tortilla on top and flip. Let cook for about 3-8 minutes until serving. ; name: champinones al ajillo garlic fried mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh mushrooms, dry white wine, fresh parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Warm the oil in a large saute pan over medium heat. Add the garlic and saute about 2 minutes. Do not let it burn. Increase the heat to high, and add the mushrooms. Saute until tender for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. The time may need to be adjusted according to the type of mushroom used. Add the wine and continue to cook until the liquid is absorbed. Add the parsley, salt and pepper, and stir to combine. Serve while hot. ; name: red skin potato and dill salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, mayonnaise, fresh dill, celery, onion, garlic, cracked black pepper, salt ; preparation:

name: amazing overnight french toast ; ingredients: corn syrup, brown sugar, butter, raisin bread, eggs, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Over medium heat, bring corn syrup, brown sugar and butter to a boil. Boil 5 minutes and pour into a greased 13 x 9 baking pan. Cut or tear all of the bread and place in the pan, set aside. Beat eggs, milk and vanilla and pour over bread. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Uncover and bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: aunt norma s chocolate nut toffee ; ingredients: pecans, margarine, brown sugar, chocolate chips ; preparation:Spread nuts on bottom of a well-buttered 8x8 pan. Combine margarine and brown sugar in a heavy saucepan and bring to a full boil. Boil for 7 minutes, stirring constantly. Pour mixture over nuts, being sure to cover them all. Scatter chocolate chips over toffee. Cover until chips have softened, then spread evenly. Refrigerate until chocolate has set, turn out on a board and break into bite-sized pieces. ; name: peach crumble ; ingredients: sliced peaches in juice, sugar, flour, oats, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Drain peaches, reserve juice. Put peaches in 8 x 8 baking pan, sprinkle with 1 tsp sugar. In a bowl, combine flour, oats, 1 tbsp sugar and cinnamon. Cut in butter, top peaches with crumble, sprinkle with 1 tsp sugar. For a softer, sweeter crumble, drizzle over some of reserved peach juice before baking. Bake 30-40 minutes, or to desired crispness, serve warm. ; name: oatmeal honey cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, honey, egg, water, flour, salt, rolled oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg and water. Sift together the dry ingredients then stir in the oats. Add the dry ingredients to the wet and mix. Add any additional ingredients drop by heaping teaspoonsful onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12 to 15 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: cranberry apple sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple pie filling, cranberry sauce, apricot preserves, orange marmalade ; preparation:Cut fresh potatoes into bite size pieces. In a large saucepan cook potatoes, covered in enough boiling water to cover, about 15 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside. Spread pie filling in an 8x8 inch baking dish. Arrange cooked fresh or canned sweet potatoes on top. In a small mixing bowl, stir together cranberry sauce, apricot preserves, and orange marmalade. Spoon over sweet potatoes. Bake uncovered in a 350f oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until heated through. ; name: hot white bean salad ; ingredients: butter, shallots, garlic clove, white beans, fresh parsley, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, olive oil, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: s more smoothies ; ingredients: marshmallow creme, chocolate syrup, milk, ice, graham cracker squares, mini marshmallows, mini chocolate chip ; preparation:Add the marshmallow creme to the container of an electric blender. Add in the chocolate syrup and milk. Add the ice on top and crumble the graham crackers over the ice. Cover and blend on high until smooth and all the marshmallow creme has been incorporated. Pour mixture into 2 chilled glasses. Garnish with the mini marshmallows and chocolate chips. ; name: tangy fruit chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, vegetable oil, cranberry sauce, prepared mustard, vinegar ; preparation:In skillet, brown chops in hot oil, for 5 minuts on each side. Add remaining ingredients. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Put chops on serving platter. Spoon sauve over. ; name: cabbage pie ; ingredients: pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie, cream cheese, butter, cabbage, onion, sliced mushrooms, lean ground beef, salt and pepper ; preparation:Bake pie shell at 375 degrees. Cool. Spread cream cheese on inside of crust. Saute the vegetables in the butter. Brown the ground beef and add to vegetables. Pour into prepared pie shell. Top with the other crust and cut a few vents in the crust. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 25-30 minutes. ; name: eggnog for diabetics ; ingredients: skim milk, vanilla, sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, splenda sugar substitute, nutmeg ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine vanilla and milk. In another bowl, combine the dry pudding mix, sweetener, and nutmeg. Whisk the dry mix into the milk mixture until smooth. Refrigerate until serving. Carbs. ; name: baked apples and cranberries ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, apples, sugar, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, pecans, butter ; preparation:Grease a 2-qt baking dish. Spread cranberries and apples in the dish. Sprinkle with 1 cup sugar. In a small bowl mix the oats, brown sugar, and pecans until well combined. Add the butter, stirring until mixed. Sprinkle the oat mixture over the fruit in the baking dish. Bake at 325 degrees for 45 minutes. ; name: shiitake mushroom soup ; ingredients: shiitake mushrooms, fresh ginger, olive oil, chicken stock, water, soba noodles, spinach, soy sauce, lime juice ; preparation:

name: grapefruit sparkler ; ingredients: sugar, star anise pods, grapefruit juice, campari, sparkling wine ; preparation:In a small saucepan, combine 1 celsius water with the sugar and star anise. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally, until sugar has dissolved. Remove pan from heat. Let cool completely. Pour mixture through a fine sieve into a measuring cup. Discard star anise. Cover syrup with plastic wrap, and chill. In a large pitcher, combine grapefruit juice, campari, and chilled syrup. Divide among eight glasses. Top with sparkling wine or champagne. Serve immediately. ; name: halloumi bites nigella lawson ; ingredients: garlic oil, parsley, lime juice, fresh ground pepper, halloumi cheese ; preparation:Combine the oil, parsley, lime juice, and pepper in a large shallow dish. Slice the drained halloumi into -inch wide pieces, and then cut each slice in half again. Heat a dry skillet and dry-fry the slices of cheese until golden on both sides. This should take only a minute or so in a hot pan. Put the fried halloumi into the shallow dish of other ingredients as you go, and then turn the halloumi about t coat each piece before turning into a serving dish. ; name: chicken a la greque ; ingredients: chicken breast, dried oregano, ground pepper, salt, olive oil, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Combine oregano, salt and pepper in a small dish. Rub seasonings into chicken. Arrange in large baking dish. Blend together olive oil and lemon juice. Pour mixture over chicken pieces. Bake 40 minutes, or until tender. ; name: macaroni pizza ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, salt, pepper, tomato soup, macaroni, milk, egg, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Boil macaroni as per package directions. Drain and set aside. Brown together meat, onion, and seasoning. Stir in soup and heat for 15 minutes. In separate bowl combine pasta with milk and egg. Grease a jelly roll pan and pour pasta mixture in. Spread out to fill pan. Gently spread beef mixture on top to cover. Sprinkle with the cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 20 minutes. Cool 5 minutes before cutting into squares. ; name: pork sausages with ginger onions and apple ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onions, granny smith apple, fresh ginger, mustard seeds, cider, pork sausage links, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180dc. Heat oil in a heavy based pan, add onions, apples and ginger and cook until soft. Add mustard seeds and water and cook for 15 minutes. Remove mixture to warmed ovenproof dish. Deglaze pan with cider and add to onion mixture. Fry sausages in pan until browned. Drain and add to onion mixture. Bake in oven, uncovered for 25-30 mins. Serve with mashed potatoes. ; name: sausage and summer squash ; ingredients: italian salad dressing, garlic cloves, polish sausage, summer squash, italian bread, oregano leaves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: stove top and chicken ; ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:Prepare stove top with 1 cup water. In small mixing bowl mix soup and sour cream. Place chicken breast on bottom of 9x13 baking pan. Pour soup mix over top. Spoon stuffing on top. Bake covered for 30 minutes. Uncover bake an additional 5 to 10 minutes. ; name: ww garlicky baked shrimp 5 points ; ingredients: cooking spray, medium shrimp, dry breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, lemon rind, salt, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 4 individual gratin dishes with cooking spray. Divide shrimp among dishes. Set aside. Combine breadcrumbs and next 4 ingredients. Stir in juice and oil. Sprinkle breadcrumb mixture over shrimp. Place dishes on a baking sheet. Bake at 400 degrees for 13 minutes or until shrimp are done and breadcrumbs are lightly browned. ; name: coffee biscuits ; ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, vanilla essence, instant coffee powder, baking powder, chocolate ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add sifted dry ingredients. Roll into balls and place on a greased oven tray and flatten. Place a chocolate button in the centre of each biscuit. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes at 175c. ; name: texas oven brisket ; ingredients: beef brisket, barbecue sauce, worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, celery salt, lemon pepper, salt, onion, water ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 275f degrees. In a large pyrex baking dish, thoroughly mix all ingredients for sauce. Put the brisket in the baking dish, and turn it over once to coat it with the sauce. Sela the dish tightly with havy-duty aluminum foil. Bake at 275f degrees. For 5 to 7 hours. Remove from oven and allow to stand for 1 hour before slicing. Slice across the grain, and serve with sauce. Makes 8 to 10 servings. Be sure to use a pyrex baking dish or a very heavy metal pan. Also, before you prepare the brisket, remove it from the refrigerator far enough ahead of time to allow it to come to room temperature. ; name: celeriac and walnut gratin ; ingredients: celeriac, walnut oil, vegetable stock, walnuts, blue cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 190c. Peel, quarter and thinly slice celeriac - can be done with slicing blade of food processor. Toss celeriac with walnut oil, season to taste. Place in a gratin dish, spread out evenly. Pour over stock, bake for 45 minutes. Scatter with walnuts and crumble over blue cheese. Cook another 15 minutes till crisp and golden. ; name: parsleyed rice with peas ; ingredients: butter, onions, rice, water, bay leaf, salt & freshly ground black pepper, hot pepper sauce, frozen peas, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: clams with garlic and almonds tapas ; ingredients: littleneck clams, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, sliced almonds, dry white wine, lemons, juice and zest of, scallions, parsley ; preparation:Scrub and drain cockles and set aside. In a 12-inch to 14-inch saute pan, heat oil until smoking. Add garlic and almonds and saute until golden brown. Add clams, wine and lemon juice and zest and bring to a boil. Cover and cook until clams open, about 3 to 4 minutes. Uncover, add scallions and parsley and serve. ; name: apple butter ain t b s recipe ; ingredients: apples, dark brown sugar, molasses, apple juice, cinnamon, allspice, clove, nutmeg ; preparation:Wash your apples and quarter them, place in the stock pot. Add the remaining ingredients in the stock pot and cook at very low temperature until apples start to juice. Once there is plenty of liquid turn heat up to medium high. Cook until mixture starts to thicken. Take apples off the stove and cool to room temperature. Run apples through a food mill. Poor apples back into a suitable size pot for the apple butter. Cook down until very thick. Sometimes i use a crock pot to finish off the apple butter to the very thick stage to keep from burning it. Once apple mixture has thicken, place in large container and refrigerate or this will make about 9 8-ounce canning jars. ; name: meatloaf muffins very simple to make and kids can help ; ingredients: lean ground beef, egg, light bread, onion rings, ketchup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix salt, meat, egg, and torn up bread together. Fill each muffin cup of muffin pan almost to the top. Top with a onion ring and ketchup in the middle of the ring. Place in oven until thoroughly cooked, about 20-30 minutes. ; name: quick drop cookies ; ingredients: sugar, salt, butter, milk, peanut butter, rolled oats, vanilla extract, instant chocolate drink mix ; preparation:Combine sugar, salt, butter and milk in a medium size sauce pan. Bring to a boil and let boil for 1 minute. Stir in peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate drink mix. Drop by rounded teaspoons full onto waxed paper. Let set until cool. Store in airtight container. ; name: sauced chicken breasts with apples and onions ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, onions, granny smith apples, dried marjoram, apple cider ; preparation:Place flour and salt and pepper in a ziplock bag, add chicken, seal bag and shake to coat. Heat 1 teaspoon oil in a large nonstick frypan over medium high heat. Add chicken, saute 2 minutes on each side. Remove from pan, keep warm. Heat 1 teaspoon oil in pan. Add onion, saute for 5 minutes or until browned. Add apple and marjoram, saute for 5 more minutes. Add the chicken and cider, bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until chicken is done. ; name: weight watchers ww roasted squash risotto ; ingredients: butternut squash, fresh rosemary, red onion, risotto rice, vegetable stock, garlic cloves, light cream cheese, balsamic vinegar, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: shaker pumpkin muffins ; ingredients: brown sugar, molasses, butter, egg, pecans, pumpkin puree, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour ; preparation:Cream sugar, molasses, and butter in a mixing bowl. Add pumpkin and egg and mix well. Mix the dry ingredients into the pumpkin batter and fold in nuts. Grease muffin tins and fill half full. Bake at 375 degrees for 20 minutes. ; name: shrimp and croissant brunch casserole ; ingredients: plain croissants, monterey jack cheese, small shrimp, green onions, eggs, milk, dried thyme, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Place half the croissant cubes in the bottom of a lightly greased 11 x8 inch baking dish. Sprinkle with half the cheese, all the shrimp and green onions. Top with remaining croissant cubes. In a mixing bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, thyme, salt, and pepper together. Pour pour over mixture in baking dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Cover and refrigerate for several hours. Bring to room temperature. Bake in a 350 degree oven, uncovered, for about 40 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes. Cut into squares and serve. ; name: one pan summer eggs ; ingredients: olive oil, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, garlic clove, eggs, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan. Add the zucchinis and fry for 5 minutes, stirring every so often until they start to soften. Add the tomatoes and garlic, then cook for a few minutes more. Stir in a little seasoning, then make two gaps in the mix and crack in the eggs. Cover the pan with a lid or a sheet of foil, then cook for 2 to 3 minutes until the eggs are done to your liking. Scatter over a few basil leaves and serve with crusty bread. ; name: southwestern shells with chicken and corn ; ingredients: shell pasta, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, flour, milk, monterey jack cheese, frozen corn, thick & chunky salsa, green chilies ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook and drain pasta according to package directions. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until lightly browned. Sprinkle with flour and stir while cooking for 1 more minute. Reduce heat, slowly add the milk and cook for about 5 minutes or until milk is slightly thickened. Remove from heat, add one cup cheese, corn, salsa and green chilies. Add in hot pasta and mix well. Place in lightly greased baking dish. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and bake 20-25 minutes. ; name: croatian potato restani krumpir ; ingredients: potatoes, onions, lard, salt ; preparation:Do not peel potato, just wash the dirt and put it in cold water and cook until soft. In the meantime saut sliced onion until soft or almost brownish. Peel cooked potato and slice it. Add salt and into onion and lard and fry it just until potato starts to hold of the pot. Serve hot. ; name: chocolate turtle pie ; ingredients: eggs, sweetened condensed milk, butter, pecans, milk chocolate, graham cracker pie crusts, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:

name: white chocolate irish cream berry trifle ; ingredients: sponge cakes, cream, icing sugar, mascarpone cheese, irish cream, white chocolate, milk chocolate, frozen mixed berries, chocolate curls ; preparation:Cut each sponge cake into small squares. Whip cream and icing sugar together until soft peaks form. Place mascarpone in a large bowl and fold cream lightly through mascarpone until well combined. Line the base of 4-6 serving dishes with half the sponge. Drizzle with half the irish cream and spread the mascarpone mixture over sponge. Sprinkle with half the combined white and milk chocolate and half the mixed berries. Repeat layers, cover and chill for 3 hours or overnight. To serve sprinkle trifle with any remaining berries and chocolate curls. Accompany with cream if desired. ; name: slow baked lamb tastes like spit roasted ; ingredients: sea salt, garlic cloves, rosemary, black peppercorns, extra virgin olive oil, dried oregano, lamb shoulder, red wine vinegar, water, lemon ; preparation:Preheat a fan-forced oven to 170c. Grind salt, garlic, rosemary and peppercorns in a mortar and pestle to a rough paste. Add olive oil and oregano to the paste and mix well. Rub marinade into meat and place lamb in a ceramic baking dish. Add vinegar and water to the dish, cover with foil and bake for 2 hours. Remove foil, and increase heat to 220c and turn on oven grill. Brown meat for 3-5 minutes until crispy on top. Remove from the oven and shred meat into large chunks. Arrange on a platter and spoon over pan juices. Serve with lemon. ; name: libby s poached eggs with dill sauce ; ingredients: eggs, water, flour, sour cream, dill weed ; preparation:Poach eggs. Take eggs out and reserve 4 cups poaching water. Mix flour in sour cream until smooth. Add to reserved poaching water with dill weed. Cook until thickened, stirring constantly. Spoon over poached eggs. ; name: brown sugar oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: brown sugar, shortening, margarine, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, old fashioned oats ; preparation:In a big mixing bowl, add the brown sugar, shortening, and margarine. Beat until fluffy. Add in the vanilla and eggs. Mix until well blended. Add in the flours, and baking powder. Stir to mix. Add in the oats. Stir well to mix. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of dough 2-inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 for 10-14 minutes or until a light golden brown. Cool for 1 minute, then transfer to cooling rack. ; name: southern georgia peachy baked beans ; ingredients: great northern beans, peach, onion, bacon, bourbon, apple juice, molasses ; preparation:Cook bacon, drain and crumble. Clean and pit peach, dice. Dice onion. Add all ingredients to saucepan. Simmer until thickened. Serve. Garnish with more crumbled bacon or chopped green onions. ; name: ranch style lentils ; ingredients: dry lentils, salt, water, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, onion soup mix, ketchup, prepared mustard, vinegar, pepper ; preparation:

name: nobody will guess peach cobbler ; ingredients: fresh peaches, sugar, flour, egg, butter, white bread ; preparation:Place the fruit in a buttered 8 x 8 inch baking dish. Cut each slice of bread into five stripe. Place the strips onto the fruit. In a separate bowl, mix the sugar, flour, egg, and melted butter. Pour this mixture evenly over the bread and fruit. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: cream of morel mushroom soup ; ingredients: morel, chicken stock, heavy cream, celery, onion, black pepper, kosher salt, butter, flour, olive oil ; preparation:Cook onions and the celery in the olive oil. Stir often till soft. Add morel mushrooms and cook about 6 to 7 more minutes. Add butter and slowly stir in the flour. Now add the chicken stock, salt and pepper. Bring to a low boil, reduce to a simmer and cook 10 to 15 more minutes. Add heavy cream and continue to cook another 10 minutes. ; name: chinese new year rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cooked chicken breast, cooked rice, green onions, celery, carrot, soy sauce, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium high heat. Add chicken. Cook and stir until lightly browned. Add remaining ingredients. Cook and stir about 10 minutes. Serve. ; name: carrots and parsnips ; ingredients: carrot, parsnip, pear, fresh chervil ; preparation:In a 3-quart saucepan, steam the carrots and parsnips until tender, about 10 minutes. Reserve the steaming liquid. Transfer the carrots and parsnips to a food processor. Add the pears. Puree until smooth, adding just enough liquid to facilitate blending. Reheat gently before serving. Stir in the chervil or parsley. ; name: edamame with mustard vinaigrette ; ingredients: red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, edamame, red onion, celery, fresh parsley ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a large bowl, stirring with a whisk. Add oil, whisking until well blended. Cook edamame in boiling water for 4 minutes. Add onion and celery and cook an additional 1 minute. Drain well. Add edamame mixture to vinaigrette. Toss well to coat. Stir in parsley. Chill at least 1 hour and serve. ; name: kilasara potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, butter, onion ; preparation:

name: no fuss chocolate oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, quick oats, chocolate chips ; preparation:In a large bowl cream together butter, sugars and vanilla. Beat in egg. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in oatmeal and chocolate chips until well blended. On a baking sheet place a ball of dough 2 inches between each other. Bake at 350 degrees f. For about 8-10 minutes. ; name: no bake creamy coconut pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, milk, flaked coconut, whipped topping, almond extract, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, sugar, milk and coconut in blender. Blend at medium speed for 30 seconds. Fold into whipped topping. Add extract, spoon into crust. Freeze for about 4 hours. Sprinkle with additional coconut, toasted, if desired. Let stand at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving. Store in freezer. ; name: tko sangria punch non alcoholic ; ingredients: crystal light raspberry powdered drink mix, cranberry juice cocktail, orange juice, fresh lime juice, club soda, oranges, limes ; preparation:Empty drink mix into large pitcher. Add cranberry juice cocktail, orange juice and lime juice. Stir until drink mix is completely dissolved. Stir in club soda and fruit. Serve over ice cubes in tall glasses. ; name: candy corn ; ingredients: carrots, potato, bacon, olive oil, onion, maple syrup, corn ; preparation:Cook carrots and potatoes in boiling salted water until done. Drain. Fry bacon until golden. Add olive oil to 1 tablespoon bacon drippings and cook onion 10 minutes over medium low heat. Add maple syrup and cook 5 minutes. Stir in corn, bacon, carrots and potatoes and season to taste. Cook until warmed through. ; name: curried eggs ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, curry powder, mayonnaise, milk, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Cut hard boiled eggs in halves. Eemove yolks and place in bowl. Add mayonnaise, milk curry powder and salt and pepper, mix well. Spoon mixture back into egg halves. Press down gently with a fork. Sprinkle with chopped parsley. ; name: caribbean grilled tuna ; ingredients: tuna steaks, lime juice, olive oil, jamaican jerk spice ; preparation:

name: pickled beetroot ; ingredients: beetroots, vinegar, water, sugar, peppercorn, clove, bay leaf, mustard seeds, cinnamon stick, salt ; preparation:Wash the beetroot well, and cook in boiling salted water until tender. Strain and cool beetroot and remove skins. Slice beetroot into julienne strips and set aside. Place all pickling ingredients into a pan and bring to boil when boiling bring back mixture to a simmer for about 5 minutes and then strain mixture. Spoon beetroot into hot sterilized jars, and top with the vinegar mixture. Seal jars, and store in a cool place. ; name: peaches and cream dessert casserole ; ingredients: rolled oats, light brown sugar, peaches, eggs, vanilla extract, cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Butter an 8-inch square baking dish. Combine the rolled oats and sugar in a small bowl. Set aside. Distribute the peaches evenly in the pan. Mix the eggs, vanilla, and cream in a bowl. Pour over the peaches. Top with the rolled oat mixture. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the oats are browned and the peaches bubble up around the edges of the pan. Serve hot or at room temperature. ; name: chocolate blancmange ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, unsweetened chocolate, milk, vanilla, whipped cream ; preparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, salt and chocolate in a medium saucepan. Gradually stir in milk. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate melts and mixture is thickening. Bring to a boil for 1 minute. Remove from heat, and stir in vanilla. Pour into a 3 cup jello mold. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until cold, about 3 hours. When ready to serve, run a knife around the top, dip mold quickly in and out of hot water, then invert on a serving plate. Garnish with whipped cream if desired. ; name: crispix snack mix ; ingredients: crispix cereal, mixed nuts, small pretzels, brown sugar, light karo syrup, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Bring sugar, syrup, butter, and vanilla to a boil. Grease a cookie sheet. Spread cereal, nuts, and pretzels evenly over cookie sheets. Pour syrup mixture over the top. Bake at 250 degrees for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes. Shake mixture to break apart. ; name: bill s bloody mary ; ingredients: vodka, tomato juice, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cayenne pepper, salt, celery rib ; preparation:Combine all ingredients, except the celery, in a 32 ounce pitcher. Add ice and mix well. Pour into 6 glasses. Place a celery stalk in each glass. Serve. ; name: margaret lefever s wonderful baked beans ; ingredients: dried navy beans, brown sugar, catsup, barbecue sauce, dry mustard, bacon ; preparation:

name: aloha cheesecake ; ingredients: vanilla wafer crumbs, margarine, cream cheese, sugar, milk, eggs, macadamia nuts, pineapple, kiwi ; preparation:Combine crumbs and margarine. Press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan. Bake at 350 f, 10 minutes. Combine cream cheese, sugar and milk, mixing at medium speed on electric mixer until well blended. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in nuts. Pour over crust. Bake at 350 f, 45 minutes. Loosen cake from rim of pan. Cool before removing rim of pan. Chill. Before serving, top with fruit. ; name: oven barbque country pork not ribs ; ingredients: country pork strips, brown sugar, garlic, apple juice concentrate, dried chipotle powder, black pepper, kosher salt ; preparation:Mix everything and coat both sides of pork. Lay the coated strips on a parchment covered sheet pan with sides. This worked for me and avoided that messy cleanup. Let marinade room at temp for half an hour. Bake in a 275 oven for about 90 min, turning once. Remove the meat, pour off any grease, put a flat rack on the pan, return meat laying now on the rack. Run the oven up to 450f bake for about 10 minutes more to crisp. ; name: chicken salsa tacos ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, water, taco seasoning, salsa, sharp cheddar cheese, light sour cream, tortillas, lettuce, tomatoes ; preparation:Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the chicken until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the chicken onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using. ; name: christmas oranges ; ingredients: oranges, french vanilla ice cream, grand marnier, ground cinnamon, of fresh mint ; preparation:Cut a very thin slice from the base of each orange so that it will stand upright, not to cut into pulp. Cut off upper third of each orange and scoop out orange pulp. Remove membraines from pulp. Combine orange pulp with ice cream and grand marnier. Fill each orange shell with mixture and freeze. Before serving sprinkle with cinnamon and garnish each with a sprig of mint. Serve and enjoy. ; name: granola yogurt berry parfait ; ingredients: plain yogurt, granola cereal, berries, bananas, honey ; preparation:Line up 4 parfait, white wine or other tall glasses. Spoon 2 tablespoons of yogurt, into each glass and smooth surface. Spoon 2 tablespoons of granola overtop and smooth surface. Spoon 2 tablespoons of fruit overtop and smooth surface. Repeat the process, adding a bit of honey here and there, to taste. ; name: tangy avocado orange salad ; ingredients: oranges, red leaf lettuce, avocado, white balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: sauteed black olives with tomatoes ; ingredients: black olives, tomatoes, salt, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh thyme leave, ground pepper, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:Rinse and drain olives. You can pit them or not, whichever you prefer. Combine tomatoes and salt in a medium bowl. Set aside. Heat olive oil in a medium skillet, add garlic, and cook over medium-low heat until just starting to brown, 2 to 5 minutes. Add olives and thyme. Cook over medium heat, stirring often, 3 to 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, cook over medium heat until juices thicken a bit and flavors are combined, 5 to 8 minutes. Season to taste with pepper. Serve this colorful an. Just before serving, stir in the parsley. ; name: yogurt bran muffins from fiber one ; ingredients: all-bran cereal, egg whites, vegetable oil, nonfat yogurt, all-purpose flour, splenda granular, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Grease bottoms of 12 muffin molds, or use baking cups. Crush cereal. Stir together egg whites, oil, and yogurt. Stir in cereal and dry ingredients, just until moistened. Fold in optional additions. Spoon batter evenly into tins. Bake 18-20 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: everyone s favorite sour cream coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, sour cream, baking powder, flour, salt, vanilla, brown sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease a 9 x 13 pan. Cream together butter and sugar. Add eggs, sour cream and vanilla. Mix together flour, baking powder and salt. Add to butter mixture. Spread half the batter in the prepared pan. Sprinkle this with half the filling. Add the rest of the batter and sprinkle with the remaining filling. Bake 35 - 40 minutes. ; name: cherry almond creamy cheese pie ; ingredients: flour, butter, almonds, cream cheese, sugar, cool whip, cherry pie filling, almond liqueur ; preparation:Mix flour, butter and almonds to make crust and press into an 8 in pie pan. Bake at 350 deg for about 15 minutes or until brown. Mix sugar, 2 teaspoon almond liquor and cream cheese together thoroughly till creamy. Fold in cool whip. Put mixture into pie shell. Mix 1 teaspoon of almond liquour with cherry pie filling. Top cheese mixture with cherry pie filling. Chill 2 hours or overnight. ; name: brats n tots bake ; ingredients: bratwurst, onion, condensed cream of mushroom soup, frozen tater tots, sour cream, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Crumble bratwurst into large skillet. Add onion. Cook over medium heat until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the soup. Transfer to a greased 13 in x 9 in baking dish. Top with tater tots and sour cream. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered at 350 degrees for 35-40 minutes. ; name: crock pot chicken cordon bleu ; ingredients: chicken breasts, swiss cheese, deli ham, cream of chicken soup, milk, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:

name: light cheesy crab stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: mushroom caps, crabmeat, celery, red peppers, laughing cow cheese, nonfat sour cream, fat free cream cheese, butter-flavored sprinkles ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Wipe mushrooms clean with a damp paper towel and then dry them. Place with the rounded sides down on a baking dish sprayed lightly with nonstick spray. Combine all other ingredients and stir until well mixed. Evenly distribute crab mixture among the mushroom caps. Place in the oven for 10 - 12 minutes, until hot. ; name: chicken in thyme cream sauce ; ingredients: chicken breast fillets, plain flour, olive oil, fresh thyme, dry sherry, cream ; preparation:Toss the fillets in the flour, and shake off any excess. Heat the oil in a large frying pan, and cook the fillets for 5 minutes on each side or until they are golden brown. Sprinkle on the thyme and turn the fillets over. Add the sherry and half the cream and boil for 2-3 minutes. Turn the fillets again and pour over the remaining cream. Season to taste and serve. I like this with a jacket potato and a green vegetable. Also a nice young riesling. ; name: cake mix german chocolate cookies ; ingredients: german chocolate cake mix, butter, eggs, water, flaked coconut, nuts, cocoa ; preparation:With mixer on low speed blend, butter, eggs and water. By hand stir in cake mix. Add coconut and nuts. Chill dough for approximately 1 hour before placing on parchment lined baking sheet. Form into large balls, place on baking sheet and press down with hand. Bake 350 degrees for 12 minutes. Let cool before removing from baking sheet. ; name: ranch chicken nuggets ; ingredients: chicken tenders, ranch dressing, butter, garlic salt, pepper, potato chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Stir together dressing, butter, garlic salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Add chicken and toss well to coat with mixture. Roll each piece in crushed chips and place on a shallow baking sheet. Sprinkle with any remaining chips. Bake for 30 minutes or until crispy and lightly browned. ; name: low fat pumpkin scones ; ingredients: self-raising flour, sugar, butter, pumpkin, egg, salt, milk, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 220c. Cream butter and sugar together. In a large bowl, place flour and salt. Add the egg, pumpkin, creamed butter and sugar and milk to dry mixture and mix with a wooden spoon until just combined. Depending on the wetness of the mixture, you may need to add a little more milk. Lightly grease muffin tray with canola spray and spoon mixture into tray. Bake at 220c for 10-15 mins, or until tops of muffins spring back when lightly touched. ; name: broccoli mandarin orange salad ; ingredients: broccoli florets, sliced almonds, mandarin orange sections, orange, juice and zest of, green onions, vinegar, sugar, olive oil ; preparation:

name: brown sugar brownies ; ingredients: golden brown sugar, butter, eggs, unsweetened chocolate, all-purpose flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat over to 325 degrees. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool in pan and cut into bars. ; name: microwave american welsh rarebit ; ingredients: butter, mustard, pepper, salt, beer, velveeta american cheese spread, italian bread ; preparation:Melt the butter and mustard in a microwave safe bowl on high for 15 seconds, add salt and pepper, beer and cheese and microwave on high for at least 30 seconds. Remove the bowl and stir until the cheese has has achieved the desired consistency. Taste and add additional salt and pepper if required. Pour over plain toast or for a lunch, slices of ham and tomatoes may be added. Serve immediately, with the rest of the beer. ; name: red lobster cheese biscuits copycat ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, cheddar cheese, cold water, butter, garlic powder, salt, onion powder, dried parsley ; preparation:To cold water, add bisquick and cheese, blending in a mixing bowl. Mix until dough is firm. Using a small scoop, place the dough on a baking pan lined with baking paper. Bake in 375 degree oven for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. While biscuits bake, combine spread ingredients. Brush baked biscuits with garlic topping. ; name: dorito casserole with chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, creamy chicken verde soup, rotel tomatoes, frozen corn, monterey jack pepper cheese, milk, green onions, nacho cheese flavor doritos ; preparation:Put the cooked chicken on the bottom of a large, greased casserole dish. Put crushed doritos on top of chicken. Put the chopped green onion next and the corn. Mix the soup with the milk and tomatoes. Pour over the corn. Top with cheese. Bake at 375 degrees for 30-45 minutes. ; name: garlic dill crackers ; ingredients: dry ranch dressing mix, extra virgin olive oil, dried dill, garlic granules, lemon pepper, cayenne pepper, oyster crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 175degf. Combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl, plus cayenne pepper, if using, and stir until well combined. Add crackers, and toss well to combine. Transfer mixture to a baking sheet. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until dry, stirring occasionally. Store in an airtight container. ; name: caramel mud cake gluten free ; ingredients: unsalted butter, white chocolate, brown sugar, golden syrup, milk, gluten-free flour, baking powder, eggs, thickened cream ; preparation:

name: blinchatyi pirog pancake pie ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, milk, flour, butter, ground beef, onion, mushroom, salt and pepper ; preparation:Make the filling by sauteing the onions and mushrooms till soft and golden. Season. Mix with the cooked ground beef and leave to cool. Mix the pancake batter together with all ingredients except melted butter and fry 6-8 pancakes, each 7-8 inches in diameter. Cover and keep warm as you make them. When all the pancakes are ready, put two pancakes side by side in a deep baking pan, spread a layer of filling, then another two pancakes, then more meat. Continue in this way, finishing with two pancakes on top. Sprinkle with the melted butter and warm in the oven at 300f for 15 minute serve with a salad. ; name: solo italian sausage and pasta medley ; ingredients: cooked italian sausage, dry pasta, green bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, tomato sauce, dried basil, olive oil, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta in 2 quarts of salted water and cook until soft, which should take about 10 to 12 minutes. Chop the pepper and onions into half inch pieces and saute in olive oil. After 5 minutes, add the garlic, basil, and the tomato sauce and simmer until it starts to thicken. If the sauce become to thick, add a little of the water from the pasta. Add the precooked sausage to the vegetable and sauce mixture, and stir over low heat while waiting until the pasta is done. Add drained pasta to the pan, stir, check to see if salt is needed, and plate. Serve with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: stevia chocolate syrup ; ingredients: unsweetened cocoa, stevia, water, vanilla ; preparation:Blend the cocoa and stevia in small saucepan. Over low - medium heat, gradually stir in the water. Simmer for a minute or two until mixture is smooth. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. If mixture is too thick, gradually blend in warm water until desired consistency is reached. ; name: orange cream candy ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, water, orange juice, vanilla, white sugar, powdered sugar ; preparation:Lightly grease 9x13 pan. Large bowl mix geletin and juice. Let dissolve. In med saucepan combine water, vanilla and sugar. Stir over med heat for 5 min, or until thickened. Pour sugar mixture into bowl with juice and geletin. Whip on high speed for about 10 minutes, or untill fluffy and creamy. Pour into prepared pan. Let stand for about 1 hr or until firm. Dust with powdered sugar and cut to serve. Store in ziplock bag. ; name: reuben ring ; ingredients: deli corned beef, sauerkraut, swiss cheese, thousand island dressing, fresh parsley, garlic clove, egg, crescent rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a bowl, combine corned beef, sauerkraut, one cup of cheese, dressing, parsley and garlic. Mix well. Take the crescent rolls and separate them into the triangles. Arrange one can of the triangles so they look like a sun with the fatter side in the middle and the shinny part of the triangle pointing out. Then take the second can of rolls and separate into triangles. Place one triangle in between two triangles so that it looks like a very full sun. All skinny parts are on the outside and all fat parts are on the inside. Scoop filling evenly over the thick inner part of the sun. Then take the skinny points and fold them over tucking the ends in the thicker part of the dough. This should create a circle stuffed with the ingredients. Brush top with egg. ; name: falafel croquettes ; ingredients: canned chick-peas, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, fresh chives, salt and pepper, oil ; preparation:

name: cucumber tomato salad ; ingredients: tomatoes, cucumber, green onion, italian salad dressing, vinegar, fresh basil, salt, pepper, garlic salt ; preparation:In a serving bowl, layer half of the tomatoes, all of the cucumber, then remaining tomatoes. Sprinkle with onion. Combine remaining ingredients in a jar with a tight fitting lid and shake well. Pour over salad. Cover and chill for 25 to 30 minutes or until ready to serve. ; name: almond flour stevia cookies ; ingredients: butter, almond flour, stevia, salt, vanilla extract, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f. Soften real butter. Combine soft butter and remaining ingredients. Electric mix until smooth. Form 16 balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 20 minutes, stopping at 7 minutes to flatten with fork. ; name: danish blue cheese and port spread ; ingredients: danish blue cheese, unsalted butter, port wine, fresh ground white pepper, cayenne pepper, walnuts ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except walnuts in food processor. Process, stopping occasionally to scrape down the sides, until the mixture is smooth and well blended. Refrigerate, covered, up to 2 weeks. Remove from the refrigerator about 1 hour before serving and stir in the walnuts when softened. Serve with bread, crackers or in pastry tartlets. ; name: pineapple salsa mahi ; ingredients: mahi mahi fillets, pineapple chunk, salsa, cornstarch, horseradish, honey mustard, garlic-flavored non-stick spray, lemon pepper ; preparation:Chop pineapple into small pieces. Combine with salsa, cornstarch, horseradish and honey mustard. Coat both sides of fish with cooking spray. Sprinkle fish evenly with lemon pepper. Preheat large saute pan on medium-high. Cook fish 3 minutes. Turn. Add salsa to one side of the pan & stir often to evenly heat. Reduce heat to medium, and simmer 5-6 minutes or until flesh is opaque & separates easily with a fork. Serve fish and sauce over prepared long grain rice. ; name: spicy buffalo glazed meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, soft breadcrumbs, egg, onions, garlic, salt and pepper, hot pepper sauce, butter, honey, blue cheese dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine ground beef, bread crumbs, egg, onion, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl, mixing lightly but thoroughly. Shape mixture into 32 1-inch meatballs. Place on rack in broiler pan and bake 18 to 20 minuntes. Do not overbake for they will become dry. Meanwhile, combine hot pepper sauce, butter and honey in a small saucepan. Simmer, low, for about 5 minutes until sauce has thickened and has reduced by about half. Place meatballs into a bowl and pour sauce mixture over, stirring to coat well. Serve meatballs with blue cheese dressing. ; name: fried apples stekte epler ; ingredients: apples, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, cardamom, raisins ; preparation:

name: prosciutto wrapped asparagus bundles ; ingredients: asparagus spear, prosciutto, olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Line a baking sheet will aluminum foil and coat with cooking spray. In a dish, coat asparagus with olive oil, lemon juice salt and pepper. Cut each slice of prociutto in half lengthwise. Gather bunches of 5 asparagus spears and wrap them in the prociutto and place on the baking sheet. Bake at 375 for 15 minutes. ; name: sloppy joe di maggios ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, lean ground sirloin, beef hot dogs, onion, steak seasoning, chili powder, dark brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, tomato sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Heat the extra-virgin olive oil, a turn of the pan, in a deep skillet over medium-high heat. Add meat and crumble as it browns. Add chopped hot dogs after 3 to 4 minutes then cook 3 to 4 minutes more. Add the onions to the pan and cook to soften, 5 to 6 minutes more. In a bowl mix the spices, sugar, worcestershire and tomato sauce. Pour sauce over the meat and simmer a few minutes to combine flavors. Slop onto buns and serve. ; name: chocolate chip peanut butter oat cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, butter, peanut butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, quick oats ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour and baking soda in a bowl. Beat butter, peanut butter, sugars, and vanilla in a large mixing bowl until creamy. Beat in eggs. Beat in flour mixture. Stir in oats and chocolate chips. Drop by mounded tablespoons onto a ungreased cookie sheet about 3 inches apart then bake for 10 to 15 mins. Or until they are light brown. Let stand on cookie sheets 3 minutes then remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: reconstituted shitake mushrooms ; ingredients: dried shiitake mushroom, dashi powder, mirin, sake, sugar, soy sauce, water ; preparation:Soak the shitake mushrooms in water according to package directions to hydrate. In a small saucepan, cover the mushrooms with water. Add in the dashi, mirin, sake, sugar, and soy sauce. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 20-30 minutes. When the mushrooms are tender, remove from soup and slice to use in your recipe. You can also make a decent soup out of the leftover broth by leaving in some sliced mushrooms, and adding a bit of diced tofu, etc. As you would with a miso soup. ; name: cubano ; ingredients: mayonnaise, roll, pork, deli ham, swiss cheese, dill pickle slices, yellow mustard, canola oil ; preparation:Split cuban roll. Spread mayonnaise and mustard inside roll. Layer pork, ham, cheese, and pickles in roll. Heat in an oiled panini press. Turn sandwich once, and warm until cheese is melted and bread is golden brown. Serve warm. ; name: russ s ploughman s lunch style toasted jaffles ; ingredients: bread, butter, chutney, ham, cheddar cheese, pickled onion ; preparation:

name: pistachio pudding dessert ; ingredients: ritz crackers, butter, instant pistachio pudding mix, milk, vanilla ice cream, cool whip, chocolate candy bar ; preparation:Place the crackers into a plastic storage bag and break into crumbs with a rolling pin. Pour crumbs into a bowl and add the melted butter. Spread into the bottom of a 13x9 inch pan to make a crust. Bake at 350f for 20 minutes. Cool. Mix pudding with 2 cups of milk using the directions on the side of the package. Add in softened vanilla ice cream. Pour over the cooled cracker crust. Top with cool whip. Use a vegetable peeler to create chocolate curls as garnish across the top. Chill until ready to serve. ; name: cod portuguese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, chopped tomatoes, paprika, orange, juice of, cod fish fillets, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy fry pan and saute the onion, garlic and pepper for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, paprika and orange juice. Season, stir well and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Lay the fish fillets on top, cutting them to fit the pan if necessary. Season lightly, cover and simmer gently for 12-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked but still firm. Transfer to serving dishes and sprinkle with parsley. Serve. ; name: flounder with white wine sauce ; ingredients: flounder fillets, salt, black pepper, white wine, butter, lemon juice, capers, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Cut 4 pieces of aluminum foil twice the size of each fillet. Place each fillet on a piece of foil. Sprinkle fish evenly with salt and pepper. Top each with 1 tablespoon wine, 1 tablespoon butter, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon capers, and 1 teaspoon parsley. Wrap fish in foil grill for 6 to minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. ; name: paros island patates riganates potatoes w fresh oregano ; ingredients: baking potatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, dried oregano, salt, fresh ground black pepper, beef stock, fresh lemon juice, fresh oregano ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Place the potatoes in a single layer in a 13x9 dish and pour the oil over them. Add garlic, dried oregano, salt & pepper to taste. Toss to coat with oil. Bake potatoes for 15 minutes. Add stock, toss and bake for 10 minutes more. Add lemon juice, toss and bake for 10 to 15 minutes more, or until the potatoes are cooked through. Preheat broiler and broil potatoes for a couple minutes, until golden. Sprinkle with fresh oregano. Serve immediately. ; name: lemon dijon green beans ; ingredients: green beans, butter, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, dill weed, slivered almonds, salt and pepper ; preparation:I usually steam the green beans for 5-7 minutes to get them a bit tender. Melt butter or margarine in large frying pan. Add green beans and cook on medium hight heat until coated with butter. Add lemon juice, mustard and dill. Toss with beans until coated well and heated through. Check taste, add salt or pepper if desired. Sprinkle with toased almonds before serving. ; name: grilled white asparagus with egg topping ; ingredients: white asparagus, lean ham, eggs, butter, salt ; preparation:

name: easy taco casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, salsa, taco seasoning, salad dressing, nacho cheese flavored tortilla chips, colby-monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving. ; name: fried gefilte fish ; ingredients: salmon, whitefish, carrots, onion, eggs, matzo meal, salt, oil ; preparation:Grind the salmon, whitefish, carrots and onion in a food processor. Put in a bowl and mix in 3 eggs and 1c matzoh meal, salt& pepper. Put remaining matzoh meal on a plate. Beat 2 eggs in a bowl. Put some oil on your hands,. Form the fish mixture into patties, dip in egg, then matzoh meal to coat, set aside pour some oil into a skillet heat to medium, cook patties in batches until brown on both sides, adding more oil as needed serve on fresh greens with horseradish. ; name: butternut squash with garlic and olive oil ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, butternut squash, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender. ; name: perch fillets ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, paprika, salt, egg, milk, butter, perch fillets ; preparation:Mix flour, paprika, and salt together and set aside. In a small bowl, blend the egg and the milk. Heat butter in a large frying pan. Dip perch fillets in egg wash first and then into the flour mixture. Carefully place them into the hot butter in the frying pan and brown on both sides. Remove from the butter and drain on a paper towel to absorb excess butter. Serve immediately. ; name: weight watchers ww strawberry mousse ; ingredients: strawberries, low-fat cream cheese, sugar-free strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, egg whites ; preparation:Mix the strawberries with the cream cheese until the berries are slightly broken up and the cheese in pinky in hue. Make up the jello according to the packet and pour over the strawberry mix. Stir well and leave until just starting to set. Whisk the egg whites until stiff peaks and fold into the strawberry mix. Spoon the mix into glasses and chill for one hour. ; name: cool rise bread dough ; ingredients: dry active yeast, warm water, oil, sugar, salt, eggs, flour ; preparation:

name: nutty carrot cumin soup ; ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, carrots, celery, low-sodium vegetable bouillon granules, cumin, water, ground almonds, black pepper ; preparation:Bring onions, garlic, carrots, celery, stock and water to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until vegetables are tender. Remove from heat, strain vegetables. Blend vegetables in a food processor or blender until smooth. Stir in ground almonds and enough stock to make desired soup consistency. Add cumin and black pepper. ; name: potato sloppy joe bake ; ingredients: lean ground beef, sloppy joe sandwich sauce, condensed cream of potato soup, frozen hash browns, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a skillet, cook beef until no longer pink, drain. Add sloppy joe sauce and soup, mix. Place thawed hash browns in a greased 9x13 pan. Top with the beef mixture. Bake at 450 degree for 20 minutes- covered. Remove foil and bake additional 10 minutes or more until heated through. Sprinkle with cheese. ; name: marinated top sirloin steaks ; ingredients: top sirloin steaks, garlic, olive oil, worcestershire sauce, cider vinegar, sherry wine, brown sugar, fresh thyme, pepper, salt ; preparation:Place steaks in a plastic ziplock bag, or plastic container. In a small bowl, whisk together all the remaining ingredients. Pour over steaks. Turn to coat evenly. Chill for at least 6 hours. Turning occasionally to redistribute marinade. After marinating, heat grill on med-high. Remove steaks from marinade and place on hot grill. Grill for about 4 minutes on each side or to desired doneness. ; name: skillet macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: butter, elbow macaroni, onion, bell peppers, salt, dry mustard, water, cheddar cheese, pimento stuffed olives, roasted red peppers ; preparation:In skillet over medium heat, in hot butter, cook raw macaroni and next four ingredients for five minutes, stirring constantly. Stir in water. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low and cover. Simmer 10-15 minutes until macaroni is tender, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Stir in cheese and olives until cheese is melted. Serve immediately. ; name: mashed sweet potatoes parsnips ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, parsnips, evaporated milk, butter, salt, ground nutmeg, fresh chives ; preparation:Combine sweet potatoes and parsnips in large saucepan. Cover with cold water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered, 15 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Drain vegetables. Return to pan. Add milk, butter, salt and nutmeg. Mash potato mixture to desired consistency over low heat. Stir in chives. ; name: sliced tomatoes with lemon caper sauce ; ingredients: tomatoes, mayonnaise, plain nonfat yogurt, capers, lemon juice, lemon zest ; preparation:

name: my ground cherry ketchup ; ingredients: cape gooseberries, onions, apples, bell peppers, white vinegar, white sugar, pickling spices, black pepper ; preparation:Mince the onions. Cut green and red mild peppers into pieces as big as a stamp. Pass the spices and the black pepper through the blender to obtain a spice powder. Peel, take away the core and cut the apples in 1 inch pieces. Peel and wash the ground cherries thoroughly. Mix all the ingredients in a big thick cooking pot and bring to a boil, then reduce to medium heat. Let cook until the liquid acquire a syrupy consistency, stirring often to prevent sticking at the bottom of the pot. Pour into sterilized mason jars and close the lids. Verify that the jars are vacuum-sealed. ; name: honey and lemon glazed rack of lamb ; ingredients: racks of lamb, olive oil, lemon, juice and rind of, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, honey, lemon, juice of, fennel seed ; preparation:Combine marinade ingredients and add lamb. Marinade for 2 hours. Drain lamb and score fat with diamond pattern. Place on a cake rack inside a baking dish, this stops the racks from sitting in fat. Warm the honey and lemon juice together. Brush onto lamb fat and sprinkle with fennel seeds. Bake at 350f for 30 to 40 minutes or as required, basting regularly with the remaining honey and lemon mixture. ; name: wholemeal bran pikelets ; ingredients: wholemeal self-rising flour, natural bran, raw sugar, egg, milk ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a blender. Process till smooth. Heat frypan to moderately high. Grease lightly. Drop dessertspoons of batter into pan. Allow room fror spreading and turning. Cook till bubbles appear on top. Turn and cook other side till golden brown. Serve warm with butter. ; name: to die for veggie casserole ; ingredients: celery, sour cream, cheddar cheese, canned corn niblets, green beans, onion, condensed cream of celery soup, ritz cracker, slivered almonds, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine celery, sour cream, shredded cheese, corn, green beans, onion, and cream of celery soup in a large bowl, and mix well. Press into a medium casserole dish. In a medium bowl, mix melted butter, crushed crackers and almonds, and spread over top of the mixture of veggies. Bake at 350 for 40-45 minutes. ; name: barbie s tuna sandwich ; ingredients: solid white tuna, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, sweet pickle relish, onion flakes, curry powder, dried dill weed, garlic powder ; preparation:In a medium bowl, combine tuna, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese and onion flakes. Season eith remaining ingredients. Mix well. Chill. Serve on crackers or as sandwich spread. ; name: chocolate amaretto bars ; ingredients: unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, cocoa, amaretto, ground almonds ; preparation:

name: baby shrimp scampi with angel hair pasta ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, butter, shallot, lemon, baby shrimp, dry vermouth, grape tomatoes, angel hair pasta, salt and pepper, fresh chives ; preparation:Get your pasta water going. Start the scampi sauce when you drop your pasta into boiling water to cook. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil and melt the butter into it. Add shallots and cook a minute or 2, stirring constantly. Add lemon zest and shrimp and heat shrimp through, another minute or two. Add vermouth or wine and tomatoes. Toss another minute to heat the tomatoes through. Add cooked pasta to the pan and toss to coat evenly in sauce and to distribute the shrimp. Season liberally with salt and pepper and serve with chives to garnish. ; name: glazed turkey tenderloins ; ingredients: turkey breast tenderloins, vegetable oil, orange marmalade, ground ginger, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Cook turkey breast tenderloins in oil in skillet over medium heat about 5 minutes or until brown on one side. Turn turkey. Stir in remaining ingredients. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until turkey is done & sauce is thickened. Cut turkey into thin slices. Spoon sauce over turkey. ; name: grilled mangoes with ginger ; ingredients: rock sugar, water, gingerroot, mangoes, butter ; preparation:Combine sugar, water, and ginger in a small pot and cook until the sugar is dissolved. Remove and let cool. When the syrup is completely cooled, remove and discard the ginger. Brush the mango slices with melted butter and grill until slightly charred, turning once. Place the mangoes in a bowl, add the syrup, cover and let cool. When ready to serve, break the mango into bite-sized chunks. Garnish with mint sprigs if desired. ; name: mexican casserole weight watchers ; ingredients: extra lean ground beef, onion, diced tomatoes, frozen corn, black beans, chile, fat free sour cream, low-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown hamburger and onions in large skillet, until thoroughly cooked. Add tomatoes, corn, back beans and crushed chilies, mix well. Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Mix in sour cream, simmer another 10 minutes. Top with cheese when serving. ; name: wine and mushroom sauce ; ingredients: beef bouillon cubes, water, fresh mushrooms, butter, flour, red wine, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute mushrooms in 2 tablespoons butter until limp.
