In the microwave or in a pan, melt the butter and dark chocolate together until liquid. Add the biscuit crumbs, mix well to combine and spoon into a 22cm fluted round, loose-bottomed tin. Press up the side to form the lip first, then press into the base, making sure there are no gaps where they join then put into the fridge to chill. Using a fork or a hand whisk, mix together the cream, eggs, orange zest and orange curd and pour into the crust in the tin. Bake in the oven for 30-35 minutes until just set. Leave to cool. Remove from the tin and drizzle with the melted chocolate. Leave to cool completely. Chill in the fridge before serving. ; name: yogurt or sour cream crumb fruit topping ; ingredients: pumpernickel bread, butter, raw sugar, plain yogurt, apricots ; preparation:Slowly saute bread crumbs in butter until toasted and very crisp, stirring frequently. Allow crumbs to cool and drain on paper towel. Mix with sugar to sweeten. Whip chilled yogurt until smooth, turn into serving bowl and sprinkle with crumb mixture. Spoon over chilled fruits. ; name: harvest pumpkin cake ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, splenda sugar substitute, pumpkin, baking soda, applesauce, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, egg whites, vanilla, fat-free whipped topping ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 375, grease a deep 8 inch pan. I find it best to use a wooden spoon instead of a mixer to mix this batter. Mix first 8 ingredients, mixture will be lumpy. Add egg whites, mixing well after each addition. Mix in vanilla, continue stiring for a minute or two, but mix should remain lumpy. Pour into greased pan, bake 25-35 minutes or until cake seems set and a warm orange brown color on top. Cake will remain soft but should hold together well. I like to serve warm with fat free whipped topping, or for truly sugar free just sprinkle some splenda on top. ; name: easy skillet casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, tomato paste, milk, butter, macaroni & cheese dinner mix ; preparation:Brown beef in a large, deep pot with onion, garlic powder, salt, pepper and worchestershire sauce. Cook macaroni separately according to package directions. When beef is cooked add tomato paste and prepared macaroni. Mix throughly. Cook over low heat until thickened. Add grated cheese on top, if desired. Cover and set aside for 5 mins before serving. ; name: pepper jack spinach pizza pie ; ingredients: bacon, frozen chopped spinach, monterey jack pepper cheese, fresh ground black pepper, prepared pizza crust, olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: artichoke bruschetta ; ingredients: marinated artichoke hearts, tomatoes, romano cheese, red onion, garlic cloves, mayonnaise, french baguette ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place the bread slices on a baking sheet and toast lightly under the broiler. In a medium bowl, mix marinated artichoke hearts, romano or parmesan cheese, red onion, crushed garlic, diced tomato and mayonnaise. Top the lightly toasted french baguette slices with equal amounts of the artichoke heart mixture being careful to spread the mixture over the entire surface. The edges of the bread will tend to burn if not covered by the artichoke mixture. Arrange slices in a single layer on the baking sheet. Broil in the preheated oven 2 minutes, or until toppings are bubbly and lightly browned. ; name: rockin cheddar ranch turkey burgers ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, ranch dressing mix, cheddar cheese, green onion ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together in bowl. Form into 4 patties. Cook in skillet or on grill until cooked through, appox. 6-7 minute per side. Serve on buns with lettuce and tomato. ; name: lemonade with a twist ; ingredients: lemons, limes, oranges, water, sugar ; preparation:Squeeze the juice from lemons, limes and oranges. Reserving one lemon for garnish. Pour into a gallon container. Add water and sugar. Mix well. Chill. Garnish with lemon slices. ; name: kittencal s bechamel sauce ; ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, flour, nutmeg, half-and-half cream, parmesan cheese, seasoning salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a large heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat. Add in fresh garlic saute for 2 minutes. Add in flour and nutmeg. Stir for 2 minutes. Slowly add in half and half cream. Bring to a boil over medium heat stirring constantly. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until thickened and bubbly. Mix in the parmesan cheese. Season with salt and lots of black pepper. ; name: fresh tomato and roasted garlic salad dressing ; ingredients: garlic, olive oil, tomatoes, lemon juice, scallions, vinegar, basil ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the oiled garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover. ; name: sprinkle nut cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, vegetable oil, water, eggs, walnuts, chocolate sprinkles ; preparation:

name: bourbon chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, vegetable oil cooking spray, brown sugar, garlic powder, powdered ginger, soy sauce, bourbon, ketchup ; preparation:Lightly coat large non-stick skillet with cooking spray. Place frozen wings in a single layer in the prepared skillet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour mixture evenly over chicken. Cover and cook over medium heat 20 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink inside, turning wings often to prevent from sticking. ; name: string beans feijao verde ou carrpato guisado ; ingredients: green beans, butter, onions, parsley, tomatoes, vinegar, salt, pepper, nutmeg ; preparation:Cut the beans into 2 inch lengths and cook uncovered in plenty of salted boiling water until barely tender, about 10 minutes. Drain and rinse under cold water and set aside. Heat butter in a large skillet. Add the onions and parsley and saute until lightly browned. Add the tomatoes and simmer 15 minutes. Add the beans, vinegar, salt. Pepper and nutmeg and toss until beans are heated,. Serve immediately. ; name: hot dog tag alongs ; ingredients: hot dogs, cheddar cheese, onion, pickle relish, prepared mustard, ketchup, chili, hot dog buns ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together all ingredients except buns. Have 12 pieces of aluminum foil ready. Partially hollow out centers of buns. Fill each bun with hot dog mixture. Wrap in aluminium foil, sealing securely. Place on a cookie sheet and bake in a preheated 375 degree fahrenheit oven for 20 minutes or place on top rack of outdoor grill. Cover grill and grill for 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: low fat rice on the grill ; ingredients: instant rice, fresh mushrooms, green pepper, onion, chicken broth, water, ketchup, reduced fat margarine ; preparation:In a 9 inch round aluminum foil pie pan, combine the first seven ingrediets. Dot with margarine and cover with heavy-duty foil. Make sure to seal edges tightly. You also can use the new reynolds foil bags. Heat up grill and place pie pan on top off rack. Grill for 15 minutes or until liquid is all absorbed. Before serving, fluff with a fork. ; name: oven roasted tomato sauce ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic cloves, dried italian herb seasoning, sugar, salt, black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven 400f. Slice tomatoes in half, set aside. Pour the olive oil onto a large baking sheet and spread it around the sheet. Sprinkle evenly the garlic, herbs, sugar, salt and pepper over the oil. Place the tomatoes cut side down onto the baking sheet. Roast for about 30-40 minutes, or until the skins start to lift from the tomatoes. Allow to cool. Remove the skins and put the sauce into a large bowl and break up the flesh with a fork. Reheat sauce if using immediately. ; name: afghani inspired spinach dish ; ingredients: frozen spinach, diced onion, ginger, garlic, cayenne pepper, curry powder, garam masala, salt, yogurt, grapeseed oil ; preparation:

name: not so honest roast vegetables ; ingredients: fennel bulbs, onions, sweet potatoes, carrots, coarse salt, dried rosemary, garlic clove, olive oil ; preparation:Pre-cook vegetables in microwave on autocook cycle for potatoes but remove 4 minutes before completion of cook cycle. Allow to cool. Grind salt, rosemary and garlic in mortar and pestle to a paste. Add paste and olive oil to cooked vegetables in ziplock bag and shake to coat. Marinate vegeables overnight in refrigerator. Preheat oven to 280 centigrade. Place marinated vegetables in ovenproof dish and roast for 30 minutes at 280 celsius. Serve. ; name: blueberry dream cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, butter, egg whites, vanilla, fresh blueberries, low-fat plain yogurt, egg, lemons ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, egg whites, and vanilla. Mix well. Press onto bottom of 10 inch springform pan. Layer blueberries on base. In large bowl combine flour, yogurt, egg, sugar, vanilla, and lemon rind. Mix until smooth. Pour over blueberries. Bake 60-70 minutes or until cake is firm and golden. ; name: steamed palm sugar custards ; ingredients: milk, palm sugar, star anise, cinnamon stick, eggs ; preparation:Place milk, sugar, star anise and cinnamon in a saucepan over low heat for 5 minutes. Strain mixture and place in a bowl. Beat eggs lightly and whisk into milk mixture. Pour mixture into 6-8 chinese tea cups and place tea cups in a steamer. Place steamer over rapidly simmering water for 20 minutes or until custards are just set. Affects the texture of the custard. Steam would be lost once the lid is opened before they are ready. ; name: penne with vodka cream and smoked salmon ; ingredients: penne pasta, marinara sauce, fresh dill, vodka, smoked salmon, frozen peas, heavy cream ; preparation:Cook pasta in salted water according to package directions to al dente. Drain and keep warm. Meanwhile, in a large saucepan over medium heat, simmer the marinara sauce, dill and vodka for 15 minutes. Add the salmon pieces, peas and cream and heat through. Pour sauce over pasta and serve. ; name: bacon cheese snacks ; ingredients: bacon, cheese, garlic powder, sugar, onions, miracle whip, celery salt, miniature party rye rounds ; preparation:Fry bacon and crumble fine. Add remaining ingredients except rye bread. Mix well. Spread on party rye. Broil until hot. ; name: old sussex potato cheese cakes ; ingredients: potato, flour, cheese, egg, butter, salt ; preparation:

name: asian scrambled eggs ; ingredients: garlic clove, fresh ginger, peanut oil, mushroom, snow peas, red bell pepper, scallions, reduced sodium soy sauce, egg whites, egg ; preparation:In a skillet or wok on medium-high heat, brown garlic and ginger in half of the oil. After a couple of minutes, add mushrooms, snow peas, and pepper. Stirfry until mushrooms start to brown, and lose most of their moisture. Add chopped scallions. Stir fry for another couple of minutes while drizzling half of the soy sauce over ther mixture. Remove vegetables from skillet. Add the remaining oil, then eggs. When eggs start to bubble around the edges, stir them with a spatula until scrambled. Just before eggs are completely cooked, add vegetables and mix thoroughly. Serve warm, with remaining soy sauce drizzled over top after cooking. ; name: buckingham palace scones ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Sift together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Chop in the butter until the particles of butter are the size of coarse cornmeal. Add the egg and milk. Stir quickly and lightly, only until no flour shows. Add more milk if needed to make dough soft. Turn the dough out on a floured surface and knead gently about 15 times. Cut the dough in half. Shape each half into a ball, press each down into a round and cut into 8 wedges like a pie. Place the wedges on a greased cookie sheet without allowing the sides to touch. Bake until golden brown about 12 minutes. ; name: finger licking sesame edamame ; ingredients: frozen edamame, vegetable oil, sesame oil, fresh ginger, garlic, salt, sesame seeds ; preparation:Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add edamame and continue boiling until beans are crisp-tender, about 6 minutes. Meanwhile mix remaining ingredients together. When done, run cold water over, or put in ice water, to stop cooking. Drain well. Pat excess moisture off, and toss in the dressing. Top with seeds. To eat, hold pod by stem end, and slide the individual beans out with your teeth. Discard pod. ; name: tofu cottage cheese vegan ; ingredients: tofu, garlic powder, onion powder, lemon juice, salt, raw cashews, water ; preparation:In a small bowl, rinse and crumble tofu. Place remaining ingredients in blender and blend until smooth. Add just enough pickle juice or water to form a creamy sauce. Pour blended sauce over crumbled tofu and mix well. Chill and serve. ; name: mexican green sauce ; ingredients: tomatillo, fresh jalapenos, fresh cilantro, onion, garlic clove, fresh mint leaves, vegetable oil, vegetable broth, salt ; preparation:Boil the tomatillos and jalapenos in salted water until just tender, about 10 minutes, then drain. Place in blender or food processor with cilantro, onion and garlic and blend until smooth. Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Pour sauce in and stir for 5 minutes. Add broth and salt, return to a boil, then simmer for 8 to 10 minutes until thickened. ; name: veal in wine sauce ; ingredients: veal, butter, scallions, mushrooms, paprika, flour, white wine, whipping cream, salt and pepper, rice ; preparation:

name: honey nut berry berry parfait ; ingredients: frozen strawberries, frozen blueberries, splenda sugar substitute, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, honey nut cheerios ; preparation:Mix berries with splenda in a small bowl. Defrost berries slightly. Layer half of the yogurt, berries, cereal in serving glass. Repeat. Enjoy. ; name: ham and bean soup ; ingredients: white beans, black beans, cooked ham, carrots, onion, herbs, pepper, low sodium chicken broth, fresh kale, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In crock pot, combine beans, ham, carrots, onion and pepper. Stir in undrained tomatoes and broth. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hrs or high for 3-4 hours. Stir in kale or spinach just before serving. Sprinkle each serving with parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: chicken tarragon casserole ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, half-and-half cream, dried tarragon, pepper, linguine, cooked chicken, parmesan cheese, paprika ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine soup, cream, tarragon and pepper. Stir in the linguine and the chicken. Transfer to an ungreased 4-qt. Baking dish. Sprinkle with the parmesa cheese and paprika if desired. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 30 minutes or until heated through. ; name: glazed chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, sugar-free honey, splenda granular, soy sauce, oil, garlic cloves, no-sugar-added ketchup ; preparation:Cut the chicken wings into drummettes. Season them with salt and pepper and put them in your slow cooker. In a bowl, stir together the honey, splenda, soy sauce, oil, garlic, and ketchup. Drizzle the mixture over the wings and stir them to coat. Cover the slow cooker, set it to low, and let it cook for 6-8 hours. ; name: peach ice ; ingredients: warm water, sugar, peach, lemon juice ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Place the peach, lemon juice and sugar mixture into a blender and process for 1 minute or until blended. Cover and freeze for 3 hours or until almost firm. Transfer to a blender and process again for 30-40 seconds or until slushy. Cover and freeze over night. Remove from freezer just before serving. Using a fork, scrape into 2 dessert dishes. ; name: nut cake gluten free ; ingredients: pecans, eggs, brown sugar, maple syrup, cinnamon, flour, salt ; preparation:

name: divine cherry coffee ; ingredients: swiss almond chocolate liqueur, cherry schnapps, coffee liqueur, coffee, white sugar, whipped cream, almonds, chocolate shavings ; preparation:Rim the outer rim of your glass with cherry liquer, then dip the glass in the white sugar, reserving any leftover sugar and cherry liquer for later use. Pour steaming hot coffee into prepared glass or mug, add the liquers and mix. Mix the whipped cream with any leftover cherry liquer and white sugar. Top the coffee with whipped cream mixture and add the chocolate shaving, topping with the finely chopped almonds. Take your coffee, find a quiet spot, close your eyes and enjoy. ; name: peach or apricot butter slow cooker ; ingredients: peaches, sugar, cinnamon, ground cloves ; preparation:Drain fruit. Remove pits& puree in blender. Pour into a slow cooker. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover. Cook on high 8-10 hours. Remove cover during last half of cooking. Stir occasionally. ; name: spicy korean chicken ; ingredients: chicken wings, onion, green bell pepper, carrots, soy sauce, black pepper, sugar, water, red pepper paste, dry red pepper ; preparation:Boil wings in pot until blood no longer visible. Drain. Mix ingredients together and bring to boil. Cover and let simmer over med heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cook until carrots reach desired tenderness. Serve with sticky white rice. ; name: fruited brie ; ingredients: golden raisin, apple, pear, apple juice, pecans, brie cheese ; preparation:Combine fruit and apple juice in large bowl and allow to marinate for at least 2 hours in refrigerator. Slice brie in half horizontally. Place one layer of brie in baking dish and cover with half of the fruit mixture. Place second layer of brie on top of fruit and cover with remaining fruit mixture. Sprinkle with pecans. Bake, uncovered, in oven at 350 degrees approximately 25 to 30 minutes. Serve with cocktail bread, crackers, baguette, etc. ; name: apple cinnamon wontons ; ingredients: apples, light brown sugar, fresh lemon juice, ground cinnamon, wonton wrappers, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Coat a large baking sheet with butter flavored cooking spray. In a medium bowl, combine apples, brown sugar, lemon juice and cinnamon. Toss to coat apples. Place wonton wrappers on a flat surface. Drop apple mixture by teaspoonfuls onto center of each wrapper. Moisten edges of wrapper with wet fingers, fold over one corner to make a triangle and press sides together to seal. Transfer filled wrappers to prepared baking sheet and coat surface with cooking spray. Bake until wontons are golden brown, about 15 minutes. Place wontons on individual plates and sift with powdered sugar. Serve with ice cream on the side. ; name: lemony potato broccoli and goat cheese salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, broccoli, green beans, dill, salt & freshly ground black pepper, goat cheese, pine nuts ; preparation:

name: rhubarb dessert ; ingredients: white cake mix, rhubarb, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert ; preparation:Mix cake mix according to package directions. Put into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix the rhubarb, sugar, & jello together. Spoon onto cake mix. Bake according package directions. ; name: sherry s infamous snickerdoodles ; ingredients: butter, butter flavor shortening, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Mix butter, shortening, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. In separate bowl mix flour, baking soda, salt, and cream of tartar. Combine with moist ingredients. Shape dough into round balls. Mix remaining sugar with cinnamon. Roll balls in the mixture and place on baking sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes. ; name: roasted parsnips with shallots ; ingredients: parsnips, garlic cloves, shallots, olive oil, honey, kosher salt, cracked black pepper, of fresh mint, fresh sage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Toss together all the ingredients except for the mint and sage. Place in a roasting pan and roast 30 minutes, or until the parsnips are fork tender. Stir in the herbs and toss. Adjust seasoning if necessary. ; name: tomato treat 3 ; ingredients: pita bread, pesto sauce, cheese, tomatoes, fresh ground pepper, salt, onion ; preparation:Spread pesto on flatbread, english muffin or split crusty roll. Top with your favourite shredded cheese. Add thick slices of tomato. Sprinkle with salt and freshly ground pepper. Top with thinly sliced onion. Broil about 6 inches from heat until tomato is soft and cheese is melted. About 5 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: easy bread pudding ; ingredients: eggs, egg whites, skim milk, honey, vanilla, cinnamon raisin bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot. ; name: tomatillo hash with sausage ; ingredients: italian turkey sausage, olive oil, onion, red bell pepper, poblano chile, salt, tomatillos, white wine, cooked brown rice ; preparation:

name: the dampest darkest deadliest brownies of all time ; ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, unsalted butter, unsweetened chocolate, dark brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, all-purpose flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Coat a 9-inch-square baking pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium heat, begin melting the butter. When it is half melted, add the chocolate. Remove from heat and stir until the butter and chocolate are completely melted. Stir in the sugar, salt, vanilla and eggs until smooth. Stir in the flour until well-combined. Mix in the chocolate chips. Pour and scrape the batter into the prepared pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until the top is dry but the center is still damp. Do not overbake. Remove from the oven and cool on a rack until the brownies are cool and firm, about 30 minutes. ; name: cheesy potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, mayonnaise, white sugar, green onion, shredded cheddar cheese, bacon bits ; preparation:Place the potatoes into a pot, and fill with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until easily pierced with a fork. Drain, and set aside to cool. In a large bowl, mix together the sour cream, mayonnaise, sugar, half of the onions, and half of the cheese. Gently stir in the cooled potatoes. Top with remaining cheese and onions, and sprinkle bacon bits over the top. ; name: omelette to go ; ingredients: eggs, butter, cheddar cheese, monterey jack pepper cheese, low-carb whole wheat tortilla ; preparation:Preheat small skillet over medium heat. Add butter. Pour beaten eggs into buttered skillet and cook over medium heat until beginning to bubble well. Turn heat down to medium-low and cook covered until completely done on top. Remove from heat and add shredded cheddar cheese. Cover and let set for 1 minute. Microwave tortilla with pepper jack cheese sprinkled on top for 20 seconds, or until cheese is melted. Place omelette straight from skillet on top of tortilla. Fold in sides and roll up to make a wrap. ; name: all day mushrooms ; ingredients: button mushrooms, butter, burgundy wine, worcestershire sauce, garlic, dried dill, pepper, chicken bouillon cubes, beef bouillon cubes ; preparation:Wet a paper towel and wipe any dirt from the mushrooms. Place the mushrooms in a large stockpot. Add the remaining ingredients to the pot. The liquid will not cover the mushrooms at first. Cook, covered, over very low heat for 4 hours. Stir occasionally so that all of the mushrooms are completely coated with the cooking liquid. Remove the cover and cook for an additional 4 hours. The mushrooms will shrimk by half and become saturated with cooking liquid. Remove with a slotted spoon and serve in a bowl. ; name: picnic orange apricot yogurt soup ; ingredients: plain yogurt, apricots, milk, orange juice, oranges, mint ; preparation:Combine the yogurt, apricots, milk& orange juice in a blender and blend at medium speed for 1 minute. Refrigerate until well chilled. Pour into a well chilled thermos. Carry orange slices and mint separately. Float orange& mint on the soup when serving. ; name: the black eyed pea s baked squash ; ingredients: yellow squash, eggs, breadcrumbs, butter, sugar, salt, onions, pepper ; preparation:

name: corn chorizo tacos ; ingredients: chorizo sausage, red onion, fresh corn kernels, corn tortillas ; preparation:In a large skillet cook chorizo until crispy. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate. Pour off all but 1 tbsp of fat from skillet and add sliced red onion. Cook, stirring over medium-high heat until just soft, about 5 minutes. Add corn kernels and chorizo and cook briefly to heat through. Fill 12 heated corn tortillas with corn mixture and serve with lime wedges, sour cream and chopped cilantro. ; name: spicy bread discs ; ingredients: bread, green chilies, fresh coriander leaves, plain low-fat yogurt, semolina, red chili powder, fresh lemon juice, garam masala powder, garlic, salt ; preparation:Soak the bread slices in water for 30 seconds. Squeeze out the water by squeezing the bread between the palm of your hands. Mix all the ingredients together with the bread and knead into a dough. Divide the dough into 1 tbsp. Sized equal parts. Flatten and fry in hot oil until golden brown on either side. Drain on clean paper kitchen napkins. Serve hot with tomato ketchup or mint chutney. ; name: apple cinnamon oatmeal ww points 4 5 ; ingredients: quick-cooking oatmeal, low-fat milk, unsweetened applesauce, raisins, cinnamon, splenda sugar substitute ; preparation:Combine oatmeal and milk in microwave safe bowl. Give it a quick stir to make sure oats are covered. Make sure the bowl is wide or deep enough so the oatmeal does not overflow. Put it into the microwave for 3 minutes. Remove bowl from microwave. Add apple sauce, raisins, cinnamon and splenda. Mix it all together. The oatmeal may be stiff until the apple sauce is incorporated. ; name: jalapeno rellenos ; ingredients: pickled jalapeno peppers, cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, green onion, pimiento strips ; preparation:Rinse and drain jalapenos. Slit lengthwise on one side. Remove seeds and veins, leaving stem attached. Beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in cheddar cheese and green onion. Stuff each pepper with part of the cheese mixture. Arrange in a heatproof serving plate or baking sheet. Bake in 350 degree oven for about 10 minutes or until cheese melts. Top each pepper with a pimiento strip. ; name: curach irish honey and oatmeal cream ; ingredients: oatmeal, heavy cream, honey, whiskey, raspberries ; preparation:Toast the oatmeal on a cookie sheet under the broiler, or in a hot oven, watch it carefully and stir it from time to time, until it turns a pale golden color. Leave it to cool completely. Whip the cream until it holds its shape, stir in the honey and whiskey, then the cold toasted oatmeal. Layer the raspberries and the cream mixture in the glasses, saving a few of the berries for decoration on top. Serve slightly cool. ; name: halibut zucchini saute ; ingredients: halibut steaks, salt & pepper, zucchini, onion, garlic, oil, tomatoes, parsley, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: cranberry kissed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, orange juice, butter, fresh cranberries, brown sugar, orange, zest of, slivered almonds ; preparation:Combine sweet potatoes, orange juice and butter in a large microwave-safe bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and heat on high, stirring occasionally, 12 minutes. Stir in cranberries and brown sugar. Cover and heat on high until potatoes are tender and cranberries burst, about 5 minutes. Toss mixture with orange zest. Stir in almonds if desired. ; name: soda bread ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sour milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Stir flour, baking soda and salt together. Cut in butter, until mixture resembles crumbs. Pour in sour milk. Knead dough, cut cross at center and bake for 40 minutes. ; name: cheese stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: mushrooms, green onion, garlic cloves, butter, dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, basil, pepper ; preparation:Remove mushroom stems and chop finely. In a small pan, cook stems, green onions, garlic and butter over medium heat til tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add all remaining ingredients except caps. Fill caps with mixture, place in baking dish. Bake 350f for 15 minutes. ; name: kentucky country saltimbocca ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt, pepper, flour, fresh sage leaves, country ham, jarlsberg cheese, white wine ; preparation:Melt butter in skillet over medium heat. Add olive oil. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Dust with flour. Saute in skillet for approximately 5 minutes per side. Top each chicken breast with a sage leaf, 2 ounces of country ham, then cheese. Pour white wine into the skillet. Simmer until cheese is melted. Serve immediately. ; name: three colours chocolate crme ; ingredients: dark chocolate, white chocolate, chips, eggs, milk, sugar ; preparation:Break up each type of chocolate separately. Separate the eggs and place the egg whites in a measuring jug and keep in a cool place. Place the egg yolks in a bowl and stir. Heat the milk to boiling point, remove from the hob, and stir into the egg yolks. Pour everything back into the pan, and heat to boiling point, stirring all the while. Divide the crme into 3 portions. Dissolve one of each of the chocolate types into one each of the hot crme mixtures. Allow to cool. Beat the egg whites to a froth them gradually add the sugar to the beaten egg whites. Continue to beat until the mixture forms stiff peaks and is shiny. Fold the stiffly beaten egg whites in equal parts into the cooled chocolate mixtures. Place equal amounts of each chocolate in espresso coffee cups and keep cool until serving. ; name: individual pecan tartlets ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg yolks, almond extract, all-purpose flour, dark corn syrup, powdered sugar, pecans, pecan halves ; preparation:

name: fast chicken parmesan ; ingredients: vegetable oil, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, biscuit mix, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, margarine ; preparation:Mix together vegetable oil and lemon juice in small bowl. Mix cheese, biscuit mix, and pepper in a shallow small bowl. Dip chicken into oil mixture, then coat with cheese mixture. Heat margarine in large skillet over medium heat until hot. Saute chicken until golden and done. Serve with a squeeze of lemon, spaghetti sauce, or parmesan cheese. ; name: no bake orange cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, cool whip, white sugar, orange-flavored liqueur, orange extract, rum, chocolate wafer pie crust, oreo cookies ; preparation:Mix cream cheese, sugar, orange liquor, orange extract and rum until smooth. Fold in cool whip. Spoon mixture into crust. Sprinkle cookie crumbles on top to taste. Refrigerate overnight. ; name: honey wholemeal scones ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, butter, honey, milk ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients in a bowl. Rub in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in honey and add as much milk as needed to form a soft dough. Turn out onto a floured surface and knead lightly. Pat down to desired thickness and cut out scones of desired size. Bake at 220 c for about 8 minutes. ; name: tarynne s potato latkes ; ingredients: potatoes, red onion, eggs, flour, salt and pepper ; preparation:Shred potatoes and onions together. Squeeze in a towel until dry. Add eggs, flour, and season to taste. Fry until golden brown. Serve with sour cream or apple sauce, if desired. ; name: brown sugar chili ; ingredients: extra lean ground beef, brown sugar, prepared mustard, onion, kidney beans, low-sodium tomato juice, salt, black pepper, chili powder ; preparation:Brown ground beef and onion in non-stick skillet over medium heat. Stir brown sugar and mustard into meat. Combine all ingredients in crockpot. Cover, cook on high for 2 hours. If convenient, stir several times during cooking. ; name: roasted skinless duck breast ; ingredients: skinless duck breasts, lemon pepper, garlic heads, olive oil, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:

name: won ton dipping sauce ; ingredients: onion, jalapenos, garlic cloves, oil, soy sauce, rice vinegar, brown sugar ; preparation:Combine onion, peppers and garlic in food processor and chop to a medium-fine consistency. Heat oil in skillet on low heat and add the vegetables from the food processor. Stir, continuing to cook on low heat until the oil takes on the color of the peppers. In a bowl, pour the vinegar, soy sauce and brown sugar and stir to dissolve the sugar. Taste the mixture, adjust to taste. Mix, then add the mixture from the skillet. Serve warm or at room temperature with freshly steamed or fried won tons. ; name: grilled summer squash ; ingredients: summer squash, onion, fresh ground pepper, garlic powder, salt, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat grill. Arrange veggies on a piece of aluminum foil large enought to form a packet. Sprinkle pepper, garlic powder, & salt over veggies. Slice butter into desired pieces and place on top of veggies. Drizzle with olive oil. Seal packet leaving enough room for veggies to steam. Place on grill for approximately 20 minutes or until veggies are soft and flip packet as necessary for even cooking. ; name: mom s cracked sugar cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, flour, cream of tartar, baking soda ; preparation:Cream butter & sugar. Mix in egg. Mix in flour, cream of tartar & baking soda till well combined. Drop tablespoon size balls in sugar, roll to coat. Place 12 cookies on a parchment lined cookie sheet, do not flatten. Bake at 350 for 10 - 15 minutes. Slide parchment with cookies onto wire rack to cool. Store in airtight container. ; name: garlic mashed red potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, garlic cloves, butter, nonfat milk, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese. ; name: linguine with clams bacon and tomato ; ingredients: bacon, garlic cloves, dry white wine, crushed tomatoes, bottled clam juice, clam, flat leaf parsley, salt, dried red pepper flakes, linguine ; preparation:In large frying pan, cook the bacon over moderate heat until almost crisp. Remove bacon with slotted spoon and pour off all but 2 tbs fat. Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 30 seconds. Add wine. Stir in bacon, tomatoes and clam juice and heat to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes. Add the clams, parsley, salt and red-pepper flakes and cook for one minute longer. In the meantime, boil the linguine until just done, about 12 minutes. Drain the linguine well and add to the sauce. Allow the linguine to sit for 2 to 3 minutes to absorb some of the liquid. ; name: el charro cafe green enchilada sauce ; ingredients: vegetable oil, white onion, flour, anaheim chilies, garlic cloves, chicken stock, salt ; preparation:

name: onion and olive tart ; ingredients: olive oil, white onions, garlic cloves, shortcrust pastry, roma tomatoes, anchovy fillets, black olives ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a preferably non-stick pan over a low heat, and saut the onions and garlic, until they are softened but not browned, for about 25 minutes. Drain and reserve the oil. And cool. Preheat the oven to 200c, lightly grease a 29cm x 21cm rectangular flan pan, and press the pastry firmly into the pan. Trim and discard any excess pastry and chill the pastry-lined pan for 15 minutes. Spread the onions and garlic over the pastry, top with the sliced tomatoes, anchovy fillets and olives, and drizzle with the reserved oil. Bake for 40-45 minutes, until the pastry is crisp and golden. Serve. ; name: the only bbq salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, parsley, sun-dried tomatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt ; preparation:Chop the garlic cloves finely, sprinkle with salt and grind together with the flat of the knife. Combine with the parsley, tomatoes and olive oil and store, covered in the fridge overnight. Prepare the bbq and oil the grill. With a sharp knife cut two lengthwise slits in the fillet, cut to, but not through, the skin. Spread half the garlic mixture over the fillet and into the slits. Place skin side down on the bbq grill at low temp with the lid closed for 10-15mins. Spread the remaining garlic mixture over the fillet, close lid, increase the temperature to medium and cook another 15mins or until the flesh seperates into natural moist sections when pressed with a fork. ; name: impossible quiche ; ingredients: mushroom, milk, cheese, eggs, onion, bisquick baking mix, salt, fresh ground pepper, thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease a 9-10 inch pie plate. Sprinkle mushrooms, cheese, and onion evenly over bottom of pie plate. Place remaining ingredients in blender, cover, and blend on high for 1 minute. Pour into pie plate. Bake until golden brown and knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let stand 5 minues before cutting. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: quick and easy chicken cordon bleu rolls ; ingredients: chicken breasts, prosciutto, swiss cheese, salt and pepper, cream of mushroom soup, milk, dry white wine ; preparation:On each chicken breast, place one piece of prosciutto and cheese. Roll up each chicken breast and secure with a toothpick. Season each roll with salt and pepper. Place in the crock-pot slow cooker. In a small bowl, whisk together the soup, milk and white wine. Pour half of this mixture over the chicken breast rolls, placing the other half in the refrigerator for later. Cover and cook on low for 4 to 6 hours or on high for 3 to 4 hours. Before serving heat up the remainder of your sauce and put over the chicken breast when serving. ; name: cinnamon sicles ; ingredients: plain yogurt, applesauce, honey, cinnamon ; preparation:Blend yogurt, applesauce and honey. Pour into paper cups. Cover with foil, make a slit in center of foil. Insert popsicle stick. Freeze. ; name: fried apples and bread slices ; ingredients: margarine, apples, brown sugar, white bread ; preparation:

name: oven baked beef or pork steak with tangy sauce ; ingredients: round steaks, salt and pepper, onions, fresh garlic, barbecue sauce, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees f. Grease a roasting pan or baking dish. Heat oil in a large skillet. Season the beef or pork steak with with salt and pepper, then brown on both sides. Place into the prepared pan and top with the onion slices. In a bowl mix the bbq sauce, soy sauce and garlic then pour over meat in the pan. Cover tightly with foil then make a couple of slits in the foil with a sharp knife to allow steam to escape. Cook until meat is fork-tender, about 1 hour. ; name: medieval fine cakes ; ingredients: butter, salt, granulated sugar, cinnamon, unbleached flour ; preparation:Cream together the sugar, salt, and butter. Mix together the cinnamon and flour. Add this to the creamed mixture. Mix in water, as needed, to make the dough manageable. Press dough into 2-3 baking sheets lined with baking parchment. Prick all over with a fork at regular intervals. Bake at 325 degrees f for 30 minutes. Cut into 100 squares. ; name: easy walnut butterscotch fudge ; ingredients: evaporated milk, marshmallow creme, sugar, butter, vanilla extract, butterscotch chips, walnuts ; preparation:Line an 8 inch square pan with nonstick aluminum foil, letting the ends entend over the pan on 2 sides. In a medium nonstick saucepan, combine the evaporated milk, marshmallow creme, sugar and butter. Bring to a boil over med-high heat, stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Reduce heat to medium and boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and stir in chips until melted. Stir in vanilla and walnuts until blended. Pour mixture into the prepared, foiled pan. Chill about 2 hours or until firm. Lift foil by ends out of the pan and transfer fudge onto a cutting board and cut into squares. Store in refrigerator. ; name: a sauce for a dull food ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt and pepper, sugar, hard-boiled eggs, milk, lemon juice ; preparation:Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the flour and stir 1-2 minutes to make a roux. Add the salt, pepper, sugar and chopped egg, mixing well. Gradually add the milk and stir until mixture thickens, about 5 minutes. Stir in lemon juice and serve. This sauce can be used to give an attractive flavour and appearance to foods such as fish, old vegetables, and so on. ; name: strawberry banana ice box pie ; ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, bananas, fresh strawberries, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, vanilla flavoring ; preparation:Line pie crust with sliced bananas and strawberries. Whip cream cheese until light and fluffy. Gradually beat in milk. Add lemon juice and vanilla. Blend well. Pour over bananas and strawberries. Chill for 2 hours or until firm. ; name: virginia s cinnamon sauce bread pudding ice cream crepes etc ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:

name: sauteed kidneys ; ingredients: veal kidneys, butter, vegetable oil, onions, mushroom, red wine, salt ; preparation:Remove the outside membrane from the kidneys. Rinse and pat dry. Set to the side. Melt the butter and oil together in a skillet. Brown the kidneys quickly, and remove to a warm platter. Add the onion and mushrooms to the pan and cook until the onion is soft and translucent, stirring frequently. Add the wine and cook for another minute or so. Return the kidneys to the pan and add salt to taste. Heat through. Serve on toast points. ; name: crock pot lemon turkey breast ; ingredients: turkey breast, lemons, fresh rosemary, fresh oregano, dijon mustard, white wine, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grate zest from lemons, and juice them. Mix zest and juice with remaining marinade ingredients. Place turkey in a nonmetallic dish. Spoon marinade over turkey, turning to coat breast. Cover and refrigerate several hours, or overnight. To cook, place turkey and marinade in the crock pot, cover, and cook on low for 6-8 hours, or until tender. Serve hot. To use for salads or sandwiches, cool. Cover and refrigerate. Slice or chop. ; name: colby hash browns casserole ; ingredients: milk, beef broth, butter, salt, pepper, garlic powder, frozen hash brown potatoes, colby cheese ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the milk, broth, 1 tablespoon butter, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Stir in hash browns. Heat remaining butter in a large nonstick skillet. Add hash brown mixture. Cook and stir over medium heat until potatoes are heated through. Stir in cheese. Transfer to a greased shallow 2 quart baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 40-45 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: dark chocolate butterscotch brownies ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, sugar, egg whites, vanilla, flour, bittersweet chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Melt together butter and unsweetend chocolate in microwave, stir until smooth, then cool slightly. In a large bowl, combine sugar and chocolate mixture. Stir in egg whites and vanilla. Stir in flour. Stir in the chips. Spread into greased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Melt together chips and butter, stir until smooth. Spread over warm brownies. Cool completely before cutting. ; name: kielbasa and potato bake ; ingredients: condensed cream of mushroom soup, onion, milk, kielbasa, salt, ground black pepper, russet potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: brie pancake ; ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, brie cheese, salt, butter, chives, cayenne pepper ; preparation:

name: easy eggplant aubergine dip sandwich spread ; ingredients: eggplant, tomatoes, avocado, garlic, cayenne, soy sauce, tahini ; preparation:Pierce the eggplant with a fork first in a few places so it wont explode in the oven. Bake the eggplant for 1 hour, or until it is soft throughout. Cool the eggplant, cut in half and let drain. Remove the skin. Mash in tomatoes, avocados, garlic and spices to taste. For a thicker dip, add tahini. ; name: sheila s swedish creme ; ingredients: whipping cream, sugar, unflavored gelatin, almond extract, pure vanilla extract, sour cream, fresh red raspberries, fresh blackberries ; preparation:Place whipping cream, sugar, and gelatin in a sauce pan. Cook and stir over low heat until steam rises from the pan and gelatin is thoroughly dissolved. Stir in almond and vanilla extracts. Allow to cool, then fold in sour cream until thoroughly combined. Pour into large bowl and cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate from 1-4 hours to set properly. Before serving, sprinkle raspberries and blackberries over top. ; name: strapatsada scrambled eggs in tomato sauce ; ingredients: tomatoes, green pepper, eggs, olive oil, feta cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put the tomatoes and green pepper in a non-stick frying pan and cook them until they are a very thick sauce. Season to taste. Add oil and eggs. Let the eggs cook till set on the bottom before giving them a stir. Bring the set eggs up, and continue to cook, in this way. When the eggs are fully cooked, top with the cheese. Allow the cheese to melt. ; name: crock pot mexican chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, black beans, rotel, black olives, corn, salsa, onion, garlic cloves, sea salt ; preparation:Place frozen chicken breasts in crock pot. Add all other ingredients. Cook on high for 5-6 hours. Remove chicken and shred with two forks. Return chicken to crock pot, reduce to low, and cook for 1-2 hours. ; name: versatile pasta salad ; ingredients: rotini pasta, italian salad dressing, onion, green peppers, tomatoes, turkey pepperoni, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside. Dice onion, peppers, and tomatoes and add to salad. Cut pepperonis into quarters and add to pasta mixture. Toss all with entire bottle of italian dressing. Mix italian seasoning into parmesan cheese and fold into salad. Refrigerate overnight for best flavor. Serve cold. ; name: pork chops and potato scallop ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, water, dried dill weed, potatoes, pork chops, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, parsley ; preparation:

name: sloppy joes w chicken gumbo ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, chicken gumbo soup, catsup, salt, hamburger buns ; preparation:In skillet, cook chopped onion until soft. Add ground beef, crumbling and breaking it up while cooking it. When meat is brown, remove from heat and drain fat. Place back on stove and add two cans of chicken gumbo soup. Stir together until it begins to bubble. Stir in catsup. Simmer for a few minutes, then remove from heat. Ready to serve on hamburger buns. ; name: rachael ray s garlicky holy guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, lemon, juice of, garlic clove, jalapeno, plum tomato, yellow onion, coarse salt, corn tortilla chips ; preparation:Cut avocados in half around the pit. Separate the halves. Pop out pit with spoon, then scoop flesh of avocados into a bowl. Squeeze the juice of a lemon over the avocados. Add garlic, jalapeno, tomato, onion and salt to the bowl. Mash and mix the ingredients into a chunky dip using a fork. Serve with corn tortilla chips. ; name: caramelized onion and goat cheese pizza ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, pizza crust, pizza sauce, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, goat cheese, fresh basil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion. Cover and cook for 3 minutes. Uncover and cook for 11 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently. Place the pizza crust on a baking sheet. Combine the sauce and tomatoes. Spread sauce mixture over pizza crust. Top with onion and cheese. Bake at 450 for 10 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Sprinkle with basil. Cut into 6 wedges. ; name: anise pound cake ; ingredients: flour, salt, butter, sugar, vanilla, anise seeds, eggs, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease and flour 10-inch tube or bundt pan. In a small bowl sift together flour and salt and then set aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter with sugar, vanilla and anise seed. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Add dry ingredients alternately with sour cream to mixture and beat well. Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour or until cake is golden and springs back when touched with fork. ; name: grilled mango and ricotta with english muffins ; ingredients: low-fat ricotta cheese, low-fat tropical yogurt, mangoes, english muffins, passion fruit pulp ; preparation:Whisk cheese and yogurt together in medium bowl until mixture is smooth. Slice cheeks from mangoes. Remove skin, cut each cheek in half. Cook mango on heated oiled plate until browned both sides. Just before serving, split muffins. Top with cheese mixture and mango, drizzle with passionfruit pulp. ; name: spaghetti with italian tuna capers ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, anchovy fillet, crushed tomatoes, capers, tuna in olive oil, spaghetti, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: romaine salad with avocado and oranges ; ingredients: oranges, lemon juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, salt, romaine lettuce, scallions, avocado ; preparation:With a paring knife remove the skin and pith from the oranges. Working over a large salad bowl to catch the juices, cut out the orange segments. Set aside. Add the lemon juice, oil, mustard, and salt to the juice, whisking to blend. Add the lettuce and scallions, tossing well. Add the avocado and toss gently to combine. ; name: one for all marinated beef ; ingredients: orange juice, reduced sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, prepared mustard, canola oil, garlic cloves, beef flank steak ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add flank steak. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steak, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: grilled orange maple mustard pork chops bbq ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, dijon-style mustard, maple syrup, green onions, orange rind, pepper ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium. Trim fat from chops if necessary and season with pepper. In a small bowl, stir together mustard, syrup, onion and orange peel. Set aside. Grill chops 12-15 minutes until done. Turn once and brush with the sauce mixture during the last 5 minutes of grilling. ; name: lemon parmigiano artichoke casserole ; ingredients: frozen artichoke hearts, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley, seasoned dry bread crumbs, parmigiano, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Coat a 9-inch glass pie plate with cooking spray. Place artichokes in a colander and, if needed, rinse with cold water to separate. Drain well and pat dry with paper towels. Place artichokes in prepared pie plate. Add lemon juice and parsley. Season with salt and pepper and stir to combine. In a small bowl, combine breadcrumbs, cheese, garlic, olive oil, and red pepper. Sprinkle the mixture evenly over the artichokes. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until topping is golden. ; name: pickled cabbage and peppers ; ingredients: cabbage, bell peppers, pickling salt, sugar, white wine vinegar, hot pepper flakes, mustard seeds, garlic cloves ; preparation:In a large bowl or cork, toss the cabbage and peppers with the salt. Cover and let stand in a cool place for 8-12 hours. In a non-reactive saucepan, combine the sugar and vinegar. Bring to a boil, then let it cool. Rinse the cabbage, and drain it well. Toss with the pepper flakes, mustard seeds and garlic. Pack the vegetable mixture firmly into pint mason jars. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables. Close the jars with hot two-piece caps. Process the jars for 20 minutes in a boiling water bath. Store the cooled jars in a cool, dry, dark place for at least 3 weeks before eating the cabbage. ; name: meat and potatoes quiche a k a the man s quiche ; ingredients: frozen pie crusts, ground beef, hash brown potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, heavy cream, eggs, salt, black pepper, onion salt ; preparation:

name: sour cream rice cold ; ingredients: long grain rice, green onions, hard-boiled eggs, sour cream, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Cook rice according to package directions. Let cool slightly, then add rest of ingredients. Mix throughly and put in a loaf pan, lined with plastic wrap overlapping edges. Refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight. Remove from loaf pan by pulling up on plastic wrap. Invert on plate and remove wrap. Serve cold. ; name: karin calloway s crock pot sweet and sour meatballs ; ingredients: tomato paste, water, crushed pineapple, cider vinegar, salt, black pepper, onion, brown sugar, crushed red pepper flakes, meatballs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a 4-quart or larger crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours. Stir once or twice during cooking. To serve as an entree, spoon over hot cooked white rice or egg noodles. Sauteed sugar snap or snow peas make a good side dish. ; name: couscous mix with toasted pine nuts coconut milk lime juice ; ingredients: pine nuts, coconut milk, lime juice, sugar, water, chicken base, butter ; preparation:In medium saucepan add all of the ingredients except the couscous mix and the butter. Bring to a boil, take off burner add couscous and cover,. Let set for about 5 minutes. Stir and add butter. Serve. ; name: crazy cake frosting ; ingredients: sugar, butter, salt, cocoa powder, milk, vanilla ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except vanilla in a sauce pan. Bring to a boil and boil for only 1 minute. Remove from heat and cool. Add vanilla and beat with fork or beaters until spreading consistency. Cooking time does not include time to cool. ; name: goats cheese melts ; ingredients: crusty bread rolls, olive oil, chutney, goat cheese, fresh thyme ; preparation:Heat oven to 190c. Take each roll and hollow out a space just big enough for the goats cheese. Brush the insides with the oil and bake for 5 mins until crispy. Spoon the chutney into the rolls and place the cheese on top. Depending on the cheese you use you may have to remove the top and bottom rind. Decorate each roll with a sprig of thyme and cover to roll in foil leaving the cheese exposed. Cook for 15 mins removing the foil for the last 5. ; name: chocolate cherry dump it cake ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, cherry pie filling, chocolate cake mix, margarine, flaked coconut ; preparation:

name: barbecued pork quesadillas ; ingredients: barbecued pork, barbecue sauce, fresh cilantro, green onions, flour tortillas, four-cheese mexican blend cheese, butter, sour cream, green onion ; preparation:Stir together first 4 ingredients. Spoon pork mixture evenly on 1 side of each tortilla. Sprinkle with cheese. Fold tortillas in half, pressing gently to seal. Spread butter on both sides of quesadillas. Heat a large nonstick or cast-iron skillet over medium heat, and cook quesadillas 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until browned. Cut each quesadilla in half for main-dish servings or in quarters for appetizer servings. Serve with desired toppings. Garnish, if desired. ; name: homemade egg substitute ; ingredients: egg whites, nonfat dry milk powder, vegetable oil, yellow food coloring ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl. Whisk until smooth. Store in a glass container or jar in the refrigerator for up to 1 week and also freezes well. To make scrambled eggs. Fry slowly over low heat in a nonstick frypan. ; name: easy cheeseburger mac ; ingredients: ground beef, water, ketchup, yellow mustard, macaroni and cheese mix, frozen corn, frozen peas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef and drain. Add water, ketchup and mustard. Bring to a boil. Stir in the macaroni from the box. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 4 minutes. Add thawed vegetables. Simmer another 5-6 minutes covered, until macaroni is tender. Reduce heat to low and add cheese powder. Stir well. Sprinkle cheddar over the top and cover for a minute or two until cheese melts. ; name: perfect blintz batter ; ingredients: eggs, water, half-and-half cream, vanilla, salt, sugar, flour, baking powder, butter ; preparation:In a medium bowl lightly beat eggs, then whisk in water, milk, salt, 2 teaspoons sugar and vanilla until well blended. Sift the flour and baking powder, then stir into the egg ingredients. Whisk until thick. Stir in melted butter. Let the batter sit out at room temperature for 20 minutes or until it comes to room temperature and the bubbles settle. Lightly butter a 8-inch skillet on medium heat. Add in about 3-4 tablespoons batter and swirl to coat the bottom of the skillet. Cook until the bottom is set and light browned. Flip the blintz over and cook for about 30 seconds. Repeat with remaining batter. ; name: wife saver breakfast ; ingredients: white bread, cheddar cheese, back bacon, eggs, dry mustard, onion, green pepper, salt & pepper, butter, corn flakes ; preparation:Grease the bottom of 11 x 13 pan. Remove crusts from bread and layer them in bottom of pan. Add a layer of sliced cheese, and then a layer of ham followed with a final layer of bread with crusts removed. Set aside. In a medium bowl beat the eggs, then add dry mustard, minced onion, chopped green pepper, and salt& pepper to taste. Pour egg mixture over bread, cheese and ham. Cover and refrigerate overnight. In the morning preheat oven to 350f. Mix melted butter to the crushed corn flakes and sprinkle over top. Bake for 1 hour. ; name: chicken and rice cheesy casserole ; ingredients: healthy request cream of chicken soup, water, white rice, onion powder, vegetables, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, reduced-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: microwaved apples with orange and strawberry sauce ; ingredients: granny smith apples, ground cinnamon, orange juice, strawberries, brown sugar, cointreau liqueur, orange, slivered almonds ; preparation:Place the apples in a microwave container, sprinkle with cinnamon and pour the orange juice over the top. Cover and cook on high in the microwave for 3 minutes, toss and then cook for another 3-4 minutes, or until tender. At the same time, puree the strawberries and add 1 teaspoon sugar, or to taste. Then drain the juice from the apples into a saucepan together with the strawberry puree and cook over a high heat to reduce. Place the apples in a bowl and pour the sauce over the top. Garnish with almonds and serve warm or hot. ; name: caramelized sweet potato casserole ; ingredients: brown sugar, flour, pecans, butter, mashed sweet potatoes, sugar, salt, vanilla, eggs ; preparation:Boil sweet potatos for 15 mins, let it sit for 15 mins, boil another 15 mins, let it sit another 15-30 minutes. Mash potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine crust mixture brown sugar, flour, nuts and butter in mixing bowl. Set aside. Combine sweet potatoes, sugar, salt, vanilla, eggs and butter in a mixing bowl in the order listed. Mix well. Pour mixture into greased baking dish. Sprinkle the surface of the sweet potato mixture evenly with the crust mixture. Bake for 30 minutes. Allow to set at least about 15-30 minutes before serving for the crust to harden. ; name: iranian potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, lemons, juice of, chicken, baby green peas, mayonnaise, salt ; preparation:Boil, bone and cool the chicken. Grate the potatoes & eggs. Tear chicken into small pieces. Mix together with mayonnaise and salt. Mold the salad to your personal preferences by starting out using 3c of mayonnaise and adding more. Do the same with the salt. When mold is to your liking, add lemon juice and mix. Cover mold with a layer of baby sweet peas. Let set in the ice box overnight. Do not eat right away or lemon juice will be too overpowering. ; name: no crust pineapple pie ; ingredients: milk, sugar, biscuit mix, butter, eggs, vanilla, crushed pineapple ; preparation:In blender, combine first 6 ingredients. Process until smooth. Spoon pineapple over the bottom of a greased deep-dish 9 inch pie plate. Pour batter over pineapple. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes, or until knife comes out clean. ; name: pork chow mein ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onions, celery, pork, soy sauce, bean sprouts, cornstarch, beef broth, rice ; preparation:Heat the oil in a deep skillet or wok. Saute the onion and celery 5 minutes. Mix in the pork, soy sauce and sprouts. Cook 2 minutes. Mix the cornstarch with the broth. Add to the skillet, stirring steadily to the boiling point. Cook 3 minutes more. Serve with rice or chow mein noodles. ; name: quick domino slice ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, cocoa, plain flour, coconut, icing sugar, boiling water ; preparation:

name: thai red pork curry with corn and peas ; ingredients: peanut oil, red curry paste, lean pork, coconut milk, corn kernel, fresh peas, fish sauce, brown sugar, lime rind, thai basil ; preparation:Heat oil in wok, add curry paste and stir fry for one minute. Add pork, stir fry until lightly browned. Add coconut milk and one cup water, bring to the boil. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add corn and peas to wok, cook for 5 minutes. Add fish sauce, brown sugar, lime rind and basil leaves, toss well. Serve with steamed rice. ; name: v s crock pot bottom round roast ; ingredients: boneless bottom round roast, dijon mustard, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, dry red wine, beef broth, onion, carrots, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Place chopped onion and carrots in bottom of crock pot. Season all sides of the roast liberally with the kosher salt and ground pepper. Place roast on top of onions and carrots, fat side down. Combine mustard, sugar, worcestershire sauce, beef broth and red wine in a separate bowl and pour over roast. Set crock pot to low and cook for 3 hours. After 3 hours, turn the roast onto one side and cook for 20 minutes. After 20 minutes, turn the roast on the next side and cook 20 minutes, repeat until the roast has the fat side on the bottom again. Cook for about 2 more hours usually 6 hours total. The roast is done when it shreds easily with a fork. ; name: faux tatoes cauliflower ; ingredients: head cauliflower, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic, chicken bouillon, fresh ground black pepper, chives, unsalted butter ; preparation:Set a stockpot of water to boil over high heat. Clean and cut cauliflower into small pieces. Cook in boiling water for about 6 minutes, or until well done. Drain well. Do not let cool and pat cooked cauliflower very dry between several layers of paper towels. In a bowl with an immersion blender, or in a food processor, puree the hot cauliflower with the cream cheese, parmesan, garlic, chicken base, and pepper until almost smooth. Garnish with chives, and serve hot with pats of butter. ; name: potato and cucumber soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, potato, chicken broth, water, cucumber, heavy cream, ear of corn, fresh parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and cook onions until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, chicken broth, and water. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree potato mixture with cucumbers and return to pot. Stir in cream. Meanwhile, heat a heavy skillet over medium high heat, and add the corn and cook until golden. Scrape corn from cob and add to soup. Stir in parsley, salt and pepper. If desired, chill soup in refrigerator before serving. ; name: sweet and sour german spinach ; ingredients: bacon, frozen spinach, onion, egg, sugar, white vinegar ; preparation:Fry bacon in medium skillet until almost crisp. Fry onion in bacon grease until soft. Remove onion and bacon from grease. Place spinach in grease, stirring until hot. Return onion and bacon to skillet. Mix sugar and vinegar. Beat egg then mix with vinegar and sugar. Pour over spinach. Cook 2-5 minute. Salt to taste. ; name: blond brownies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, self rising flour, eggs, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, semisweet chocolate morsel, pecans ; preparation:

name: oh my goodness yummy very low cal chocolate cupcakes ; ingredients: egg whites, cream of tartar, splenda granular, salt, cornstarch, vanilla, cocoa powder, self rising flour ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. Beat egg whites and cream of tarter while slowly adding splenda, vanilla, and salt. In another bowl sift the rest of the dry ingredients. Slowly add dry ingredients into the egg whites. Pour into 6 muffin cups. Bake for 15 minutes or until done. ; name: grilled zucchini with cumin ; ingredients: zucchini, olive oil, cumin, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cut zucchini in half lengthwise. Make criss-cross hatches into the cut side of the flesh. Season with salt and pepper. Drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with cumin. Grill on medium hot grill for about 5 minutes on each side, or until desired tenderness. ; name: cheapo gourmet a la college ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, chili, cheese, yellow onion, tomatoes ; preparation:Make easy mac according to directions on box. Meanwhile, saute chopped onions in whatever type of oil is available. Add desired amount of chili to mac. Stir in sauted onions and top with chopped or sliced tomatos. Serve on a paper plate with a cheap beer and a slice of bread. ; name: tomato and bell pepper spaghetti ; ingredients: whole wheat spaghetti, olive oil, green pepper, grape tomatoes, parmesan cheese, garlic, oregano, basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. While the spaghetti is cooking, heat a large saut pan over medium heat with olive oil. Saut green peppers. Add tomatoes and herbs once pepper softens. Heat until warmed. Combine pasta and tomato mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top and fold edges of pasta toward the center. Heat until warm. Transfer to plate, stir, and serve. ; name: pickled cabbage and peppers ; ingredients: cabbage, bell peppers, pickling salt, sugar, white wine vinegar, hot pepper flakes, mustard seeds, garlic cloves ; preparation:In a large bowl or cork, toss the cabbage and peppers with the salt. Cover and let stand in a cool place for 8-12 hours. In a non-reactive saucepan, combine the sugar and vinegar. Bring to a boil, then let it cool. Rinse the cabbage, and drain it well. Toss with the pepper flakes, mustard seeds and garlic. Pack the vegetable mixture firmly into pint mason jars. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables. Close the jars with hot two-piece caps. Process the jars for 20 minutes in a boiling water bath. Store the cooled jars in a cool, dry, dark place for at least 3 weeks before eating the cabbage. ; name: low salt savoury rice ; ingredients: white rice, olive oil, margarine, chopped tomatoes, garlic clove, onion, green capsicum, pepper, boiling water ; preparation:

name: paul prudhomme s candied yams ; ingredients: unsalted butter, sweet potatoes, water, sugar, dark brown sugar, orange, lemon, cinnamon sticks, vanilla extract, mace ; preparation:Heat the butter in a 4-quart saucepan over high heat. When about half melted, add the remaining ingredients. Stir, cover, and cook over high heat until mixture comes to a strong boil, about 10 minutes. Stir then reduce heat and simmer covered 20 minutes. Uncover and continue cooking until sweet potatoes are very tender, about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and discard cinnamon sticks. Orange and lemon slices can also be discarded if desired. Serve immediately, undrained. Can also be mashed. ; name: lemon orzo salad with zucchini and fresh herbs ; ingredients: orzo pasta, zucchini, fresh parsley, of fresh mint, lemon, rind of, lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the orzo until tender but firm. Drain in a colander. Rinse under cold water to cool, and drain well. Mix the orzo, zucchini, parsley, and mint in a large bowl with a large spoon. Whisk the remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over the salad and mix with a large spoon. ; name: celebration chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, poultry seasoning, american cheese, cream of celery soup, sour cream, chicken flavor stuffing mix, butter ; preparation:Place chicken in sprayed crock pot. Sprinkle each breast with seasoning. Place a slice of cheese on each. Combine soup and sour cream in a saucepan and heat through enough to be well blended. Spoon over chicken. Sprinkle stuffing mix on top. Drizzle melted butter evenly over stuffing. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours. ; name: yummy round steak with rich gravy ; ingredients: round steaks, onion soup mix, water, condensed cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Cut steak into 5 or 6 serving pieces. Place in a slow cooker. Add dry onion soup mix, water and condensed mushroom soup. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours or on high about 4-5 hours. If making the pork chops, brown in oil and then put some of the sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 pan, then layer pork chops and add more sauce. Then bake for an hour and a half at 350. ; name: coronado rice casserole ; ingredients: butter, onion, cooked rice, sour cream, cottage cheese, green chilies, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute onion in butter until golden. Remove from heat and stir in cooked rice, sour cream, cottage cheese. Season to taste. Layer half of this into three quart baking dish. Add half the chilies and sprinkle with half the cheese. Repeat layers ending with cheese. Bake at 375 degrees for half hour. ; name: sizzlin southwest guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, limes, juice of, cilantro leaf, corn kernel, red bell pepper, red onion, jalapeno jack cheese, hot sauce, salt ; preparation:

name: egg in a nest for 1 person ; ingredients: bacon, leek, garlic clove, red pepper, zucchini, fresh basil, fresh ground black pepper, egg, tasty cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180dc, 350df. Cook bacon, leek and garlic in a nonstick fry pan over medium high heat for 3- 4 minutes or until bacon is crisp. Add red pepper and zucchini and cook for 3-4 minutes longer. Stir in basil and black pepper to taste. Spoon mixture into a small ovenproof dish and form a depression in the centre. Break egg into a small bowl, then slide into the depression in the vegetable mixture. Sprinkle with cheese and bake for 5-8 minutes at 180dc 350df or until the white is set in the egg. ; name: tarragon shallot egg salad sandwich ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, shallots, fresh tarragon, white wine vinegar, salt, black pepper, whole grain bread, baby spinach leaves, tomatoes ; preparation:Cover eggs with cold water by 1 inch in a 2-quart heavy saucepan and bring to a rolling boil, partially covered. Reduce heat to low and cook eggs, covered completely, 30 seconds. Remove pan from heat and let eggs stand in hot water, covered, 15 minutes. Transfer eggs with a slotted spoon to a bowl of ice and cold water and let stand 5 minutes. Peel eggs and finely chop. Stir together eggs and remaining salad ingredients in a bowl with a fork. Spoon egg salad onto bread and spread evenly. Top with favorite garnishes. ; name: nacho ordinary macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, velveeta cheese, taco seasoning, salsa, green onion ; preparation:Cook macaroni in boiling water for 9 minutes. Drain and return to pan. Add cheese and taco seasoning, stirring until cheese melts. Stir in salsa. Sprinkle with green onions. ; name: baked pancake squares ; ingredients: milk, butter, egg substitute, sugar, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease an 8x8-inch baking dish. In a large mixing bowl, beat together milk, butter and egg substitute. Add the sugar, then gradually beat in the flour. Carefully stir in the baking powder and salt. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Cut into 16 square servings. ; name: chilean sea bass with ginger and lemon ; ingredients: sea bass steak, gingerroot, lemon, olive oil, salt, pepper ; preparation:In a baking dish, marinade for 20min up to a couple of hours. Ginger juice. Juice of 1 lemon. Drizzle with olive oil. Salt and pepper to taste. Preheat over to 450. Drain excess marinade. Cover dish with foil and bake for 20 minutes at 450. ; name: easy cheesy corn bake casserole ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, eggs, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, corn muffin mix, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: peach or nectarine clafouti ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, vanilla-flavored soymilk, sugar, plain fat-free yogurt, vanilla extract, eggs, peaches, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Lightly spoon flour into dry measuring cup, level with a knife. Combine flour and next 5 ingredients in a blender, process until smooth. Chill 30 minutes. Arrange peaaches or nectarines in a 13x9 inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Pour batter over fruit. Bake at 400f degrees for 35 minutes or until set. ; name: restaurant spanish rice ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, sweet onion, rice, water, chicken bouillon cube, kosher salt, enchilada sauce, carrot, green onion ; preparation:Saute onion in oil until translucent. Add rice and saute a few more minutes. Add remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Stir, cover and reduce heat to simmer. Simmer for twenty minutes without removing lid. Fluff with a fork and serve with chopped green onions on top. If using hot enchilada sauce, i would cut the amount in half at least. ; name: pat s cranberry banana bread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, bananas, cranberries, flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Beat together the butter, sugar and eggs until smooth. Stir in fruit. Blend dry ingredients in another bowl. Add all at once to the fruit mixture, stirring only to moisten. Scrape into greased loaf pan and bake at 350 degrees for 60 minutes until done. ; name: penne pasta with tomatoes and cheese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, plum tomatoes, dried basil, ground red pepper, chicken broth, penne pasta, havarti cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4. ; name: strawberry shag ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, powdered sugar, basil sprig, ice, vodka, lemon juice, soda water ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine the strawberries and sugar, toss well. Let sit for 15 minutes. In a cocktail shaker, combine the basil and strawberries and any juice collected in the bowl. Gently crush using a muddler or wooden spoon. Fill the shaker with ice, then add the vodka and lemon juice. Cap the shaker. Shake vigorously. Pour into a large glass, then top with soda water. Stir. Garnish with a strawberry and fresh basil. ; name: whole grain energy bar ; ingredients: honey, mini chocolate chip, millet, wheat germ, puffed kashi, oatmeal, natural-style peanut butter, raisins ; preparation:

name: poppy parmesan cigars ; ingredients: phyllo pastry, parmesan cheese, parsley, poppy seed ; preparation:Prehreat oven to 200c. Sprinkle one sheet of filo pastry with cheese and parsley, top with a second sheet of filo, sprinkle with cheese and parsley. Cut the pastry into 4, roll up tightly and repeat with remaining pastry sheets. Brush rolls with a little oil and sprinkle with poppy seeds. Bake on a lightly floured oven tray at 200c for 10 minutes. These are great served hot with soup. ; name: mexican prune chipotle pork ; ingredients: pork, prunes, fresh tomato, chipotle chile, cooking oil ; preparation:Prehat oven to 150c. Sear the meat on all sides on a pan in the hot oil. Place on a baking dish in the oven for one hour. Process rest of the ingredients in the blender, strain, and pour over the meat. Continue cooking in oven until meat isdone and sauce is bubbly. ; name: apple mustard glazed pork tenderloin ; ingredients: syrup, soy sauce, apple cider vinegar, grainy mustard, pork tenderloin ; preparation:Stir first 4 ingredients together to make the glaze. Pour half the glaze over the pork and stand for 15-30 minutes. Roast or grill pork at 350 degrees for 20-25 mins per side. Heat remaining glaze on stovetop or in microwave. Drizzle cooked pork with remaining glaze or serve on side as a dip. ; name: brussels sprouts in creamy mustard sauce ; ingredients: yogurt, dijon mustard, real maple syrup, salt, fresh dill, fresh ground black pepper, brussels sprout, butter ; preparation:Whisk together the first 6 ingredients in a medium sized bowl. Cover and let the mixture come to room temperature. Set aside. Quarter the sprouts, unless they are very small, in which case leave them whole. Melt butter in skillet. Add brussel sprouts and sprinkle lightly with salt if desired. Stir, cover, and cook over medium heat until quite tender. When they are done, transfer them to a bowl and pour sauce over the top. Serve right away. ; name: pepper beef steak packets ; ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, garlic powder, black pepper, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, teriyaki sauce, cooked rice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f or grill to medium-high. Sprinkle both sides of steak with garlic powder and pepper. Cut in thin strips. Combine steak strips and pepper strips with teriyaki sauce. Center one-fourth of the steak mixture on each sheet of foil. Bring up foil sides. Double fold top and ends to seal packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Repeat to make four packets. Bake 12 to 15 minutes on a cookie sheet in oven or grill 7 to 9 minutes in covered grill. Serve immediately over rice. Makes 4 servings. ; name: easy low fat curried zucchini soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, curry powder, zucchini, baking potato, broth, salt ; preparation:

name: ramp ribs ; ingredients: pork rib rack, ramps, garlic cloves, habanero peppers, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Rub the salt and pepper and garlic into both sides of the ribs. Place the ribs curve up on some aluminum foil. Place on the concave surfaced the ramps and sprinkle over with the hot peppers. Give it several dashes of vinegar.
