Wrap it up in foil and bake on the grill for 1 hour. Carefully open the foil and mush what is left of the ramps and smear over the meat. Place the meat on the grill and brown both sides. Baste the meat with the juice ramp mixture left in the foil. Just before removal coat well with your favorite barbecue sauce. Forget the napkins everyone will want to lick their fingers. ; name: madras chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast halves, canola oil, onion, juice, curry powder, mango chutney ; preparation:Saute chicken until slightly golden - about 3 minutes per side. Remove from pan. Add onion and curry and saute a couple of minutes. Return chicken to pan. Add fruit, juice and chutney. Simmer 10 minutes. Enjoy. ; name: dipped ice cream sandwiches ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, shortening, ice cream sandwiches, candy sprinkles ; preparation:Line a baking sheet with waxed paper. Set aside. In a microwave or heavy saucepan, melt the chocolate and shortening together and stir until smooth. Quickly dip the ice cream sandwiches halfway lengthwise in melted chocolate. Coat chocolate with sprinkles. Place on prepared baking sheet and freeze. ; name: hamburger casserole ; ingredients: hamburger, green beans, onion, sharp cheddar cheese, egg, tomato soup, potatoes ; preparation:Cook and mash potatoes, add egg to potatoes while mashing. Set aside. Brown hamburger and onion, drain. Add beans and soup, stir well. Place in a greased casserole dish. Put mashed potatoes on top of meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 350 for 35-40 minutes. ; name: waldorf astoria chocolate cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking soda, cocoa, cold water, miracle whip, vanilla ; preparation:Sift dry ingredients together into a large mixing bowl. Add moist ingredients and mix until well blended. Pour into a well-greased loaf pan. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. If you double, bake in well-greased bundt pan for 90 minutes. Allow to cool in pan before turning out or top will separate from the cake. Dust with powdered sugar bfore serving. ; name: horseradish topped cod ww ; ingredients: horseradish, lemon, garlic cloves, fennel seed, panko breadcrumbs, parsley, pepper, salt, cod fish fillets, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: marlin steak ; ingredients: marlin fillets, cajun seasoning, salt, pepper, olive oil, lemon wedges ; preparation:Season both fillets with cajun seasoning. Salt and pepper fish. Heat oil to hot in medium skillet. Slide in fish. Cook 2-3 minutes. Turn and cook 2-3 more minutes. Garnish with lemon wedge. Serve with tortilla chips and chunky tomato salsa. ; name: raspberry chicken lettuce wraps ; ingredients: raspberry preserves, olive oil, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, salt & fresh ground pepper, scallions, fresh raspberry, cooked chicken breast halves, bibb lettuce ; preparation:In a medium-size bowl, whisk together raspberry preserves, oil, vinegar, dijon mustard and salt and pepper. Add scallions and raspberries to vinaigrette. Add diced chicken and toss to combine with vinaigrette. Arrange lettuce on individual plates. Spoon chicken mixture over lettuce just before serving. ; name: cowboy casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, baked beans, barbecue sauce, bisquick baking mix, milk, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef and drain, preheat oven to 425f. Stir baked beans and barbecue sauce into beans heat to boiling while stirring, pour into sprayed 2 quart casserole dish. Stir bisquick mix, milk, and butter until dough forms. Drop by spoonfuls onto beef mixture. Bake uncovered 20 minutes until topping is golden brown. Sprinkle with cheese and cook about 3 minutes more or until cheese is melted. ; name: kalbi short ribs ; ingredients: soy sauce, water, honey, ginger, sesame seed oil, garlic cloves, green onion, apple cider, beef short ribs, sesame seeds ; preparation:Combine all sauce ingredients. Dip each piece of meat in the sauce. And layer in a flat dish or pan. Pour more marinade on top. Marinate. 4-12 hours. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Remove short ribs from marinade pat dry and discard marinade. Grill short ribs until slightly charred and tender and cooked to desired degree of doneness. Garnish with the sesame seeds and additional scallions if desired. ; name: monkfish kabobs ; ingredients: monkfish, sweet onion, red bell pepper, whole mushrooms, ground cumin, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, skewers ; preparation:Arrange monkfish, onion, bell peppers, and mushrooms onto skewers. If using wooden skewers, soak them 10 minutes in water to avoid flare-ups. Combine cumin, lemon juice, and oil in a small bowl. Grill kabobs, basting with sauce, for app. 5 minutes, until fish is cooked through. ; name: sweet carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, water, brown sugar, butter, white wine vinegar, salt ; preparation:

name: moist banana nut bread ; ingredients: sugar, eggs, butter, flour, baking soda, baking powder, bananas, nuts, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cream sugar, eggs and butter. Add dry ingredients. Add mashed bananas, nuts, cinnamon and vanilla. Cook in greased loaf pan for about an hour. For small-medium muffins. 20-30 minutes. ; name: spring vegetable pie ; ingredients: eggs, milk, swiss cheese, frozen chopped spinach, vegetable soup mix, frozen deep dish pie shell ; preparation:Preheat oven and baking sheet to 350. In large bowl, whisk eggs. Blend in milk, cheese, spinach and. Knorr recipe mix. Pour into frozen pie crust. Bake on baking sheet 60 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: quick herbed pizza dough ; ingredients: flour, dried yeast, olive oil, mixed italian herbs, sugar, salt, warm water ; preparation:Sift flour into a large mixing bowl, create a well in the middle. Add dried yeast, olive oil, sugar, salt. Add warm water. Knead for 3 min, adding a small splash of water as needed to incorporate all the flour. If too sticky, dust lightly over with flour and keep kneading. Add italian herbs. Knead for another 5 - 7 min, or until dough is elastic. Cover with plastic wrap, layer over a warm, damp towel and set for at least 30 min in a warm area for dough to rise. When dough has risen, punch down, lightly use. ; name: caramel butter sauce ; ingredients: sugar, water, salt, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream ; preparation:Combine sugar, water, salt, and cream of tartar in a heavy duty 2 quart saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sugar dissolves. Cover and cook 2 to 3 minutes to wash down sugar crystals from the sides of the pan. Remove cover, and cook without stirring, to a soft crack stage. Watch carefully for it to turn light amber. If it turns dark amber, it is burnt. Add the butter and whisk it in quickly. Remove from heat. Add cream and whisk it inches. Serve warm over ice cream, fresh fruit, cake, or apple crisp. ; name: mussels in guinness garlic ; ingredients: fresh mussels, shallot, garlic cloves, fresh thyme, guinness stout, half-and-half, unsalted butter, parsley, lemon wedge, french bread ; preparation:Put a stockpot or dutch oven over medium heat. When the pot is hot, add the mussels and remaining ingredients cook, stirring once or twice, for 6 to 8 minutes, or until mussels open. Discard any that do not open. To serve, divide the mussels among shallow bowls and ladle the broth over them. Sprinkle with the fresh parsley, and serve with a lemon wedge and slices of bread to sop up the juices. ; name: marvelous mushrooms ; ingredients: button mushrooms, olive oil, water, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: victorian tomato relish ; ingredients: tomatoes, onions, lebanese cucumbers, salt, sugar, malt vinegar, mustard, cayenne pepper, flour, curry powder ; preparation:Cut up the unskinned tomatoes, onions, and unpeeled cucumbers. Sprinkle with all the salt, stir it through, and leave overnight to draw out the liquid. Strain off liquid- as much as you can. Add sugar and vinegar. Boil till tender then add mustard and cayenne pepper. Mix flour and curry powder with extra vinegar and add to cooked tomatoes to thicken. Bottle in sterilized jars. Cover when cold. Can be used immediately and also keeps really well. ; name: basic chicken pot pie ; ingredients: onion, flour, margarine, mixed vegetables, chicken broth, milk, cooked chicken, pie crust ; preparation:Melt butter, add onions- saut for a minute, add flour, mix till pasty, add broth and milk. Stir constantly until creamy and thick,. Add veggies & chicken. Dump into a pie crust. Freeze now for later or bake 40-50 minutes at 350. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts with pine nuts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, dried thyme, dried oregano, pine nuts, kosher salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Cut the bottoms off the brussels sprouts and trim any damaged leaves. Cut in half. Add the rest of the ingredients into a bowl. Mix to combine. Add brussels sprouts and mix until coated. Put in a roasting pan in the oven for 45 minutes, stiring once after about 25 minutes, until brown and caramelized. ; name: polenta crackers ; ingredients: boiling water, polenta, mixed herbs, salt, soy margarine ; preparation:Bring water to a boil. Add polenta and herbs, and cook until creamy. Remove from heat, and add salt and margarine. On a well-oiled cookie sheet, spread out batter until thin. Score into pieces with a sharp knife. Bake in a 350 degree oven 30-55 minutes, until crispy and brown. Cool and serve. ; name: sweet chunky mango sauce ; ingredients: mangoes, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, allspice, caster sugar ; preparation:Separate mango slices from syrup and do not throw away the syrup. Mash mangoes until chunky. Place mangoes, mango syrup, nutmeg, cinnamon, allspice and caster sugar in mixing bowl. Mix the mixture and place in a saucepan. Place saucepan over high heat and stir ingredients slowly but constantly. When the mixture begins to simmer, turn down the heat to medium. Cook mixture until it is hot, but not boiling hot. Serve on ice-cream, pancakes or in a bowl. ; name: peanut butter n banana cookies sugar free ; ingredients: peanut butter, fat-free margarine, banana, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, splenda granular, baking soda, salt ; preparation:

name: dessert citrus sauce ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, water, butter, orange juice, orange peel, lemon juice ; preparation:In 1 quart saucepan, combine sugar and cornstarch. Gradually stir in water until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring often until boiling. Boil 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in butter, juice, and peel until butter is melted. Serve warm. ; name: ricotta spinach dip with chips ; ingredients: fresh spinach, ricotta cheese, scallions, radishes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh dill, water chestnut, parsley, olive, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Stem the spinach and clean it thoroughly. Dry completely using a salad spiner and mince fine. Place the ricotta in a medium large bowl. Use a wire whisk or wooden spoon to beat until quite smooth stir in the spinach and all other ingredients, except garnishes. Cover tightly and chill until very cold. Serve with chips, raw veggies, or good crackers. ; name: spicy shrimp prawn skewers ; ingredients: lime juice, honey, soy sauce, vegetable oil, jamaican jerk spice, hot pepper sauce, salt and pepper, prawns, wooden skewers ; preparation:Stir together the lime juice, honey, soy sauce, and oil in a large bowl. Season with jerk seasoning, hot pepper sauce, salt, and pepper. Add the prawns and toss well to coat. Cover, and refrigerate for one hour to marinate. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat. Remove skewers from the water, pat dry, and spray with nonstick cooking spray. Skewer the shrimp. Grill the shrimp on the grill on both sides until pink and opaque, about 5 minutes per side. ; name: mother s scratch cake ; ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, sugar, self-rising flour, vanilla, milk, cocoa ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease 13x9 inch pan and lightly flour. Mix eggs, oil, and sugar in large bowl with a fork. Add flour and milk in small amounts at a time. Add flavoring. Mix batter with a fork about 2 minutes. Pour batter into the pan. Bake for 30 to 40 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean or cake springs back when lightly touched in the center. ; name: apple raisin soup ; ingredients: apple juice, cooking apples, raisins, cinnamon sticks, brown sugar, brandy ; preparation:In a 2 quart saucepan combine the first 4 ingredients. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until the apples are tender. Stir in brandy and sugar, cook until dissolved. Remove cinnamon stick before serving. You can also put this in the blender before serving if desired. ; name: lebanese tomato salsa banadurah harrah ; ingredients: tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, cayenne pepper, dried mint ; preparation:

name: kalbi short ribs ; ingredients: soy sauce, water, honey, ginger, sesame seed oil, garlic cloves, green onion, apple cider, beef short ribs, sesame seeds ; preparation:Combine all sauce ingredients. Dip each piece of meat in the sauce. And layer in a flat dish or pan. Pour more marinade on top. Marinate. 4-12 hours. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Remove short ribs from marinade pat dry and discard marinade. Grill short ribs until slightly charred and tender and cooked to desired degree of doneness. Garnish with the sesame seeds and additional scallions if desired. ; name: scandinavian cucumber salad recipe ; ingredients: sour cream, parsley flakes, tarragon vinegar, sugar, chives, cucumbers ; preparation:Thinly slice unpeeled cucumbers - use can use a mandolin or slicer for nice paper thin slices. Should be about 3 cups. Whisk sour cream, parsley, vinegar, sugar, and chives in a small bowl. Fold in sliced cucumbers. Cover and chill for at least two hours. ; name: coffee with coconut milk ; ingredients: coconut milk, sweetened coconut, coffee, sugar ; preparation:In a casserole, heat the coconut milk and coconut at medium heat. Let simmer 15 to 20 minutes or until the mixture is creamy. Strain the mixture. Set aside. Grill the coconut in a preheated oven of 350 f until lightly gril. Set aside. Distribute the coconut milk and coffee in 4 mugs equally. Put sugar if you want and gasnish with grilled coconut. ; name: chili mint rub ; ingredients: leg of lamb, cooking oil, garlic, hot chili paste, fresh ground black pepper, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:Leave lamb to get to room temperature. Place all other items in food blender to create a paste. Spread half of mixture over lamb, alow to stand for 2 hours. Place in foil tray and cover with rest of mixture. Cover tray with foil. Cook for 1 hour in covered bbq. Remove foil and cook a further 30 minutes, or until done to your taste. Mint leaves to be loose packed. ; name: blueberry nut bread ; ingredients: blueberries, sugar, salt, oil, baking powder, nutmeats, lemon rind, eggs, milk, flour ; preparation:Sift dry ingredients together. Combine beaten eggs, milk and oil. Add to dry ingredients. Mix lightly to dampen. Stir in nutmeats and blueberries. Spoon into loaf pan. Let stand about 20 minutes. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. ; name: kahlua chocolate pecan pie ; ingredients: sugar, eggs, kahlua, pecan pieces, flour, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, deep dish pie shell ; preparation:

name: miracle hamburger stroganoff ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, mushrooms, garlic cloves, mushroom soup, water, miracle whip, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown ground beef. Add onions and cook until the onions are clear. Add mushrooms, continue cooking. After the mushrooms are warm add the minced garlic and continue cooking on low. Add soup and water, mix and simmer for about 10 minutes. Add miracle whip and salt and pepper to taste. Serve over noodles. ; name: spicy broccoli salad ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red bell pepper, miniature corn cobs, red onion, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, light brown sugar, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Steam broccoli florets for 2 minutes, then rinse quickly in cold water. Drain well. Place broccoli in serving bowl, adding the onions, bell peppers, and miniature corn. In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, oil, brown sugar and red pepper flakes. Just before serving toss dressing with vegetables. Season with salt. ; name: pork with apple butter sauce ; ingredients: olive oil flavored cooking spray, boneless butterfly pork loin chop, dried rosemary, salt & freshly ground black pepper, apple butter, prepared horseradish, apple cider vinegar ; preparation:Heat a nonstick skillet on medium high and spray with olive oil spray. Remove fat from pork and sprinkle with rosemary. Press rosemary into chops on both sides. Add to skillet and brown 2 minutes. Turn and brown second side 2 minutes. Sprinkle cooked side with salt and pepper to taste. Lower heat to medium low, cover and cook 2 minutes. A meat thermometer should read 160 degrees. Meanwhile mix apple butter, horseradish and cider vinegar together. Place pork chips on dinner plates and pour pan juices on top. Served seasoned apple butter on the side. ; name: carrots piedmontese ; ingredients: carrot, butter, onion, garlic, salt, vinegar, chives ; preparation:Cook carrots in boiling water 3 minutes then drain. Return carrots to saucepan. Add butter, onion, garlic and salt. Cover, cook over low heat 10 minutes or until carrots are tender crisp. Discard garlic. Add vinegar. Place in serving dish and sprinkle with chives. ; name: low fat carrot and fruit loaf ; ingredients: carrot, green apple, sultana, dried apricot, water, apple juice, raw sugar, cinnamon, self raising flour, bananas ; preparation:Place carrot, apple, dried fruit, water, juice, sugar and cinnamon in pot. Bring to the boil, simmer 15 minutes. Set aside to cool. Fold in sifted flours and bananas. Spoon mixture into greased loaf tin 10 x 20 cms. Bake 180 c for 50 - 60 minutes or until cooked when tested. Turn onto wire rack to cool. Slice and serve with butter. ; name: portuguese apple cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, oil, milk, eggs, baking powder, vanilla, apples, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: pizza turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, egg, onion, mushroom, garlic powder, oregano, black pepper, pizza sauce, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce. ; name: marinated garlicky mushrooms ; ingredients: garlic cloves, button mushrooms, shiitake mushrooms, tomatoes, lemon juice, olive oil, bay leaf, white wine, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Slice garlic thinly. Cut tomatoes in wedges. Trim mushrooms. Discard stems of shiitake mushrooms. Cut in bite size pieces. Sprinkle the button mushrooms with lemon juice to prevent darkening. Place oil, garlic slices and bay leaf in skillet. Heat until aroma is released. Add all mushrooms and stir fry over high heat. Swirl in white wine and season with salt and pepper. Marinate in refrigerator at least 1 hour. Garnish with tomato wedges and parsley. ; name: mahi mahi with blood orange avocado and red onion salsa ; ingredients: blood oranges, avocado, red onion, red jalapeno chiles, fresh lime juice, olive oil, mahi mahi fillets ; preparation:Using a small sharp knife, cut peel and white pith from orange, working over small bowl, cut between membrane to release segments. Add avocado, onion, jalapeo and lime juice to bowl with orange. Stir gently to blend. Season salsa to taste with salt. Heat oil in heavy medium skillet over medium-high heat. Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper. Add fish to skillet and saut until brown and cooked through, about 5 minutes per side. Place one fillet on each of the 2 plates. Spoon salsa over fish and serve. ; name: herbed chicken en casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, butter, cream of chicken soup, sauterne, water chestnut, canned mushroom, green peppers, dried thyme ; preparation:Lightly season chicken with salt and pepper. Brown slowly in butter in skillet arrange browned chicken skin side up in baking dish. To dripping in skillet add mushroom soup and wine, stirring to combine. Add remaining ingredients and stir to combine. Heat to boiling. Pour sauce over chicken. Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes. Uncover and cook for an additional 15 to 20 minutes or until chicken is done. Serve with hot, fluffy rice. ; name: easy peasy bisquick cherry cobbler ; ingredients: cherry pie filling, milk, sugar, bisquick, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Melt butter in microwave safe bowl. Stir together milk, sugar, bisquick, vanilla and butter. Pour batter in 9 x 9 inch glass dish. Pour cherry pie filling in and press down gently with spoon so that most of the filling is covered with your batter. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour. Important - as soon as the cobbler is done cooking place on towel inside refrigerator and cool for at least 4 hours. This step is very important for your crust to turn out buttery. ; name: butterscotch apple pecan cobbler ; ingredients: nestl toll house butterscotch flavored morsels, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, cinnamon, tart apples, butter, pecans, quick oats ; preparation:

name: seafood salad crab salad spread ; ingredients: seafood, cream cheese, seafood cocktail sauce, cracker ; preparation:Mix cream cheese and seafood salad. On a dinner sized plate, mold mixture into a ring, leaving room on outside of ring for crackers. Pour cocktail sauce in the middle of ring. Chill until served. Arrange cracker assortment around plate, outside of salad ring. ; name: tom yum spicy thai soup ; ingredients: shrimp, kaffir lime leaves, tomatoes, mushrooms, water, lemongrass, fish sauce, lime juice, red chili peppers, chili paste ; preparation:Pour water into medium saucepan and place over high head on stove. Bring to boil and add kaffir lime leaves & lemon grass. Cook for 2 minutes. Reduce to low heat, add fish sauce, lime juice, fresh ground red chili, and chili paste in soy bean oil. Add mushrooms & tomatoes. Cook for several minutes. Add shrimp or chicken. Turn heat to high, do not stir. When shrimp or chicken is cooked, continue to cook for 2 minutes more. Serve with hot rice. ; name: roasted turkey panini ; ingredients: focaccia bread, turkey breast, dried cranberries, sharp cheddar cheese, red onion, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Saute the dried cranberries and red onion in olive oil for two minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add one tablespoon of water to keep ingredients moist. Set cranberry compote aside. Slice the rosemary & onion focaccias in half, then slice horizontally to create the top and bottom sandwich portions. Cover the bottom half of the focaccia with cranberry compote and top with 4 ounces of roasted turkey breast and one slice of sharp cheddar cheese. Place top of focaccia over sandwich. Grill over medium-high heat on both sides. ; name: sarah s fabulous summer pasta salad ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, dried tubular pasta, fresh basil leaf, sea salt, black pepper ; preparation:Put pasta on to boil. Halve tomatoes. Place tomatoes in large bowl with all other remaining ingredients, stir well, cover and leave. When pasta is al dente, drain, and then add to tomato mixture. The warm pasta will semi-cook the basil and garlic, releasing its flavour. Serve immediately, with crusty italian bread and a nice glass of red wine. ; name: maple glazed delicata squash ; ingredients: maple syrup, fresh sage leaf, delicata squash, olive oil, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees. Cut off squash ends, halve lengthwise, seeded and sliced into 1 inch half moons. In a small saucepan, combine maple syrup and sage, bring to simmer, reduce heat to low, cover and cook 15 minutes, set aside, covered. In a bowl, toss squash slices with olive oil and salt. Transfer to a a foil lined baking sheet in a single layer, bake at 400 for 20 minutes. Pour maple syrup mixture evenly on top of squash, bake 20 minutes more until squash is browned and tender. ; name: sausages with oregano mushrooms and olives ; ingredients: sausages, sunflower oil, dried oregano, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, beef stock, black olives, mushrooms ; preparation:

name: cinnamon tea cakes ; ingredients: butter, crisco shortening, sugar, vanilla, eggs, cinnamon, self-rising flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, with electric mixer at medium speed, beat together butter and shortening until light and fluffy. Add sugar and cream together until very light. Add vanilla, scraping down sides of bowl as needed. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each egg. Gradually fold in flour until a soft, workable dough forms. Shape into balls and place on cookie sheets. Dip the bottom of a flat bottomed glass in sugar and use it to mash down the balls of dough. Bake in preheated oven until done. Immediately remove from pan to cool. ; name: scotch eggs baked not fried ; ingredients: bread, milk, ground sausage, egg, parsley, ground nutmeg, salt and pepper, bacon, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 200 degrees celsius or 375 degrees fahrenheit. Soak the bread in the milk for 1 minute. Squeeze dry. Combine the bread, sausage meat, raw egg, parsley, nutmeg, salt and pepper. Mix well. Lightly oil a 12 cup muffin tray. Line each cup with a slice of bacon. Cover with a layer of sausage mixture. Add a hard boiled egg, pointy end up. Enclose the egg completely with more sausage meat mixture. Bake uncovered for 20 minutes or until cooked through. ; name: okinawa pork ears in sesame sauce mimigar gomaae ; ingredients: pork, toasted sesame seeds, sugar, soy sauce, vinegar ; preparation:Bring water in a pot to a boil then boil the pork ear for about a minute. Take the pork ears from the boiling water then set aside and use a strainer to drain. Grind the toasted sesame seeds with a mortar and pestle. For some texture, you can leave some sesame seeds unground. In a small bowl, combine the ground sesame seeds, sugar, soy sauce and vinegar then mix well. In a larger bowl, combine the drained pork ears and the sesame sauce. Mix well until the ingredients are well combined. Put on a serving plate then top with some more toasted sesame seeds before serving. ; name: rogene s yummie potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, green onion, chicken stock, cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes till tender, peel and grate. Heat the butter with soup and chicken stock. Blend in sour cream, onion, and most of the cheese. Mix with the potatoes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Spread into a 9x13 baking dish. Mix the bread crumbs with the melted butter and then place on top of the potatoe mixture. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese. Bake for 45 min at 350 degrees or until bubbly. ; name: turkey cranberry bites ; ingredients: light mayonnaise, honey mustard, pepper, turkey breast, celery, fresh parsley, dried cranberries, swiss cheese, walnuts, miniature phyllo cups ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Measure mayo, mustard and black pepper into bowl. Add chopped turkey, chopped celery, chopped parsley, chopped cranberries, shredded cheese, and walnuts. Stir to combine. Spoon into mini phyllo cups and bake for 12 to 15 minutes until heated through. ; name: pork chops in onion sauce ; ingredients: pork chops, pepper, vegetable oil, red wine, cornstarch, salt, unbleached flour, onions, beef broth ; preparation:

name: biscotti di pepe taralli italian pepper biscuits ; ingredients: dry yeast, warm water, flour, salt, black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Dissolve yeast in water. Sift flour salt and pepper onto mixing board. Make a well in the center and add yeast and oil. Blend together and gradually incorporate into flour. The dough will be stiff. Knead 10 minutes. Place in oiled bowl, turn to coat, cover with towel and let rise until doubled in bulk. Preheat oven to 375. Break off small pieces of dough and roll into ropes about 6 inches long. Form a ring and pinch edges together. Place on baking sheet and let rise 20 minutes. Brush with oil and bake 12 to 15 minutes or until lightly browned. ; name: easy canned green beans ; ingredients: cut green beans, white vinegar, beef bouillon cube, water, vegetable oil ; preparation:Pour green beans into small cooking pot. Add water, vinegar, boulion cube and oil. Bring to a boil. Turn down to medium. Simmer for approximatly 45 minutes, or until most all the liquid has evaporated. ; name: the black swan house dressing ; ingredients: garlic cloves, sugar, dry mustard, salt, sour cream, red wine vinegar, oil, parsley, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:In a food processor place the garlic, sugar, mustard, salt, and sour cream. Add the vinegar. Blend on continuous speed. In a thin stream, slowly add the oil. When blended, fold in the parsley and pepper. ; name: delicious vegetarian gravy ; ingredients: butter, onion, carrots, celery, peppercorns, bay leaves, flour, vegetable broth ; preparation:In a medium sauce pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion, carrots, celery, celery leafs, peppercorns, and bay leafs. Cook until very dark but not burned. 40-50 minutes. Stir in the flour and cook for 2-3 minutes. Slowly pour in the broth while stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, and then drop the heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes. Strain through a cheesecloth and serve immediately. Enjoy. ; name: tre s shepherds pie ; ingredients: ground beef, frozen mixed vegetables, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, onion powder, black peppercorns, mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, combine all the ingredients except the potatoes and cheese over high heat. Mix well. Cook for 5 to 8 minutes, or until heated through, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat and and put into a deep cassarole dish. Dollop with the potatoes. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. Cover with grated cheese last 10 minutes of cooking. Serve immediately. ; name: veggie pot pie ; ingredients: olive oil, red onion, celery, vegetables, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, cumin, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: macadamia crusted tilapia with pineapple salsa ; ingredients: flour, egg, macadamia nuts, tilapia fillets, fresh pineapple, red onion, jalapeno, cilantro ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Dredge fish in flour, then egg, then nuts. Place on oiled baking sheet. Bake 20 minutes until golden brown. Make the salsa as far ahead as possible to allow time for flavors to meld. Combine all salsa ingredients and refrigerate. Serve over fish. ; name: easy bake oven english muffin pizza ; ingredients: english muffin, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Separate the english muffins and place on a baking sheet. Top each with about 1 tbs. Of prepared sauce. Top with any additional pre-cooked toppings. Top with shredded cheese. Bake in your easy-bake oven for about 15-20 minutes. ; name: boneless honey mustard grilled pork loin ; ingredients: boneless pork loin, honey mustard, dijon mustard, orange juice, cajun seasoning, pepper, lemon pepper ; preparation:Wash the pork loin under cold water and pat dry with a paper towel. Take a fork and poke holes all over the loin, even the ends. Mixing all the wet ingredients in a small bowl, set aside. In another bowl, mix all the dry ingredients making sure the loin is dry, shake the dry ingredients all over the loin the front, back and the ends. Rub the dry seasoning on the loin making sure it is well covered and worked all in the loin. With a brush spread the wet ingredients all over the loin. Put the loin in a plastic bag, casserole dish or baking roaster and put back into frig for a minium of 12 hours, 24 is even better. Grill on low to medium heat until the thick part of the loin reaches 170. In a oven bake at 350 until the thickest part of the loin is 170. Enjoy. ; name: peach shortcake muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, ginger, margarine, milk, peaches, cinnamon ; preparation:Combine first five ingredients in large bowl. Cut in margarine with pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Add milk and peaches, stirring just until blended. Spoon into greased muffin cups. Sprinkle with topping mixture. Bake at 400f for 20-25 minutes or until set and golden. ; name: breaded chicken fingers ; ingredients: chicken breasts, egg, buttermilk, garlic powder, all-purpose flour, seasoned bread crumbs, salt, baking powder, oil ; preparation:Place chicken strips into a large, resealable plastic bag. In a small bowl, mix the egg, buttermilk and garlic powder. Pour mixture into bag with chicken. Seal and refrigerate 2 to 4 hours. In another large, resealable plastic bag, mix together the flour, bread crumbs, salt and baking powder. Remove chicken from refrigerator, drain, discarding buttermilk mixture. Place chicken in flour mixture bag. Seal and shake to coat. Heat oil in a large, heavy skillet to 375 degrees. Carefully place coated chicken in hot oil. Fry until golden brown and juices run clear. Drain on paper towels. ; name: martini by the sea ; ingredients: sliced almonds, white fish fillets, water, vermouth, salt, fresh ground pepper, butter, parsley, lemon wedge ; preparation:

name: grammy s bbq sauce ; ingredients: ketchup, brown sugar, white vinegar, onions, garlic, dried mustard, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Toss all ingredients into a pot. Cook over medium heat and bring to slow boil then reduce heat to lower setting and continue cooking for about 15 to 30 min longer. Best if used on ribs or chicken. Can use this sauce if baking or bbq. Usually, depending on the qty i am cooking, i have to double or triple this recipe. ; name: tex mex chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salsa, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, avocado, garlic salt, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in plastic zippered bag with salsa or picante sauce. Zip shut and refrigerate 1 hour. Place on barbecue grill and cook for 5 minutes on each side. Top with cheese and close top of grill until cheese melts. Spread bottoms of each hamburger bun with avocado mixture. Top with lettuce, tomato, chicken breasts and top of buns. ; name: chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cornstarch, salt, baking soda, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: liver and onions w gravy ; ingredients: flour, black pepper, salt, extra virgin olive oil, beef liver, onion, beef broth ; preparation:Place enough flour in a large bowl to coat the liver. Add salt and pepper. Slice liver and dredge in seasoned flour. Place olive oil in a large skillet and brown both sides of the liver over medium high heat. Place sliced onions in the skillet with the liver. Pour beef broth on top of liver and onions. Cover and simmer on low until onions are tender and broth forms a nice gravy. ; name: old farmer s almanac butterscotch icebox cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, nuts ; preparation:Cream together butter and brown sugar until light. Add egg and vanilla, and mix well. Stir together flour, salt, and baking powder and add to sugar-egg-butter mix, mixing well. Stir in nuts. Form dough into a 2-inch-diameter log and wrap in foil or waxed paper. Chill for 12 to 24 hours. Slice and bake on ungreased cookie sheets at 400 degrees f for 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: maple glazed beets ; ingredients: beets, margarine, maple syrup, lemon ; preparation:

name: creamy italian crock pot chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing mix, water, cream cheese, cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces ; preparation:Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine salad dressing mix and water. Pour over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Stir in mushrooms, pour over chicken, and cook 1 hours longer or until chicken juices run clear. Serve over rice or noodles. ; name: special occasion chicken ; ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, sliced mushrooms, shallots, salt, pepper, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Melt butter in skillet over medium heat. Add chicken and cook 10 minutes. Turn chicken. Add shallots and mushrooms, sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook 10 minutes or until cooked through. Chicken should be browned on both sides. Remove and sprinkle with cheese. ; name: boston cream poke cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, french vanilla pudding mix, milk, chocolate frosting ; preparation:Make cake according to package instructions. Mix pudding mix with milk. Whisk until lumps are gone, about 2 minutes. Pudding should be pourable but not thin. While cake is still warm, poke holes in cake using a wooden spoon. Pour pudding over cake and gently press pudding into cake. Cool cake in the refrigerator. Remove foil from frosting. Microwave for 10-15 seconds and stir. Frosting should be pourable but not bubbly. Pour over cake and spread gently. ; name: center cut ham on the grill ; ingredients: ham, brown sugar, lemon juice, prepared horseradish, yellow mustard, vegetable oil ; preparation:Mix together the basting sauce ingredients and stir until smooth. Cover and let sit in refrigerator at least 1 hour. Prepare your grill medium to medium-high heat. Place ham slices on prepared grill and baste with some of the sauce. Grill for 1 hour, basting and turning every 15 minutes. ; name: roast rack of pork with port sauce ; ingredients: pork loin, salt, pepper, rosemary, garlic, olive oil, low sodium beef broth, port wine ; preparation:Rub salt, pepper and rosemary into the meat. Then pat garlic on. Make several slits with knife and stuff some garlic in the holes. Heat olive oil in large pan on high heat, add meat. Brown about 12-15 minutes transfer to baking pan that can be used on the stove top and bake 1 hour at 375 degrees. Remove meat and pour fat from the pan. Add port wine to the pan, heat on high, loosen all remnants stuck to bottom of pan as you go. Lower heat to medium high and add stock. Let it come to a slow boil for about 15 minutes to reduce. Skim off excess fat, serve with pork. ; name: mini pork and apple meat loaves ; ingredients: ground lean pork, onion, apple, fresh parsley, garlic, egg, breadcrumbs, barbecue sauce ; preparation:

name: bar b q chicken pizza ; ingredients: thin pizza crust, hickory flavored barbecue sauce, red peppers, yellow peppers, chicken breasts, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Spread bar-b-q sauce evenly over pizza crust. Top with sliced chicken breasts. Place red and yellow peppers rings over the chicken. Spread monterey jack on top of pizza. Bake in 350f oven for 20 minutes. ; name: italian baked chicken ; ingredients: butter, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, and crushed garlic. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through. ; name: japanese pickled daikon and carrot salad ; ingredients: carrot, daikon radish, salt, rice vinegar, japanese soy sauce, fresh ginger, sugar ; preparation:Peel and finely shred carrot and daikon. Put vegetables into large bowl. Sprinkle with salt and let stand for 30 minutes. Gently squeeze out as much water as possible from vegetables. In a bowl, combine vinegar, soy sauce, ginger and sugar, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add vegetables and refrigerate for 8 hours. Salad will keep for up to 1 week in sealed container in refrigerator. ; name: spinach and corn tortilla bake ; ingredients: fresh cilantro leaves, scallions, salt and pepper, baby spinach, corn tortillas, kidney beans, salsa, monterey jack pepper cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425f. In a food processor, combine cilantro, scallions, salt and pepper with as much spinach as will fit. Pulse, adding the rest of the spinach in batches, until all is coarsely chopped. Coat an 8-9 inch square baking dish with butter or oil. Lay 4 tortillas in the bottom of dish, overlapping slightly. Layer with half of beans, salsa, spinach mixture and cheese. Repeat with remaining ingredients, ending with cheese and pressing in gently. Cover dish with foil, place on a rimmed baking sheet. Bake until bubbling, 25-30 minutes. Remove foil, and continue baking until golden, 15-20 minutes more. Cool for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: spicy citrus grilled chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, lime, juice and zest of, orange, juice and zest of, olive oil, dried oregano, garlic cloves, jalapeno pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f. ; name: baked curry tofu ; ingredients: frozen orange juice concentrate, fresh lime juice, curry powder, firm tofu ; preparation:

name: easy green beans masala ; ingredients: green beans, butter, garam masala, salt, tomatoes ; preparation:Cook green beans until tender and immediately cool in cold water to stop cooking. Melt butter in pan. When it is lightly browned, add garam masala and salt. Add grean beans and toss to coat. Serve with chopped tomato sprinkled over the top. ; name: texas oven brisket ; ingredients: beef brisket, barbecue sauce, worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, celery salt, lemon pepper, salt, onion, water ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 275f degrees. In a large pyrex baking dish, thoroughly mix all ingredients for sauce. Put the brisket in the baking dish, and turn it over once to coat it with the sauce. Sela the dish tightly with havy-duty aluminum foil. Bake at 275f degrees. For 5 to 7 hours. Remove from oven and allow to stand for 1 hour before slicing. Slice across the grain, and serve with sauce. Makes 8 to 10 servings. Be sure to use a pyrex baking dish or a very heavy metal pan. Also, before you prepare the brisket, remove it from the refrigerator far enough ahead of time to allow it to come to room temperature. ; name: low fat chole chickpea curry ; ingredients: olive oil, diced tomatoes, chickpeas, onion, ginger paste, garlic paste, cumin powder, garam masala, salt, cilantro ; preparation:Add olive oil to medium heat. Once oil is hot add onions and salt. Once onions are sauted, add ginger and garlic paste fry for 1 minute. Add in tomatoes and cook until it becomes like a gravy. Add chickpeas in and add 4 cups water and all spices. Let this boil until chickpeas are soft and smash some of chickpeas. Once water thickens this dish is ready to serve --. ; name: palmer s pecan popovers ; ingredients: butter, honey, lemon rind, all-purpose flour, salt, milk, eggs, pecans ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients, stir well, and chill. Combine flour and next 3 ingredients. Beat with a wire whisk just until smooth. Stir in pecans. Pour batter evenly into six greased custard cups. Bake at 425 degrees for 30 minutes or until golden. Serve immediately with chilled butter. ; name: clam soup portuguese ; ingredients: clams, bacon, onion, olive oil, butter, water, uncooked rice, peas ; preparation:Leave clams overnight in salted water and then wash thoroughly in several waters to clean all the sand. Dice bacon and onion and saut with oil and butter in deep pot. Add clams and a parsley sprig. Cover and allow simmering slowly for about 20 minutes, stirring from time to time so onions do not burn. Add water. When this comes to a boil, add rice. Add 10 ounces frozen peas to the soup when rice is soft. Allow to come to a boil again and then turn heat down, allowing soup to simmer slowly until rice has softened almost to a paste. Remove all empty shells which have loosened from the clams. ; name: brussels sprouts in browned butter ; ingredients: brussels sprout, butter, nutmeg, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: vegan apple pie pancakes ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, oats, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, soymilk, raisins, apple ; preparation:In medium bowl, stir together flour, oats, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt. Add milk, raisins, and apples. Stir gently till just mixed. Portion batter onto hot non-stick pan and cover. Let sit on medium heat until center starts to bubble and becomes sturdy. Flip and cook other side till golden brown. Repeat with remaining batter. Makes 2 large or 4 small pancakes. ; name: tarragon scallops ; ingredients: sea scallops, garlic clove, unsalted butter, dried tarragon, paprika, parmesan cheese ; preparation:If some scallops are a lot larger than others, you may want to cut the larger ones in half. Rinse scallops and pat dry with paper towels. In a skillet heat butter over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and lightly sautee for about 1 minute. Add scallops and tarragon. Cook for about 6-7 minutes or until scallops are opaque. Turning each once halfway through cooking. Sprinkle with paprika and parmesan cheese and serve immediately. ; name: easy peasy meatballs over buttered noodles ; ingredients: condensed cream of celery soup, condensed french onion soup, sour cream, frozen meatballs, egg noodles, butter ; preparation:In a large slow cooker, mix together the cream of celery soup, french onion soup, and sour cream. Stir in the meatballs. Cook on high heat for 3-4 hours. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. In a large bowl, toss the pasta with butter. Serve meatballs and sauce over the cooked pasta. ; name: dijon crusted pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, dijon mustard, fresh rosemary, seasoned bread crumbs, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes. ; name: cheesy beef noodles ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato sauce, taco seasoning, sharp cheddar cheese, egg noodles ; preparation:Brown and drain ground beef. Cook and drain noodles. Mix ground beef, tomato sauce and taco seasoning. Spread noodles in the bottom of a 9x13 pan. Spread beef mixture over noodles. Mix slightly. Cover with cheese. Bake 350 for about 20 minutes until heated though and cheese is melted. ; name: arkansas green beans ; ingredients: green beans, bacon, brown sugar, butter, soy sauce, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: quick and easy tuna noodle casserole ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, elbow macaroni, water, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, peas ; preparation:Boil noodles. Then strain. Mix in cream of mushroom soup and tuna. Pour into casserole dish. Sprinkle cheese of top. Bake at 350 until cheese is melted. Let cool and serve. ; name: potatoes on the half shell ; ingredients: baking potatoes, milk, butter, egg, salt, pepper, green onion, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f degrees. Scrub the potatoes and place them in the oven until done, about 1 hour. Cut each potato in half, lengthwise. Carefully, scoop out the potato and place in a bowl. Set the potato shells aside to use later. While still hot, mash the potatoes with the milk, beaten egg, and butter. Beat until fluffy. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Add in the onion. Spread the potato shells with butter and fill each shell with the potato mixture. Sprinkle the tops with parmesan cheese. Bake until tops are browned. ; name: chicken and dumplings for 2 ; ingredients: flour, water, chicken broth, chicken, salt, pepper, dumplings, baking powder, milk ; preparation:In a small skillet, whisk together the water, and flour until smooth. Slowly stir in the broth, heating over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Add chicken, salt, and pepper. Cover, and reduce heat to low. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a small bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt and pepper. Stir in the milk unitl the mixture forms a thick batter. Drop the batter on top of the chicken a tablespoonful at a time. Cover and cook on low, 15 minutes or until the dumplings are cooked through. ; name: glazed bacon ; ingredients: bacon, flour, brown sugar, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Line cookie sheet with parchment paper to keep from sticking. Combine flour, sugar and pepper in a gallon plastic bag. Put one bacon slice at a time in bag and shake to coat well. Place bacon on the cookie sheet so they are not touching each other. Bake for 30-40 minutes at 300 degrees. Drain on paper towels. ; name: caramel butter pecan bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, pecans, caramel ice cream topping, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour and brown sugar in a bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Press into bottom of an ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Top with pecans. Drizzle warmed caramel topping evenly over pecans. Bake at 350 f for 15-20 minutes or until caramel is bubbly. Place on wire rack. Sprinkle with chocolate chips. Let stand 5 minutes, then spread chocolate chips over caramel-pecan layer. Cool for at least 6 hours at room temp or until chocolate has set. Cut into bars. ; name: chicken breasts with portabella mushrooms ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoned bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, egg, shallot, olive oil, portabella mushrooms, parsley, black pepper, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: radish olive salad with mustard vinaigrette ; ingredients: radishes, kalamata olive, scallions, olive oil, white vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic, salt, black pepper, boston lettuce leaves ; preparation:Combine radishes, olives and scallions in a small bowl. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper together. Pour over radish mixture and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate. To serve, place one or two boston lettuce leaves on each plate and divide salad evenly among plates. ; name: aunt helen s green congealed salad ; ingredients: cottage cheese, crushed pineapple, evaporated milk, lime jell-o gelatin, cider vinegar, celery, nuts, boiling water ; preparation:Dissolve jellow in boiling water. Add vinegar. Chill til thickened. Whip evaporated milk. Fold into thickened jello together with remaining ingredients. Turn into buttered 8 cup mold and chill til firm. ; name: maple pecan pork chops ; ingredients: spicy brown mustard, pepper, maple syrup, pork loin chops with bone, butter, unsweetened apple juice, pecan halves ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine the mustard, pepper and 2 teaspoons syrup. Brush over both sides of pork chops. In a large nonstick skillet, brown pork in butter over medium heat for 2-3 minutes on each side. Add apple juice. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until meat is tender. Remove chops and keep warm. Add pecans and remaining syrup to the skillet. Cook and stir for 1-2 minutes or until blended. Serve over pork chops. ; name: teriyaki sirloin strips ; ingredients: sirloin steaks, soy sauce, rice vinegar, brown sugar, onions, oil, garlic, ground ginger, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place steak strips into a large glass bowl. Combine all remaining ingredients. Pour over the meat and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate over night. Drain and discard the marinade. Thread meat loosely on skewers. Grill over coal for 7-10 minutes. Until meat reaches desired doneness. ; name: low fat pumpkin scones ; ingredients: self-raising flour, sugar, butter, pumpkin, egg, salt, milk, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 220c. Cream butter and sugar together. In a large bowl, place flour and salt. Add the egg, pumpkin, creamed butter and sugar and milk to dry mixture and mix with a wooden spoon until just combined. Depending on the wetness of the mixture, you may need to add a little more milk. Lightly grease muffin tray with canola spray and spoon mixture into tray. Bake at 220c for 10-15 mins, or until tops of muffins spring back when lightly touched. ; name: cranberry apple salad ; ingredients: cranberries, heavy whipping cream, sugar, walnuts, fuji apple, powdered sugar ; preparation:

name: grilled ham with glaze ; ingredients: brown sugar, prepared horseradish, lemon juice, ham steak ; preparation:In small saucepan, bring first 3 ingredients to a boil. Boil 1 minute. Remove from heat. Brush on the ham. Grill over med hot coals, turning once, until hot. Baste with more glaze. ; name: beer cheese logs ; ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, fresh italian parsley, paprika, beer, toasted almond ; preparation:Beat cream cheese, and cheddar. Add snipped fresh parsley and paprika. Beat until combined. Gradually beat in the warmed beer and beat until nearly smooth. Cover and chill one hour. Mould with hands and shape into a log. Insert almonds along the top. Some times i add a little more beer and spoon into little crocks-- chill 3 to 24 hours. ; name: caramel frosting ; ingredients: unsalted butter, powdered sugar, light brown sugar, milk, dark corn syrup, vanilla ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight. ; name: brown sugar rubbed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, brown sugar, paprika, onion powder, salt, chili powder ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high. Combine sugar and spices in a resealable plastic bag. Wash hands. Add chicken to bag, one piece at a time, shaking to coat. Transfer to plate. Spray on both sides with nonstick cooking spray. Wash hands. Grill chicken, turning frequently to avoid burning sugar, 10 to 12 minutes or until done. ; name: italian poutine ; ingredients: vegetable oil, spaghetti sauce, potatoes, cheese curds ; preparation:Heat oil in a deep fryer or deep heavy skillet to 365 degrees f. Warm spaghetti sauce in saucepan or microwave. Place the fries into the hot oil, and cook until light brown, about 5 minutes. Remove to a paper towel lined plate to drain. Place the fries on a serving platter, and sprinkle the cheese over them. Ladle spaghetti sauce over the fries and cheese, and serve immediately. Top with a bit of parmesan cheese. ; name: lumberjack hash ; ingredients: vegetable oil, butter, onion, green bell pepper, garlic cloves, frozen hash brown potatoes, salt, black pepper, ham, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: creamy peppercorn steaks ; ingredients: black peppercorns, white pepper, new york strip steaks, salt, butter, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce, half-and-half ; preparation:Mix the peppercorns and white pepper. Rub over both sides of meat. Chill 1 hour. Sprinkle salt in large skillet, heat on high until salt starts to brown. Sear steaks on both sides. Add butter, reduce heat to med and cook for 2 minutes per side. Add worcestershire sauce and tobasco, cook each side 2 more minutes, or until desired doneness. Remove steaks. Add cream, cook and stir until smooth. ; name: kaasteefjes ; ingredients: edam cheese, bread, butter, prepared mustard, egg, salt, pepper, milk ; preparation:Blend butter and mustard, spread on all pieces of bread. Cover 3 slices of bread with sliced cheese. Cover with other slice of bread. Mix remaining ingredients and dip sandwiches in mixture. Fry sandwiches in butter til golden brown on each side. ; name: coconut lentil soup ; ingredients: red lentils, fresh ginger, onion, garlic clove, oil, turmeric, chicken stock, crushed tomatoes, coconut milk ; preparation:Rinse and drain lentils. Finely chop ginger, onion and garlic clove. Heat oil in a pot and saut chopped ginger, onion and garlic until softened. Add turmeric, hot chicken stock, crushed tomatoes and the lentils. Bring to boil and allow to simmer for 20 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender until smooth and return to the pot. Add coconut milk and heat gently. ; name: creamsicle jello shots ; ingredients: orange jell-o, boiling water, orange juice, water, triple sec, vodka ; preparation:Dissolve jello in boiling water. Stir for about 3 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and pour into shot containers. Chill for 4 hours and enjoy. If you have fresh squeezed oj that is the way to go. ; name: chicken hominy soup ; ingredients: chicken, oil, white onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, dried oregano, salt, red chili powder, hominy ; preparation:Brown chicken in oil in a pot. Remove chicken with a slotted spoon and keep warm. Heat the pot to medium and add onion and garlic and saut till the onion softens. Add chicken, chicken broth, oregano, salt and chili powder to pot. Reduce heat to low cover and cook for 90 minutes. Add hominy cook 15 more minutes. This is the time to check the seasonings and adjust to taste. Ladle into soup bowls garnish with onion, cilantro, lime, cheese. Warm tortillas on the side always please the belly. ; name: pafect tuna sandwich ; ingredients: tuna, mayonnaise, pickle relish, honey mustard, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: chocolate banana bread puddings ; ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, bananas, milk, eggs, pure vanilla extract, white bread, milk chocolate candy bars ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes. ; name: banana nutmeg bread pudding ; ingredients: pam cooking spray, bananas, whole grain bread, splenda sugar substitute, splenda brown sugar blend, egg white, nonfat milk, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly spray baking dish & arrange the banana slices in the bottom. Top with the bread squares, being sure to cover the banana. Whisk the splenda, egg whites, milk, and nutmeg together in a bowl and pour over the bread. Bake in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes or until risen & golden. ; name: easy peasy quick chocolate orange cake ; ingredients: caster sugar, margarine, flour, egg, baking powder, cocoa powder, vanilla essence, orange, juice and zest of ; preparation:Cream the butter and sugar together. Add the egg and the flour and baking powder. Add the orange rind and juice coco powder and vanilla essence. Mix well and pour into microwavable dish. Zap for five minutes in the microwave on medium. Serve with custard. ; name: skillet chicken cacciatore ; ingredients: italian dressing, onion, green bell pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, italian seasoning, sugar, stewed tomatoes ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat italian dressing. Add onion, bell pepper, and chicken. Mix well to combine, and cook over moderate heat for approximately 6 minutes, stirring occasionally. In a small bowl, combine italian seasoning, sugar, and undrained stewed tomatoes. Spoon this over the chicken evenly, and lower heat so chicken is just simmering. Simmer for about 12-14 minutes, stirring occasionally. When chicken is fork-tender, it is ready to be served over hot noodles. ; name: easy crock pot teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken thighs, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, fresh ginger, garlic cloves ; preparation:Wash and dry chicken. Place in slow cooker. Combine remaining ingredients. Pour over chicken. Cover. Cook on high 1 hours reduce heat to low, cook 6-7 hours. ; name: curried apples and celery ; ingredients: celery, onion, butter, tart apple, flour, curry powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: tex mex taco soup ; ingredients: ground beef, garlic cloves, whole kernel corn, pinto beans, kidney beans, salsa, taco seasoning, ranch dressing mix, water, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a dutch oven or other large pot, over medium-high heat, brown ground beef with garlic until beef is crumbly. Drain well. Add remaining ingredients, except for cheese, and stir. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat and simmer for 45-60 minutes. Serve in bowls, if desired over broken tortilla chips. Top with grated cheese to garnish when serving. ; name: shrimp and broccoli stir fry spicy ; ingredients: broccoli, medium shrimp, rice wine vinegar, soy sauce, chicken broth, garlic, ground ginger, red pepper flakes, cornstarch ; preparation:In a large sauce pan. Add the vinegar, garlic, red pepper flakes, broth, soy sauce, and ginger. Bring to a slight boil. Add shrimp and fresh or frozen but thawed broccoli florets. Take some of the excess sauce and pour into a bowl. Whisk and return to pan. Bring to full boil and stir constantly. As soon as thickening begins, remove from heat and serve over white rice. You may also use one of them premade asian vegetable medleys in this recipe and pour sauce over it. Can be used for beef, chicken or pork as well. ; name: swedish pickled beets ; ingredients: beets, bay leaves, allspice berries, horseradish root, water, vinegar ; preparation:Put everything except the vinegar into a medium pot and bring to a boil. Simmer over medium heat about thirty to forty five minutes, or until the beets are tender. Drain and cool slightly. When beets are still warm, peel and cut into quarters. Place in a quart jar or other container with a lid and pour the vinegar over the beets. Cover the mixture and refrigerate for at least two days before serving. ; name: german home fried potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, red onion, garlic clove, canola oil, olive oil, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in their jackets, until done. Cool slightly and peel. Cut into thin slices while still warm. In a non-stick skillet, add a mixture of canola oil and olive oil- just enough to coat the bottom of pan. Heat oil and add potato slices, garlic, and onion. Season with salt and pepper. Saute until golden brown. Sprinkle liberally with chopped chives or parsley. ; name: easy garlic bread ; ingredients: italian seasoning, sugar, garlic powder, onion powder, milk, canola oil, egg, self-rising flour, shredded cheddar cheese, margarine ; preparation:In a larger bowl, blend together flour, cheese, sugar, both powders, and italian seasoning. In a medium bowl, add milk, oil, and egg, mixing well. Stir into wet bowl into dry bowl, until moistened. Pour into a greased 9x5-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 f for 50 to 55 minutes or until toothpick inserted near centre comes out clean. When you remove from oven, spread margarine over top with paper towel. Cool for 10 minutes in pan. Remove to wire rack and cool for 10 more minutes, then enjoy. ; name: chocolate espresso brownies ; ingredients: dark chocolate, butter, eggs, caster sugar, espresso, plain flour, salt ; preparation:

name: spinach leek cream soup ; ingredients: leek, garlic cloves, olive oil, celery salt, chicken stock, potatoes, fresh spinach, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan, soften leek and garlic in oil. Add celery salt and pepper. Add chicken stock and potatoes. Bring to boil. Cover and let simmer about 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Add spinach and keep cooking 1 minute. In blender, reduce in a creamy puree and homogeneous. Adjust seasoning. You can serve with firm plain yogurt on top. Or if you have people over, you can use whipped cream instead of yogurt. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, olive oil, kosher salt, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: kentucky kernel oven baked pork chops ; ingredients: pork loin chops, butter, egg, milk, ground black pepper, seasoned flour ; preparation:In a shallow dish combine egg, melted butter, milk and ground black pepper. Place kentucky kernel seasoned flour in another shallow dish. Dip pork chops into egg mixture. Dip pork chops into flour, covering both sides. Place in 13x19x2-inch baking pan. Bake, uncovered, in a 425 degree oven for 10 minutes. Turn chops. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes more or until done and juices run clear. ; name: roma style spinach ; ingredients: golden raisin, pine nuts, garlic, salt, ground red pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh spinach, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook raisins, pine nuts or pecans, garlic, salt and ground red pepper in hot oil in a 6-quart dutch oven over medium heat for 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic is light brown. Add spinach. Toss well to coat. Cook and stir 2 minutes more or just until spinach is wilted and heated through. To serve, sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: poached whole chicken crock pot ; ingredients: whole chickens, thyme, rosemary, sage, parsley, salt, carrots, onion, celery, dry white wine ; preparation:Rub herbs and salt into cavity of chicken. Put vegetables in slow cooker. Truss chicken compactly and place in slow cooker. Add wine. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours or on high for 4 hours. Serve hot with noodles or chill and slice. ; name: red wine essence ; ingredients: onion, carrot, garlic, celery rib, apple, vegetable oil, dry red wine, ruby port, reduced-sodium chicken broth ; preparation:

name: chocolate covered pretzels ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, vegetable shortening, pretzels, white chocolate ; preparation:Cover a baking sheet with waxed paper. In a double broiler set over simmering water, melt the semisweet chocolate with 2 teaspoons shortening, stirring gently constantly. Remove from heat. Using tongs dip each pretzel in chocolate allowing excess to drip off. Place onto waxed paper. If you are sprinkling any toppings on do it right after dipping into the chocolate so it will stick. Place the coated pretzels in the refrigerator to harden. After the pretzels have hardened place the white chocolate in a double boiler and melt over simmering water. Drizzle the white chocolate in small strands over each pretzel. Return to waxed paper and refrigerate. ; name: microwave sweet pickles ; ingredients: salt, turmeric, mustard seeds, celery seed, white vinegar, sugar, cucumbers, onion ; preparation:In small bowl mix salt, tumeric, mustard seed, celery seed, vinegar and sugar. In microwavable bowl, mix cucumbers and onion. Pour vinegar mixture over cucumbers and onion. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 5 minutes. Stir well, return to microwave for 5 minutes more. Cool. Pour into quart jar and refrigerate. Pickles are ready to eat when thoroughly chilled. ; name: frozen pineapple salad good use for those muffin tins ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, brown sugar, crushed pineapple, pineapple yogurt, pecans ; preparation:Blend cream cheese and sugars, beating well. Add pineapple and yogurt. Spoon into cupcake liners placed in a muffin tray. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Cover and freeze until firm. Remove from freezer about 10 minutes prior to serving. ; name: blackened sirloin with tex mex butter ; ingredients: butter, cumin, oregano, chili powder, thyme, cayenne pepper, sirloin steaks, blackened steak seasoning, oil ; preparation:In small bowl, combine first 6 ing. Place in refrigerater. Brush the 1 t melted butter on steak. Rub blackened seasoning on each side of steak. Let stand 30 minutes. Cut steak into 4 pieces. Preheat a heavy saucepan to very hot. Add the oil. Add steak and cook on med-hi for 6-8 minutes, to desired doneness. Serve steak with a ball of tex-mex butter on top. ; name: broiled salmon fillet with mustard dill sauce ; ingredients: salmon fillets, soy sauce, bay leaf, fresh thyme sprig ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Rinse salmon and pat dry. Arrange salmon, skin side down, in a foil-lined jelly-roll pan and rub thoroughly with soy sauce. Season salmon with salt and pepper and broil about 4 inches from heat 12 to 15 minutes, or until just cooked through. Transfer salmon to a platter and garnish with herbs. Serve salmon warm or at room temperature with mustard dill sauce. ; name: no oil carrot cake ; ingredients: white sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, carrots, walnuts ; preparation:
